courses.description:
講座に興味を持って頂きありがとうございます。
今回の講座は、製図では出来ない立体裁断の楽しさを体験してもらえる内容になっています。
様々なプロのテクニックも入れ込んでますので、
初心者の方から経験者の方まで何かしらの学びがあると思います。


・立体的に服のデザインを考える方法
・洋服作りの時間を短縮するプロのテクニック
・限られた用尺の中でデザインする方法
・素材に合わせたデザインを考えるコツ
などが学べます


私自身、立体裁断のプロフェッショナルとして約40年近く活動しています。
立体裁断は着る服にこだわりがある人ほど体験してもらいたいと思っています。
立体的に服を考えることで、着心地の良さや、どの角度から見ても綺麗なラインの出し方など
細かい部分をより突き詰める事ができます。


こだわるとキリがない程奥が深い分野ですが、
ポイントを押さえて身につけることで手軽に体験することができます
プロに作ってもらうのもいいけれど、ご自身で作ってみたいという方は
ぜひ学んで実際に作ってみてください


ご縁のある方と講座でお会いできるのを楽しみにしております
target_audience: 実際に自分で考えた洋服のデザインを形にしたい方

Basics of Textiles English Version: Polyester and Nylon - Processing, Properties and Uses

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
The Basics of Textiles course provides insights on fundamentals of textiles. It helps students get an in-depth understanding of fabric, its types, its classification, its properties, and its industrial application.
There are a variety of materials available in the market today. The use of fabrics depends on the purpose of the event. While cotton is commonly used for casual wear, glossy material is used for party wear. More often than not, it can be really difficult to choose a fabric according to the purpose of deliverables. The valuable insights in this course will guide you through the same.
The course additionally covers the fundamentals of yarn and weaving. The course sheds light on connection between the two, and how the processes are interlinked yet different.
This course will guide you to understand different fabric types, classification of materials, which properties separate one material from the other, color characteristics, and where and how are these materials used in the industry.
Beginners to intermediate to advanced professionals, being equipped with information on textiles is a must for every fashion designer, stylist, merchandiser, manager, and blogger.
This course is strategically designed to help students gain sound knowledge about the textile industry in an easy-to-understand language and engaging video content.
target_audience: 1. Anyone Who Wants to Learn Fashion designing
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, fashion merchandisers, and fashion bloggers
3. Anyone who wants knowledge about different aspects of Fashion Designing
4. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Design
5. For all entry level to advanced Fashion Designers

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Shoulder-Dart Dress PATTERN Block Course is the 6th course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Shoulder-Dart Dress Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Shoulder-Dart Dress PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Dress Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Shoulder-Dart Dress Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately and professionally using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This SHOULDER-DART Dress PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic SHOULDER-DART PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype(mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

courses.description:
Understanding the fundamentals of Fashion Trunk will help you master the art of styling garments & accessories. Any individual who wants to start their career as a fashion stylist, fashion manager, or fashion blogger should be well-versed in the Categories of Men's, Women's and Kids Wear, Different types of Garments, Trims, Accessories as well as Silhouettes & its Body Types.
Categories of Men’s Wear, Women’s Wear and Kid’s Wear – This category focuses primarily on different types of clothing designed especially for men, women and kids. Men's and kid's clothing categories did not have nearly as many alternatives as they do now. They only had a few wardrobe essentials to choose from, such as shirts, jeans, trousers, and kurtas. Brands, on the other hand, have gone above and beyond in introducing trends and fashion in men's, women's, and children's clothes during the previous few decades.
Types of Garments – Different types of garments such as shirts, jackets, vests, coats, dresses etc. are styled as per requirements and comfort of people. This section will enhance your knowledge about a variety of garments in different colors, patterns, styles and elements.
Types of Trims & Accessories – As bread & butter, lock & key, similarly, even clothes & accessories are incomplete without one another. This section focuses on teaching the elements of styling clothes with the best matched trims & accessories. You will understand the theory behind which shoes, hat, footwear, bag etc. match the designed outfit.
Silhouettes & Body Types – This topic will enhance your expertise of various types of silhouettes and styling them as per body types.
This course is strategically designed so that the students who want to learn the basics of styling will experience the ease of understanding and will be able to consume through the flow of topics. Additionally, various live and trendy examples have also been given to make the topic more interesting.

requirements: To have the desire to create unique, original handmade jewelry and understand the use of findings (cord ends, clasps and closures)

courses.description: There are some simple and affordable ways to finish the jewelry you create. There are several options, like using various findings or tying knots. After creating the pendant, you will need to hang it on a necklace. And sure you could make a beaded necklace to pair with the pendant but you can also string it onto a piece of cord. Tying a knot is probably the simplest way to end a piece of cord jewelry. It’s perfect for long necklaces that you just want to slip over your head. An advantage when using this method is that you don’t need to add a clasp to the necklace you created. For the cord ends you can also use fold-over crimp ends, which are flat pieces of metal with a flap on two sides. They have a loop on one end and a tiny spike on the other end. The spike digs into the cord and secures it. In this course, you will learn the basics of jewelry making with tips, techniques, and how to become familiar with the different findings used in jewelry creation. I will talk about how to create handmade jewelry ends and closures, in order to create esthetic jewelry that expresses your own personality. Creating handmade jewelry is relaxing and fun. If you like to create your own jewelry then this course will show you how to use closures, clasps and cord ends in order to make various types of jewelry that you can wear yourself or sell in your own jewelry shop.
target_audience: People who want to create handmade jewelry using cord ends, clasps and closures

courses.description:
Hello everyone! Welcome to this course. This course is a complete guideline on getting a successful fashion Designer. In this course you'll learn How to become a fashion Designer  and how to draw fashion sketches. I'll educate you step by step complete guideline on fashion designing.
How to Become a Fashion Designer?
There's no formal education or instrument needed to come a successful fashion Designer, but that does not make the feat any easier. To come a fashion Designer, you'll need to have a combination of delineation, sewing, and design chops, a knowledge of the fashion assiduity, and unequaled perseverance. You will also need to produce a strong fashion portfolio and strengthen your knowledge of business and finance in general.  so you will learn
How to Draw Fashion Sketches?
In the fashion section, new designs are presented in the form of hand- drawn sketches before they ’re actually cut and darned. First you draw a croquis, the model- shaped figure that serves as the base of the sketch. The point isn't to draw a realistic- looking figure, but a blank oil of feathers on which to display illustrations of dresses, skirts, blouses, accessories and the rest of your creations. Adding color and details like ruffles, seams and buttons helps to bring your ideas to life.
Fashion design has become highly competitive today. If you want to pursue a career in this industry, you will have to work harder and develop several other skills. It is not only about getting a Bachelor’s degree in Fashion Design but also about Visual Arts, General Design and even Graphic Design knowledge. That is if you really want to be the best.
It's truly inspiring for anyone passionate about fashion designing.
Designing a Fashion Collection (aka Line) is a complex process involving numerous way executed in successional order to stylish produce optimum results.
I'll take you through the factors and tools to prepare, organize, and execute the designing of your Collection/ Line.
You'll learn new language similar as Incline, Mood Boards, Draping process, Pattern drafting, Cost Wastes, Tech Packs.
You'll learn how to sketch your ideas.
You'll learn about outlines (" shapes").
You'll learn the different types of fabrics/ fabrics ( woven vs knits).
Learn to identify Target Client.
You'll explore Social Media and its significance in the promoting and dealing of your Brand.
I hope you will learn a lot from this course. Thanks

courses.description:
Become a Fashion Buyer - Learn the essentials.
This course will help you decide if becoming a fashion buyer is for you, and it will help you understand the key tasks of a fashion buyer and the skills required to become a successful fashion buyer.
Why choose this course? Because it is designed by a fashion lecturer with 10 years industry experience plus 10 years lecturing at top universities and helping thousands of students.
By the end of this course you will be in a position to understand what a fashion buyer does. You will have the confidence to either embark on further study or take the steps to securing your first job as a fashion buyer.
Section 1:
Introduction
Section 2:
You will learn the buyers main responsibilities
You will gain an understanding of the key areas a buyer is evaluated on in their role (otherwise referred to as KPI's or key performance indicators), and
You will understand the key skills required to be successful in this role.
Section 3:
Structures of buying departments are discussed – from small to large sized businesses , different types of buying roles (brand buyers to product developers) and
We will cover other staff roles in a buying department that work alongside a buyer.
Section 4:
You will understand the steps involved in planning a fashion range
Section 5:
You will gain an understanding on various sources used in predicting fashion trends for your fashion range and a checklist is provided for you to create your own trend board.
Section 6:
You will gain a good overview of the financials involved in planning a fashion range, and gain an understanding of the considerations to factor in when building a fashion range.
Section 7:
You will understand what to look at when sourcing a fashion supplier, how to evaluate a supplier and understand the different types of suppliers.
Section 8:
Understand the steps involved in negotiating with a supplier.
Section 9:
You will understand the term landed cost price and how this is calculated.
You will also understand the importance of strategies involved in setting the retail price.
Gross Profit calculations are also included in this section as it is important financial part of a buyers role.
Section 10:
You will understand the fundamental analytical functions in a buying department and gain an understanding of what an open to buy is.
There will be basic calculations and examples of an OTB.
Section 11:
You will gain an understanding of the key sales reports reviewed in a buyers role.
Section 12:
You will gain tips on the best way to land your first role. We will cover work experience, qualifications, finding available positions, cover letters and CV presentation, and interview preparation for meeting with a company.
target_audience: This course is suitable for students, recent graduates or people seeking a career change into buying.
Suitable if you are seeking a short course on buying, to help you decide whether you embark on further study in buying
Please note: this course is probably not for you if you are seeking to learn more advanced and in depth studies on fashion buying.

courses.description:
Hello everyone. My name is Pakatip. I am from Bangkok ,Thailand.
I am a fashion illustrator, painter and instructor. After I did my master degree in textiles and fashion in the UK. I then started teaching since 2007 . I have taught fashion courses and I give regular fashion illustration workshops both in my own studio and other institutions.
From my teaching, I experienced many students with zero background in fashion illustration and I know the challenges they faced during the practicing process.
Therefore I have developed an effective teaching methods that students can easily follow in order to successfully develop their skills

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Shoulder-Dart Bodice PATTERN Block Course is the 3rd course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.
Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Shoulder-Dart Bodice Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Shoulder-Dart Bodice PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Bodice Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can then, be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker is one who creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Shoulder-Dart Bodice Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately and professionally using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This SHOULDER-DART Dress PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic SHOULDER-DART PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype(mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

Bütün metotları yırtın kendiniz için düşünmeyi tekrar öğrenin herkes düşünebilir önemli olan özgür düşünebilmektir dikiş ve kalıp sıkıcı metotlarla yapılmamalı keyif alarak eglenerek yapılmalı dikiş ve kalıp aynı zamanda bir sanat terapisidir derslerin eglenceli verimli geçmesi öğrencinin bir sonraki dersi sabırsızlıkla beklemesi paha biçilemezdir eglenerek ögrenmek zor degil burda insanlar hem para harcayıp hem sıkıcı metotlarla zamanını boşa harcamamalıdır ben osman üzen 29 yıllık meslek hayatımda alaylı olarak başladığım mesleğimde çıraklık regolacılık makinacilik modelistlik tasarimcılk aşama aşama yükseldiğim bu meslekte hala ilk günkü aşkla Nişantaşı ofisimde modanın kalbindeyim özel dikim yapmaktayım bilinenin aksine Nişantaşı'nda Bir çok meslektaşımla zorlu modellerde bir araya gelip yardımlaşıyor iştişare yapıyoruz ve  bu modelin kalıbını nasıl daha pratik hızlı çıkarabiliriz nasıl daha hızlı dikebiliriz yardımlaşma içindeyiz ders alacaklara mutlak tavsiyem 1000 lerce insanı 0dan giydirmiş bir modacıdan ders almalarını tavsiye ediyorum zaten ders alanların büyük kısmı moda tasarım mezunları giyim ögretmenleri ve özel kurs bitirip belge sahibi insanlar zaten mantıklı düşünürseniz kitabı ezberleyiz neyi neden niçin yaptığını bilmeyen 1 kişiyi bile giydirmemis birisi size bunu ögretemez bu işte en iyi oldugumu asla idda etmiyorum benden çok daha iyi üstadlar var ders almak isteyenlere nacizane tavsiyem bu işi yaşayan 100 lerce 1000 lerce insanı sıfırdan giydirmiş bir modacıdan ders almaları nişantaşı piyasasında yüzde 99 u akademik teknik bilgileri metotları kullanmıyor sebebi gerçek hayatla akademik teknik bilgiler örtüşmüyor  sanatsal faliyetlerde dogaçlama yapanların yüzde 98 başarılı olurken akedemik teknik bilgilerle çalışanların yalnızca yüzde 1 başarılı olmuştur
Ölü ozanlar derneği Dead Poets Society filmini mutlaka izlemenizi tavsiye ederim
Modern toplumların bizi bir tür kalıba sokup, herkesi benzer ürünler haline getirip size nasıl bir hayatın daha iyi olacağını dayatarak, aslında olmadığınız kişiliklere yönlendirdiğini görüyoruz. Sizin lüks bir eviniz olmalı. Lüks bir arabaya binmelisiniz. En güzel kıyafetleri alıp, son model telefonlara sahip olmalısınız. Her şeyin en son çıkanına sahip olmalısınız ki mutlu olasınız! Acaba bu mutluluk mudur Hiç ölmeyecekmiş gibi yıllarca çabalayıp moderliğin dayattığı gibi sürekli borç altında yaşayarak, sürekli bir telaş içinde yaşayarak ömrümüzü tüketmek. Bu mutluluk mu acaba  Yoksa sadece bazıları böyle olması gerektiğini düşündüğü için bizde mi böyle yaşıyoruz. Filmin ana özetine gelecek olursa kutunun dışına çıkmak özgür düşünmek doğaçlama yapabilmek metotların teknik bilgilerin dayatılan kalıpların dışına çıkabilmek aynı yola daha kısa yoldan ulaşmak ve en önemlisi capri diem anı yaşa günü kavra
not bu kurs resmi degildir  özel ders  Halen Nişantaşı ofisimde kişiye Özel dikim ve modelistlik terzilik özel dikiş dersi veriyorum. Özel dersler için bana ulaşabilirsiniz dress pattern making pratik dikiş egitimi Basic to advanced sewing course for beginners
Learn the foundation of sewing skills and get the confidence to sew garments and other projects by the end of the cour
se
This course is not equipped with technical information. There is no information in the modeling course and modeling books. You can already take the modeling course. You can also buy modeling books everywhere. In this course, I will share my 29 years of professional knowledge with you. I gave one-on-one private lessons to more than 500 people. 80 percent of these people were fashion design graduates and clothing teachers. I know you will be surprised. But the people who did not go to school were learning faster and faster. The reason for this was that real life and the information in school never overlapped. Fashion design graduates said when I combined the chest and waist line, don't we combine 12 and 14? It is very dangerous to memorize the steps of the process. It is very important to know what you are doing and why, according to research conducted around the world, in artistic activities. 99 percent of those who improvised were successful. Only 1 percent of those who worked with academic technical knowledge and remained in the box were successful. Our motto is fashionable improvisation. I will explain what I did and why, not with the steps of the process. While drawing, you will know what and why you did it. Perfection is achieved by subtracting things, not by constantly adding things. I have given hundreds of private lessons. Among the students, those who had nothing to do with fashion learned much faster. The reason was that they did not have dirty information in their minds. Unfortunately, fashion design graduates learned much later. Their biggest mistake was that they memorized the steps. While explaining the practical ways, my teacher said, "Weren't we combining 1 and 12?" When I asked them why they were combining them, they froze. Memorizing is very dangerous. When you do a job, you should question what and why you did it. According to research around the world, 93 percent of those who are successful in the fashion industry were trained from the background as an apprentice. This statistic does not mean that you cannot do it. Excellence is not achieved by constantly adding information, but by clearing the mind. Being free is like a sculptor carving the stone and creating a unique masterpiece. It is nothing but being free is something very sublime. As Fiche said, go out of the box, if you improve my methods, if you add something to them, if you find new methods, you will be successful. Those who want to save time, those who want to know what they do and why, if you are ready, let's get started. I still do custom sewing and give private sewing lessons in my office in Nişantaşı, Istanbul.
target_audience: Ev hanımları Hobi edinmek isteyen kendine özel kıyafetler dikmek kalıp çıkarmak isteyen bu işi severek yapmaya talip herkes için uygundur

courses.title: How To Draft Your Pattern From An Existing Garment
courses.bio: Have you ever had a favourite dress or that vintage sample that you wish you could copy or replicate? Here's my diverse
objectives: Learn the tricks of the trade
Learn the techniques of how to take patterns from existing garments
Look at how to solve tricky problem areas and variations on specific garments
Experience different ways of how to take patterns both flat and by draping it on the garment on the mannequin
requirements: Have a basic understanding about pattern cutting and making
courses.description:
I am super excited to deliver this to you.
This course is designed for:
- Fashion students. - Industry professionals.  - Hobbyists.  - Fashion enthusiasts.
We will cover: - Taking a pattern of a simple vest top
- Looking at gathers and tucks from a skirt
- Looking at how to take a pattern of a dart
- Taking a pattern of a frill
- A brief overview of an elasticated waistband
- Comparing your pattern back to your block
- Taking the pattern of a simple sleeve
- Using a fun technique by taking a front bodice pattern of a jacket by draping fabric onto the mannequin
All of the lectures are delivered by video. The content is a fabulous introduction to the wonderful world of Pattern Cutting & Making. Which is the key skill in garment making. At the end of the course you will be ready to move forward in your pattern cutting journey.
If you want to enhance your career in one of the most competitive careers on the planet, then this is the course for you.  See you on the inside.
target_audience: Fashion Students
Industry Professionals
Aspiring home dress makers
Pattern Makers
Pattern Cutters
Fashion lovers

courses.title: Men's cape tutorial for beginners - Style3d Atelier
courses.bio: Learn to design a stylish men's cape in Style3D Atelier with beginner-friendly tools and techniques.
requirements: Even though certain beginners may not be familiar with the user interface of Style3d Atelier, it will still be easy to follow along, because the tutorial is well explained.
courses.description:
Learn to Design a Men's Cape in Style3D Atelier – A Beginner-Friendly Guide
Are you interested in digital fashion design but don’t know where to start? This beginner-friendly course will teach you how to design a men’s cape from scratch using Style3D Atelier. Whether you’re new to the software or looking to strengthen your skills, this step-by-step tutorial will guide you through the essentials of pattern creation, sewing tools, and fabric simulation.
In this course, you’ll learn how to:
Create and modify cape patterns using basic tools
Sew and assemble the garment for realistic draping
Experiment with textures, colors, and fabric properties
Finalize and export your design for presentation
No prior experience is required—just a passion for fashion design and 3D garment creation! By the end of this course, you’ll have a fully designed men’s cape and the skills to explore more complex projects in Style3D Atelier. Whether you're a fashion enthusiast, aspiring designer, or 3D artist, this course will help you take your first step into digital garment creation with confidence.
Instead of admiring these digital designs and thinking that you may want to start creating beautiful fashion designs, be enterprising and take the opportunity to join now and start designing in Style3D Atelier today!
target_audience: This course is perfect for beginner digital fashion designers who want to learn how to create garments in Style3D Atelier. Whether you're new to the software or looking to build confidence in pattern creation, sewing tools, and fabric simulation, this step-by-step tutorial will guide you through the process of designing a men’s cape from start to finish. No prior experience in digital fashion is required—just a curiosity for creating stylish and professional-looking garments in a virtual environment. If you’re interested in fashion design, 3D modeling, or garment visualization, this course is a great place to start!

courses.description:
PatternMaster Boutique , genellikle özel tasarım Tasarımcı modunda  bluz,elbise,ceket,tulum gibi ve aksesuar ürünleri sunan bir moda veya tasarım markası olarak üretilebilir. Özel tasarım ürünler ölçülere göre oluşturabilme programıdır.
Hedef kitleye uygun tasarımlar kalıp ve teknik çizim önizlemeleri kalıp detayları stillerine göz atmak ve seçip eklemek en kolay şekilde moda tasarımı yapılmasını amaçlayan bir eğitimdir. Tasarım yaka kesim kup form gibi pek çok detay özelliklerini stilize edebileceksiniz kendi gardrobunuzu oluşturup gereksiz giysi harcaması yapmayacaksınız üstünüze oturabilen yakışan kalıpları siz tasarlayın. Dikiş tutkunları için vazgeçilmez olan beş adet programdan biridir. Dikim kalıp ve stilistlik ile ugraşanlar için çok keyif verici bir eğitim olacaktır. çok kolay kullanımı ve zamandan tasarruf saglaması kullanıcılar için bu programı tercih etme sebebi mutlaka olacak Pattern master studio stil katalogu ,kalıp baskı Klasik modda pattern master stili oluşturma Tasarım ve uyum ayarları İnc veya Cm olarak kalıp metrikleri ayarlama Style sheetler kalıp yeni oluşturma kaydetme ve resetleme delete özellikleri kullanma ileri geri stillerde bakış yazıcıdan çıktı alma ve ayarlama bu oluşturulan kalıpları kullanarak 3d görselleştirme de başka programlardada yapılabilir. kullanıcılar kendi ölçülerin göre bu program sayesinde tasarım yapabilecekler hobi olarakta kolaylıkla kullanılabilecek çok kullanışlı bir yazılımdır. kullanıcı dostu bir ara yüze sahip olmaktadır. tasarım sürecinin yanında kalıp üretim gibi süreçlerdede çokça yardımcı olacak bir yazılım niteligi taşır.

courses.title: Men’s Bespoke Trouser Making Course. Module 1
courses.bio: Learn step-by-step how to make unique bespoke trousers.
objectives: Art of trousers pattern drawing
Skills of traditional bespoke techniques
Fit your patterns for various figurations
Diagnosis faults and understand required remedy
Improve your tailoring skills

Module 1. Pattern cutting: Preparation for the first fitting. Part 1
Preparation for the first fitting. Part 2
Creating bespoke master pattern for a client. Part 1
Remedy the faults of the trouser. Part 1
Remedy the faults of the trouser. Part 2

requirements: No tailorong experience required
You need sewing machine, thread, ruler, tape measure and scissors
courses.description:
There is nothing more satisfying than making one’s own clothes.
This course is suitable for beginners to professional.The trouser making is a great course and garment to start with. Someone who makes good use of their sewing machine can learn the process in a few short weeks.
Pattern Drafting isn’t just about following a system, it has as much to do about accessing figures, studying posture and recognising the human form that make us all unique to one another.
This is a step by step guide to cutting, fitting and making trousers. From this one video series, you can learn to make trousers. 70% of trouser making is machine sewing, with that last 30% being all hand work. With this knowledge  you can mix and match details to extend your client wardrobe with different fit and looks.
This course was created for people who want to develop their skills in traditional bespoke tailoring techniques.
Through a series of  video tutorials you will learn:
- Various trouser styles
- Process of measuring person
- Draft patterns
- Diagnosis faults and understand required remedy
- How to lay and cut your client’s pattern
Anyone can become a bespoke tailor. All you need is passion, patience and a ‘can do’ attitude and you will succeed.
target_audience: For tailors who just in the beginning of their sewing journey
For tailoring houses who wants to provide higher quality of services
For tailors who want to acquire the skills to become bespoke master
For Cutters and Craftsman

Temelden ileri seviyeye Moda Stilistlik çizimleri yapacağınız bu kurs içeriğinde kara kalem anatomi ve kumaş çizimlerinden moda koleksiyonu hazırlığına, Bilgisayarlı dijital moda tasarımına detaylı moda çizim uygulamaları yapacağımız bu kapsamlı kurs içeriğinde;
Baştan sona karakalem çizgi çalışmalarıyla başlayarak moda alanında yeteneklerinizi geliştirirken, hayallerinizi profesyonel tasarımlara dönüştürün.
3 Moda tasarımcısı eğitmen tarafından içeriği hazırlanan MODA TASARIM UYGULAMALARI İÇEREN BU  STİLİSTLİK KURSU
Özellikle bir moda tasarımcı adayının bilmesi gereken moda tarihinden, renk bilgisine, kumaş çeşitlerinden moda teknik bilgilerine tüm püf noktaları teorik olarak hem sohbet ederek işleyeceğiz. Dijital çizim ve illüstrasyon konusundaki uygulamaları yaparken hiçbir bilginiz olmasa bile eğitimdeki videoları izleyerek artistik moda moda çizimi ve dijital moda çizim konusunda baştan sona bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Hazırsanız başlayalım.


Neye İhtiyacınız Var?
Kara kalem: HB, 2B, 3B, 4B

Bu kurs size sadece teknik bilgi sunmakla kalmayacak, aynı zamanda hayal gücünüzü kağıda aktarmayı, gözlem yeteneğinizi geliştirmeyi ve çizim disiplininizi güçlendirmeyi amaçlıyor.
Her dersin sonunda örnek çizimler ve uygulama ödevleriyle yeteneklerinizi pekiştirecek, hızla ilerleme kaydedeceksiniz.


Neden bu eğitim setini almalıyım?
Eğitim setini satın almak isteyen, veya satın almış fakat nereden başlayacağını merak ediyorsanız bu videoyu sizin için hazırladım.
Bu eğitim seti yalnızca moda tasarımına yönelik çizim yapmayı değil moda alanında yeteneklerinizi profesyonel seviye taşıyacak bir içeriktedir. Artistik moda çizimleri yapmayı uygulamalar üzerinden deneyimleyerek yeteneklerinizi geliştirin.
Eğitimin 2. bölümünde yer alan bilgisayarlı stilistlik bölümü için photoshop, ıllustrator kullanmayı bilmeseniz bile benimle birlikte adım adım araçlar menüler ve panellerini öğrenmiş olacaksınız.
Özetleyecek olursam bu eğitim setini tamamladığınızda kendi moda portfolyo tasarımınızı yapabilleceksiniz.

courses.title: Learn to Make Handmade Jewelry
courses.bio: The basics of jewelry making with tips, techniques, and how-to become familiar with the different findings
objectives: The basics of jewelry making with tips, techniques, and how-to become familiar with the different findings used in jewelry creation.
Understand how to use handmade jewelry tools
Learn how to make handmade jewelry that they want to sell
Understand jewelry design principles and color combinations
Introduce a range of jewellery making techniques

Handmade Jewelry Techniques: Neon Green Shamballa Bracelet for Women
Making a Chain Necklace with Tiger Pendant

requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description: You probably wondered what handmade jewelry is or how it was created. It is jewelry that is made by an artist without mass production equipment. It includes handcrafted pendants, earrings or bracelets. A jewelry artist only uses his hands and simple tools to create each individual piece. Each piece is unique and expresses the personality of the artist. Handmade beaded jewelry includes easy designs, or very complicated designs. Artists can make necklaces, earrings or bracelets and using beads on a single strand of string material or on multiple strands. Mass-produced pieces simply can’t hold a light to the handcrafted made designs. Making your own jewelry is not only a fun and addictive activity, but it also has the benefit that you can wear what you create. It can seem overwhelming when you first decide you want to try your hand at making jewelry, because there’s such a great range of possibilities. Choose one medium to focus on first, whether you want to work with leather, clay, or glass. Whether you plan on working with metal, beads, clay or another type of jewelry, there are a few skills you’re going to have to know for every project you make. You will also need proper tools, to work with. At first, it may seem a high investment, but they more than pay for themselves when you’re able to create sell the jewelry you create to others.
target_audience: People who like making beautiful handmade jewelry that they want to sell.
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

courses.title: 메타버스(Metaverse) 제페토 아이템 수익 창출하기 [3D아이템]
courses.bio: 제페토 공식 크리에이터 한솔과 함께하는 메타버스(Metaverse) 제페토 아이템 수익 창출하기[3D아이템]
objectives: 제페토에서 나만의 개성있는 의류제작법
제페토에서 나만의 의류로 판매수익 창출하는 법
블렌더를 활용한 3D제페토 아이템 제작 방법
노멀 맵 및 리깅에 대한 이해
제페토 아이템 제작과정에서 가장 자주 발생하는 오류 해결법

소개: Hello! 제페토 아이템 수익 창출하기[3D 아이템]
Chapter 1. 크리에이터 환경 세팅 및 3D 템플릿 사용
Chapter 4. H라인 스커트와 A라인 주름 치마 만들기
Chapter 7. 바디가 들어간 민소매 또는 수영복 제작
Chapter 8. 본을 추가하여 떠있거나 몸에 붙지 않는 아이템 제작
Chapter 9. 노멀 맵 및 리깅에 대한 이해

requirements: 강의에 필요한 툴 사전 설치가 필요합니다.(블렌더, 유니티, 포토샵)
courses.description:
강의 Overview
강의 난이도 : 중급
강의 길이 : 8시간
필요 툴 : 포토샵, 블렌더


강의 소개
<메타버스(Metaverse)제페토 3D아이템 제작 >
제페토(Zepeto) 아이템 제작이 실질적인 수익으로도 이어질 수 있다는 점 알고 계신가요?
블렌더와 포토샵을 활용한 고퀄리티 3D제페토 아이템 제작부터 수익화 실현방법까지 함께 알아보아요!
제페토 3D아이템 제작을 배우며 한솔만의 노하우부터 블렌더 조작법, 모델링, 스컬핑, 리깅, UV편집까지 한 강의를 통해 배우실 수 있습니다.
한솔 크리에이터와 함께라면 메타버스 제페토 크리에이터가 되실 수 있습니다.


핵심역량
Design :  블렌더를 활용한 3D제페토 아이템 제작 중급 과정
Planning : 메타버스 아이템을 직접 그려보고 만들어 보는 과정


강사 소개
안녕하세요! 제페토 크리에이터 라한솔입니다. 고퀄리티 아이템을 만들기 위해서는 3D모델링 기술이 필요합니다. 무료 툴인 블렌더를 사용해 3D아이템을 제작하는 방법을 알려드리겠습니다. 저의 강의로 크리에이터 활동을 시작해보세요! 취미로 시작한 크리에이터 활동이 수익을 가져다주고, 본업이 될 수 있습니다.


주요 경력
- 제페토 공식 크리에이터
- (2021.03)제페터 클래스 멘티
- (2021.08)제페터 클래스 멘토
- (08.11~09.08)제페토 런웨이 Studio Pick
- 2021 Zepeto Fasion Hub KACON 소개


강의준비는 이렇게 해주세요
강의 시청용과 실습용으로 사용기기는 2대 준비를 권장합니다.
강의에 필요한 툴 사전 설치가 필요합니다.
- Blender 2.93.4버전 이상 권장
- Unity 2018.4.6버전 이상 권장
- Photoshop 2020(21.0.0)버전 이상 권장
target_audience: 메타버스 크리에이터로서 수익창출이 목표인 분
본인의 제작물이나 디자인을 메타버스에서 활용해보고 싶은 분
패션 또는 3D디자인에 관심 있는 분
아이템 제작 과정이 어려워 포기한 분
블렌더와 유니티 입문하고 싶은 분

courses.title: Drafting Basics 1
courses.bio: How to Draft a Basic Bodice Block (Sloper)
objectives: Special Introductory price of $24.99 for first 100 enrollments (usual price $49.99)
All the basic (must-have) & optional (good-to-have) tools for pattern drafting.
How to draft a basic bodice pattern from your own measurements (with step-by-step instructions).
How to measure key body points for accurate drafting (for all body types).
How to determine & calculate Front & Back body dimensions for drafting (and why).
How to create & rotate/pivot darts (and why).
AND get a free Measurement Worksheet download that automatically makes calculations for drafting.
requirements: A very basic understanding of sewing clothes from a pattern.
courses.description: Do you wanna make clothes that fit properly? It all starts with a good fitting basic block or sloper. That's your blueprint for making clothes of any design to fit well. It is a straight-forward process and my courses show you how with easy-to-follow, step-by-step instructions. Whatever your sewing abilities, all you need is some time and the desire to learn.
target_audience: Home sew-ers
Fashion design students
Sewing enthusiasts
Professionals in the fashion or dressmaking industry

courses.description:
MERHABA
20 YILDIR MODA TASARIM SON 10 YILDIR MODELİSTLİK İLE BİRLİKTE İŞİMİ PEKİŞTİRMİŞ BİR ŞEKİLDE ÇALIŞMAKTAYIM.


TEKNOLOJİ BENİM İÇİN BİR HUZUR, ÇOŞKU HEYECAN. İÇİNDE BİLGİSAYAR VE PROGRAM OLAN HERŞEY MERAK HELEKİ MESLEĞİMDEKİ HAYALLERİM İLE BİRLEŞECEKSE ÇOCUKSU BİR ÇOŞKU.


MESLEĞİNİ BENİM GİBİ ÇOŞKU İLE YAPANLAR, MESLEĞİNE AŞIK VE TEKNOLOJİYİ BENİM GİBİ MESLEĞİNDE DÖNÜM NOKTASI YAPMAK İSTEYENLER BU PROGRAM SİZİN İÇİN HARİKA BİR PROGMRAM.


NORMAL SÜREÇTE İLK ÖNCE KUMAŞLAR ALSESUARLARA GÖMÜLÜP, SONRA KAĞIT KALEMLE KAĞIDA DÜKÜP, BİR SONRAKİ AŞAMADI MODELİST İLE KALIPLARA GEÇİRİLEN ÜRÜNLER. MODEL MAKİNECİ İLE HAYAT DÖNÜYOR. BUDA UZUN BİR ZAMAN OLUP MERAKLA BEKLENEN BİR SÜREÇ OLUYOR.


CLO3D SANAL GERÇEKLİKTE İSE KISA SÜRE TASARIM ESNASINDA İSTEDİĞİNİZ DEĞİŞİKLİĞİ YAPARAK O BİR GÜNLÜK SÜREÇTE ÇIKAN GERÇEK ÜRÜNÜ, SANAL ORTAMDA MAKSİMUM GERÇEKLİKTE SANALDA KISA SÜREDE ORTAYA ÇIKARMA KEYFİ PAHA BİÇİLEMEZ.


PEKİ SİZ BİLGİSAYAR KULLANABİLİYORMUSUNUZ, MODA TASARIM MESLEĞİNİZDE GERÇEKTEN GEREKLİ DONANIMLAR OLAN KUMAŞ AKSESUAR KALIP VE DİKİŞ BİLGİNİZE SAHİPMİSİNİZ? O ZAMAN ŞİMDİ DAHA DİKKATLİ OKUYUN.


BU KURSTA SİZE SANAL GERÇEKLİKTE TASARIM EĞİTİMİNİ ÖĞRETECEĞİM.


BİLGİSAYAR KULLANMAYI BİLİYORSANIZ, BİRAZ KALIP VE DİKİM BİLGİNİZ VARSA SİZİN İÇİN HIZLI SANAL GERÇEK TASARIMLAR HEMEN ELİNİZ ALTINDA.


6 SAATLİK BİR SÜREDE BAŞLANGIÇ SEVİYİSİNDEN PROFESYONEL SEVİYEYE YAKIN DÜZEYDE PROGRAMI KULLANABİLİRSİNİZ.


MESAJLAR İLE EKSİKLERİNİZİ BERABER TAMAMLAYABİLİR.


MERAK ETTİĞİNİZ VİDEOLARI EN KISA SÜREDE SİZE YÜKLEYEBİLİRİM.


PROGRAMI YÜKLEMEDEN ÖNCE LÜTFEN BİLGİSAYAR DONANIMINIZIN UYGUNLUĞUNU ARAŞTIRIN. BAKINIZ TANITIM VİDEO.


EĞİTİM SÜRESİNCE ÜCRETSİZ DENEME PROGRAMINI KULLANARAK ORJİNAL İLE ÖĞRENMENİZİ TAVSİYE EDERİM.


BU PROGRAM İLE GÜNÜMÜZ TEKNOLOJİSİ İLE DÜNYANIN DÖRT BİR YANINA TASARIMLARINI SUNABİLİRSİNİZ.


ŞİMDİ ÜCRETSİZ DENEME SÜRÜMÜNÜ İNDİRİN VE DERSİMİ SATIN ALARAK TELEFONUNUZDA DERSİ AÇIN.


İZLEYEREK BİLGİSAYARDA BENİ TAKİP EDİN.


LÜTFEN YAPTIĞINIZ İŞLERİ BENİMLE PAYLAŞIN.

Moda tasarım alanında çalışanlar

Stilistler
Moda alanında çalışmak isteyenler

courses.title: Pattern Making For Fashion Design - Deep Neck Princess Cut
courses.bio: Learn to draft a Very Deep Neck Sleeveless Blouse with Advanced Pattern Making Techniques useful for Fashion Designing.
objectives: ADVANCED PATTERN MAKING for Fashion Designers. This is a beginner/intermediate/advanced pattern making course.
Design description and tools required and how to use them
Measurements required for this design
Shortcuts related to drafting of the pattern
How to read an inch tape
Drafting and cutting of back and front patterns
How to use the lining with seam allowance
How to attach fusing
Sewing back and front parts
Ironing the blouse
Hook & Eye part and Seams loading
How to attach pads
How to apply the formulas for various sizes
requirements: Required Tools: Mentioned in Lecture 4 - 1.4
There are no prerequisites to learn this pattern making course. Anyone who has a passion towards fashion can learn this course. So, you can learn this course!
courses.description:
This Pattern Making Course is about learning, the measurements required, how to draft and cut the pattern, how to use the lining and pads, and finally to give the perfect finish.


This Course is for -
Beginners who want to learn Pattern Making.
Intermediate designers who want to learn how to measure a body, draft and cut a pattern, and finally stitch the pattern.
Advanced designers who want to learn advanced techniques, and implement them in their business, to give the perfect fit to their clients/customers.


In this course you will learn -
How to read an inch tape.
Measurements required and shortcuts related to the pattern.
How to draft a deep neck princess cut sleeveless blouse, from scratch using specific measurements.
How to use the lining with seam allowance.
How to attach fusing
Sewing the entire deep neck princess cut sleeveless blouse by using pads.
How to draft this pattern for different sizes


This online advanced pattern making course consists of 25+ Lectures and 2+ Hours of video content. After finishing this course, you can sew this design easily for any size. This pattern making course is for anyone, young and old, who has a passion towards fashion and would like to learn a new skill as a hobby or to create an income from home. After finishing this course, you can try our other pattern making courses, where we teach different designs and advanced techniques.
target_audience: For people who has passion towards fashion.
For beginners if you want to learn drafting, cutting, sewing a sleeveless blouse.
For business owners or fashion designers, who wants to give perfect fit to their clients/customers.

courses.title: How To Create An Impressive Fashion Design Portfolio
courses.bio: A full guide to creating and presenting your fashion portfolio for entry into university, art college or job interviews.
objectives: How to create a fashion design portfolio to enable you to provide visual evidence of your artistic capabilities and distinguished identity
Understand the importance of your portfolio as a communication tool to positively influence universities and employers
Understand what universities and employers want to see in your portfolio in order to help them understand your artistic flare
Know what elements of your work to include in your portfolio and what to exclude
Assess your fashion portfolio against a checklist of essential elements to make your work stand out
Recognise where your fashion design portfolio needs to improve and how to do it
Learn what mistakes to avoid when submitting your work for review.

Tutor Welcome and Course Overview: Meet Your Tutor, Learn About The Course And How To Make The Most Of It
The Purpose Of A Fashion Portfolio For U: What Fashion Portfolios Are and Why We Need Them
Creating Your Fashion Portfolio In Pract: What You Can Expect To Learn In This Section
Choosing The Best Format For Your Fashion Portfolio
What To Include and Excude In Your Portfolio
The Best Ways To Organise Your Portfolio's Content
How To Physically Present Your Work In Your Portfolio
Using Sketchbooks To Enhance Your Portfolio And Show Off Your Development Ideas
How To Correctly Use Fabric Swatches, Sewing And Knit Samples
When To Include Accessory And Footwear Designs
How To Correctly Use Photos And Magazine Cuttings In Your Portfolio
Interviews and Your Portfolio: The Use Of Your CV, Certificates Or Press Cuttings In Your Portfolio
11 Mistakes You Must Avoid In Your Fashion Portfolio Submission To University
10 Ways To Stand Out And Shine Above Other Candidates
Recap and Summary: Videos And Advice Directly From Universities

requirements: You should have a realistic artistic talent in the first place as your portfolio displays this talent
courses.description:
Follow this course and learn how to create and present your fashion portfolio, so that it will inspire, impress and show off your unique talents to those that see it during university, college or job applications.
Make sure your fashion design portfolio stands out and demonstrates the artistic skills, talents and visual communication abilities you have.

This course will help:
Fashion students at all levels
People going through the application process for a university or college course in fashion design or a fashion related course
People applying for a job in the field of fashion where a portfolio is required as part of the interview process
Mature students, those on a GAP year and people in a job who want to ensure their portfolio is of the best standard it can be


After completing the course:
By successfully completing this course you can ensure that your portfolio works for you and inspires and impresses those that view it, showing off your unique and real talents. It will increase the chances of you landing your fashion design job or entry into the university or college course you dream of.
Duration - the course will take about 1.5 hours to complete.
Structure - you'll be guided by a tutor who has both fashion design and teaching experience and is a gifted designer in her own right, able to pass on her experience to you.
Materials - you will receive complimentary key learning point sheets, a portfolio check-sheet as well as personal goal plans and action planner for use during and after you have completed the course.

Tutor Support - your tutor is on hand to call upon for any support you need and to help you to make the most of the course and the time and money you have invested.

Student Discussions - the course includes an opportunity to join in with other students and discussions relating to the creation of your fashion portfolio.
Life Time Access - you have lifetime access to the course so there's no need to feel that you have to complete it within a few days. Start and finish when it suits you knowing that if for any reasons you can't complete it in one go you can always finish it later.

A FINAL NOTE:
The course will not teach you how to draw so if you have no artistic skills or need to develop your fashion drawing techniques then you should choose one of my other courses.
target_audience: Current fashion students at all levels who wish to re-inforce the quality of their portfolios to ensure they maximize the impact it makes when needed
People applying for a fashion design course with a university or college where a portfolio forms part of the application process
People that are applying for a job in fashion design or a fashion related field and where a portfolio is required as part of the job interview
Mature students, those on a GAP year and people in a job who want to ensure their portfolio is of the best standard it can be

Welcome to this fantastic beginners online jewellery making class. Come join me in this class to master these skills so that you are able to unleash your creativity within. Once you start with the basics there is no end to where this could take you, there are truly so many benefits.
Learn to make bayberry beads jewellery quickly

Create a beaded jewellery business and work from home
It is so satisfying when you buy a new outfit and wish you could have a pair of bayberry beaded bag to match or give your outfit that pop it needs. I cannot count the amount of times i have quickly whipped up accessories to wear for a special occasion or night out with friends, it is so satisfying that i have made them. Especially seeing the look on an admirers face when you tell them that it was YOU that made them. That always makes me smile and feel proud of myself.
Another skill this class will teach you is how to repair jewellery. We all have a few pairs of earrings that are missing a hook or a favourite necklace that just needs a clasp replaced. Well after this class you will be able to do exactly that and you'll be amazed how simple it is once you know how. The only thing is you'll have a queue of friends asking you to fix things!!
You will also be able to make inexpensive gifts for friends and family with your new skill. I have saved a fortune over the years by making my own gifts for my loved ones. Not only is this more special as it is handmade by you with your time and love, you can also personalise the bayberry beaded bag jewellery too, to match an outfit or make perfect for them using their favourite gemstone. It's a great gift to have and to use it to give. It also means that you don't need to fight the masses so much at the shops!! It's a win win.

courses.title: Interpret and Draw Production Sketches
courses.bio: Determine points of measurement of garment based on given specifications and measurements.
requirements: A love for fashion and the textile industry
courses.description:
In this short course, you will learn how to interpret and draw production sketches for fashion garments. You will be introduced to the various silhouettes and components of garments, including different types of collars, necklines, armholes, and pockets. You will also learn how to determine points of measurement based on given specifications and measurements.
One of the main objectives of this course is to teach you how to draw by hand the style, silhouette, seams, trims, and stitch details of a given apparel. This includes learning how to incorporate accessories and closures into your production sketches.
Throughout the course, you will have the opportunity to practice developing garment production drawings and evaluating them based on given specifications and measurements. You will also learn how to effectively communicate with sample makers using both visuals and written descriptions, to ensure that the final product accurately reflects your design vision.
By the end of this course, you will have an introductory understanding of professional-quality production sketches for your own fashion designs.


Describe the various silhouettes and components of the garment i.e. the various types of collars/neckline, armholes, sweep, pockets, etc
Determine points of measurement of garment based on given specifications and measurements
Draw by hand the style, silhouette, seams, trims and stitch details of a given apparel
Accessories and closures
Develop garment production drawing and evaluate based on given specifications and measurements
Communicate with the sample maker the style and details of the design he/she wants to achieve using visuals and written description
target_audience: Individuals who are interested to have a sneak peek into the fashion and textile industry training centre.

This course focuses only on setting stones and does not include information about jewelry fabrication.  Each of the technical demonstrations includes an overview of tools as well as a detailed description of the task.

courses.title: Alt Style - Let me teach you the basics to my Alt style
courses.bio: 15 years of of making alt clothing
objectives: The first part of the course is an introduction and overview of everything I have learned about fashion and my style over the past 15 years.
The second part covers basic outfits or base outfits, colour coordination, and matching
The third part focuses on statement pieces such as leather jackets, vests (denim or otherwise), and suit jackets.
The fourth part is about the making of the statement pieces. Here, I will go over how to sew patches, paint on leather, stud jackets, add chains, and how I org
The fifth part covers how to add accessories to achieve a fine balance between being extra but not over the top.
requirements: No experience needed
courses.description:
Hello and welcome! My name is Switch, and I'm thrilled to be your instructor for this new course on alternative fashion.
I've spent years in the alternative fashion scene, developing a style that's all my own. In this course, I'll be sharing my knowledge and expertise on how to create a wardrobe that's truly unique and expressive.
I'll take you through the process of crafting and sewing patches onto jackets and vests, studding and painting leather jackets, and much more. You'll learn how to mix and match textures, patterns, and colors to create a cohesive look that reflects your personality and style.
As someone who's deeply passionate about alternative fashion, I'm excited to help others express themselves through their clothing. Join me in this course, and let's create a one-of-a-kind wardrobe together.
Throughout this course, I'll be sharing the tips and tricks that I've learned over the years on how to create alternative fashion looks that are both stylish and comfortable. From selecting the right fabrics to choosing the perfect accessories, I'll guide you every step of the way.
I understand that alternative fashion can be intimidating to some, but my goal is to make it accessible and fun for everyone. Whether you're a seasoned alternative fashion enthusiast or a newcomer to the scene, this course is designed to help you discover and refine your personal style.
I'm excited to be a part of your journey towards expressing your true self through your wardrobe. Let's dive in and explore the world of alternative fashion together!
target_audience: Anyone

courses.description:
O mundo evolui a uma velocidade desafiante. Novos programas, aplicações e tecnologias surgem constantemente, prometendo ajudar-nos a ser mais produtivos, criativos e diferenciados. No entanto, para aproveitar ao máximo estas ferramentas inovadoras, é fundamental ter um conhecimento sólido que abranja as diversas etapas da elaboração de um projeto de moda, considerando todas as suas variáveis. Afinal, se fosse fácil, todos teriam uma marca de moda, não é verdade?
Neste curso, vais aprender os fundamentos essenciais para te tornares um designer de moda, explorando os imprevistos que podem surgir ao longo do processo e recebendo dicas valiosas para ultrapassar os desafios do dia a dia. Com um método passo a passo, irás desenvolver uma coleção única e memorável, utilizando as ferramentas adequadas e as orientações especializadas fornecidas pelas tuas professoras, que possuem mais de 30 anos de experiência no mercado internacional. Vamos também ajudar-te a perceber o quanto o mercado em que estás inserido é importante e de que forma pode direcionar as tuas escolhas. Além de técnicas práticas, terás a oportunidade de explorar a criatividade e a originalidade que te permitirão destacar-te neste universo fascinante. No final, sairás equipado com mais competências e conhecimentos, pronto para abraçar o teu projeto com confiança.
Este curso é o teu passaporte para o universo da moda!

courses.description:
Adobe Photoshop is the industry's leading program for digital design. As fashion designers, we should know this program. This program may seem complicated at first, but you can also do great work using very basic tools. With this course, we will do fashion illustration work in Photoshop. You can apply every step with detailed videos. The videos may seem a bit long, but overall the digital drawing process is a bit long. We will do our work using a graphic tablet. If you do not have a graphic tablet, you can review the information sheet about it.
In the second part of the course, you will learn how to draw and color a figure, starting from the sketch stage. Then you will learn how to create fabric folds and textures with the graphic tablet using different brushes. In this section, we will draw floral bustier, denim shorts skirt, slippers and earrings.
In the third part of the course, we will draw the front and back figures on the template. We will tone the figures in detail. Then we will draw a plaid jacket and dress on this figure. This section will be added soon.
In the fifth part of the course, we will draw the front and back figures and color them in detail. And in the sixth part, we will draw shirts and jeans on these figures.
We will draw a front and back wedding dress on the figure we drew in the 7th part of the course. In this section, we will also draw crowns, necklaces, earrings and shoes.
In the ninth section, we will draw front and back figures. And in the last part, we will design a bralette, tulle blouse, leather skirt and ankle boots.
Start learning now with Start Now Fashion.

requirements: To have the desire to create unique, original Bohemian handmade jewelry
To want to learn about the tools and findings and learn how to use them in order to make Bohemian handmade jewelry
courses.description: Bohemian jewelry represents a recent trend towards a more natural fashion style. With unusual combinations of simple natural materials, this type of jewelry values self-expression and individualism. Boho jewelry has been popular across generations and is usually made by hand. This course will show you how to make different types of Boho jewelry from specific materials. Jewelry was created to enhance a person's beauty. In the past, people created jewelry to exhibit their power and rank. Now wearing accessories has become a trend with an increasing number of people preferring to wear handmade jewelry. Did you think often about buying jewelry that is handmade? Handmade products are considered to be more expensive due to the extra time, work, and materials used in manufacturing them. In the jewelry-making business, tools and techniques are important to create really unique pieces that will attract the attention of buyers. Anyone who has received handmade jewelry as gifts will confirm that those pieces are unique and are easy to identify as handmade items. People who select to make jewelry on their own always make sure that their design is unique and defines their personality. The freedom of making personalized designs is made possible by a wide range of materials available for buying such as crystals, plastic, metals, or gemstones. So, if you love Boho jewelry if you are interested in understanding the basic jewelry-making techniques and want to know more about the Bohemian style of jewelry, then this course is for you. You will learn how to use wood, shell, glass, beads, or metal in order to create various Boho jewelry items that you will be able to wear yourself, offer as a gift or sell if you decide to make your own shop and turn your hobby into a business.

courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás todos los conocimientos que necesitas saber para crear tus primeras prendas de ropa de principio a fin.
Comenzarás conociendo qué es un patrón y otras definiciones.
Después aprenderemos a tomar medidas, interpretar un cuadro de tallas y entender cuales son las medidas necesarias para realizar un patrón de costura.
Luego realizaremos los patrones básicos más importantes que te permitirán crear diferentes prendas como corpiños, blusas, diferentes tipos de mangas y vestidos.
Aprenderemos sobre telas, cuál es la mejor manera de manipularlas, como se cortan los patrones y que dirección de la tela es la indicada.
A partir de cada patrón realizaremos una prenda para practicar lo aprendido desde la aplicación de las medidas, el patrón, el corte y la confección.
Al final de este curso tendrás todos los conocimientos teóricos y prácticos para crear tus propias prendas.
Tendrás 3 prendas terminadas hechas por ti de principio a fin, un crop top, una blusa con mangas y un vestido con mangas.
Por último recuerda que tendrás diferentes recursos de apoyo, un libro con todos los patrones aprendidos con instrucciones, el cuadro de tallas con las medidas comúnmente utilizadas, un diccionario de moda con los conceptos más importantes del curso, la hoja para tomar medidas y muchas cosas más.
Este es el curso más completo de Moda, Patronaje y Costura que encontrarás con todos los conocimientos y patrones base que necesitas para realizar cualquier tipo de prenda femenina.
¡Te espero en el curso! Que lo disfrutes.

courses.title: Merch Micro Niche Blueprint - Make Merch By Amazon a Success
courses.bio: Discover and Evaluate Profitable Micro Niches on Merch By Amazon and Help Make Your T-Shirt Business a Success
objectives: LEARN how to generate ideas for potential micro niches
DISCOVER the 3 must-have constraints that every micro niche needs to satisfy
FIND OUT the 5 nice-to-have criteria that I like my micro niches to follow
LEARN how to fully capitalise on a Micro Niche Strategy

An Introduction to the Course: Introduction to the Merch Micro Niche Blueprint
BONUS SECTION: BONUS LECTURE: How To Source Fonts For Your Designs
BONUS LECTURE: Expanding Your POD Business Further

requirements: At least a basic knowledge of Merch By Amazon
You should be willing to treat Merch by Amazon as a T-Shirt business
courses.description:
Why are Micro Niches so important?
Merch is becoming more and more well known and, as a result, there are now more and more of us creating  t-shirt designs, as well as designs for hoodies, Popsockets and even phone cases, for sale on Amazon.
Whereas, before it was relatively easy to capatalize on a trend or a holiday design, it is now becoming far more difficult, simply because of all the extra competition.
Does this mean that Merch is saturated? No, not at all. Fortunately, there are still a myriad of opportunities out there, for us to take advantage of, in the form of Micro Niches - that is to say, those hobbies, interests, past times, relationships and professions that a small percentage of the population really care about.
What’s more, at this present moment in time, relatively few designers are actively creating designs that satisfy the demand in these micro niches. Perhaps because they are harder to find than trends and holidays or possibly because they are not considered to be worth chasing.
Indeed, it may well be true that you are not going to get rich from a single design that targets a micro niche, but let me ask you this, is it better to play the lottery of chasing the latest trend with tens of thousands of competing designs, where your design effectively becomes a “needle in the haystack”, or to consistently make a couple of sales each and every month from a large proportion of the t-shirt designs that you upload to Merch?
So what makes the perfect Micro Niche?
I have created the Merch Micro Niche Blueprint to help identify what makes the perfect Micro Niche. The 8 point BluePrint has been split up between 3 Constraints (or Must have elements) and 5 Criteria (or Nice to have elements).
The course also covers a number of tips and tactics that I personally use when looking for potential micro niches that I can create a design for, as well as strategies for capitalizing on micro niches once you have discovered them.
Specifically, this class will cover:
The 3 main sources I use to generate ideas for potential micro niches
The 3 MUST HAVE Constraints that every micro niche needs to satisfy
The 5 NICE TO HAVE Criteria that I like my micro niches to follow
Different ways to fully capitalise on a Micro Niche Strategy
So join me today and follow the Merch Micro Niche Blueprint if you are serious about taking Merch by Amazon to the next level.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to earn a substantial passive income online
Anyone who is struggling to get regular sales on Merch By Amazon

This Fashion styling courses is certainly for fashion stylist, designer, blogger, artist and creator. It trains the students to showcase their work and style as a professional stylist. It  sparks their  inner designer spirit we at Indian Design League helps amateurs, professionals, experts & entrepreneurs to turn their specialized knowledge, talents, and abilities into a career & business that works so well that they can live a lifestyle that they want and achieve peace of mind, financial Freedom and a Career for Life.

objectives: Progettare una collezione di moda fast fashion

Sdifettare i capi e fare le size charts ovvero la griglia taglie per i cartamodelli

Dall'idea alla pratica: Progettazione della collezione PT. 2 - Dal disegno alla produzione
PRODUZIONE PT.1 DAL PROTO ALLA PRODUZIONE
Social Media Marketing: Social Media Marketing - Come posizionare il proprio brand

requirements: È un corso aperto a tutti: principianti e professionisti
courses.description:
Il corso è rivolto a tutti i fashion designers, di ogni livello e a tutti coloro che amano la moda e vorrebbero aprire un proprio brand. Le scuole di moda in tutta Italia, hanno un modello di insegnamento improntato sulla creazione di collezione d'atelier, d'alta moda, da pret-a-porter, invece io vi preparerò alla progettazione di una collezione che deve essere prodotta in pochi mesi per la vendita in negozi medi e medio/alti, per negozi sportswear e brand commerciali.
Quale è la differenza? L'iter è completamente diverso e le tempistiche sono al doppio se non al triplo delle normali richieste. Inoltre la filiera produttiva, lavora in maniera differente in scala rispetto ad un atelier. La griglia taglie, per esempio, non è basata su un sartoriale o su misura, ma su gradings commerciali quindi i proto vanno sdifettati in una maniera diversa per far si che una taglia S vada bene a più fisici diversi tra loro.
Inoltre c'è il fattore logistico e burocratico che le scuole di moda non toccano da nessun punto di vista e che invece, per costruire un brand o una collezione, è importante conoscere ed inserire nel proprio business plan.
Questo è il corso della moda del futuro, di quello che richiede oggi il mercato.
target_audience: Insegnare a realizzare una collezione di moda vendibile, che può esser venduta 2 mesi dopo nel negozio della via di fronte casa. Un iter completamente diverso dall’alta moda e pret a porter

courses.title: Developing Adaptive Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design
courses.bio: The product development paths and design considerations of developing adaptive fashion through adaptive design.
objectives: Students will learn what adaptive design is and the benefits and challenges.
Students will learn how adaptive design differs from universal design.
Students will learn the process for developing adaptively designed fashion.
Students will learn what to consider in the adaptive design process.
requirements: Please take Introduction to Adaptive Fashion, History of Adaptive Fashion, Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion, Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive, and Adaptive Fashion Market Overview prior to taking this course.
courses.description:
In this course, Developing Adpative Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design, we will begin to look at the process of actually developing adaptive fashion. This course focuses specifically on developing adaptive fashion through adaptive design. While this course is geared towards designers, technical designers, product developers, and production managers, learning what goes into developing adaptive fashion will also benefit merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. The prerequisites for this course are:
Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion
Course 2: History of Adaptive Fashion
Course 3: Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion
Course 4: Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive
Course 5: Adaptive Fashion Market Overview
Following a brief instructor and course introduction in lecture 1, lecture 2 will introduce you to adaptive design, universal design, and hacked clothing. Lecture 2 will also compare the benefits and challenges of adaptive design. In lecture 3, you will learn the two product development paths for adaptively designed fashion. The first product development path is modifying an existing garment. The second product development path is creating an adaptively designed product through research and development. Split into two parts over the last two lectures, we will cover the considerations to take into account when using adaptive design to create products.
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Product developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion merchandisers, buyers, production managers, e-Commerce specialists, and marketers who want to expand their knowledge of all facets of the adaptive fashion industry.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: A Complete Embroidery Course: Beginner to Pro
courses.bio: Learn 20 Essential Stitches and Create Beautiful Projects
objectives: Introduction to Embroidery
Essential Tools and Materials
Preparing to Stitch - Getting Your Tools and Materials Ready
20 essential embroidery stitches

Introduction: Introduction to Embroidery Tools and Materials
Mastering Essential Stitches: Preparing to Stitch: Getting Your Tools and Materials Ready
Tracing Patterns and 10 Beginner-Friendl: How to Trace Embroidery Patterns onto Fabric

requirements: No Experience Necessary!
No prior knowledge of embroidery, fabric types, or needlework is required. We'll start from the very basics!
courses.description:
Embark on a creative adventure with this comprehensive beginner's guide to hand embroidery! Join me, Shanas, a professional embroiderer, as we explore the fascinating world of stitching. In this course, you'll learn everything you need to know to get started, from the basic tools and materials to mastering 20 essential stitches.
Section 1: Essential Tools and Materials
Introduction to Embroidery
What is hand embroidery?
Different types of embroidery (Brazilian, Japanese, Applique, Hardanger, etc.)
Benefits of embroidery (relaxation, creativity, self-expression)
Fabric:
Types of fabric suitable for embroidery (linen, osnaburg, cotton)
Choosing the right fabric for different projects
Preparing fabric for embroidery (washing, ironing)

Needles:
Types of embroidery needles (tapestry, chenille, crewel)
Selecting the right needle for different threads and fabrics
Threading a needle (with and without a needle threader)

Hoops:
Types of embroidery hoops (wooden, plastic, spring tension)
Different shapes and sizes of hoops
How to use an embroidery hoop

Threads:
Types of embroidery thread (stranded cotton floss, silk, metallic)
Understanding thread weights and colors
Recommended brands (Anchor, DMC)

Scissors:
Embroidery scissors vs. regular scissors
How to use embroidery scissors safely

Floss Organization:
Floss bobbins and organizers
Tips for storing and organizing embroidery floss

Preparing to Stitch:
How to pull out an arm's length of thread
How to separate or split strands of floss
Choosing the right number of strands for different effects
Tying a knot in the end of the floss
Attaching fabric to the hoop
Adjusting the fabric for even tautness
Finishing the backside of the hoop
Tips for tightening the hoop with a screwdriver

Optional: Hoop Stands:
Introduction to hoop stands
Benefits of using a hoop stand
Different types of hoop stands (desktop, lap)
Demonstrating how to use a hoop stand
Section 2: Mastering Essential Stitches


Lesson 1: Stitch Basics - 5 Essential Stitches to Get You Started
Backstitch
Running stitch
Split stitch
Stem stitch
Couching stitch

Lesson 2: Expanding Your Stitch Repertoire - 5 More Essential Stitches
Chain stitch
Cross stitch
French knots
Twisted chain stitch
Blanket stitch

Lesson 3: Essential Stitches - Part 3
Satin stitch
Herringbone stitch
Fly stitch
Chevron stitch
Feather stitch

Lesson 4: Mastering Stitch Techniques - The Final 5
Long and short stitch
Fishbone stitch
Lazy daisy stitch
Bullion stitch
Cast-on stitch
Section 3: Embroidery Transfer Methods and Beginner-Friendly Designs


Embroidery Transfer Methods

Direct Tracing: Learn how to trace designs directly onto fabric using a light source (window or lightbox) and a water-soluble pen or pencil.

Lightbox Tracing: Discover the benefits of using a lightbox for accurate and efficient design transfer, especially for intricate patterns.

Carbon Paper Transfer: Explore the traditional method of using carbon paper to transfer designs onto fabric, suitable for darker fabrics.

Printable Sticky Stabilizer: Learn about this modern method that allows you to print designs directly onto a stabilizer, which is then adhered to the fabric.

Tissue Paper Techniques: Discover how to use tissue paper to transfer designs, a versatile method suitable for various fabric types.

10 Beginner-Friendly Embroidery Designs

Mountain & Sun: Practice your straight stitch and chain stitch with this scenic design.

Cute Elephant: Stitch an adorable elephant using back stitch and detached buttonhole stitch.

Coconut Tree: Create a tropical scene with couching stitch, bullion knots, and straight stitch.

Sunset at the Lake: Capture the beauty of a sunset using running stitch and straight stitch.

Dragonfly: Stitch a delicate dragonfly using braided chain stitch and outline stitch.

Coffee Cup: Embroider a cozy coffee cup with twisted chain stitch and split stitch.

Dancing Couple: Stitch a whimsical dancing couple using stem stitch and whipped running stitch.

Bird: Create a charming bird design with back stitch and Portuguese knotted stitch.
Leaf: Stitch a detailed leaf using heavy chain stitch and outline stitch.
Snail: Embroider a cute snail using split stitch and palestrina stitch.
target_audience: This class is all about discovering the joy of embroidery. We'll focus on basic stitches, exploring different textures, and having fun with the creative process.
Since it's a beginner's course, the most important requirement is an eagerness to learn and explore embroidery.

courses.title: Visual Merchandising Basics
courses.bio: A comprehensive visual merchandising course for aspiring interior designers and retailers
objectives: 1. Introduction to visual merchandising
2. How to attract customers to your store
3. How to select themes, styles, lighting, materials, and understanding retail layouts
4. Branding and budgeting in visual merchandising

Visual Merchandising Hinglish Version: Principles of Design and Composition in VM
