requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Has it ever happened that you come across a shop in a mall or an independent building, some elements in the window of a store like a mannequin or any other design captures your attention, you take a peek inside and enter the store?
It has happened with nearly all of us. Have you ever noticed what led you to the store in the first place? The Visual Merchandising basics course is strategically designed to make you aware about such elements.
The course is categorised into four main sections which are explained in 12 independent topics. The four categories are -
Introduction to Visual Merchandising
Elements of Visual Merchandising
Branding and Signage
Budgeting and Preparation
The first section introduces you to the concept of visual merchandising, its importance, its history, roles and responsibilities of a visual merchandiser, and principles of design in VM. The second section covers different elements of VM that will help you elevate the appearance of a store like themes, style, props,materials, lighting, mannequin styling, and layout. This section will guide you through the same.
The third section will help you understand key details and significance of branding and signage. Case studies of national and international brands have been provided to make learners understand the importance of different elements in VM.
One of the most vital aspects in any field is budgeting. The last and the fourth section throws light on the same.
The purpose of this course is to acquaint amateur, aspiring, and professional individuals, retailers, entrepreneurs, and interior designers with practical and theoretical insights on visual merchandising.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn a new skill
2. Retailers who want to update their team on visual merchandising
3. Anyone who wants to know how to attract customers to their retail store through visual merchandising
4. Aspiring and professional artists, students, interior designers and retailers
5. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design

courses.title: Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive
courses.bio: The approaches to dressing, target audience roles, and monetary considerations of the adaptive fashion customer.
objectives: Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the adaptive fashion customers.
Students will learn the different ways people with disabilities approach dressing.
Students will learn about the different target audiences in adaptive fashion.
Students will gain an understanding of the monetary considerations faced by the adaptive fashion consumer.

Molly Farrell Shares Her Experience as a: Molly Farrell Shares Her Experience as an Adaptive Fashion Customer

requirements: No prior adaptive fashion knowledge or experience needed, just an interest in learning about adaptive fashion and becoming a more inclusive member of society! It is recommended that you have taken Introduction to Adaptive Fashion, History of Adaptive Fashion, and Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion prior to taking this course.
courses.description:
Understanding who the adaptive fashion customer is absolutely essential to every component of adaptive fashion. This course, Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive, covers approaches to dressing, target audience roles, and monetary considerations of the customer. This course is intended for individuals in the fashion industry interested in learning more about adaptive fashion. This course will benefit designers, technical designers, production managers, merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. Although no prerequisites are needed for this course, it is recommended to take Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion, Course 2: History of Adaptive Fashion, and Course 3: Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion before taking this course.
Lecture 1 provides a brief instructor and course introduction. Lecture 2 will introduce you to the adaptive fashion consumer. Building upon the consumer introduction, in lecture 3 you will learn about the two approaches to dressing used by consumers with disabilites. Within adaptive fashion, the person wearing the clothing isn't always the person purchasing the clothing. Lecture 4 will introduce you the three roles with the target audience of adaptive fashion. In lecture 5, we will cover the impacts of money on our adaptive fashion consumer in order to ensure we truly understand our customer. In our last lecture, Molly Farrell of All Fashion Able shares her experience as an adaptive fashion customer and advocate for finding fashion that works for everyone
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Fashion merchandisers who want to learn about merchandising adaptive fashion.
Production managers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Product developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion buyers who want to learn about adaptive fashion.
E-Commerce specialists who want to learn about adaptive fashion e-commerce.
Marketing professionals who want to learn about marketing adaptive fashion.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: How to Crochet Hats the easy way.
courses.bio: A course for free spirits with a flare for uniquely hand made items.
objectives: How to crochet hats the easy way.
requirements: A crochet hook and yarn of choice.
courses.description:
I love crocheting and knitting and have done so since I was a little girl. My mom and grandmothers taught me the basics when I was back in Italy and I learned the rest through trial and error.
In this course, I teach you how to go from knowing nothing about crocheting to being able to start and successfully finish your project giving it a little personal flair.  Patterns are great but for free-spirits like myself can be a little stressful and boring, not to mention... one has to count constantly and actually pay close attention to the pattern.
This course is designed to teach you the basics so you can start free-styling in a manner of hours.
If you are like me and enjoy making things with your hands as much as reading a book, this may be the course for you. I don't focus on terminology or different stitches, I just teach you the simple things you need to start and what to look for in the beginning and I guide you through the project so you can develop your own style.
As I use this type of work to relax and think about my actual work and projects at work I have developed a full-proof way to make hats and scarves without having to actually count nor follow a pattern.
I will also include my personal routine of what I do to make the experience even more relaxing and how I use energy healing while preparing pieces so to truly be guided by the universal guiding spirit into each and every piece I produce. As a Reiki Master Teacher, I value the spirit's guidance and try to apply it in everything I do, including practical pranks I try to pull on April 1st!
If you are looking to make a gift for this holiday season...this is the course for you.
If you are not a true beginner...this is not the course for you. If you find veganism and energy healing topics triggering this is not the course for you either as I speak about all kinds of stuff in different sections of this course because it's all part of the healing process. I don't shame others for their choices, I just cover the topics because it is important. This is not a course designed just for learning the basics of crochet, this is a course designed for those who wish to also learn a bit about energy healing and how we can use these techniques with EFT Techniques and crafting.
Much Love~
target_audience: Beginner Only

courses.title: Jewelry Design Course 1/3
courses.bio: Sketching and designing jewellery
objectives: Jewelry design
Understand how lights affect gemstones
Different parts of a diamond
Shading gemstones, cabochons, beads and pearls
Sketching different jewelry pieces
requirements: No prior knowledge required
courses.description:
This course is the first step of the mile stone journey into jewelry design. We are going to learn how to draw gemstones, different cuts and shapes. And we will sketch together several jewelry pieces. We will start by understanding lights effects on basic objects, gemstones, cabochons, and pearls. We are going to have exercises to practice what we learned all along the class. And as a final project you are going to sketch a very unique piece of jewelry. After this course you will be able to draw and sketch jewelries and turn your ideas into reality.
I still remember the first jewelry drawing I made, and believe me practice makes perfect. Knowing technical side of drawing will allow you to improve considerably.  In the exercises section, I only gave you the minimum and it is always good to double or triple the amount asked.
Please share anything you drew with me, I will be very glad to see the results and give you any advices or further explanations.
This class is part (1/3) of the series that I will be making about jewelry design, it is beginner friendly and easy to follow.
Part (2/3) is how to paint jewelries using watercolor
Part (3/3) is how to draw jewelry digitally, and I will be designing a real jewelry order with you.
So if you are interested to join my class, I thank you sincerely for your support.
target_audience: Anyone interested in Jewelry design and wants to develop his skills

objectives: Learn The Best Fashion Design Prompt Formatting System
Secret ChatGPT and Bard Formula
Learn How to use Reference Images
Create Harmonic Clothing Collections
Variations and Style in Clothing
Create Creative Fashion Design Clothes
Secret of Creating Elegant Outfits and Wedding Dresses
Turn Your Sketch into an Amazing Realistic Photo

Quick Start: Learn The Best Fashion Design Formatting System
Magic Result with Prompt Formatting plus ChatGPT and Bard Formula
Creative Process: Secret of Creating Elegant outfits and Wedding Dresses
Turn Your Sketch to an amazing Realistic Photo
Add your design to your fav location
Fix any image prompting by using the system

requirements: Midjourney Subscription Plan
courses.description:
In this comprehensive masterclass, you will embark on a creative journey to learn the art of fashion design and bring your unique clothing ideas to life. Led by industry experts from Midjourney, an innovative fashion tech company, this course combines the power of AI technology and your creative vision to transform your designs into stunning realities.
Course Lessons:
01- Learn The Best Fashion Design Formatting System: Discover the most effective formatting system used in the fashion design industry. Gain a solid foundation in organizing your designs, creating sketches, and communicating your ideas clearly.
02- Magic Result with Prompt Formatting plus ChatGPT and Bard Formula: Harness the power of AI to enhance your design process. Learn how to use prompt formatting techniques with ChatGPT and the Bard formula to generate magical results and unlock your creative potential.
03- How to use Reference Images: Explore the importance of reference images in fashion design and learn effective techniques for utilizing them to enhance your designs. Discover how to gather inspiration, analyze trends, and incorporate references seamlessly into your work.
04- Harmonic Clothing Collections: Master the art of creating cohesive and harmonious clothing collections. Learn how to curate a collection with a unified theme, color palette, and aesthetic, ensuring each piece complements and enhances the overall vision.
05- More Variations and Style: Expand your repertoire of design variations and styles. Discover techniques to create diverse clothing options while maintaining your unique signature style, enabling you to cater to a wider audience.
06- Create Creative Fashion Design Clothes: Unleash your creativity and create fashion designs that push boundaries. Learn how to think outside the box, experiment with unconventional materials, and incorporate innovative elements into your garments.
07- Secret of Creating Elegant Outfits and Wedding Dresses: Dive into the secrets of creating elegant and sophisticated outfits, with a specific focus on wedding dresses. Explore design elements, fabric choices, embellishments, and tailoring techniques to achieve timeless and breathtaking results.
08- Turn Your Sketch into an Amazing Realistic Photo: Learn how to transform your fashion design sketches into realistic and captivating visuals. Discover techniques for rendering fabrics, adding texture, and creating lifelike representations of your designs.
09- Add Your Design to Your Favorite Location: Explore the art of contextualizing your designs. Learn how to visualize your clothing in various settings, such as fashion runways, editorial shoots, or virtual environments, enhancing their impact and showcasing their full potential.
10- Fix Any Image Prompting by Using the System: Develop problem-solving skills to overcome any challenges you may encounter during the design process. Learn how to utilize the system effectively to troubleshoot and refine your designs, ensuring they align with your vision.
Why Students Should Watch This Course:
Comprehensive Skill Development: This masterclass covers a wide range of topics, providing students with a holistic understanding of fashion design, from foundational principles to advanced techniques.
Fusion of AI and Creativity: By combining AI technology with your creative abilities, this course offers a unique opportunity to leverage the power of automation while maintaining artistic expression, resulting in extraordinary designs.
Industry-Insider Knowledge: Led by experts from Midjourney, a renowned fashion tech company, this course provides insights into industry standards, trends, and best practices, equipping students with valuable insider knowledge.
Practical Application: Each lesson offers practical exercises and real-world examples, enabling students to immediately apply what they learn and refine their skills through hands-on experience.
Personalized Learning Experience: The course encourages individual creativity and tailors the learning experience to meet students' unique interests and design preferences, fostering their personal growth as fashion designers.
Versatility and Adaptability: The skills acquired in this masterclass are applicable
target_audience: Fashion Designers: Those who want to incorporate AI technology into their design process and explore new possibilities in clothing creation.
AI Enthusiasts: Individuals with a passion for AI and machine learning who wish to apply their knowledge in the context of fashion and clothing design.
Fashion Students: Students studying fashion design who want to expand their skills and learn how AI can enhance their creative process.
Tech Professionals: AI developers and engineers looking to specialize in the fashion industry and contribute to the evolution of clothing design through AI.
Entrepreneurs: Those interested in starting a fashion-tech venture and want to understand how AI can be utilized in clothing design and customization.
Fashion Industry Professionals: Individuals working in the fashion industry who want to stay ahead of the curve and adapt to the growing influence of AI in the field.
Creative Professionals: Artists and designers from diverse disciplines who want to explore the fusion of AI and fashion to push the boundaries of artistic expression.
Anyone with Curiosity: Essentially, anyone with an interest in both fashion and AI, regardless of their background, can benefit from gaining insights into this exciting emerging field.

courses.title: Pattern Making for Fashion Design -PART 1- Essential Skills!
courses.bio: How to Use Pattern Making Principles and Techniques to Draft and Manipulate Patterns to Create Your Fashion Design Ideas
objectives: PATTERN MAKING for Fashion Designers. This is a beginner/intermediate course on how to draft patterns, and some draping.
You will learn the Principals of Pattern Drafting (Dart Manipulation, Added Fullness, Contour).
You will learn Techniques such as Pivoting and Slash-and-Spread.
You will learn to draft an A-Line Skirt.
You will learn to draft a Yoke unto a skirt and Add Fullness to the skirt.
You will learn how to draft Princess Stylelines/Seams. And Darts, Pleats, Tucks.
You will learn Grainlines and how to label Patterns. Including Notches and Seam Allowance.
requirements: No requirements or prerequisite
courses.description:
This Course is about using the techniques of pattern making, also known as pattern drafting, in fashion design, to create patterns that will then be used to cut fabric and ultimately be sewn into garments.
Methods and techniques studied in major fashion universities are demonstrated in a clear and simple visual demos so that anyone interested in learning about fashion design can, and will learn the foundational principles of fashion design. New terminology is clearly explained and applied to the subject matter.
As a fashion designer, pattern making is essential in learning how garments are created and put together.  A good fashion designer must learn pattern making in order to really understand the construction of his/her designs.
This course will empower you to be a better fashion designer, give you more creative options, establish the foundations for a successful fashion brand or elevate your existing one.
VIDEOS + DEMOS:  In this course students will learn:
Basic Principles of pattern-making such as Dart Manipulation and Added Fullness and Contour.
Students will learn techniques such as Pivoting and Slash-and-Spread.
New terminology such as Slopers and Blocks and Darts, Pleats, Tucks, Yokes, Princess Seams, Shirring, Apex, Notches.
Where patterns come from: Draping muslin bodice on dress form.
Drafting Princess Seams.
Drafting an A-Line skirt.
Drafting Skirt Yokes and adding fullness to skirt.
Grainlines and Pattern Labeling.
Trueing Darts.
Tools necessary for drafting patterns.
Manipulating darts from one position to another, from one "angle" to another, will increase the number/amount of options available to you and expand your creative reach. Included in this Class is the Draping process, which when used creatively will enhance the ability to develop new and exciting fashion designs.
Once the muslin has been draped, transferring the information to paper is essential. Also, the different types of paper used in the industry to develop patterns.
Learning how to take a simple skirt and by the use of adding a Yoke , you can develop new ideas and spark your imagination to endless possibilities.
Labeling a Pattern correctly can mean the difference between a beautiful design versus a disaster! Thus learning how to label a pattern correctly is very important -- the industry demands perfection when it comes to being accurate and precise.
And the use of proper Grainlines can be the difference between cutting the garment correctly or cutting it "the wrong way" and thus having to cut it all over again.
Getting to know, and familiar with, all the necessary tools used in the industry, makes the difference between a professional and a novice when going for a job interview.
All lectures delivered by VIDEO with detailed DEMOS of the applied techniques.
When working with a designer you must know, and be familiar with, the proper terminology, techniques, principals, of pattern drafting so that communication is clear and understood in order to execute a garment accurately. Deciding on which technique to apply to a design, not only expedites the process but the right choice produces optimum results.
Learning how to use an existing pattern, maybe something that you bought at your local fabric store, and, by applying the principals and techniques learned in this course, you can transform the original design into a new idea, will give you confidence and experience.
Pattern making is essential in learning about the construction of a garment. And learning pattern making and garment construction can help you in the design process. Knowing pattern making will help you in knowing what is possible and what is not when it comes to designing a garment, or how to design a garment.
Knowing pattern making is valuable not only in the design room but also in production. If something goes wrong in the factory and the reason is due to a pattern mistake, you must know what to do and how to fix the pattern and/or remedy the situation.
Because pattern making is a very specialized skill, and not everyone can do it, the financial compensation for a pattern maker is usually very high. A pattern maker is a very valuable asset to a company and is treated with respect and rewarded accordingly.
There is a need for good pattern makers in the industry and this Course will give you a good idea if this is a good career for you.  If you are a person who likes accuracy, precision and details, this career can generate a very good financial income for you.
Pattern making is one aspect of the design process and an essential one in order to be a good fashion designer.
target_audience: Students should have a strong interest in Fashion Design.
Students eager to learn how to draft patterns so that they can (potentially) design and cut and sew their own clothes.
Students who want to expand their knowledge of Patternmaking and garment construction.

courses.title: Making African and Reggae Jewelry
courses.bio: Learn How to Make African and Reggae Jewelry
objectives: How to make African and Reggae jewelry
Understand how to use handmade jewelry tools
Learn how to make handmade jewelry that they want to sell
Understand jewelry design principles and color combinations
Introduce a range of jewellery making techniques

Necklaces: Necklace with Leather Cord and Sliding Knot
Bracelets: Cowrie Shell Bracelet with Sliding Knot

requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description: Selling handmade jewelry can be a great way to supplement your income and it can even become your main source of income. You can turn your hobby into a job. To make your own jewelry you only need a few tools, findings, some beads and a lot of imagination. The process of stringing beads and tying knots requires patience and practice. You must learn a few fundamental jewelry making techniques, and you'll also need some specific supplies. When you're starting out making handmade jewelry, you should begin by experimenting using inexpensive materials. It’s a pleasure to create your own jewelry, whether you want to use it yourself, give it as a gift to your friends or sell it in your own online store. When it started out in Jamaica in the 1960s, reggae music was considered a mix of different music styles, Jamaican Mento and contemporary Jamaican Ska music, along with American jazz and rhythm & blues. The earliest reggae lyrics spoke mostly of love, specifically romantic love. But as the music moved into the 1970s, reggae started taking on a heavy Rastafarian influence. Now the love being sung about was not just romantic love, spiritual love, the love of God, or “Jah”. Regarding jewelry, colors like green, yellow and red are fundamental and they stand for the Ethiopian flag.
target_audience: People who like making beautiful handmade jewelry that they want to sell.
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

Understand the fundamentals of cutting a 6 piece skirt (how to calculate for each panel that makes up the 6 pieces)
Learn how to fold, mark the fabric using your measurements, and cut your style.
Learn how to install an elastic waistband.

Kurs Hakkında
Bu kurs, modelistlik alanında A’dan Z’ye her şeyi öğrenmek isteyenler için tasarlandı. Moda ve tekstil sektöründe başarılı bir modelist olmanın yolu, sadece elde kalıp çıkarmayı bilmekten değil, aynı zamanda bu beceriyi dijital ortama taşıyabilmekten geçiyor. Gerber gibi kalıp yapımı programları, günümüzde modelistlerin iş akışının ayrılmaz bir parçası haline gelmiş durumda. Bu kursta Sektörde en çok tercih edilen, sektörün %70'ine tek başına hakim olan Lectra Gerber programını kullanacağız. Ancak çoğu eğitim programı, bu iki beceriyi ayrı ayrı öğretiyor; önce elde kalıp çıkarma, sonra bilgisayarda uygulama. Bizim kursumuz ise fark yaratıyor: Hem geleneksel kalıp çıkarmayı hem de bu kalıpları dijital ortamda Lectra Gerber programı ile oluşturmayı aynı anda öğrenmenizi sağlıyor.


Neden Bu Kurs?
Tekstil ve moda endüstrisinde fark yaratmak isteyen bir modelist için hem geleneksel hem de dijital becerilere sahip olmak büyük bir avantajdır. Genellikle modelistlik eğitimi alanlar, ilk etapta manuel kalıp çıkarma tekniklerini öğrenir ve zamanla bu becerilerini bilgisayara taşır. Ancak biz, bu süreci hızlandırarak, sizlere elde kalıp çıkarma ve bilgisayar destekli modelistliği bir arada sunuyoruz. Bu kurs sayesinde, Lectra Gerber programının sunduğu tüm olanaklardan faydalanarak, işlerinizi daha hızlı, doğru ve profesyonel bir şekilde tamamlayabileceksiniz. Ayrıca kurs ile beraber Gerber Programının her ikonunun detaylı anlatıldığı ikon kullanım kitapçığı materyallar kısmından indirip kurs ile beraber kullanılabileceksiniz.
Kursta çıkaracağımız her kalıbı kitapta da takip edebilmek ve incelemek için kullanılan kitap PDF formatında öğrenciye teslim edilecektir.


Sektörde Fark Yaratın


Bu kurs, size hem geleneksel hem de dijital modelistlik tekniklerini  benzersiz püf noktalar bir arada sunarak, sektörde rakiplerinizden öne çıkmanızı sağlayacak. Bilgisayarlı modelistlik yetenekleriniz Gerber programı ile beraber, iş başvurularında büyük bir avantaj yaratırken, elde kalıp çıkarma becerilerinizle de sektörde geniş bir yelpazede çalışma fırsatına sahip olacaksınız. Bu eğitimle, modelistlikte bütüncül bir yaklaşım benimseyerek, kariyerinizde önemli bir adım atacak ve tekstil dünyasında aranan bir profesyonel olacaksınız.
target_audience: Moda Tasarımı mezunu öğrencilere
Modelistliği Sıfırdan A’dan Z’ye öğremek isteyen herkese

courses.title: FUNDAMENTALS OF FASHION STYLING
courses.bio: Discover fundamentals of Fashion Design and styling for different body shapes; get styling industry outlook.
objectives: Introduction to Styling – Insights about Different types of Styles
Styling Career & Industry Outlook
Basics of Styling Matrimony
Introduction to Body Shapes & Dressing Ideas – Pear, Inverted Triangle, Rectangle, Hourglass & insights about dressing as per particular body shape.
Developing your own Signature Look
Challenges in Styling Career

Introduction: Body Shape – Pear Shape & Its Dressing Ideas
Inverted Triangle (Strawberry) Shape & Its Dressing Ideas

requirements: Open to all Learners
courses.description:
Understanding the fundamentals of fashion styling will enhance your profession as a “Stylist”. Any individual who wants to start their career as a fashion stylist, fashion manager, or fashion blogger should be well-versed about different types of styles, Styling Career & Industry Outlook, understanding basics of Styling Matrimony, Introduction to Body shapes & their dressing ideas, developing your signature look as well as challenges in Styling Career.


Introduction to Styling – This particular topic focuses on the basics, significance, types, and concepts of styling in the fashion industry. It will also teach you the basic difference between fashion designing and fashion styling. Laying brick is the foundation of the building, similarly, the basics of styling will enhance your fundamentals as well as provide deeper insights into this domain.


Styling Career & Industry Outlook – To succeed in the field of Fashion Styling, one must have a thorough understanding of the fashion industry, market trends, designer labels, as well as marketing and advertising. This section will help you improve your abilities as a professional stylist in the rapidly growing fashion industry.


Basics of Styling Matrimony – This section is based on the idea of the “5 wives-1 husbands” Rule. This particular topic will enhance your profile-building skills as per the client’s requirements, occasion, body type you will learn the fundamentals of curating a client’s look appropriately.


Introduction to Body Shapes & Dressing Ideas – This section will introduce you to a variety of body shapes as well as ideate dressing as per body requirements. The topic focuses on various body shapes such as Pear, Inverted Triangle, Apple, Rectangle & Hourglass with adequate dressing ideas.


Developing your Signature Look - Working as a fashion stylist offers a fascinating opportunity to express your enthusiasm for style with many interesting individuals right from working with celebrity clients to styling models for photoshoot. This curriculum is created to help you develop your signature look while also broadening your creative and innovative perspectives.


Challenges in Styling Career – In this section, we'll understand the various problems that come along with a Styling Career, as well as how to overcome them.


This course is strategically designed so that the students who want to learn the basics of styling will experience the ease of understanding and will be able to consume through the flow of topics. Additionally, various live and trendy examples have also been given to make the topic more interesting.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn about Fashion Styling.
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers.
3. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Styling.
4. Anyone who wants knowledge about Introduction to Styling, Basics of Styling Matrimony, Introduction to Body Shape & Dressing Ideas and many more.
5. For all entry level to advanced Fashion Stylists.

courses.title: How to Create a Fashion Design Portfolio - Essential Course
courses.bio: Learn to craft a professional fashion design portfolio: brand profiles, mood boards, line plans, flats, illustrations.
objectives: Crafting a Brand Profile Page that highlights their personal or brand identity.
Developing a Customer Profile Page to align designs with target audience needs.
Designing a Mood & Color Page that sets the visual tone for collections.
Assembling a Line Plan Development Page for cohesive design planning.
Creating Sketching Pages, including professional Flats and Illustrations.
Understanding and producing Tech Packs to convey construction details.
Selecting fabrics, balancing lines, and mastering key design techniques.
Writing compelling Cover Letters tailored to the fashion industry.
Presenting their work in a polished and contemporary format for career opportunities.

Crafting a Fashion Design Portfolio: LESSON 1 - Part 1 - Introduction of the Instructors.
LESSON 1 - Part 2 - Example of End Product.
LESSON 4 - Part 1 - Portfolio Page 3 - Mood & Color.
LESSON 5 - Portfolio Page 4 - Fabric by Color.
LESSON 8 - Review Final Designs and Intro to Flats: Adobe Illustrator or By Hand
LESSON 9 - Hand Flats (Flats drawn by hand).
LESSON 12 - The Process: The Creation Process of Your Portfolio (Sofia)
LESSON 13 - Detail Page: Part of a Tech Pack. Adobe Illustrator. (Sofia)
LESSON 14 - Cover and End Page. Review the Portfolio.
My New Book: "Design Your Future-Be A Future Designer"

requirements: A basic understanding of fashion design concepts (helpful but not mandatory).
Access to tools like sketchpads, design software (e.g., Adobe Illustrator), and portfolio materials for hands-on application.
A willingness to learn and an interest in creating or enhancing a fashion portfolio.
courses.description:
In the world of fashion design, a compelling portfolio is your key to standing out and unlocking opportunities. This comprehensive course will guide you through every step of creating a professional, impactful fashion design portfolio that showcases your creativity, technical skills, and unique design perspective.
Designed and taught by two seasoned industry professionals, this course provides you with the tools and knowledge needed to present your work with confidence and precision; Create a Stunning Fashion Design Portfolio That Opens Doors.
This course is designed for both newcomers entering the fashion industry and seasoned professionals seeking to refresh their portfolios, stay current, and align with contemporary market trends.
Learn to craft essential portfolio elements like brand profiles, mood boards, and customer profiles
Master technical skills, including sketching flats, developing line plans, and creating tech packs
Understand fabric selection, design techniques, and construction details to elevate your designs
Gain insider tips and industry insights to align your portfolio with professional expectations


Course Overview
This course uses a step-by-step approach, combining in-depth explanations with high-quality video demonstrations. Every module is crafted to ensure you not only understand the concepts but can also confidently apply them to build a standout portfolio.
We begin with foundational topics like creating a Brand Profile Page, which defines your aesthetic and identity as a designer. From there, you'll learn to craft a Customer Profile Page that aligns your designs with target market needs. Next, we’ll dive into the Mood and Color Page, teaching you to visually articulate your design inspiration and set the tone for your collection.
As you progress, you'll tackle the technical aspects of portfolio creation. Develop a Line Plan Development Page to map out cohesive collections, and build skills in Sketching Flats and Illustrations, ensuring your designs are clearly and professionally represented. We’ll also explore elements like Tech Packs to communicate technical specifications, and provide guidance on fabric selection, line balance, and construction details.
But this course isn’t just about the technical; it’s about presenting yourself as a well-rounded designer. You’ll learn to craft a compelling Cover Letter and understand how to curate a portfolio that tells a cohesive story about your design philosophy.
With practical exercises, real-world examples, and expert tips, you’ll feel empowered to create a portfolio that resonates with industry professionals.
This Course is designed and created by Nino Via, Founder & Creative Director of ‘Fashion Premier Academy’, and Sofia Elin Bernardez, Fashion Designer at ‘Beyond Yoga’ — a winning combination of knowledge, experience, and wisdom.
What You’ll Gain
By the end of this course, you’ll walk away with:
A complete fashion design portfolio that highlights your skills and creativity
A deep understanding of how to organize and present your work to impress hiring managers or clients
Technical skills that elevate your designs and improve your professional refinement
The confidence to share your portfolio with the fashion industry, whether applying to jobs, internships, or showcasing your work at events


Course Content & Topics
The journey begins with an introduction to the course, where you'll meet your experienced instructors and learn about their credentials and motivation for teaching. This course is perfect for anyone aspiring to become a fashion designer, regardless of their current level of experience. You'll start by understanding the purpose of a portfolio, what makes a great one, and how to maintain a clean, professional layout throughout. Visualizing the end product from the outset, you’ll be encouraged to document your process meticulously, capturing every step with photos and screenshots.
Creating a strong Brand Profile is your first major task. You'll begin by defining your brand name and determining its category and market segment, which will help you set appropriate price points. Competitor Research will sharpen your understanding of the market landscape, guiding you to choose three key competitors for in-depth analysis.
Next, you’ll develop a detailed Customer Profile, bringing your target audience to life with specifics like name, age, occupation, income range, and clothing budget. Delving deeper, you'll explore their lifestyle, hobbies, favorite vacation spots, drinks, music, and sports. This vivid, personalized profile will be enriched with a Pinterest collage that captures the mood and preferences of your ideal customer, providing a clear visual reference for your design work.
With your Brand and Customer Profiles established, the course will guide you through mood and color development. Choosing a season for your collection, you’ll be introduced to invaluable industry resources such as: WGSN, Vogue, Pantone, and Pinterest. You'll learn to harness these tools to identify themes and color palettes that align with your brand and season. Through collaborative Mood Board creation, you’ll select a balanced range of warm and cool colors, ensuring your palette is both cohesive and visually appealing. Key design details will be identified to serve as foundational elements for your future creations.
Understanding Fabrics and their applications is crucial in fashion design. You'll explore the concept of deliveries and confirm your chosen seasonal colors, complemented by 2-3 core colors. Selecting top weight, bottom weight, and novelty fabrics, you’ll either draw from known fabrics or venture to fabric stores for inspiration. Assigning colors to each fabric type, you'll integrate these choices into your portfolio layout, providing a tactile dimension to your design vision.
Developing a Line Plan is a fundamental skill you'll master next. You'll learn the importance of line balance, distinguishing between core basics and fashion-forward pieces.
Fabric usage will be optimized, and Pinterest will serve as a rich source of inspiration for silo variety. Your line plan will include essential pieces like core tops and pants, seasonal tops, fashion-forward bottoms, dresses, jumpsuits, and outerwear.
Through quick sketching and artistic draping, you’ll refine your designs, using market research and forecasting insights to ensure they are on trend and market-ready. Questions about silos, details, and construction will help narrow down your choices, ensuring a cohesive and unified collection.
Technical skills are paramount, and you’ll delve into CADs and Technical Sketches. Understanding the role of CAD Flats, you’ll be introduced to AI sketching and key points to consider. Practice with sketching, both manually and digitally, will prepare you to integrate these elements into your portfolio. Options for adding style numbers, descriptions, and color chips will be explored, enhancing the professional quality of your work.
For those seeking advanced knowledge, the course offers an introductory lesson on creating Tech Packs. You’ll understand their importance and components, working on a design detail callout page for one of your creations. This advanced insight will add a professional edge to your portfolio, demonstrating your readiness for industry demands.
Finally, you'll create a professional Cover Page and End Page for your portfolio, and receive tips on crafting a compelling resume and acing job interviews. Exploring top fashion schools around the world, you’ll gain a broader perspective on educational opportunities.
By the end of this course, you will have created a stunning, professional fashion portfolio that showcases your unique design vision, technical skills, and creative process. This portfolio will be an invaluable tool in advancing your fashion career, whether you’re applying to fashion schools, internships, or jobs in the industry.
This course equips you with the essential tools, techniques, and mindset to take your fashion design career to the next level. Join us and start building the portfolio that will set you apart!
target_audience: Aspiring Fashion Designers: Students new to the industry who need to create their first portfolio.
Current Fashion Professionals: Designers aiming to update and modernize their portfolios to align with current market trends.
Fashion Enthusiasts: Individuals exploring fashion design and seeking to present their creative ideas professionally.
Job Seekers in Fashion: Those applying for roles in fashion design, merchandising, or related fields who require a standout portfolio.

objectives: Fashion Rendering
Flats & Crocky Drawing
Pattern creation in Pattern Tool
Layout Design

How to Draw Flats: Apply Texture on Button Down Shirt

requirements: Illustrator basic knowledge will help although not necessary
Adobe Illustrator Subscription
courses.description:
In this class you will learn how to draw technical flats quickly by using Adobe Illustrator. This class provides easy to follow step-by-step instructions to get you up and running quickly.
We start from basic flats drawing like T-Shirt and then then draw Button down shirt and skirts. After completing digital sketching work we fill color and apply texture on flats. After completing drawing and texturing work we also discuss how me make layout for finished professional work.
Throughout this course you will learn to use Adobe Illustrator to create detailed flat fashion drawings. I will introduce you to the basic functions of Illustrator and gradually build your skills; teaching you techniques and short cuts to create interesting and industry standard CAD drawings
The concepts and techniques are the knowledge that I’ve learned from several courses and teachers combined with my own personal techniques to deliver you a simple and easy way to develop skills in the fashion illustration.
Every lecture includes supporting Illustrator work files so that students can follow the lecture exactly


Who this course is for:
This course is for anyone who is interested in fashion illustration.
This course will benefit those who are planning to attend a fashion school and need some preparation.
Advanced learners are also welcome.
target_audience: Graphics Designing and Fashion Designing Students

courses.bio: El curso mas completo con enfoque en sastrería en donde aprenderás paso a paso como hacer una chaqueta smoking
objectives: Todos los conocimientos básicos de cómo hacer una chaqueta estructurada.
Cómo tomar medidas y cuáles se necesitan para la chaqueta.
A desarrollar el patrón básico de chaqueta con el que puedes hacer todo tipo de diseños.
A desarrollar el patrón del diseño de una chaqueta con cuello smoking.
Cómo sacar el despiece del patrón de acuerdo a cada una de sus partes (forro, falso, entretela, cogotera, bolsillos)
Cómo hacer el tendido y el corte de la chaqueta
La técnica para fusionar la entretela en prendas estructuradas.
Cómo manipular correctamente el paño.
Cómo hacer la confección de un cuello tipo smoking.
Aprenderás a hacer un ojal de ribete
Como hacer un bolsillo de ribete
Te enseñaremos como poner una hombrera, pieza fundamental en prendas estructuradas
Las terminaciones al detalle que se le deben dar a una chaqueta.

Patronaje de base de chaqueta: Desarrollo de base de chaqueta delantero
Desarrollo de base de chaqueta espalda
Interpretación y desarrollo del patronaj: Interpretación de manga de chaqueta smoking
Unión de delantero y ubicación de bolsillo
Unión del delantero y la espalda
Planchado de solapa y costura de hombreras
Unión de forro con chaqueta y terminaciones

requirements: Tener una maquina de coser
Conocimientos básicos de como usar una maquina de coser
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás todos los conocimientos que necesitas saber para hacer desde cero una chaqueta con cuello smoking.  Al final sabras:
- Empezarás aprendiendo cómo tomar medidas y cuáles se necesitan para la chaqueta, ya que estas se utilizaran para hacer el patrón a medida.
- Después te enseñaremos a desarrollar el patrón básico de chaqueta con el que puedes hacer todo tipo de diseños mas adelante.
- Y por último en cuanto el proceso de patronaje sabrás cómo interpretar un diseños y haremos el patrón de una chaqueta con cuello smoking, para finalizar sacando el despiece del patrón de acuerdo a cada una de sus partes (forro, falso, entretela, cogotera, bolsillos)
- Continuaremos con el proceso manual y empezarás aprendiendo cómo hacer el tendido y el corte de la chaqueta
Y ya entrando en la etapa de confección aprenderás:
- La mejor técnica para fusionar la entretela en prendas estructuradas.
- Cómo manipular correctamente el paño.
- Cómo hacer la confección de un cuello tipo smoking.
- Te enseñaremos como hacer un ojal de ribete y un bolsillo de ribete.
- Conocerás como poner una hombrera.
- Y para finalizar te enseñaremos las terminaciones al detalle que se le deben dar a una chaqueta .
Al final de este curso tendrás todos los conocimientos teóricos y prácticos para crear tus propias prendas estructuradas.
Tendrás 1 prenda terminada hechas por ti de principio a fin.
Por último recuerda que tendrás diferentes recursos de apoyo, el cuadro de tallas con las medidas comúnmente utilizadas, un diccionario de moda con los conceptos más importantes del curso, la hoja para tomar medidas y muchas cosas más.
Este es el curso más completo de sastrería que encontrarás con todos los conocimientos y patrones base que necesitas para realizar cualquier tipo de chaqueta.
¡Te espero en el curso! Que lo disfrutes.

objectives: An overview of the fashion industry, including the various roles and responsibilities within it.
The specific role and responsibilities of a fashion agent, including how to build relationships with clients, negotiate contracts, and manage brand partnerships

courses.description:
Welcome to "How to Become a Fashion Agent," the ultimate course for anyone looking to start a career in fashion representation. This course is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the fashion industry and the role of a fashion agent, as well as the skills and tools you need to succeed in this exciting field.
In this course, you will learn the basics of the fashion industry, including the various roles and responsibilities within it. You will then dive into the specifics of the fashion agent role, covering topics such as building relationships with clients, negotiating contracts, and managing brand partnerships.
Throughout the course, you will have access to real-life examples and case studies, providing you with a practical understanding of the industry and the day-to-day tasks of a fashion agent. You will also have the opportunity to practice and apply your newfound knowledge through a series of exercises and quizzes.
By the end of the course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of what it takes to become a successful fashion agent, as well as the skills and tools you need to get started in this exciting and rewarding field. Whether you're looking to launch a new career or take your existing career to the next level, join us for "How to Become a Fashion Agent" and start your journey today!
target_audience: for anyone interested in breaking into the fashion industry or pursuing a career as a fashion agent

courses.title: Decluttering your wardrobe: Learn to declutter with purpose
courses.bio: Declutter Your Wardrobe: Learn How to Declutter with Purpose, Declutter Effectively with decluttering tips simplified
objectives: Select clothes based on the colour palette
Learn how to choose clasic and versatile pieces
How to build strong wardrobe foundation
Discover your style
Reduce fashion mistakes and impulse buying
Create a more organised closet acording to your style
Learn the benefits of owning less
Learn how to create your purpose statement
Learn how to work through it step by step

Minimalist Wardrobe: Understanding the concept of minimalist wardrobe
The advantages you'll experience in the process
The best method to start with
Getting to work: Organizing the wardrobe
Follow the best ones at minimalism

requirements: Be willing to revise your wardrobe for 3 months or a seasonal try
courses.description:
Do you have an overstuffed closet and need help? Would you like to try a closet transformation? This course teaches you every step, including tested methods for identifying your personal style. Here you'll find tips for choosing the right clothes that will match your style and help you feel confident every day.
And don't worry, the best part is you don’t have to trash all your clothes and buy new expensive items. We’ll work with what you already have, adding just a few key pieces if needed to elevate your wardrobe.
What we'll do is apply the concept of creating a combination of versatile items that can fit together in endless combinations. This simple yet powerful approach ensures that your wardrobe is functional and stylish.
Just imagine this: you can create countless outfits with less than 50 items in your closet. Think of the time and energy you’ll save when getting dressed every morning!
If you’re looking for a way to simplify and improve your wardrobe, you’ve come to the right place. Owning a minimalist wardrobe, which consists of a limited amount of clothing, will—believe it or not—set you free! It’s a lifestyle change that brings clarity and ease to your daily routine.
What happens when you build your own minimalist wardrobe?
Know exactly how to declutter your old clothes without feeling overwhelmed
What are the core pieces for a wardrobe, and how can you find them?
Discover the key values to effectively curate your wardrobe and stick to your style
Reduce fashion mistakes and impulse buying while embracing a more sustainable approach
This course is your guide to transforming not just your closet but also how you think about fashion and personal style. Let’s make it happen!
target_audience: Anyone who feels is overwhelmed by their wardrobe
Anyone who wants to overcome consumerism
Anyone who wants to live a more organised life

8. Vermiş olduğum eğitimle tüm bu işlemleri en basit ve hızlı bir şekilde yapabileceğinizi göreceksiniz. ..
9. Moda Tasarım dünyasına yenilikçi bir bakış açısı kazanmış olmanızla beraber tüm bu işlemleri çok hızlı bir şekilde gerçekleştirebilir olduğunuzu fark edeceksiniz .

14. Clo 3d programında çalışmış olduğunuz kalıbı da dışarı aktar aracı ile dışarı aktarıp . farklı bir kalıp programında kullanabilirsiniz..

courses.bio: Dress according to your physique, body size, body type, weight, complexion and so on.
objectives: Understand business dressing etiquette
Learn corporate dressing for men
Learn corporate dressing for women
Learn corporate dressing and personal grooming
Learn corporate dressing for workplace success
Learn corporate dressing for personality development
Learn personal grooming tips for men
Learn personal grooming tips for women

Learn awesome clothing tips no woman should ever miss

Corporate Dressing For Men: Neutral colors such as blue,grey, white, khaki, black are hit in corporate side
Make sure your sleeves touch the base of your hand
Avoid wearing chunky necklaces or too any bracelets to work
Hair should neatly combed for a professional look / avoid chewing gum at work
Corporate Dressing For Women: Wearing cloths that fit you well make you feel confident at work place
Its always wise to dress according to your office culture
Avoid see through dresses, spaghetti tops, blouses with deep necklace
Female executives should avoid wearing heavy jewelry to work
Your handbag must go with your outfit and compliment your overall look
Corporate Dressing And Personal Grooming: Corporate dressing play a crucial role in enhancing one;s personality
You need to feel about the way you look
Personal grooming and corporate dressing go hand in hand
Male professionals need to: shave daily, comb hair well, trim his nails, etc.
Female professionals need To: tie hair in a neat ponytail or bun, smell good etc
Corporate Dressing For Success At The Bu: Corporate dressing helps you climb the ladder of success in the short time
Corporate dressing makes you feel confident and fresh throughout the day
Corporate dressing help you get noticed and stand apart from the rest
Corporate Dressing For Personality Devel: Remember what you wear speaks volumes about your personality
Corporate dressing goes a long way in enhancing one personality
Being well dress make a good impression on others
Personal Grooming Tips For Men: don't use hard soap on your face
Use good quality razor when it comes to shaving
Get an appropriate hair cut done according to the shape of your face
Take care of the fit of your shirt and trouser / maintain an active lifestyle
Personal Grooming Tips For Women: don't keep long hair if you cannot maintain it
Nothing look better than a glowing and healthy skin
Female should remove hair around lips / dress sensibly
General Dressing Tips: Dressing rules all men should learn

requirements: Our target is people who want to:
Dress to stand out among their peers
Dress to be unique in your team
Dress to gain positive reputation
Dress to signal you are well organize
Dress to show your readiness and preparedness to work
courses.description:
It is rightly said that " a man is known by his dress and address" donning the right business attire will not only help you make the mark of your own but climb the success ladder in the shortest possible time time span.Do not pull anything from your wardrobe and wear it to work. Remember you cannot wear wear you party outfit to work just because it is expensive and look good on you. It is not necessary that a shirt that look good on you five years ago will still look good on you today. Know what you are wearing. Do not step out of your home unless you see yourself in full length in the mirror.
Do not wear loud colors to work. Blue, Charcoal grey, white, black, khaki are essentially some colors which every business wardrobe should have. Colours based on a neutral color palette look good at the workplace. Be very careful about the fit of your dress. Do not wear something which is too tight or too loose on you. Females ought to avoid body hugging and revealing tops to work. Dress with a deep necklace are not meant to be worn at offices. Skirts should not be above the knee. Females should prefer wearing flats to work. Avoid being a make-up box. Females with long hair can tie their hair in a neat bun or a high pony tail.
target_audience: human resource professionals, women, fashion men, corporate staff, public workers, private workers, corporate institutions,workers, everybody, students, entrepreneurs, business people, managers, companies, marketers, researchers,consultants,business moguls etc

courses.title: The Complete Guide to Dart Manipulation
courses.bio: 2 techniques, 5 applications, 5 bonus learning points
objectives: Methods of dart manipulation, how to move the positions of darts and how to properly label a pattern.

requirements: Basic pattern making and sewing skills
courses.description:
As a fashion designer, it is crucial to not simply learn how to sew a dart, but also understand how to use darts and manipulate them to achieve the perfect design detail for your clothes.  Darts are more than simple garment additions. They require key techniques that enable you alter the darts to achieve the look of your garment. The Complete Guide to Dart Manipulation from Martwayne shows how to apply key dart manipulation techniques to achieve several variations.


This fashion course is for you if:
· You are a fashion designer who is unable to achieve your desired designs because of dart placements;
· You want to improve on your creativity as a fashion designer;
· You want to improve your pattern making skills;
· You want to become a fashion designer;
· Own a fashion line or you intend to start your ready to wear line.


What the Complete Guide to Dart Manipulation from Martwayne offers you


This online course offers you the flexibility to learn anywhere and anytime at your convenience.
With this course, you get:
· Bonus Modules: This course gives you access to 4 bonus modules for free
· Higher Income Opportunity: Increasingly, there is a demand for those with unique skills, who can creatively manipulate basic techniques to create unique designs. This sets you apart and positions you to charge higher for the added value you are now able to offer clients.


Here is a glimpse of what you learn in this course:


Core Modules: Dart Manipulation Techniques and Application


· Explore the possibilities available with dart manipulation
· Learn the slash and spread method of dart manipulation and how they are used in 3 applications
· Learn the pivotal technique of dart manipulation and practise in 2 applications


Bonus Modules


· Know your pattern making tools
· Understanding technical drawings
· How to label a pattern for commercial purposes
. Course recap


We know first-hand what it feels like to learn new concepts in order to improve skills and charge higher prices. We also understand how challenging some students find online learning.  Our Online Courses were also created to get our courses to learners who do not live in our location but want to benefit from our knowledge.


Why are we so confident you will get the best from our Online Course? Simple! We teach our concepts from scratch because we also learnt the concepts from scratch in a very relaxed atmosphere. Learning new concepts can be daunting but we had to make it fun for you! I learnt everything from scratch myself. We are GREAT at what we do!
It's time for you to take that plunge too and start to earn some serious income from your fashion business!


Here's to Your Success...
Tope Williams-Adewunmi
Founder, Martwayne | Fashion School
target_audience: Fashion lovers who want to boost their skills to improve their services and earn a higher income.

courses.description:
In this short course, we will be drafting a skirt and simple culottes from scratch using CLO3D software. These base patterns are necessary to start creating your own modifications and designs on the pattern. Check also our other courses for a fitted and simple bodice block pattern with sleeves! Keep an eye on the Fashion Innovators Academy Courses as we will also add a new modifications course very soon!

The course will start with a basic lecture about pattern making, body types and how to take measurements. Also, a few videos of learning the main navigation and tools of CLO3D are included in the course. But do not worry, no steps are skipped in the videos and all tools that are used are explicitly explained on the go.

All instructions are also included as course materials so it is easier to follow and iterate the process later on with your measurements.

IMPORTANT! You can also follow the same steps when drawing your pattern on paper. You can also do both, check the fit in the real-life pattern and then make necessary changes in CLO.
You can later reiterate the process with your measurements.
No former fashion or CLO3D experience is needed.

requirements: Nociones básicas de manejo del ordenador
Pasión por la moda, la imagen y el estilo
courses.description:
No es lo mismo vestirse para acudir diariamente al trabajo, que para salir a cenar con unos amigos o acudir a una boda elegante. Gracias a este curso conocerás los diferentes tipos de estilo en el vestir, aprenderás a elegir el vestuario adecuado a las distintas situaciones cotidianas, conocerás en profundidad las características del traje de Etiqueta para actos protocolarios, y lo mas importante, entenderás la importancia de encontrar tu propio estilo para conseguir sacar lo mejor de ti mismo.


Con este completo y actualizado curso descubrirás que saber vestir adecuadamente te aportará seguridad en ti mismo y te hará mostrar tus mejores cualidades. Además en un bloque adicional te voy a proponer una serie de ejercicios prácticos muy amenos donde podrás poner en práctica todo lo que vas a aprender a lo largo del curso, contando con mi asesoramiento por si tienes cualquier duda.
Este curso lo avalan mis más de 20 años de experiencia como asesora de imagen personal y estilista de moda, y esta dirigido tanto a mujeres como a hombres que quieran aprender todas las claves del estilismo personal.


Como dice un proverbio chino: una imagen vale mas que mil palabras, y en ocasiones no hay segunda oportunidad para causar una buena impresión. Así que, embárcate en este viaje conmigo y el éxito estará asegurado!

courses.description:
Learn how to create conceptual fashion illustrations applying concepts and tools from the fashion industry.
The most unique fashion illustration class where conceptual thinking, history and fashion design become one.


Absorbing history and art concept details to emphase and give reason for each details in our creation.
It's not only a fashion illustration class, we learn the though process to be creative with any subject.
More over the class start by a detail and visual resume of the period of Art Nouveau, we understand the roots of inspiration and all the details that we can characterize as part of this art mouvement.
Nature being the main inspiration of this movement we start our drawing learning by the flowers and plants line drawing with breakdown which makes it so easy. Always with the twitch we need to go in the art nouveau look. A beautiful addition to your drawing skills.


This brings us to the first exciting part of the final project, which is split in 2 parts.


For the first part, we draw an architectural window of creativity with with plants and flowers.
The second part, it’s time to add the magic in the piece with the creation of the fashion illustration. We will create a piece of lingerie with the Art Nouveau inspiration. With this exercise, you will learn how start from a visual idea and create a pattern.


We integrate the two parts to get a final and polished presentation that gives the notch above for your projects, wether its for your fashion
school, marketing, art, design, sewing, or even just for illustration.




If you are not convinced yet, remember that being creative is definitely something that anybody can learn, it’s only a though process that once broken down to simple step process and can be applied on any subject or project you want.
Moreover, if you want to try it, you still have 30 days guaranty, but I’m sure you’ll love it. ;)

courses.title: Learn to draw fashion with Adobe Illustrator CC Intermediate
courses.bio: Illustrator training specifically tailored for fashion designers
objectives: Competently produce detailed coloured fashion flats
Create complex, resuable trim and stitch library components
You will be well on your way to becoming a fashion designer with expert skills in Adobe Illustrator
You will be ready to progress to the advanced training with the details including link and discount code provided in the course summary.
You will stand out from the thousands of fashion design graduates and make yourself more attractive to potential employers.
requirements: You should have Adobe Illustrator installed. The training is designed around the latest Adobe Creative Cloud version of Illustrator, however you can still follow the training with older versions of Illustrator as many of the techniques will be the same. You should be aware though that there may be some functions featured that will not be available in older versions.

This course follows on from "Learn to draw fashion with Adobe Illustrator CC - Beginner". You do not have to have completed the beginner course to take this intermediate course but you should have mastered the tools and techniques listed in the beginners course agenda before taking the intermediate course.
courses.description:
Learn how to use Adobe Illustrator to draw fashion flats. Develop your skills to enable you to produce creative, accurate product designs quickly and to standards required for retail and manufacturing.
In this intermediate level 2 course, you will learn further tools and features that take your fashion flats from basic to detailed and professional.
For students that have a basic working knowledge of drawing fashion with Adobe Illustrator or for students that have completed the Level 1 Beginners Illustrator 4 Fashion course.
Learn how to add detailed design features to your drawings such as fabric fills, patterns ribbing, draping and shading.
Learn to create reusable brush libraries of trims and stitching such as sequins, buttons, zippers and overlock stitching.
Garment drawing workshops
Learn essential skills required by the fashion industry
Having spent over a decade implementing and training software technologies into fashion brands and retailers across the globe, I spent a lot of time working with the designers. Over the years there seemed to be a common theme in the design room - lots of designers were using Illustrator well but many either couldn't use it at all or couldn't use it very well. They also didn't adhere to any drawing standards or best practises so had problems such as not being able to easily edit each other's drawings, create colourways quickly or create reusable components properly, making them inefficient.
Illustrator 4 Fashion training has been specifically tailored for fashion, with the needs of the industry in mind. The training can be taken by company design employees, freelance designers, fashion design students and anyone else looking to learn or improve their fashion drawing with Adobe Illustrator.
Course Overview
Most Adobe Illustrator manuals and online training courses are industry generic with many modules not relevant to fashion drawing. It can be hard to know which features to learn and how to develop techniques to draw professional fashion designs. Illustrator 4 Fashion only teaches you the features and techniques relevant to drawing fashion flats, illustrations and garment components.
The Illustrator 4 Fashion course is split into 3 levels; beginner, intermediate and advanced. This level 2 intermediate course is aimed at students that have a basic working knowledge of fashion drawing with Adobe Illustrator. This course builds on the foundations learnt in Level 1, progressing to more advanced skills and techniques to bring fashion flats to life. Students will learn how to build powerful trim and brush libraries to improve design efficiency and accuracy. Level 2 also looks more in depth at the use of colour, patterns, fabric fills and embellishments, to add dynamism and realism to drawings. The final section of this course features a selection of garment drawing tutorials, putting the skills and techniques learnt in the first part of the course into real life practise.
Every lecture includes supporting Illustrator work files so that students can follow the lecture exactly.
target_audience: Suitable for fashion design students
Suitable for freelance fashion designers
Suitable for company fashion design employees
Suitable for anyone looking to learn how to draw fashion using Adobe Illustrator
Students who have completed the "Learn to draw fashion with Adobe Illustrator CC - Beginner" course and are looking to progress to the next level

courses.title: Creating Beaded Jewelry
courses.bio: Tips on how to create handmade beaded jewelry
objectives: The basics of beaded jewelry making with tips, techniques, and how-to become familiar with the different findings used in jewelry creation.
Understand how to use handmade jewelry tools
Learn how to make handmade jewelry that they want to sell
Understand jewelry design principles and color combinations
Introduce a range of jewellery making techniques
Understand how to properly finish jewelry pieces to ensure durability and professional-looking results.
Develop your ability to create matching jewelry sets, such as earrings, bracelets, and necklaces.

Bracelets: Beaded Beach Bracelet with Toggle Clasp
Anklets: Surf Anklet with Sliding Knot for Women
Sets of Beaded Jewelry: Making a Set of Pearl Jewelry
Creating a Set of Wood Jewelry
How to Sell Handmade Beaded Jewelry: How to Sell Handmade Beaded Jewelry, Turn Your Craft into a Profitable Business

requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description:
In this course, you will learn how to work with different types of beads, combine them creatively, and design unique, personalized jewelry pieces. You will explore the various techniques for threading beads, as well as how to use basic tools such as pliers, wire, and needles. With each project, you'll gain more confidence in your jewelry-making abilities, enabling you to create beautiful necklaces, bracelets and earrings. Whether you are looking to make jewelry for personal use, gifts, or as a small business venture, this course will provide the foundation and inspiration to bring your designs to life.
You will also learn how to select beads based on their size, shape, and texture to create balanced and visually appealing designs. Understanding how to use clasps, jump rings, and crimps effectively will help you finish each piece with a professional touch. Furthermore, we will discuss creative ways to incorporate different color schemes, patterns, and themes into your designs to make them stand out.
There are many advantages to learning how to make your own beaded jewelry. On the one hand it is fun. Jewelry making is a popular hobby which allows a person to use their creativity in a pleasant and relaxing manner. There is also a practical part to learning how to make beaded jewelry, since you can create beautiful handmade items for family, friends and why not pieces that you can sell. A beginner jeweler may feel confused on how to get started in this art. This course will present a few tips and tricks that will help you turn your interest in jewelry making into a pleasant and profitable endeavor. It is difficult to create high-quality pieces with low-quality tools. Any beginner should have some basic tools to get started creating their very own beading projects. Investing in the right tools from the beginning will help you create better pieces. Picking the right beads is also an important aspect for any jewelry creator and also one of the most fun parts of developing your own unique style. Gemstones, crystal beads and glass beads offer a more high-end finish for your jewelry, than the cheaper plastic alternatives and the price will also be higher. Higher quality beads are also longer lasting.
target_audience: People who want to create beaded jewelry
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

requirements: Máquina de coser doméstica
Dominar costuras rectas
courses.description:
¡Anímate a crear algo hermoso con tus propias manos!
En este curso aprenderás a confeccionar un hermoso bolso de tela con detalles de flores hechas de tela, pensado no solo como un proyecto creativo, sino también como una oportunidad para emprender.
Paso a paso, te enseñaré desde la selección de materiales, el trazado del molde, el corte de la tela y la costura, hasta el armado completo del bolso con acabados prolijos y detalles de lujo. Trabajaremos con seda satinada o podesuá y aplicaremos flores tridimensionales hechas de la misma tela, logrando una pieza elegante, funcional y única.


Este curso está diseñado para principiantes, por lo que no necesitas conocimientos previos en costura. Cada clase está explicada de forma clara y práctica, para que puedas seguirme fácilmente desde casa, a tu ritmo.


Además, he incluido una clase exclusiva de marketing, fotografía de producto, empaque (packing) y estrategias de venta, con herramientas clave que te ayudarán a dar el siguiente paso: emprender con tus bolsos de tela. Aprenderás cómo presentar tu producto de forma profesional y cómo empezar a vender en redes sociales o entre tus contactos.


¡Anímate a crear con tus manos, descubrir tu talento y transformar esta experiencia en una fuente de ingresos!
target_audience: Personas creativas
Mujeres que deseen emprender desde casa
Aficionados a la moda y el diseño artesanal

courses.title: Jewelry Design Course 3/3
courses.bio: Digital painting
objectives: Paint jewelry digitally
requirements: Basic knowledge in jewelry sketching (available in the 2 previous parts)
courses.description:
In this course, we are going to paint gemstones, cabochons and pearls digitally, I will show you how to paint a chain and I will take you with me through the process of working on an order for a costumer who wants an amethyst ring and a pair of onyx earrings, I will share with you the messages, the stones i received, and the sketching as well. We will then create a technical drawing for a pair of earrings, paint them together. We will draw them from two views with zoom-ins and write down all the details and the measurements that are essential to the metalsmith, in order to produce the jewelry piece.


I want you to practice all along with me, and please share your results with me !


This course is the third part of the series I made for jewelry design.  I highly recommend that you watch the previous ones because you will learn the basic knowledge you need to follow this third part.


Part one is about sketching and designing jewelries and part two is about painting them and designing from a source of inspiration.


So if you are interested in this course, lets dive into it.
target_audience: All levels

courses.title: Blender E-sports Jersey Design Course
courses.bio: E-sports apparel design using blender
requirements: Familiar with Photoshop
Familiar with Blender 3D
Laptop or PC can run Blender and Photoshop
courses.description:
Create a professional E-sports jersey design from scratch using the methods and techniques. I've created a course before using CLO3D, PHOTOSHOP and ILLUSTRATOR which is a lot of software to use and it can be expensive to someone who are just starting out to learn how to create a jersey or a mockup from scratch. So I did a lot of research and experiments to create an apparel using only blender and the results was EPIC! and now I decided to create a tutorial to share with you guys how I did it from scratch without using any templates or addons, but only the basic tools in blender.


Why is it important to learn how to create from scratch?
- lnvesting your time to learn how to create a mockup from scratch can be challenging, but the results will be worthit because you can save a lot of money and avoid copyrights when you tried to buy mockups online or steal templates to other artists.
- If you already learn the technique on how to create a mockup, you can use the same technique to create other mockups from scratch not just a jersey or an apparel.


Lectures:
1. Course Overview
2. Sculpting the male torso base mesh
3. Jersey base modeling
4. Rigging the jersey
5. Sculpting the wrinkles
6. UV editing
7. Create a fabric texture
8. Modeling the stitches
9. Create a mockup from scratch
10. Concept design
11. Rendering Angles
12. Create a turntable animation
target_audience: For beginners or professionals who wants to learn apparel design from scratch

სტუდენტს შეეძლება ტექნოლოგიურად დაამუშაოს შექმნილი პროდუქტი

courses.description:
მოგესალმებით, მე გახლავართ ჭრა-კერვის პედაგოგი, უფრო კონკრეტულად, კონსტრუირებისა და მოდელირების პროგრამის ავტორი ნატალია ფერაძე. პროგრამა მოიცავს კერვის საბაზისო საფუძვლებს, შექმნილია დამწყებთათვის, რომლებსაც სურთ ისწავლონ კერვა, და ასევე მათთვის, ვისაც გარკვეული გამოცდილება აქვს ამ სფეროში. კურსის ბოლოს, თქვენ შეძლებთ შეკეროთ ქვედაბოლო და ერთნაკერიანი შარვალი, და ასევე შეძლებთ დასრულებული პროდუქტის გამოყენებას.
პროგრამა მოიცავს როგორც პრაქტიკულ, ასევე თეორიულ მასალებს. თეორიული ნაწილი მოიცავს თარგის დამზადებას, ხოლო პრაქტიკული ნაწილი გულისხმობს პროდუქტის გამოჭრას და დასრულებას. პროგრამის მეთოდიკა მოიაზრებს ინდივიდუალური ზომების მიხედვით პროდუქტის დამზადებას: თარგის აგებას ზომების მიხედვით, თარგის მოდელირებას, გამოჭრას და შეკერვას.
სილაბუსი შედგება 9 გაკვეთილისგან:
1. ხელსაწყოები: ინსტრუმენტების მიმოხილვა, რომელიც დაგჭირდებათ ამ კურსისთვის, მათი ცოდნა დაგეხმარებათ როგორც თარგის აგებაში, ისე პროდუქტის დასრულებაში, გამოჭრაში და შეკერვაში.
2. ზომების აღება: შეისწავლით ზომების აღებას თარგის დასამზადებლად ინდივიდუალური მეთოდიკით.
3. სამკერავი მანქანა: მანქანის სტრუქტურისული და ფუნქციური შესწავლა
4. ნაკერების სხვადასხვა ვარიაციები: გვირისტის სხვადასხვა ტიპების შესწავლა, სწორი გვირისტის, რკალური გვირისტის და ასევე კუთხის.
5. ხელის გვირისტი: სამი სახის ხელის გვირისტის ტექნიკის სწავლა.
6. ქვედაბოლოს თარგის აგება: ქვედაბოლოს თარგის აგება ინდივიდუალური ზომების მიხედვით.
7. ქვედაბოლოს გამოჭრა და დასრულება
8. ერთნაკერიანი შარვლის თარგის აგება: შარვლის თარგის აგება ინდივიდუალური ზომების მიხედვით.
9. შარვლის გამოჭრა და დასრულება


საჭირო ხელსაწყოებია:
· საკერავი მანქანა
· უთო და საუთოო მაგიდა
· ქსოვილის მაკრატელი
· ქაღალდის მაკრატელი
· პატარა მაკრატელი (მრღვეველი)
· სანტიმეტრის ლენტა
· ქინძისთავები
· ქაღალდი თარგის ასაგებად
· მარკერი
· ცარცი ან ქსოვილის საპონი
· რეზინი


გისურვებთ წარმატებული არჩევნის გაკეთებას.
target_audience: ეს კურსი განკუთვნილია მათთვის, ვისაც სურს შეიძლინოს საბაზისო ცოდნა კერვაში
ვისაც სურს შექმნას უნიკალური და ორიგინალური პროდუქცია
დიზაინერებისთვის, რომლებსაც სურთ გააძლიერონ თავიანთი კრეატიულობა სწავლით, თუ როგორ გააცოცხლონ იდეები ქსოვილისა და დიზაინის საშუალებით.
ეს კურსი განკუთვნილია მათთვის, ვისაც სურს მოირგოს მათი შექმნილი ტანსაცმელი

Non è necessario avere gli strumenti prima del corso, potrai rifornirti durante o successivamente
courses.description:
In questo corso imparerai come realizzare gioielli partendo da un solo materiale: la cera. Ti dirò quali strumenti e materiali comprare e dove. Ti guiderò passo per passo in ogni fase di costruzione del gioiello, spiegandoti le migliori tecniche pratiche. Il corso contiene non solo nozioni tecniche, ma anche parti in cui condivido spunti, sperimentali e non, utili per realizzare gioielli contemporanei, suggerimenti adatti a coloro che vogliono approcciare la materia in modo meno tradizionale, come per esempio designer e artisti. Inoltre ho inserito contenuti utilissimi dove ti spiego la formula per convertire il peso della cera in metallo, e altri consigli teorici durante la durata di tutti i video. Il corso è stato pensato non solo per chi non si è mai approcciato alla modellazione in cera e in genere all’ oreficeria, ma anche per gli artigiani che già hanno avuto modo di sperimentare la creazione di gioielli e vogliono allargare le proprie conoscenze imparando la tecnica della modellazione in cera.
Inoltre ho creato il corso con l' intento di creare una classe virtuale interattiva, in cui, a fine di ogni video lezione, l' alunno si eserciterà su quanto appreso, e condivida la foto del lavoro svolto, in modo tale da poter avere un sano confronto con gli altri partecipanti, come accade in una classe fisica. Tengo molto all' apprendimento dei miei alunni, quindi mi rendo sempre disponibile per eventuali chiarimenti e consigli.
target_audience: Artigiani, orafi, hobbisti, creativi, designer che vogliono imparare a costruire un gioiello da zero
