courses.title: Luxury Shoe Design Masterclass: From Idea to Launch
courses.bio: The Complete Guide to Footwear & Fashion Design: Learn Luxury Shoe Branding, Prototyping, Manufacturing & Launch
objectives: Gain a deep understanding of footwear fundamentals
Analyze and distinguish the main roles in the footwear industry
Develop your first creative ideas through research and inspiration
Learn the basics of technical and creative shoe design
Understand the entire footwear production chain
Prepare and manage an effective prototyping process
Communicate with suppliers and manufacturing companies
Analyze costs, margins, and retail pricing
Build a strong and coherent brand identity
Design a consistent and strategic footwear collection
Plan the launch and promotion of your own brand

CONCEPT & DESIGN - 1. INTRODUCTION TO TH: 1.4 – The Role of the Pattern Maker
1.6 – Current Trends in the Footwear Industry
2. STRATEGIC MATERIAL SELECTION: The Future of Fashion is Made of Mushrooms
4. PRODUCT PROTOTYPING AND VALIDATION: Practical Assignment: Materials, Tech Pack, and Supplier Research

requirements: No previous experience in the footwear field is required: the course starts from a beginner level.
courses.description:
Have you always dreamed of launching your own luxury shoe brand but didn’t know where to begin? This complete footwear design and branding masterclass is crafted for creative entrepreneurs, aspiring designers, and fashion enthusiasts who want to turn their passion into a commercially successful business.
From trend forecasting and sketching to leather selection, prototyping, small-batch manufacturing, and branding, this course takes you step by step through the entire process of building a signature shoe line. You’ll gain practical knowledge, insider strategies, and professional techniques used by top Italian-inspired footwear brands.
Inside this course, you will:
Design collections of men’s and women’s classics: Oxfords, Derbies, loafers, pumps, sandals, and more.
Master professional sketching, mood board creation, and technical blueprints.
Explore luxury materials, from fine leathers to sustainable alternatives.
Learn prototype engineering and small-scale production with master artisans.
Understand branding essentials: naming strategies, storytelling, logos, packaging, and positioning.
Discover how to launch and scale your shoe line with confidence.

Whether you’re a beginner exploring footwear design, a fashion entrepreneur building a new label, or a creative professional expanding your skill set, this course provides the complete framework to create and market a luxury footwear brand from scratch.
By the end, you’ll walk away with the knowledge and confidence to:
Design and prototype footwear collections.
Work effectively with suppliers, artisans, and manufacturers.
Build a brand identity that attracts loyal customers.
Launch your fashion business in today’s competitive market.

This course also features AI-powered English narration, ensuring clarity and accessibility while preserving expert insights from an Italian footwear designer.
Who this course is for:
Beginners passionate about fashion and footwear design.
Self-taught designers seeking structured training in materials, construction, and prototyping.
Aspiring entrepreneurs looking to launch their own luxury shoe line.
Fashion industry professionals expanding into footwear.
Students and freelancers who want practical, real-world knowledge of design and branding.

If you’re ready to bring your footwear dreams to life and create a brand that stands out in the global fashion industry, enroll now and take your first step into fashion entrepreneurship.
target_audience: The Emerging Creative: Has a strong passion for footwear and fashion, but has never had the chance to gain technical training.

The Self-Taught Designer: Has some experience in drawing or product design, but feels the need to acquire structured knowledge about footwear design, prototyping techniques, materials, and construction methods.
The Aspiring Fashion Entrepreneur: Wants to start their own shoe brand but doesn’t know where to begin.
The Strategic Planner: Is interested in the strategic aspects: understanding how a collection is built, how to shape a brand identity, naming, packaging, and positioning in the market.
The Fashion Industry Professional: Already works in fashion (apparel, accessories, or retail), but wants to specialize in footwear to expand their skill set and offer new services or projects.

The Creative Freelancer or Consultant: Works as a graphic designer, art director, or creative consultant and wants to explore the world of physical products by learning about footwear production, communication, and branding.

The Returning or Repositioned Professional: Has prior experience in footwear or design and now seeks to update their skills with new approaches related to small-scale production, 3D development, marketing, and artisanal collaborations.
The Fashion or Design Student: Is currently studying fashion or design and wants to complement their academic path with a practical course focused on footwear and a realistic view of the market.

courses.title: Step-by-Step Resin Jewelry: Mold Making to Finishing
courses.bio: Create unique handmade resin jewelry step by step: mold making, pouring, grinding, sanding, polishing & assembling.
objectives: You will learn how to craft professional-looking resin jewelry using real dried flowers.
Gerçek kurutulmuş çiçeklerle profesyonel görünümlü reçine takılar yapmayı öğreneceksiniz.
You will gain the ability to design and shape your own silicone molds.
Silikon kalıplarınızı kendiniz tasarlayıp şekillendirme becerisi kazanacaksınız.
You will discover the fundamental techniques and important tips used in resin jewelry making.
Reçine takı üretiminde kullanılan temel teknikleri ve dikkat edilmesi gereken püf noktaları keşfedeceksiniz.

Preparing Silicone Molds | Silikon Kalıp: Preparing the Silicone Mold Base | Silikon Kalıplarının Hazırlanması
Mixing and Preparing the Silicone | Silikonun Hazırlanması
Pouring Silicone into the Mold | Silikonun Kalıplara Dökülmesi
Finalizing and Curing the Silicone Molds | Kalıpların Hazır Hale Getirilmesi
Preparing and Mixing Resin for Jewelry C: Preparing and Mixing Resin | Reçinenin Hazırlanması
Resin Pouring – Step 1 | Reçine Dökümü -: Pouring Resin into Large Molds | Büyük Kalıba Döküm
Pouring Resin into Small Molds | Küçük Kalıba Döküm
Pouring Resin into Jewelry Frames | Çerçeveye Döküm
Freeform Resin Pouring Without Molds | Kalıpsız Döküm
Resin Pouring – Step 2 | Reçine Dökümü -: Second Pouring into Small Molds | Küçük Kalıba İkinci Döküm
Second Pouring into Jewelry Frames | Çerçeveye İkinci Döküm
Second Pouring Without Molds (Freeform) | Kalıpsız İkinci Döküm
Attaching Jewelry Findings | Takıların A: Surface Preparation Before Attaching Jewelry Findings | Aparat İçin Ön Hazırlık
Choosing the Right Jewelry Findings | Doğru Aparat Seçimi
Final Resin Coating to Secure and Seal Jewelry Findings | Üçüncü Döküm
Attaching Findings to Resin Spheres | Kürelere Aparat Yapıştırma

requirements: No prior knowledge or experience is required for this course. You will learn all the essential techniques and information step by step. Perfect for beginners.
Bu kurs için herhangi bir ön bilgi veya deneyim gerekmez. Gerekli tüm teknikleri ve bilgileri adım adım bu eğitimde öğreneceksiniz. Yeni başlayanlar için idealdir.
courses.description:
Create Unique Handmade Resin Jewelry Using Real Dried Flowers – From Mold to Masterpiece
Unlock the full potential of resin art with this Beginner Resin Art Course that guides you through the complete process of crafting professional, elegant jewelry. Whether you're an artist, a hobbyist, or a future entrepreneur, this course is designed to turn your curiosity into tangible results.
Step by step, you'll learn Resin Mold Techniques including how to make your own silicone molds, basic and layered resin pouring, grinding, fine sanding, and how to polish resin jewelry to a flawless finish.
Using real dried flowers, you'll create beautiful wearable pieces that stand out – and even discover how to sell your resin jewelry online with professional quality results.
No previous experience is needed – just a passion for creativity.
The course includes:

Detailed video lessons with close-up demonstrations
Printable checklists & resources
Professional tips for long-lasting, glossy results
Full guidance from mold making to final assembly
Start transforming flowers into timeless resin jewelry today and turn your creativity into a craft – or even a business.


Gerçek Kurutulmuş Çiçeklerle El Yapımı Reçine Takılar – Kalıptan Zarif Bir Sanata
Bu kapsamlı başlangıç seviyesi reçine sanatı eğitimi, size sıfırdan profesyonel ve benzersiz takılar üretmeyi öğretir. Reçine sanatıyla ilgilenen sanatçılar, hobi severler ya da bu alanda gelecekte kendi işini kurmak isteyen herkes için idealdir.
Adım adım, aşağıdaki tüm teknikleri birlikte öğreneceğiz:
Kendi silikon kalıplarınızı oluşturma
Temel ve katmanlı reçine döküm teknikleri
Zımparalama ve ince perdahlama
Reçine takıları nasıl parlatacağınızı
Parçaları birleştirerek takıya dönüştürme süreci
Gerçek kurutulmuş çiçekler kullanarak hem zarif hem de kalıcı takılar yapmayı öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bu takıları çevrim içi olarak nasıl satabileceğinizi de öğretecek profesyonel ipuçlarıyla donatılacaksınız.
Herhangi bir ön bilgiye ihtiyaç yok – sadece yaratıcılığa açık bir zihin ve biraz sabır yeterli.
Kurs içeriğinde:
Yakın çekim detaylarla anlatılmış video dersler
Yazdırılabilir kontrol listeleri ve kaynaklar
Parlak ve uzun ömürlü sonuçlar için profesyonel püf noktaları
Kalıptan montaj aşamasına kadar eksiksiz rehberlik
Bugün, çiçekleri şık ve kullanışlı sanat eserlerine dönüştürmeye başlayın. Yaratıcılığınızı yalnızca bir hobiye değil, belki de bir işe dönüştürün!
target_audience: Anyone interested in jewelry making and looking to start it as a creative hobby
Art lovers who want to turn flowers and plants into wearable nature-inspired pieces
Those who want to create meaningful, handmade jewelry gifts for loved ones
Entrepreneurs aiming to learn resin jewelry making and turn it into a professional business
Takı yapımına ilgi duyan ve hobi olarak bu alana başlamak isteyen herkes
Doğadan ilham alarak çiçekleri ve bitkileri takıya dönüştürmek isteyen sanatseverler
El yapımı takılarla sevdiklerine özel ve anlamlı hediyeler hazırlamak isteyenler
Reçine takı üretimini öğrenip bunu profesyonel bir işe dönüştürmeyi hedefleyen girişimciler

courses.title: Le dessin de mode
courses.bio: Apprenez les bases du dessin pour devenir styliste
objectives: Des techniques pour s'améliorer dans le dessin de mode
Des techniques classiques et numériques pour le dessin de mode

Les croquis, les bases fondamentales: les bases du dessin du corps
Faire des ovales pour les têtes
L'expression graphique, en traits et en: Utilisation globale des couleurs sur les croquis
Créer un visage avec des encres
Le mouvement: La marche et les poses, comment donner du mouvement
Les vêtements: Comment simplifier le design d'un vêtement
La planche de personnages, exercez-vous à créez vos vêtements rapidement
Créer des modèles dynamiques pour le sport ou autres activités similaires

requirements: Vouloir être styliste, ou être interessé par la mode
Avoir un peu de materiel de dessin et des feuilles
courses.description:
Devenir styliste, créer sa propre ligne de vêtements, faire connaitre ses idées... Oui, tout cela passe par le dessin de mode. Le dessin? Un problème? Plus maintenant. Grâce à ce cours, vous allez apprendre les bases du dessin de mode.
Apprenez les techniques pour dessiner des corps, à dessiner les proportions correctes et rajoutez-y le dessin de vos créations. Tout cela, vous pouvez l'apprendre avec les exercices que je vais vous donner tout au long de ce cours.
Nous allons parler de la conception des personnages, des proportions, des visages, des poses et comment vous pouvez libérer votre créativité.
Le sujet de la couleur sera aussi abordé car il est vital de pouvoir l'utiliser afin de donner un rendu concret de vos créations.
Bon cours à tous !
target_audience: Ceux qui veulent en savoir plus sur le dessin de mode
Ceux et celles qui veulent apprendre des techniques pour faire du dessin de mode

courses.title: Fashion Design - Create Your Own Fashion Ideas
courses.bio: A Downloadable WorkBook Is Included In This Video Course
objectives: This course will cover the basics of fashion illustration for a beginner you will learn basic design skills using templates very fun and easy
In This course You will learn how to create unique Fashion Trend boards
In this course you will learn how to use software to create fashion design illustrations
In this course you will learn how to sketch for beginners a basic body shape template
A Downloadable Workbook Is Included With This Video Course

How To Create Simple Fashion Illustratio: How To Use Design Templates Lesson 2 Part1
How To Use Design Templates - Part 2
Fashion Design Illustration Group - Post: Fashion Design Illustration Group For Your Projects

requirements: this is an online video course - no photoshop or adobe illustrator required You can use free software found online No need to purchase expensive software for this course
Please have your software already downloaded to complete practice sessions and also for the final course project
courses.description:
This is a art class for beginners to learn how to create fashion design illustrations using computer software and also templates. We will cover some offline sketching and also how to put your illustrations to a practical use. Anyone will benefit from the course whether you are a beginner and do not know how to draw or if you are a talented artist who would like to learn how to get your designs on the computer without spending alot on expensive software applications.
A downloadable fashion sketch illustration workbook is included in this course.
target_audience: This course is for beginners and also for anyone who would like to learn computer aided design techniques
Experienced artists are also welcome if you are interested in learning computer aided design ideas

courses.title: Color Snacks - Dress yourself with confidence, ease and fun
courses.bio: Build your wardrobe with the help of experienced image consultants. Save time and frustration; feel joy instead.
objectives: You’ll learn clever tricks with minimal different garments and accessories while changing your look.
You’ll learn how you can strengthen or weaken your nonverbal communication by choosing your colors differently.
You’ll learn how you can accentuate or hide certain body features with color
You’ll learn how you can radiate power by a refined choice of your colors
You’ll learn to use color like a professional does.
At the end of this course, you’ll easily coordinate new outfits in your existing wardrobe

How to use Color to Camouflage and Highl: Color and your Body shape - guide

requirements: You need a monitor and speakers or a headset.
Keep a pen and paper ready to take notes or fill in the forms
courses.description:
The trainers of Image Masters, instructors of image consultants, created this course.
A course full of fresh and fun new techniques to integrate color in your clothes. Whether you're accustomed now to always wearing black, or have a closet full of color, with this course you'll learn something new.
You will learn the how and how to address color on your body, color contrasts, some color communication, and how you can use color to achieve certain effects. Everything on the basis of compelling examples.
You can complete the course all in one sitting or spread it out over time. You’ll get the most out of it, by completing the exercises at the end of each section.
Comments from participants:
I've had a lot of fun with the information from the course.
Even just by watching the videos, I noticed that I was looking at different clothes in shop windows
I understand now, why sometimes I was not taken seriously. That will not happen to me anymore!
Through the course, I understand that I limit myself in my possibilities to combine the clothes in my closet.
Nice, these examples. This makes everything easy to follow.
I did not know so much can de said about color in your clothes. Great and useful tips. Thank you.
target_audience: This course is designed for women, who compose their wardrobe.
It's a great orientation course for those considering to become Image Consultants or personal shoppers
Fashion Consultants , sellers and those who help others in choosing their clothes, learn more about how color really works .
Clothing Consultants learn more about the use of color , and what words you use to talk about color.

courses.title: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion
courses.bio: A first look at adaptive fashion through language, definitions, and clothing challenges.
objectives: Students will gain a base knowledge of disability inclusion.
Students will be introduced to language, terms, and equipment used in the adaptive fashion space.
Students will start to explore the intersection of fashion and disability.
Students will learn about various types of disabilities and clothing related challenges associated with those disabilities.
requirements: No prior adaptive fashion knowledge or experience needed, just an interest in learning about adaptive fashion and becoming a more inclusive member of society!
courses.description:
This introductory, beginner course sets the stage for the next 9 courses on adaptive fashion. By providing an education on language around disability, terms and definitions, and clothing challenges faced by various disability groups, students will gain a baseline understanding upon which to build their adaptive fashion knowledge. This course is intended for individuals in the fashion industry interested in learning more about adaptive fashion. This course will benefit designers, production managers, merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. No prerequisites are needed for this course.


In the first lecture of this course, you will be introduced to your instructor, Tracy Vollbrecht, and learn what makes her uniquely qualified to teach this course. The next lecture will introduce you to the format, intentions, and outcomes of this course. In lecture 3, we will establish a foundation for disability inclusion by discussing language, key terms used throughout the course, and technology used in the disability community. In lecture 4, the first part of Disability & Clothing, we will begin to cover various disability groups and how they interact with clothing. Lecture 5, Part 2 of Disability & Clothing, will wrap up the remaining disability groups and how they interact with clothing.
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Fashion merchandisers who want to learn about merchandising adaptive fashion.
Production managers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Product developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion buyers who want to learn about adaptive fashion.
E-Commerce specialists who want to learn about adaptive fashion e-commerce.
Marketing professionals who want to learn about marketing adaptive fashion.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: Take a step into the world of bags
courses.bio: A zip pouch and a tote bag
objectives: Creating a bag
Understanding of the patternmaking
Creating the pattern of the T-shape bag
Sewing the 2 bags
sewing a zipper
get in contact with different forms of bags
understanding the world of acessories
getting the vocabolary of handbags
requirements: be able to use the sewing machine
No basic skills are needed for patternmaking
courses.description:
In this course you will learn how to create a pattern for a zip pouch and a tote bag  and how to realize it. I will show you step by step how to do the pattern, how to cut it on fabric and finally how to sew it.
After the course, you will be able to use this knowledge to design other forms and sizes of soft pouches and tote bags.
In this course you will learn how to create a pattern for a beauty case and how to realize it. I will show you step by step how to do the pattern, how to cut it on fabric and finally how to sew it.
After the course, you will be able to use this knowledge to design other forms and sizes of soft pouches, but also for shoppers.


Welcome to everyone.
I would like to introduce myself and give you some insight into my handbags and my workshops.
This presentation will take around a half an hour.
My name is Sophie Springer, I was born in Austria, in Vienna, a city of a long tradition of highquality fashion. 30 years ago, I came to Florence to study fashion design and specialized in bag design, learning both the craftmanship and designing. For more than 15 years I have been teaching at different international fashion schools (drapery, pattern, sewing and accessories). This has given me a lot of experience in teaching students from all over the world.
With the current situation, where it is safer for us to stay in our own homes, I wanted to offer different workshops: Handbag design, up-cycling and draping.


Let me tell you something about my bags:
I have had my own brand for 15 years. All my bags are designed and hand- crafted by me and trained craftspeople in Florence.
“Sophie Springer 100% Pura Italia” – I want the bags to represent my personality and knowledge, and at the same time produce locally.
Tuscany is famous for its centuries-old tradition of leather production and processing as well as its elegant and versatile fabric creations.I love to go out and source fabrics and leather for my new collections here around Florence.
My bag collection is fashionable while outlasting short-lived trends – you will find elegance, extravagance, fashion, trendy colors and refined details.
High-contrast linings provide an eye-catcher when opening your bag.
All bags are produced in small quantities, making them unique pieces. Let yourself be convinced by the quality standards and my fair prices.
I would like to give you some examples of my latest creations: …
target_audience: creative students
Creative people working with bags
interessted fashnable persons
persons who wants to get to know something about bags

courses.title: How to Make 6 Piece Dress without Patterns - Freehand Sewing
courses.bio: Learn to cut and sew a 6-piece dress using freehand.
objectives: Able to take your measurements for a 6 piece dress
Able to mark your fabric using the measurements you took
Able to cut and sew a 6 piece dress

Taking Body Measurements for the 6 Piece: Measurements You Need For This 6 Piece Dress
Cutting the Dress: Shaping the Sides of the Skirt
Stitching (Sewing) the Dress: Stitching the Skirt: Joining the Front Panels
Stitching the Skirt: Joining the Back Panels
Joining the Bodice to the Skirt

requirements: Be able to make basic straight stitches with a sewing machine
Be able to use and read a tape measure
Have the tools needed which include scissors, fabric marker or chalk, tape measure, and ruler
courses.description:
Do you want to make a 6 piece dress, but don't have or understand commercial patterns? No problem. This course teaches you how to:

- take measurements you need to make a 6-piece dress
- mark your fabric using the measurements you took
- cut and sew a 6 piece dress

You'll learn how to calculate what to mark on your fabric, based on the measurements you took, in a simple but detailed way.

To get started, here are the knowledge and tools you need:

- Be able to make basic straight stitches with a sewing machine

- Be able to use and read a tape measure

- Have the tools needed which include scissors, fabric marker or chalk, tape measure, and ruler


Beginners can take this course if they carefully follow the instruction. All other levels that desire to learn to make a 6-piece dress without patterns (freehand fashion) will benefit too.

Happy learning!
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning Freehand Fashion
Anyone desiring to learn to make a 6-piece dress without patterns.

courses.title: Modelagem de base de blusa
courses.bio: A base essencial para criar blusas com caimento perfeito
objectives: Tirar corretamente as medidas do corpo e entender como usá-las para construir moldes sob medida
Desenhar a base da blusa (frente e costas) utilizando técnicas de modelagem plana com precisão e clareza.
Interpretar as proporções do corpo no papel, compreendendo a lógica da construção do molde.
Criar novas peças a partir da base da blusa, explorando variações de modelos com autonomia e criatividade.
requirements: Este curso foi pensado para ser acessível a todos que desejam aprender modelagem de blusa, mesmo que nunca tenham costurado antes. Você não precisa ter experiência prévia em modelagem ou costura — aqui, vamos te guiar passo a passo. No entanto, para aproveitar melhor o conteúdo, é interessante que você tenha: Vontade de aprender e paciência para praticar. Materiais básicos de modelagem, como: Papel para modelagem Régua reta e curva (régua francesa ou similar) Lápis, borracha, tesoura e fita métrica Se você já tem alguma familiaridade com costura ou com moldes, ótimo! Mas se não tem, não se preocupe — este curso foi feito exatamente para te ajudar a começar do zero, com explicações claras e detalhadas. Nosso objetivo é te incentivar e te apoiar, mesmo que esse seja o seu primeiro contato com a modelagem.
courses.description:
Você quer aprender a modelar suas próprias roupas, mas não sabe por onde começar? Este curso é o ponto de partida ideal para quem deseja dar os primeiros passos na modelagem plana, com foco na construção da base da blusa — a estrutura essencial para criar diversos modelos com segurança, bom caimento e liberdade criativa.
Aqui, você vai aprender desde como tirar as medidas corretamente até o traçado completo da base da blusa (frente e costas), de forma clara, prática e detalhada. Tudo é explicado passo a passo, com linguagem acessível e direcionada, permitindo que até mesmo quem nunca teve contato com moldes consiga acompanhar e colocar em prática.
Ao longo do curso, você também entenderá a lógica por trás da modelagem, os ajustes mais comuns e como adaptar essa base para diferentes corpos, estilos ou preferências. Além disso, vai desenvolver o olhar técnico necessário para identificar proporções, encaixes e caimentos com mais precisão.
E o melhor: ao dominar essa estrutura, você poderá transformá-la em novas criações com mais autonomia, segurança e criatividade, abrindo caminho para evoluir cada vez mais na costura.
Se você busca uma formação sólida, didática e que te dê confiança para criar suas próprias peças, este curso é para você!
target_audience: Este curso é ideal para quem deseja aprender a modelar blusas do zero, com base em medidas reais e técnicas que permitem criar peças sob medida, bem ajustadas e com bom caimento. É voltado para: Iniciantes na costura que querem começar pela base da modelagem. Costureiras autodidatas que já costuram, mas desejam entender a estrutura e a lógica por trás dos moldes. Artesãs e empreendedoras criativas que querem criar suas próprias peças para vender ou usar. Alunas que querem aprender a interpretar o corpo em forma de molde, criando peças personalizadas com mais segurança e autonomia. Se você sempre quis entender como a modelagem funciona, mas achava complicado, esse curso foi feito para descomplicar e te dar confiança para começar a modelar suas próprias roupas!

courses.title: Advanced Level Fashion Illustration and Design
courses.bio: Advanced Level Fashion Illustration and Design
objectives: Advanced Level skills in Fashion Illustration and Fashion Design
requirements: Basic Sketching/Illustration Skills like front-back crouques, hairstyles and skin colour rendering.
If you wanna learn all this I highly recommend you to checkout my beginner level course named "Fashion Illustration-Beginner to Intermediate Complete Guide"
courses.description:
This course will take your Illustration and Designing skills to the next level and will help you design your dream dress so you can amaze others with your creative talent. In this course you will learn to draw female and male croques. I will also provide you the templates of the croques which you can download and practice draping. You will also learn how to color the transparent dress, transparent swarovski gown and party wear dress. In addition to this you will also able to draw and colour Fur articles and dresses, ripped denim jeans, patchwork jeans and tie & dye ombre dresses. Prints are an important part of fashion illustration, this course will also help you to illustrate different types of prints like snake prints, leaf prints along with quilted jackets and sequins gowns.
Face drawing and colouring is one of the most unique feature of this course. You will also learn to sketch and colour different types of hair styles and accessories. Further I will keep on updating the course time to time with more valuable informations and submissions for you to practice and upgrade your skills. If you practice these, you will definately able to make beautiful illustrations and will able to create your own design.
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in polishing their Fashion Illustration and Designing skills will be benefited.

courses.title: Jewelry Design Video Course: 23 Step-by-Step Lessons
courses.bio: FINALLY get all the answers to your questions about Jewelry Design Process.
objectives: 5 Biggest Mistakes Designers Make
This video course is a blueprint for startup jewelry designers offering knowledge of the step by step jewelry making process from IDEA to FINISHED PRODUCT
YOU WILL LEARN: How to design jewelry and sell it, the inside secrets of the jewelry industry, how to avoid unnecessary mistakes, how to find jewelry suppliers.
Tips on negotiation with suppliers, services and their terms
requirements: No jewelry knowledge is required, only the passion to create successful Jewelry Collection
Learn the inside secrets of the jewelry industry with jewelry mentor Aleksander Chuly
courses.description:
Good day designers my name is Aleksander Chuly. I am a jewelry designer and mentor with over 15 years of experience. I have successfully established several jewelry brands and have created thousands of jewelry designs. I mentor many jewelry designers and have collaborated with them to create their successful jewelry collections.
After years of working with and mentoring designers, I have discovered a pattern to their mistakes and questions. There is a complete lack of information for startup designers. This course will help designers avoid many mistakes and enjoy the creative process.
This video course is a blueprint for startup jewelry designers and entrepreneurs offering knowledge of the step by step jewelry making process from IDEA to FINISHED PRODUCT. I will guide you on where to go for services and how to save time and money. I will advise you on how to avoid overpaying for services. And how to make sure your design is completed within your timeframe.
I have included interviews with owners of some of the most successful polishing and casting houses. The owners give their perspective on jewelry designer’s biggest mistakes.
This video course gives start up designer’s years of experience thereby greatly accelerating your learning process. Startup designers will avoid many mistakes, thereby saving time, money and frustration.
target_audience: Must see for people who has jewelry design idea, but don’t know where and how to start
This video course will explain and give you step-by-step instructions.

Also great source for designers who has existing jewelry collection and want to improve the design and production process as well as get inside tips and information on jewelry design and manufacturing.

courses.title: Curso de Orgonite Segredos Revelados, Renda Extra! Aulas.
courses.bio: Aprenda a fabricar peças artesanais de orgonite ,crie suas peças exclusivas.Adquira um novo Hobbie/Terapia.
objectives: Artesanato e possibilidade de ganhar uma renda extra com a produção de peças de Orgonites ou obter um novo hobbie.
requirements: Vontade de aprender, Pessoas que buscam uma alternativa de gerar uma renda extra, um novo hobbie, alunos. que se interessam por uma qualidade de vida melhor e mais saudável..
Responsabilidade e cuidados de segurança.
Todo o processo de fabricação exigirá do aluno certos cuidados como o uso de máscaras, luvas, óculos de proteção.
courses.description:
Neste curso você  vai aprender sobre a história da orgonite, cuidados necessários, dicas de materiais, acabamento, etc.
Você  poderá fabricar peças grandes e pequenas como pirâmides, pingentes, broches, chaveiros, quadros decorativos, etc. Basta ter imaginação, criatividade e certos cuidados.
Você  poderá presentear e comercializar as suas próprias peças de orgonite.
Aprendendo a trabalhar com a resina você poderá fazer não só orgonites mas também peças de decoração caso queira.
Você vai aprender a manusear a resina.
target_audience: Pessoas que se interessam por Terapias Holísticas, Meditação, bem estar e espiritualidade.
Terapeutas, Yoguis, Pessoas que trabalham com computador, celular, etc.

As peças de Orgonites feitas da forma correta como é explicado nas videoaulas podem auxiliar as pessoas a terem uma melhor qualidade de vida, devido ao efeito piezoelétrico,energia Orgone que é emanado através dos dispositivos de Orgonite.

courses.title: Fashion Illustration with Photoshop
courses.bio: Create your Fashion Illustrations & design presentation using Photoshop.
objectives: Techniques in Photoshop to render and illustrate digital fashion Illustrations.
requirements: No, however basic photoshop will be an advantage and a natural flair for illustrating / drawing.
courses.description: Fashion Illustration with photoshop is where you get to translate your creative illustrations and fashion design over into a digital format using Photoshop.  Often the complexities of Photoshop can deter many designers and illustrators -  but this course gives you the basic and essential techniques to understand the workings of photoshop - so that you can start to create effective and professional quality fashion illustrations to present your design concepts. It even has a fun 2 part tutorial to understand 'Layers' - which is often the best part of Photoshop and can also be the most frustrating part of this amazing software. This course is ideal for creatives, fashion students from high schools right through to Tertiary College Fashion students and industry creatives as well ! This is also ideal for teachers and industry people that want to upgrade their skills into  modern digital presentation. The course is in a 3 part tutorial that takes you right through from using scanned fashion illustration templates - how to use rendering techniques, including the insertion of pattern, and fabric textiles. There are 6 bonus templates for you to practice you newly learned skills - with lots of additional bonus templates that will help you translates your creative design process onto your fashion templates - to effectively communicate designs through illustration. This is a must for fashion students and creatives that want to illustrate using an amazing software tool like Photoshop.
target_audience: Fashion students, high schools, tertiary fashion students, creative illustrators.

courses.title: Watercolor techniques in Fashion Illustration
courses.bio: Watercolor fashion illustration: from basic techniques to improvisation
objectives: Necessary materials
Basic painting skills in solid watercolor
Basic painting skills in liquid watercolor
Basic painting skills in watercolor in tubes
Mixing shades for fashion illustration
Fashion figure in watercolor
Three different approaches to portrait illustration. Author's techniques
Fashion illustration of a suit in watercolor in the author's technique
Fashion illustration of a dress in the author's technique in liquid watercolor
requirements: Ability to draw a human figure and clothes at a basic level
No previous watercolor experience is required, you will learn it in this course
courses.description:
Watercolor in fashion illustration, like no other technique, is able to convey not only the silhouette and cut of clothes, but also the mood, the spirit of the show and the author's idea in a light and effective manner. If you are in love with fashion and want to learn how to draw fashion illustrations in watercolor but have no art education or experience in painting, this course will help you start and give you the basic knowledge that you can later develop and deepen.


This is my second author's online course in which I will introduce you to different forms and techniques of drawing watercolors, which I use myself. I will share my knowledge, techniques and tricks, which I hope will help you to improve your skills, and perhaps discover something completely new for you.


We will look at three different types of watercolor: Liquid, Solid, and Tube Watercolor. I will explain and show in practice what their fundamental differences are and how you can work with them.


I will show you how to mix skin and hair tones using a basic range of three colors, and a quick way to mix skin tones. In practice you will learn how to feel the nuances of color and how to get the desired result.


Together with me you will draw three fashion portraits in different techniques, such as wet and dry.


Also together we will draw two fashion illustrations: a dress and a suit, where you will learn to work with photo-reference from fashion shows. As well as practicing how to depict fabric in watercolor.


We'll overcome the fear of painting with liquid watercolor and put our knowledge into practice. Let's enjoy the process, loosen up and start experimenting in the process of illustration.
target_audience: Enthusiasts
Fashion students
Makeup artists
Stylists
Illustrators
Kids
Anyone who has no experience in watercolor fashion illustration
Anyone who loves fashion and wants to learn fashion illustration

courses.title: A Journey of Decades - Evolution of Costume Trends
courses.bio: A comprehensive course on how costume trends evolved for men and women through the decades
objectives: Understanding Fashion Trends
Following Fashion Trends – Comprehending & Adopting Changing Fashion Trends
Changing Styles of Men’s & Women’s Wear
Evolving Fashion Trends from 1900-2020
Fashion Critics – Developing views & opinions
requirements: Open to all Learners
courses.description:
Understanding the evolution of costume trends will enhance your profession as a “Stylist”. Any individual who wants to start their career as a fashion stylist, fashion manager, or fashion blogger should be well-versed about understanding fashion trends, comprehending & adopting changing fashion trends, acknowledging changing styles of men’s & women’s wear over decades, understanding the evolution of costume trends from the year 1900 until today as well as developing views & opinions like a fashion critic.
Understanding Fashion Trends – To be professionally competent in this dynamic industry, stylists must consistently acknowledge changing fashion trends. This topic will address the basics of changing fashion trends, the reasons for them, and how people have adapted to this change.
Following Fashion Trends – Every stylist's essential question is how to understand and implement fashion trends. This section will tell you about reliable sources that must be followed in order to keep up with changing fashion trends.
Changing Styles of Men’s & Women’s Wear – “Change is the only constant”, is definitely true for fashion industry as with change in time & developments, there was a major transition in Men’s & Women’s wear. To learn more about these changing transitions both in men’s & women’s wear, this topic has been designed with specific details and relevant sources.
Evolving Fashion Trends from 1900-2020 – From Black & White to Color, from pre-industrial to post-industrial era, fashion trends have also evolved consistently. This section gives you deeper insights about changing fashion trends from 1900-2020.
Fashion Critics – Have you ever imagined yourself as a critic with the opportunity to express your thoughts on various styles? This part will help you improve your skills and abilities so that you can use your thoughts, perspectives, and tactics to become a top fashion critic in the ever-growing fashion industry.
This course is strategically designed so that the students who want to learn the basics of styling will experience the ease of understanding and will be able to consume through the flow of topics. Additionally, various live and trendy examples have also been given to make the topic more interesting.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about Fashion Styling.
Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers.
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Styling.
Anyone who wants knowledge about Fashion Trends, Changing Styles of men’s & women’s wear over decades, evolving fashion trends from 1900-2020 as well as many more.
For all entry level to advanced Fashion Stylists.

courses.title: Basic Fashion Illustration
courses.bio: From a 4-month course to a 2-hour video. Learn the simple techniques of how to draw fashion figures and postures.
objectives: Over 15 lectures and almost 3 hours of content!
This course will cover the basic of fashion illustration for a beginner to an intermediate.
You will be equipped with the knowledge and techniques of how to draw the body elements and different fashion poses.
Understand the proportions and difference between female, male and children figures.
Know how to draw garments on the posing figures.
Download the useful materials.
Get feedback on your sketches!
requirements: This course assumes no prior knowledge or special skill set. Anybody with an interest in the fashion drawing is welcome.
courses.description:
This course will teach you how to draw the fashion figures starting from the basic understanding of the 9-head proportion, body elements from head to toe, movement and posture to fashion poses with garments. It is a summary of a 4-month course in a regular fashion school that will shorten your learning process and save your time and money.


You will understand how to draw both female and male fashion figures that have different proportions and shapes, in different angles such as front, side, back and three-quarter views, along with how to draw body rotation and posture with different weight distribution. Besides that, you will understand how to draw garments for both female and male figures and how to draw drapes and folds on the garments for different body postures and rotation.


The concepts and techniques are the knowledge that I’ve learned from several courses and teachers combined with my own personal techniques to deliver you a simple and easy way to develop skills in the fashion illustration. It is much less complicated than any other techniques that you have seen before. In addition, you can submit your drawings to get feedback from me at the end of the course so that you will know where to improve.


This course is a good starting point for you to pursue your dream in fashion design and can also lay a foundation in human figure drawing in case you would like to understand about the anatomy of human figure, which is useful for animation.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who is interested in fashion illustration.
This course will benefit those who are planning to attend a fashion school and need some preparation.
Advanced learners are also welcome.

courses.title: BIM- Revit Concrete Structure Project- For BIM Modelers
courses.bio: Revit Structure- Project Management and 3D Modeling for Concrete Structures: RVT Project Files and Families for Practice
objectives: Introduction to Rebar Tools
WBS Importance in BIM
Pricing BIM Services
LOD's Role in BIM
Creating Project Templates
Initiating BIM Modeling
Dynamo for Structural Levels
Project Grid Generation
Adding Columns
Column Rebar Placement
requirements: A Laptop and Autodesk Revit
courses.description:
Note: The main difference in this course compared to others is that we have not confined ourselves to explaining simple techniques. Instead, we have conveyed the subject through challenging projects and specific tricks, which are the result of numerous experiences.


Ready to shape your ideas into concrete structures?
Want to master Revit Structure for concrete structures?
Ready to Tackle Complex Elements like Post-Tensioning?
Welcome to the Project-Centric Revit Structure (Concrete Structural) Modeling course! In this comprehensive course, you'll delve into the world of Building Information Modeling (BIM) as it pertains to concrete structures using Autodesk Revit. Throughout this course, you'll learn how to effectively initiate, develop, and manage BIM projects, focusing specifically on concrete structural modeling.
We'll cover various aspects of the BIM workflow, from initial project setup and AutoCAD file assessment to the creation of detailed reports, generating Excel tables for discrepancies and issues, and understanding the Level of Development (LOD) concept in concrete structural modeling


Headlines:

Introduction to Rebar Tools
WBS Importance in BIM
Pricing BIM Services
LOD's Role in BIM

courses.description:
Startnow.Fashion ile Moda illüstrasyon eğitimlerine harika bir giriş yap! Kumaş çeşitlerinin farklı teknik detaylarını moda ürünleri üzerinde uygulayarak öğrenmeye şimdi başla.
Bu uygulamayı yaptığında; dantel, kadife, triko, kürk, pul payet gibi kumaşların kendine özgü doku ve özelliklerini, adım adım uygulayarak renklendirme ve boyama tekniklerini kavrayabilirsin. Her kumaşın kendine ait boyama biçimi ve özelliği vardır. Kumaş çeşitlerini moda ürünleri üzerinde uygulamayı öğrendikçe çok daha etkileyici moda illüstrasyon çizimleri yapabilirsin.
Moda illüstrasyon çizimlerinde farklı kumaş dokularını çizebilmek için, öncelikle gerçek kumaşı inceleyerek, yapı ve dokusunu öğrenmek gerekir. Çizilen kumaşların gerçek, kumaş üzerinde inceleyerek boyamak kumaşın yapısını tanımayı kolaylaştırır. Her kumaşın farklı özellikleri bulunur. bu özellikler yazlık, kışlık vb. kumaşın kullanım yerine göre içeriğindeki yapıyı değiştirir. Bunun dışında moda tasarım ürünlerinde kumaş seçimi yaparken tasarımcının kumaşın yapısal özellikleri, kullanım performansı, pazar ve fiyat konusunda önemli bilgilere sahip olması beklenir.
Eğitim içeriğinde, en çok tercih edilen, önemli kumaşları işleyerek, ilk akla gelebilecek tasarım ile kombin oluşturacağız. Daha sonra kumaşta yer alan önemli detayları Marker kalem ve kuru boya kalem ile destekleyerek, oluşturduğumuz kombini renklendirme aşamasını yapmış olacağız. Bu eğitim ile kumaş çiziminde yer alacak bütün detayları öğrenebilirsin.

courses.title: Advanced Pattern Making AND Draping PART 5 - Fashion Design
courses.bio: Expand Your Pattern Making and Draping. Learn ADVANCED techniques: Bias, Asymmetrical, Peg Skirt, Cowl Skirt. Tutorials.
objectives: You will learn intermediate and advance techniques and skills applied to Fashion Designing.
You will learn how to Drape a Peg Skirt.
You will learn advanced techniques in Pattern Making and Draping when adding Pleats to a Peg Skirt.
You will learn advanced Draping techniques such as: Draping on the Bias and Draping a Cowl on a Skirt.
You will learn advanced principles such as: A-symmetrical Design and their nature and quality and structure.
You will learn how to adjust and modify a pattern to change the fit of the design.
We'll go over other Bias related items, such as: spaghetti straps, loop turner, bias binding tape and piping.

Curriculum: - Bias grainlines. Properties of Bias-cut dress. Making a Bias-cut Top.
- Asymmetrical Designs. One-shoulder Dress. R.S.U./Right Side Up.
- Peg Skirt: Part 1 - Draping a Peg Skirt, and "Truing" pleats.
- Peg Skirt: Part 2 - Using pattern making to draft a Peg Skirt.
- Cowl Skirt. Skirt with a Cowl on Side Seam.
- Adjusting and modifying pattern measurements to fit a specific size/body.
- Inspirational guidance and advice. Words of wisdom for the artist within you.
Bonus Lecture: FAQs, and other "goodies", etc.
My New Book: "Design Your Future-Be A Future Designer"

requirements: Knowledge of pattern making and draping would be very helpful.
courses.description:
This Course is PART 5 of: Advanced Pattern Making for Fashion Design AND Advanced Draping,… It is a combination of Pattern Making AND Advanced Draping.
If you have not taken any of my previous Courses, such as Pattern Making 1, 2, 3, 4, and Draping, and you know nothing about pattern making…. this course might be challenging for you…. So, I encourage you to enroll in my Pattern Making/Draping Courses…
This Course will cover:
Bias. Bias cut Designs
Asymmetrical Designs. One Shoulder Dress
Peg Skirt, with Pleats
Cowl Skirt on Side Seam
Adjusting and modifying pattern measurements
Spaghetti straps
Bias Binding
Bias Piping
Bias Grainlines
"Truing" pleats
Inspirational advice and direction
In this course you will learn about Bias. Bias grainline. Cutting garments on the Bias. Properties of Bias-cut dresses. You will discover Designer Madeleine Vionnet. You will learn about Bias tape and Bias piping and how to use it. Spaghetti straps are also cut on the bias. And what is a: Loop turner. And you will learn how to design a Bias Top.
You will also learn about: Asymmetrical Designs. What is a asymmetrical design? You will watch me as I demo and drape a One Shoulder Dress. You will learn how to drape using Center Front on Bias. You will learn the meaning of R.S.U. which stand for 'Right-Side-Up'. referring to how to lay a pattern unto a specific type of fabric to make sure that it is cut correctly.
You will learn, by watching me demo, how to make a: Peg Skirt with Pleats - a 2-Part Demo that will demonstrate firstly what Peg Skirt is, and secondly how to add pleats. First, I will be using the draping process and Drape a Peg Skirt, then I will show you, using Pattern Making (Drafting), how create one using Patten Drafting.
You will learn the “Truing” process, "truing" the muslin drape accurately in order to achieve accurate patterns, the transferring of the information from the muslin drape unto pattern paper.
You will learn (I will demo) how to Drape a Skirt with a Cowl on the side seam, and side seam on the bias — a unique and dramatic design. Most skirt do not have a Side Seam, and to have a Cowl Drape on a Side Seam in not only unusual but also dramatic. Draping a Cowl on a side seam you would have to have the grain line (of the side seam) on the Bias.
We will cover adjusting and modifying a pattern to fit specific measurements, whether you’re making garments for yourself or designing something for a specific customer. A get a lot of students asking me how to change the measurements of a pattern and thus altering the fit  of the garment. Even though there is a very specific skill/technique called Grading to achieve that, I will show you and give you an overall concept on how to make a pattern/garment larger or smaller.
You should have some previous knowledge of Pattern Drafting and/or Draping before enrolling in this Course. Please review my previous Courses so that you can understand and absorb the material in a supportive and empowering way. I do have Courses in pattern Making (Part 1 through 4) that would help you understand the content of this course if you feel that it's a bit too advanced for you.
You should have the proper TOOLS necessary to draft patterns and draping, such as scissors, pins, measuring tape and ruler(s), muslin or similar fabric, pencils, pattern paper would be helpful, tape, etc.
Having a Dress Form would be very helpful, as the draping part of this Course will be demoed on a Dress Form (but if you only want to learn the theory behind these designs and these techniques, that’s fine too, that’s up to you). A Dress Form is very useful especially when you want to see what a new design looks like being worn.  Also, a dress form would be essential if you want to use the draping process as a creative tool and vehicle to create new designs and bring new ideas to fruition.
I’m very excited to share this Course with you as it is the first one that combines Pattern Making AND Draping. My other courses focus on either draping or pattern making, this fashion design course combines both skills and techniques.  Learning to use, and work with, Bias, is such a new way to use fabric and to achieve a certain "look" and silhouette that would normally b very difficult to achieve.
I invite you to take this course along with my other fashion courses as it will create a synergistic effect and elevate your fashion designing knowledge to a new level.
My courses are about learning how to be a great fashion designer; whether you are a beginner student or a professional fashion designer, learning skills and techniques in designing is an ongoing process: there’s always something new to learn, even if you know basic fashion design techniques, building on top of that is essential to expand your knowledge of the industry at large.
Learning fashion designing online is such an amazing opportunity: you can study fashion designing, and learn to be a designer, in the comfort of your own home, at your own pace, having full lifetime access -- wow ...what an opportunity. Save on the cost of hight tuition, instead learn by watching these high quality videos, and... you can rewind and watch them over and over again, on your own time and schedule.
Studying Fashion Sketching, and Fashion Draping and Pattern Making (Pattern Drafting) or maybe you want to explore The Business of Fashion, and learn the business side of fashion (Business vs Creativity), or learning how to put a Fashion Collection together and learning the use of Fabrics and the Textile Industry, these Courses are an amazing way to expand your knowledge, elevate you fashion skills, and add to your existing body of work.
Whether making clothes is a fun hobby of yours or actually a financial income generator, these courses empower you to build your confidence and make you a better designer.
Regardless whether you are putting together your first presentation or fashion design portfolio, or building your fashion website or online store, or learn how to market your fashion line, these courses give you the ability to accomplish all of that especially because you will be saving on very expensive tuition costs.
I invite you to take this course, along with my other fashion design courses, as it will create a synergistic effect and elevate your fashion designing knowledge to a whole new level.
As a fashion designer, pattern making is essential in learning how garments are created and put together. A good fashion designer must learn pattern making in order to really understand the construction of his/her designs.
Manipulating darts from one position to another, from one "angle" to another, will increase the number/amount of options available to you and expand your creative reach. Included in this Class is the Draping process, which when used creatively will enhance the ability to develop new and exciting fashion designs.
Once the muslin has been draped, transferring the information to paper is essential. Also, the different types of paper used in the industry to develop patterns.
Learning how to take a simple skirt and by the use of adding a Yoke , you can develop new ideas and spark your imagination to endless possibilities.
Labeling a Pattern correctly can mean the difference between a beautiful design versus a disaster! Thus learning how to label a pattern correctly is very important -- the industry demands perfection when it comes to being accurate and precise.
And the use of proper Grainlines can be the difference between cutting the garment correctly or cutting it "the wrong way" and thus having to cut it all over again.
Getting to know, and familiar with, all the necessary tools used in the industry, makes the difference between a professional and a novice when going for a job interview.
All lectures delivered by VIDEO with detailed DEMOS of the applied techniques.
When working with a designer you must know, and be familiar with, the proper terminology, techniques, principals, of pattern drafting so that communication is clear and understood in order to execute a garment accurately. Deciding on which technique to apply to a design, not only expedites the process but the right choice produces optimum results.
Learning how to use an existing pattern, maybe something that you bought at your local fabric store, and, by applying the principals and techniques learned in this course, you can transform the original design into a new idea, will give you confidence and experience.
Pattern making is essential in learning about the construction of a garment. And learning pattern making and garment construction can help you in the design process. Knowing pattern making will help you in knowing what is possible and what is not when it comes to designing a garment, or how to design a garment.
Knowing pattern making is valuable not only in the design room but also in production. If something goes wrong in the factory and the reason is due to a pattern mistake, you must know what to do and how to fix the pattern and/or remedy the situation.
Because pattern making is a very specialized skill, and not everyone can do it, the financial compensation for a pattern maker is usually very high. A pattern maker is a very valuable asset to a company and is treated with respect and rewarded accordingly.
In conclusion, pattern making skills are invaluable for fashion designers, offering numerous benefits such as enhanced creativity, customization capabilities, and cost efficiency. Learning these skills through online courses provides designers with accessibility, flexibility, and opportunities for continuous learning and development, making it an ideal pathway for aspiring fashion professionals.
target_audience: Fashion design lovers; fashion designing students; people who want to expand their knowledge of fashion design

Who Can Learn Shuttle Tatting?

requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description:
In this course, you'll learn the essential skills to create stunning metal jewelry, from basic techniques to more advanced crafting methods. Whether you’re a beginner or have some experience, this course will guide you step-by-step through the process of making metal jewelry pieces.
We will cover the fundamental tools needed for metal jewelry making, and teach you how to safely use them to create professional-looking pieces.
Throughout the course, you will gain the knowledge and confidence to create your own jewelry collection. By the end, you’ll not only have the skills to make beautiful pieces for yourself but also to launch your own handmade jewelry business, whether online or locally.
This course will empower you to turn your passion for jewelry into a profitable venture, as you learn to craft your very own metal jewelry designs.
More and more people are trying to be their own boss in order to find a sense of fulfilment by being independent. Starting your own jewelry making business is a lot of fun and also helps you earn money doing what you love. You can thus turn your hobby into a home-based business. Making handmade bracelets, necklaces or earrings involves a lot of passion. Learning the craft is not always easy to do and requires a lot of tools and a lot of practice. With jewelry, you’re typically working with very small metal items that require specific tools.
One small mistake can damage the look of the jewelry item you created, so this is why attention and practice are very important to every jewelry creator. You can discover your talents and develop your skills by making your own unique pieces of jewelry that reflect your own style. When you create your jewelry, you will have lots of materials to choose from. Metals is one of these materials. When you first start your handmade jewelry business, focus on a product range that is closer to the best-selling jewelry online. Research the trends and see what types of jewelry sell best. After you found the best-selling jewelry types, you can start to make your own jewelry.
target_audience: People who like making beautiful handmade jewelry that they want to sell.
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

Manejo básico de la maquina de coser

Cubre pañal forrado patrón vertical, con volante.

requirements: Ningún requisito , muchas ganas de aprender. UPS ¡se me olvidaba! una maquina de coser.
courses.description:
¿Cuántas veces has visto por redes sociales, televisión o has pasado por un escaparate donde había exclusivas prendas de bebe y has deseado crearlos por ti mism@?.
En este curso, Vanessa ,diseñadora textil y creadora de Hilvana tus Patrones te enseñara a poderlo realizar. (una marca dedicada  a enseñar técnicas de costura y patronaje, con el fin de ayudar a otras personas a confeccionar su propia ropa, a su estilo y forma de vida).
Puede que te estés preguntando que este curso no es para ti , debido a que no sabes sobre costura. ¿quieres saber la mejor parte? No hace falta que tengas conocimientos previos, durante el curso empezaremos por un nivel básico que iremos incrementando en cada prenda.
Al consistir en un curso practico y no teórico, perderás el miedo desde el minuto uno.
Si por otro lado, sabes sobre costura pero te falta ciertas técnicas de acabado en las prendas, o dificultad en encontrar los patrones en diferentes tallas, este curso es para ti. conforme vayamos subiendo de nivel aprenderemos mas y mejores acabados en nuestras prendas , de ese modo podemos vestirlas o venderlas con mas valor.
Todo esto es posible porque:
He creado para ti unos patrones DESCARGABLES con diferentes tallas ,desde la 0 hasta 24 meses.
Fichas técnicas, plantillas , DESCARGABLES, para organizar todo lo que vayamos aprendiendo.
25 clases, en video donde te explico la realización  de cada una de las prendas.
Método y lenguaje entendible costuril, para no perderte en ningún paso.
Empezaremos por un nivel básico, entender la maquina de coser, que es un patrón , como descárgalos y montar los folios, o como colocarlos y cortar sobre el tejido que usaremos.
Nivel medio, confeccionaremos complementos sencillos baberolas, cuellos postizos, gorritos, cubre pañales, con diversas técnicas de costura, como por ejemplo coser con hilo elástico.
Hasta alcanzar un nivel avanzado, en técnicas de costura, acabados, con diseños como ranitas con y sin abertura lateral, vestidos, o zapatitos de bebe forrados y ocultando todas las costuras.


Todos los diseños están enfocados para niño y niña . Lo podrás realizar a tu ritmo, ir confeccionando los diseños que quieras o apetezca en el momento, no hace falta seguir el orden de las clases. Tan solo decide que quieres realizar , ¡descarga los patrones y a aprender!.
target_audience: Cualquier persona que quiera aprender confeccionar ropa bebe, para regalar o vender .Futuras mamas y papas

objectives: Learn to perform and combine basic techniques: simple wire loops, wrapped wire loops, wrapped headpins, wrapped briolette drops, rosary chains, ear wires, etc.
Inspiration for beautiful gemstone and bead combinations
Unlimited lifetime access from anywhere in the world!
All future updates and additions to this course are included, locked in at today's low price

Getting Started with Beading: HOW TO MAKE THE ''CASSY'S BEADED BAG
NEST BEADED BAG: Learn how to make a nest bag

requirements: Students will need to purchase necessary tools and supplies from the supply options
A desire to learn and a little bit of time to practice these techniques
courses.description:
Welcome to this fantastic beginners online jewellery making class. Come join me in this class to master these skills so that you are able to unleash your creativity within. Once you start with the basics there is no end to where this could take you, there are truly so many benefits.
Learn to make Cassy's beads jewellery quickly
Create beautiful gifts for loved ones
Make yourself bespoke pieces in minutes
Create a beaded jewellery business and work from home
It is so satisfying when you buy a new outfit and wish you could have a pair of Cassy's beaded bag to match or give your outfit that pop it needs. I cannot count the amount of times i have quickly whipped up accessories to wear for a special occasion or night out with friends, it is so satisfying that i have made them. Especially seeing the look on an admirers face when you tell them that it was YOU that made them. That always makes me smile and feel proud of myself.
Another skill this class will teach you is how to repair jewellery. We all have a few pairs of earrings that are missing a hook or a favourite necklace that just needs a clasp replaced. Well after this class you will be able to do exactly that and you'll be amazed how simple it is once you know how. The only thing is you'll have a queue of friends asking you to fix things!!
You will also be able to make inexpensive gifts for friends and family with your new skill. I have saved a fortune over the years by making my own gifts for my loved ones. Not only is this more special as it is handmade by you with your time and love, you can also personalise the Cassy's beaded bag jewellery too, to match an outfit or make perfect for them using their favourite gemstone. It's a great gift to have and to use it to give. It also means that you don't need to fight the masses so much at the shops!! It's a win win.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no jewelry making experience
Anyone who wants to practice and refine their basic wire wrapping skills and learn new design

courses.title: T-Shirt Design with Vectornator on Ipad Pro
courses.bio: Create Amazing T-Shirt Designs with Ease! Unleash your Creativity with the Power of Vectornator App on Ipad Pro.
objectives: Vector Design
Vectornator App
Illustration
Pixel perfect design
Graphic design
Create Beautiful T-Shirt Designs
Combine Amazing Color Palettes in your Project

T-Shirt Design: Create a Mockup for the First T-Shirt
Create a Mockup for the Second T-Shirt
Create a Mockup for the Third T-Shirt

requirements: iPad and Apple Pencil
Motivation to Learn!
courses.description:
Hello there and welcome to my class, in this class I'm going to teach you how to design your own T-Shirts. Yeah you heard right, you will learn how to express yourself and unleash your creativity. You don't need any prior knowledge, because the things you learn in this class will be just enough so that you can start designing right away!


Everybody is creative, it's just the matter of how much effort your put into it. The more your practice, the better you are getting. Which is the whole point of this class. I'm not going to waste your time with some boring theory and stuff that you don't need.


In this class you will learn by practicing. There are 3 different T-Shirts designs that we are going to create in this class. You will see how you can create some amazing designs by using basic shapes and tools. For that purpose, we are going to use one of the popular vector applications, called Vectornator. It's a free application, so no worries there.


Besides the Vectornator application, we are going to need an Ipad with an Apple Pencil. I'm using an Ipad Pro and Apple Pencil 2nd generation, even though the first generation is fine either way.


Anyhow, as I said earlier, I'm not going to waist your time anymore. You want to learn how to design, then let's get started!
target_audience: Graphic designers
Anyone who wants to learn how to create beautiful vector designs
Anyone who wants to learn more about graphic design
Anyone who wants to learn how to create vectors
Anyone who wants to learn how to use a Vectornator App
Anyone who's interested in graphic design in general

courses.title: Pattern Making For Beginners
courses.bio: Learn how to take measurements and draft necklines, sleeves, blouse, and a variety of other patterns
objectives: Introduction to Pattern Making
How to take measurements
How to draft necklines, sleeves, and blouse
How to draft a variety of trousers and skirts
How to draft a cape
How to draft anarkali and a variety of trousers

Pattern Making Hinglish Version: How to Draft Basic Chudidar Salwar
How to Draft Basic Patiyala Salwar
Basic Skirt with waistband Curriculum Description
How to draft a Circular Skirt.
How to draft a Four tucks Blouse
Pattern Making English Version: How to Draft Basic Chudidar Salwar
How to Draft Basic Patiyala Salwar
Basic Skirt with waistband Curriculum Description
How to draft a Circular Skirt.
How to draft a Four tucks Blouse

requirements: Nothing
courses.description:
You have so many ideas. You translate those ideas on paper. But how do you transform an idea to garment? The process that takes you from ideating to implementation is drafting or pattern making.
Pattern making is an important aspect of learning garment construction. Pattern making is not something which is required only before the execution of a product but is equally essential post the production. If you find certain issues with the final product, drafting methods will help you identify and fix those shortcomings with ease.
As an aspiring or a professional designer, stylist or enthusiast must be familiar with the different tools, terminologies, techniques, and other essentials of drafting. Crucially, an individual must know the purpose of drafting. This includes having sound knowledge of tools required for drafting to learn how to take measurements to drafting a variety of garments.
The course is strategically designed divided into a series of topics for better understanding. Drafting is explained in detail through demos in the video lectures.
This course covers -
Introduction to tools
Drafting necklines, sleeves, and blouse
Drafting a variety of ethnic wear like basic kurta with sleeve and anarkali
Drafting a variety of trousers like salwar, chudidar, patiala, and palazzo
Drafting a pleated skirt with yolk and circular skirt
Drafting cape
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn pattern making
Anyone who wants to learn a new skill
Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Design

courses.title: Patronaje y costura a medida de bañadores y maillots.
courses.bio: El curso más completo para realizar las prendas a medida que tu diseñes.
objectives: Patronaje y costura a medida de bañadores y maillots para danza, patinaje o gimnasia.

1-Presentación del curso: Quién soy y por qué este curso.
La máquina de coser, tomar medidas y las: La máquina de coser, tomar medidas y las telas elásticas.
Cómo trazar el patrón básico de maillot.
Cómo trazar el patrón para la manga del: Cómo trazar el patrón para la manga del maillot.
Cómo trazar el patrón de la falda para e: 5-Cómo trazar el patrón para la falda delantera del maillot.
6-Cómo trazar el patrón trasero de la falda trasera para el maillot.
La confección de un maillot con o sin mangas.
Modificar el cuello del maillot para facilitar el ponérselo.
Realiza tus propios diseños y entiende cómo los puedes confeccionar.

requirements: Tener una máquina de coser doméstica.
No es imprescindible saber coser a máquina porque empezamos desde cero. Si ya sabes coser a máquina, podrás aprender también a hacerlo con telas elásticas.
courses.description:
Este curso es la guía más completa para iniciarse en la confección de bañadores o maillots para danza, patinaje o gimnasia rítmica, a medida, trazando tus propios patrones y confeccionando las prendas mediante el uso de una máquina de coser doméstica, ahorrando así mucho dinero y consiguiendo prendas que sienten bien.
Te facilito una guía de más de 60 páginas ilustradas, con toda la información y paso a paso que necesitas, para empezar desde cero.
Además te completo la formación con más de cuatro horas de vídeos en los que te explico el paso a paso para realizar tus prendas de manera sencilla.
target_audience: Personas con interés en diseñar y coser bañadores o maillots a medida.
Pueden ser principiantes o tener ya conocimientos de costura. Todos pueden seguir el curso.

courses.title: Visual Merchandising 101
courses.bio: Fundamentals of Mannequin Styling, Window Displays, and Retail Floor Plans. Create a portfolio without prior experience!
objectives: Fundamentals of Retail Floor Plan Design; sight-lines, fixtures, safety regulations, customer traffic flow
Fundamentals of Mannequin Styling and Window Display; mannequin types, manufacturers, poses, composition, theme, color story, lighting, implementation plan
How to create a Visual Merchandising Portfolio; various options for portfolio design, interview tips and job opportunity insights
Fundamentals of merchandising apparel and accessories; learn techniques to present merchandise in an elevated manner.
requirements: No experience necessary! This course is for beginners.
courses.description:
Ever wonder about the process of creating inspiring window displays? Or who changes the floor plan and mannequins every time you visit your favorite store? Visual Merchandising 101 is a class for anyone who is interested in starting a career as a Visual Merchandiser, anyone who is a retail business owner and wants to improve their revenue or brand identity through strong merchandise presentation, or anyone who is simply interested in learning about this sometimes mysterious profession.
Cristina here, a Visual Merchandise Manager who has worked for Bloomingdale's, Neiman Marcus, and IKEA. I'm offering up over 10 years of my knowledge in Visual Merchandising to help you begin your career or improve your retail business. Experience with both luxury and big-box stores gives me a wide perspective on how to visually translate the brand identity of various retailers and meet different customer expectations.
I started my career in 2010 with no experience and worked my way up from Visual Merchandiser to Visual Lead, to Visual Merchandise Manager, and you can too.
What you'll learn in this class:
Role of a Visual Merchandiser
Merchandising fundamentals for apparel
Merchandising fundamentals for accessories
Color Theory
Mannequin Styling
Floor Plan Fundamentals
Window Display Fundamentals
Job Opportunity & Portfolio Tips
In a retail climate with unrelenting online competition, it is more important than ever before to employ strong visual merchandising techniques in a brick & mortar store.
target_audience: Anyone interested in starting a career as a visual merchandiser (You do not need a degree to become a Visual Merchandiser!)
A retail business owner aiming to improve the presentation of their merchandise

courses.title: How to design a fashion bag
courses.bio: In this course, you will learn about different kinds of bags and gain knowledge of how to create the bag from scratch.
courses.description:
"How to design a fashion bag" - In this course, you will gain the overall knowledge of bag and it's construction. As the fashion industry is on the path of continuous evolvement, the demand for unique and functional bags has surged, making bag design a lucrative career path. Learning to design bags fosters creativity and personal expression, allowing individuals to transform their ideas into tangible products. This course will include the following:
You will learn about the construction of the bag.
The construction will include bags of different shapes and forms.
You will learn about different materials and techniques used to construct a bag.
You will learn to create inspiration boards and mood boards to design your bag.
You will learn to ideate and iterate bags.
You will learn to create 3D sketches and technical drawings of bags.
You will learn how to make mock-ups (3D paper model or sample) of bags.
You will learn the history of bags.
You will learn the bag brands that exists globally and the different bags they make.
You will learn the difference between regular functional bags and avant garde bags.
You will learn the different kinds of bags used for different purposes, whether be it in a party or casual use.
target_audience: This course is dedicated to aspiring designers or anyone who may be working or studying in one field, but have an interest on bags and expects to have a future in this field.

courses.title: PENSSİZ BEDEN KALIBI ÇİZİMİ TÜM BEDENLERİ ÇİZME GARANTİLİ
courses.bio: Temel Bluz ve Tunik ve Türevleri
objectives: Tüm bedenlerde penssiz beden ve kol çizim becerisi
Pratiklik ve zamandan tasarruf
İşin mantığı
Beden çizimine göre kol kalıbı nasıl hazırlanır
requirements: Hesap makinası, riga takımı, düz cetvel gönye ve mezura 0,5 uçlu kalem
0'dan penssiz beden kalıp çizmeyi anlattığım bu kursa hiç bilginiz yoksa dahi katılabilirsiniz...
courses.description:
Merhabalar bu kurs 12 yıllık bilgi birikimim ve mesleki hayatımdaki tecrübelerim sonucu sizlere sunulmuştur. Bu sizlere sunduğum ilk kursumdur bu kurs başlangıç düzeyinde hiç işi bilmeyen birine bile Temel Penssiz Beden Çizimini öğretmeyi amaçlamıştır.
Bu kursta edineceğiniz bilgiler her bedende temel bluz ve tunik kalıbı çizimi ve mantığıdır. Bu kursa katıldığınız taktirde işin mantığını sizde kolayca öğrenip anlayacak ve her bedende bluz ve tunik gibi kalıpları rahatça çizebileceksiniz...
Bluz tunik gömlek piyasada çok fazla satılan ve günlük kullanımda bizimde çok fazla tercih ettiğimiz kıyafetlerdir bu kurs sayesinde bu kıyafetlerin hepsinin kalıbını hazırlama becerisine sahip olacaksınız.
Kurs içeriğinde her bedeni kolayca çizebilmeniz için sizlere kendi hazırladığım ölçü tablosu bu kursun içinde verildi ve diğer  tüm detay teknikler anlatıldı  ve minyatür kalıp çizimleriniz için bile minyatür cetvel ve gönye çizimleri sizlere anlatıldı...
Kısaca bütün işin püf noktalarını öğrenip kavrayabileceğiniz dolu dolu ama bir o kadar da kolay öğrenebileceğiniz kapsamlı bu kurs hazırlandı ve 12 yıllık bilgi birikimi ve tecrübemin eseri olarak sizlere sunuldu...
Bu kurs Udemy'nin eğitimcilere seçtirdiği en düşük fiyat seçeneği ile sizlere sunuldu, edindiğiniz bilgilerin ve verilen emeğin bir karşılığı olarak ve diğer yayınlayacağım sonraki kalıp kurslarının devamlılığı için geri dönüşleriniz çok değerlidir.
Bu kursta öğrendiklerinizi uygulamanızı muhakkak tavsiye ederim.
Hepinize iyi çalışmalar dilerim...
target_audience: Bu işe meraklı ve istekli işin tekniğini öğrenmek isteyen herkese yönelik

紹介: コースで使用するアプリの詳細
Real Fabric操作方法: デザインのアップロード
デザイナーとしてデザインをアップロードする方法
Procreate プロクリエイトでパターンを作る方法: キャンバスの作り方 - Procreate
