requirements: Procreate, Affinity Designer, Canva に興味がある
courses.description:
デザイン業界のトップアプリのいずれか１つをお持ちですか？


Procreateプロクリエイト
Affinity Designer アフィニティーデザイナー
Canva キャンバ


これらのアプリでそれぞれリピートパターンを製作する方法が学べるコースです。


リピートパターンとは
無限に繋がる画像のことです。
広い面積（生地など）を製作する際に必要となるスキルです。


さらに最後には製作したリピートパターンをオリジナル生地にする方法をみていきます。
ご自身や大切な方へのオリジナルプレゼントなどを製作できる生地製作方法を一緒に学びませんか？


必要なのは上記のアプリの中でお好きな物１つのみです。


講師はMacユーザーのため、画面はMac使用ですが、Windowsユーザーでも分かりやすいように、可能な限り対応しています。わからないことがあれば、Q＆Aやメッセージでご質問ください。
target_audience: オリジナルデザインの生地を作りたい方

courses.title: How to look stylish everyday: secrets of Italian stylist
courses.bio: Study how to look elegant and stylish every day without spending money: secrets from italian stylists
objectives: know how to look stylish everyday
ability to make a stylish outfit spending on it only 5 minutes every day
know how to match colors in your wardrobe properly
know how to choose the right clothes in stores that fit you
know how to match accessories and clothes properly

Does this fit you: choosing the right pi: How to choose the best fabrics for clothes
How clothes should fit: shirts, jackets, blazers
How clothes should fit: dresses, skirts, pants
Do colors in your outfit match?: How to mix and match prints like a pro
Style tips on how to wear a stripe
How to create styles for every day situa: How to build the perfect wardrobe
Tips on choosing the perfect evening dresses
How to match accessories with your outfi: How to match clothes and accessories
How to select the right shoes for your clothing
Bonus: How to look fashionable: What are the TOP trends for women this spring-summer 2016?

requirements: To learn efficiently we recommend you practice on your own wardrobe right after watching video lessons. You will also be able to correct your style and make it more sophisticated.
courses.description:
When you wake up early morning you're thinking about:
What time should I go to work?
Do I have enough time to have breakfast?
I need to drink coffee.
What to wear today?
Or everything at the same time?
We think the question about what to wear to look gorgeous and feel great shouldn't be a pain in the neck. The process of choosing an outfit should become easy and pleasant.
For sure it is not easy to look stylish every day. You can't just put on any clothes you have and wait that you'll create an elegant, fashionable and stylish outfit. Creating of any outfit requires certain knowledge and skills in image and style.
There is a special methodology of creating an outfit with a help of which you will easily able to choose your wardrobe every day. The Italian stylist and clothes designer from Milan, teacher of Italian E-Learning Fashion School will share this methodology with you.
Following these simple rules and knowing these secrets you will be able to look elegant and stylish every day without spending big amounts of money on a designer clothes.
You will know these rules and secrets of creating an everyday stylish outfit from the course “How to look stylish everyday: secrets of Italian stylist”
Everyone knows Italy is the motherland of style and fashion for the whole world. Which is why we offer you to get the knowledge about style and fashion at first hand from Italian stylists and designers of our Italian E-Learning Fashion School.
You will get the most actual and up-to-date information on the fashion world from Italian fashion business professionals without leaving your house.
target_audience: Women who would like to look gorgeous and feel great every day
Women who would like to improve their style and image
Women who would like to know some secrets for improving their wardrobe
Those who are interested in secrets of style
For those whose work deals with female clothes and those who would like to know how to create stylish outfits for women

courses.title: Pattern Drafting with CLO3D-Simple Unisex Bodice and Sleeve
courses.bio: Basic pattern blocks of a simple unisex bodice and a sleeve block. No former fashion or CLO3D experience needed
objectives: Navigate CLO3D's interface, including main navigation, layout, controls and key tools
Understand the basics of pattern drafting - including taking body measurements and body types
Draft a basic simple bodice and sleeve pattern for any model measurement
Use the main 3D tools to sew and simulate a simple garment
Use the main 2D tools to create and modify a pattern
Trace the drafted patterns and sew them on the 3D avatar
requirements: No experience needed
courses.description:
In this short course, we will be drafting a standard simple bodice block without darts and a sleeve block from scratch using CLO3D software that can be used for both female and male designs. These base patterns are necessary to start creating your own modifications and designs on the pattern. Take a look at the other pattern drafting courses from FIA as well! We also have a fitted bodice course and a course for skirts and pants coming soon!

The course will start with a basic lecture about pattern making, body types and how to take measurements. Also, a few videos of learning the main navigation and tools of CLO3D are included in the course which can be skipped if you already have the basics of CLO3D. But do not worry, no steps are skipped in the videos and all tools that are used are explicitly explained on the go.

All instructions are also included as course materials so it is easier to follow and iterate the process later on with your measurements. Additionally, a table for body measurements is included as course materials together with the lecture slides.

IMPORTANT! You can also follow the same steps when drawing your pattern on paper. You can also do both, check the fit in the real-life pattern and then make necessary changes in CLO.
You can later reiterate the process with your measurements.
No former fashion or CLO3D experience is needed.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn pattern making in an effective way - in CLO3D

courses.title: LEARN 3D FABRIC MANIPULATION TECHNIQUES
courses.bio: Learn how to create step by step beautiful, textured textiles using various fabric manipulation techniques.
objectives: Learn how to create step by step beautiful, textured textiles using various fabric manipulation techniques.
Design your own Shibori Bubbles fabric, Sandwich Fabric, learn Tucking, Ribbon Folding and Layering.
This Masterclass will teach you how to design tucks and you will stitch your own origami tuck fabric. In the end you will explore different folding variations.
You will create your own fabric sample book, see beautiful inspirations and learn how to apply these techniques to fashion and accessories design projects.

INTRODUCTION: In this course you will learn how to create step by step 3-dimensional fabrics

requirements: No previous skills are necessary to master this course. You only need very basic machine sewing skills and hand-sewing skills. No patternmaking, fashion & fabric design or illustration skills are required. The only thing you really need is the eagerness to learn something new and exciting! In terms of materials and tools you will need: fabric (at least 3 different colours and 1 fabric must be synthetic), sewing machine, needles, thread, scissors, ribbon, beads, cord, iron.
courses.description:
Welcome to the fascinating world of manipulating fabrics!
A place, where you will learn how to create three-dimensional, structured and unique textiles.


Ever wondered how to create your own, textured and stunning fabrics? How to turn a flat piece of fabric into an three-dimensional one? Ever asked yourself how these eye-catching fabrics from the runway shows are made? If yes, than this Masterclass will give you all the answers! Dominika, the founder of FABRIC CLASS, will share with you the whole process of manipulating fabrics and she will teach you how to create artisanal textiles.


WHAT YOU WILL LEARN IN THIS MASTERCLASS


In this course you will learn how to create step by step beautiful, textured textiles using various fabric manipulation techniques. You will design your own Shibori Bubbles fabric, than you will learn how to create layered sandwich fabrics and hand- smocked textiles.
This Masterclass will also teach you how to design tucks and you will stitch your own origami tuck fabric. In the end you will explore different folding variations and you will learn about decorative ribbon folding. During this course you will create your own fabric sample book, you will see beautiful inspirations and learn how to apply these techniques to fashion and accessories design projects.


WHAT YOU WILL GET


• Instant and unlimited access to this Fabric Manipulation Techniques Masterclass
• Downloadable templates
• PDF coursebooks for every chapter
• 24 exclusive step by step informational videos (over 2h)
• Exclusive access to our designer community
• An insider view on troubleshooting mistakes when they come up
• Additional support from Dominika inside the online community
• Videos in English audio (with optional polish subtitles)
• The ability to learn online anytime and at your own pace
target_audience: This course is for everyone! The only thing you really need is the eagerness to learn something new and exciting!

courses.title: Collar Couture for Her: How To Design A Distinctive Neckline
courses.bio: Patternmaking Guide For Making Unique Fashion Designs
objectives: Students will learn how to draft a collar
Students will learn adding seam allowances for fitting
Students will learn how to draft and cut out fabric patterns
Students will learn basic sewing
Students will learn the basic concepts of shirt design
requirements: basic sewing and drafting is suggested.
courses.description:
In this Patternmaking Course, you will learn how to draft and sew a beautiful custom collar to create a fitting neckline for any outfit.
A beautiful collar is a great add on to a great shirt. It requires a mix of style and technique to get it right.


Course Structure:
In this course, I show you how to impute measurements to draft a 2-piece collar consisting of a collar fall and a collar stand.
I start the course with the basics, sharing how to get a properly sized design with appropriate shape and curves. We start with the neck measurements, and also the appropriate points to construct the collar assembly. You will develop both of these patterns completely and clearly for the final design.


Next, we continue to adding the seam allowance for the collar joining. This allowance is added over fabric, to all appropriate edges for joining together and with the final shirt. We next cut out this pattern onto a nice fabric, to be ready for a quality assembly.
Finally, we continue to sew the collar fall, from two pieces with a stay for firmness on all edges. We then sew the collar stand pieces on the the collar fall and add the appropriate notching for attaching to the final shirt.
This final design will be assembled onto a model for review.


Course Fit:
This course is fashion designers young and older, interested in making more unique shirts with nice collars. If you are new to patterning making and sewing, please see my instructor profile for basics courses.

Course Outcomes:
At the end of this class, you will be able to craft a custom collar from pattern to final sewing that can be used in any of your designs.
target_audience: fashion designers, seamstress, diy designers

courses.title: The Encyclopedia of E-File and Bit Techniques
courses.bio: Choosing and Using the Right Bits for Skin Types and Effective Product Removal
objectives: How to select the correct e-file bits for different skin types for effective and safe use.
How to operate e-file machines and understand their key features for optimal performance.
Proper techniques for working with flame bit tips to manage delicate cuticles.
How to remove products safely and efficiently using e-file bits, with hands-on demonstrations.

Introduction: Introduction: Meet Your Instructor and Set the Foundation for Success
Lesson 1. Selecting Bits for Skin Types
Lesson 3. Working with Flame Bit Tips
Lesson 4: The Theory of Proper Product Removal with an E-File
Lesson 5: Demonstration of Proper Product Removal Using an E-File Bit
Lesson 6: Demonstration of Working with E-File Bits on Normal Cuticle Types
Lesson 7. Full Video. Mastering the Combined Manicure: Detailed Step-by Step

requirements: Basic knowledge of manicure tools and experience with manual nail care is recommended.
courses.description:
The Encyclopedia of E-File and Bit Techniques: Choosing and Using the Right Bits for Skin Types and Effective Product Removal
This comprehensive course is designed for nail technicians who want to master the art of e-file techniques and bit selection. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced professional, you’ll learn how to choose and use the right e-file bits for different skin types and ensure efficient product removal without compromising nail health.
The course starts with an introduction to your instructor, a seasoned expert in e-file techniques, and provides a strong foundation for your learning journey. In Lesson 1, you’ll explore the process of selecting the most suitable bits for various skin types, ensuring safe and effective work on different clients. Lesson 2 dives into e-file machines, guiding you on how to select, maintain, and operate them for maximum efficiency.
In Lesson 3, you’ll focus on working with flame bit tips, mastering precision and control. Moving into Lesson 4, you’ll learn the theory behind proper product removal using an e-file, followed by a practical demonstration in Lesson 5, showcasing step-by-step techniques for smooth and effective removal. Finally, in Lesson 6, you’ll see a hands-on demonstration of working with e-file bits on normal cuticle types, ensuring optimal results for common nail care scenarios.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and expertise to use e-files and bits professionally, ensuring high-quality results and satisfied clients every time.
target_audience: This course is for professional nail technicians looking to enhance their e-file and bit techniques for better results and efficiency.

courses.title: Fashion 101 | History of Color in Fashion
courses.bio: Learn about the history of every color in fashion, design, style & culture.
objectives: You will learn the HISTORY of color in FASHION design/styling throughout time.
You will learn how different COLORS were perceived in our History compared to our modern day age.
You will learn about the evolution of color throughout time in ART and FASHION.
You will learn about the meaning, interpretation, and PSYCHOLOGY of COLOR.
requirements: No previous knowledge needed. Just an interest to learn more about history & fashion!
courses.description:
Are you interested in learning color history in fashion? If so, this course is for you!
Welcome to another course of the Fashion 101 Series! My name is Veronika and I'm your instructor.
In this course, I will be teaching you the fashion history of color. We will look at the history of every color, each lesson focusing in on a different hue. We will look at its existence in fashion throughout time as well as its influence on fashion today. This course will have many visual examples to help illustrate the colors in fashion throughout history.
If you are interested in fashion design or styling, learning about the fashion history of color is SUPER important. It makes one understand how one color trend at a certain time in a certain place has influenced another color trend in a different time and place. It's only because of this understanding of long-term patterns and repetition in trends, that one is able to do a perfect forecast for the next season. The study of the past also helps us to compare as we start recognizing the patterns from the past. It enhances our observation and thinking skills therefore developing your taste for design.
target_audience: Anyone interested to learn about the history of color in fashion and art. No prior knowledge is needed and all are welcome!

Welcome to Udemy's first course of the Fashion 101 Series! My name is Veronika and I'm your instructor.
I created this course for you to easily learn, step by step, some of the most important fundamentals and principles used in Fashion Design & Styling.
This course covers the fundamentals of the principles of fashion styling and design:


Learn how to dress each of the 5 body types, how to camouflage/emphasize different areas and how to appear taller/shorter all through the power of color, shapes, and textures.
Learn the LOGIC behind successful design and style!
In this course, we will also cover how to mix & match different patterns together to create a successful look.
Learn all about the common shapes & textures used in fashion design.
Learn how to maintain a successful wardrobe!
Learn about the 6 face shapes and how to accessorize each shape to create that ideal look.
This course also teaches how to create/interpret a Mood Board as well as common terminology used in the fashion industry.


This course includes many exercises, short quizzes, and resources to make it easier for you to test and review your knowledge! While creating the course, I ensured that there are many visual examples available for you to follow as well as comparisons of different strategies. This course was made to teach you different methods and strategies when it comes to designing/styling garments for different people.
target_audience: Anyone interested to learn about the fundamentals of fashion design & styling. No prior knowledge is needed and all are welcome!.

requirements: This course can be started by beginner with basic drafting equipment.
courses.description:
The Easy Patternmaking Kit - Trouser Drafting Course teaches you how to construct a beautiful pair of trousers.
In this course, you learn to draft a pattern for a pair of trousers along wit belt and zipper attachments, using fitting measurements, and quality techniques. We begin with organizing your pattern paper with accurate measurements laid out properly. You will then learn to calculate the circumference measurements, the darts, and allowances for a quality fit. Finally we will draft accurate lines to match quality measurements for a fitting trouser design.


The next part of this course is to draft the zipper fly and shield, as well as the belt. These will be drafting to match and then cut out. These patterns are made using your measurements and will be ready to sew.


If you are new to drafting, please see my bodice pattern course to develop basic measurement reading and drafting.


What you learn:
How to layout measurements for an trouser sewing pattern
How to arrange trouser measurements for the leg, knee and ankle
How to draft the crouch curve
How to calculate the circumference widths and pattern curves
How to draft allowances for sewing seams
How to layout a fitting belt
How to cut out both trouser pattern, zipper and belt.
The ability to draft different styles helps you grow your craft and skill. This trouser drafting course is made to help you grow in both, and to help you be ready for your own creative takes.
If you're ready to draft your a new pair of trousers, then see you in my course!

courses.description:
Are you a hat lover, and would you like to learn how to make your own hat? Join London based milliner Elena Shvab in her studio for a hat making class and create a beautiful fascinator.

This workshop will enable you to create your own fabulous fascinator hat, and leave with the skills to carry on creating more. You’ll learn how to block a fascinator base, manipulate sinamay straw, use wire, work with veiling, and learn traditional millinery stitches. By the end of the session you will gain invaluable millinery skills and create a beautiful finished hat.
Each video contains a detailed step by step tutorial and process of making a fascinator hat using traditional millinery skills. Elena will guide you and explaining every detail. You will also learn what materials to prepare in order to start making.
As an option, a material kit including all necessary materials is available to purchase. For more information please contact me directly.
Elena Shvab is a London-based milliner and textile designer. Taking inspiration from nature, history, contemporary art and modern culture, she works with bold shapes and experimental textile techniques to create dramatic silhouettes.
Elena is an experienced millinery tutor, also offers hat-making workshops and private millinery tuition in her London studio and online. She teaches both traditional and modern hat making and shares helpful technique videos on the Elena Shvab Millinery YouTube Channel.

requirements: You should really be willing to treat Merch by Amazon as a t shirt business
It will help if you are creative or at least have an eye for a good design
courses.description:
If you are in any way creative and have not checked out the incredible opportunity that is Merch by Amazon then my advice to you would be to stop whatever it is you are doing now and spend the next 3 hours or so watching this masterclass, which is specifically aimed at non-graphic designers, who would like to supplement their online income by designing t-shirts for sale on Amazon.

- A Look at Best Practices, Design Templates and Which Types of T Shirt Design Sells Best on Merch by Amazon
The course begins by taking a look at the Best Practices when creating t-shirt designs for Amazon, including the recommended guidelines suggested by Amazon themselves, as well as the technical parameters necessary to ensure a quality t-shirt design.
The class then looks at how to correctly use the Merch by Amazon template before taking a look at how to create your own custom template, for those of you who do not work within Photoshop, Illustrator or GIMP and thus cannot use the aforementioned template, or indeed for those of you that feel the Merch by Amazon template is a little bit too crowded and complicated.
Then the class looks at the different types of designs that sell well on Amazon and the good news here is that for the most part these seem to be simple designs that non-designers, that is to say those creatives amongst you who are not graphic designers and do not have any formal training in graphic design, are more than capable of creating !!!
The remaining modules in the course are t-shirt design tutorials that show you step-by-step how to create the type of designs that sell well on Amazon.


Currently these modules are as follows:
- How To Create A Text-Based TShirt Design For Merch By Amazon
In this Module, I explain exactly why you should be creating Text Based T Shirt Designs for Merch by Amazon and I also take a look at basic typography and where you can source the fonts that you will use on your t-shirt designs.
The Module then goes on to show you how you can easily identify fonts that you like the look of, before finally creating some text-based t shirt design from scratch:
the creation of a simple design from within an iOS app, called Over
the creation of a more complex text design from within a professional vector type application, called Affinity Designer

- How To Create A Word Cloud TShirt Design For Merch By Amazon
In this Module, I am going to walk you through step-by-step how to create a Word Cloud t-shirt design from scratch, which you can then sell on Merch by Amazon.
The Module begins with an overview of the website where we will be creating the Word Cloud design and then takes a look at how to source the silhouette, which we shall use as the Image Mask for our Word Cloud.
The Module then goes on to show how you will need to prepare your image mask for use in your Word Cloud Design and also how you can both generate and then add the word list for your Word Cloud.
Finally, the Module shows you exactly how to create your Word Cloud Design from your mask image and word list, as well as how to correctly incorporate the Word Cloud into a suitable t-shirt design that it is ready to upload for sale on Merch By Amazon.

So why not join me in this course today and discover how easy it is for us non-designers to create the type of t-shirt designs that sell well and make a great new side income through the Merch by Amazon T-Shirt Business.
target_audience: People who would like to earn a substantial passive income online

requirements: Students will need to purchase and/or collect some supplies before beginning

Student should be able to create a simple design to be transferred onto the screen
courses.description:
Learn the skills needed to create a screen using one of your designs and then print it onto t-shirts or fabric at home, without the need for a dark room.
Master Screen-Printing Techniques and Turn Your Original Designs Into Money Making T-shirts.
·      Learn how to create a screen for printing
·      Discover best printing practices
·      Make designs permanent and able to withstand washing and regular wear and tear
·      Properly clean and care for your screen so you can use it repeatedly
Discover How Fast and Easy it is to Print Single-Color Images.
Learning how to screen print from home gives you the opportunity to create custom clothing for your friends and family or even to start your own business selling t-shirts with your clever and cute designs on sites like Etsy.
Anyone interested in printmaking, fashion or textile design and the fiber arts will benefit greatly from having screen-printing skills in their arsenal of techniques.  It's a versatile skill that develops a little more each time you move dye across the screen.  With a little practice you will be confident to tackle intricate designs.
Overview
Suitable for the beginner, through this course of 12 lectures and an hour of video content, you’ll learn everything you need to print single-color images onto t-shirts or fabric.
First, I’ll show you the supplies you’ll need to get started and then how to create a padded work surface to attach your fabric or t-shirts to.  Once our workspace is ready to go, I’ll take you through everything you’ll need to know to create a screen using one of your original designs.  I’ll show you how to stretch the screen-printing fabric, attach it the frame and make it waterproof.  Then I’ll demonstrate how to transfer the design and use drawing fluid to block out the areas of the screen that the dye will penetrate, before finally filling the rest of the screen with screen filler—so dye doesn’t end up where it shouldn’t. Once you complete this course you will have the know how to create almost any design onto a screen and the confidence to experiment with other print techniques
target_audience: This course is meant for beginners with no prior knowledge about screen printing
Anyone interested in fashion, textile or the fiber arts will benefit from the technique offered in this course
Great for anyone who wants screen print from home
This course is not for someone looking to learn advanced screen printing techniques like, photo emulsion

courses.description:
Olá, Estamos em uma época de crise, e pra sair dela, nada mais eficiente é se profissionalizar e se garantir para sair dela bem rapidinho. Então lhe ofereço entrar para o mercado da confecção, mercado esse que mais emprega no Brasil hoje em dia. Com esse curso você vai se profissionalizar e encontrar milhares de vaga por todo o território brasileiro e poder começar a faturar e a ter a sua independência financeira. Também dono de confecção, se você quer capacitar seu colaborador, esse curso é ideal.


Esse curso é uma das minhas experiências profissionais, e trago para vocês em primeira mão esse formidável conteúdo, onde vocês aprenderão todos os métodos e problemáticas para se fazer uma digitalização de qualidade e fiel ao molde que irão trabalhar. Esse curso é voltado para quem quer trabalhar com sistema Audaces em fabrica, ou confecção, na função de digitalizador, liberação de molde e risco e plotagem. Trago varias situações problemas vividas em minha experiência profissional, que ajudarão vocês a transcorrer em todos os desafios, sem maiores dificuldades ou surpresa na hora de por em prática o que foi ensinado. Esse cenário da profissão operador de Audaces é visto pelas empresas com um coringa na hora de economia e estratégia. Por isso é muito importante que o profissional seja muito assertivo, e também econômico em suas práticas e raciocínio do molde/risco. Então aqui mostro nos processos a importância de se conferir e monitorar o resultado da liberação de qualquer trabalho a ser feito. Esperem que gostem e aproveite ao Maximo todos os aprendizados que passarei no curso, forte abraço!
target_audience: Pessoas que quem se profissionalizar
Pessoas que querem empreender
Fabricantes
Confeccionistas
Cortadores de tecido
Costureiras
Empresários
Acabadores

courses.title: Historical Couture, Making 18th and 19th Century Garments
courses.bio: 18th & 19th Century Fashion: Craft Your Own Historical Wardrobe
objectives: Understand Historical Context: Gain insight into the social, cultural, and historical significance of 18th- and 19th-century garments
Identify Period Fabrics: Learn to select authentic fabrics such as silk, velvet, and linen, used in the creation of historical clothing.
Develop Pattern-Making Skills: Master drafting and altering patterns for the banyan, smoking cap, and morning cap.
Construct Historical Garments: Create the banyan, smoking cap, and morning cap using the materials, patterns, and techniques learned.
Understand Garment Structure: Learn to incorporate linings, and trims for an authentic look.
Explore Embellishments: Add period-specific trims, ribbons, and embroidery.
Analyze Clothing’s Social Role: Understand how clothing reflected personal identity and societal roles.
Appreciate Costume Craftsmanship: Develop an appreciation for historical garment construction.

Materials and Tools Needed for Creating: Materials and Tools Needed for Creating Historical Clothing

requirements: This course is designed for learners of all skill levels, and no prior knowledge or experience in costume design is required. Whether you're a complete beginner or someone with basic sewing skills, this course provides all the information you need to create historically accurate garments from the 18th and 19th centuries. We’ll guide you through every step, from selecting fabrics to sewing techniques, pattern-making, and garment construction. All tools and materials will be introduced in detail, and the course offers practical demonstrations to help you develop your skills at your own pace. If you’re passionate about historical fashion and eager to learn, this course is for you. We’ve structured it to ensure that anyone, regardless of experience, can successfully create beautiful, historically inspired garments by the end. All you need is a willingness to learn and the desire to explore the fascinating world of costume history.
courses.description:
This course offers a comprehensive exploration of 18th- and 19th-century clothing, focusing on the creation of historically accurate garments such as the banyan, smoking cap, and morning cap. Designed for both beginners and those with some experience in costume design, the course delves into the intricate details of historical attire, emphasizing the cultural, social, and practical significance of these garments during the respective periods.
Students will learn how to select period-appropriate fabrics, such as silk, velvet, and linen, and explore the nuanced techniques involved in constructing garments using historically accurate tools and methods. Each garment—whether the relaxed and luxurious banyan, the intimate smoking cap, or the elegant morning cap—reflects the fashionable trends, social customs, and domestic lifestyles of the 18th and 19th centuries. By the end of the course, students will possess the skills to craft these garments with attention to both historical accuracy and artistic expression.
This course also provides an in-depth analysis of period textiles, sewing techniques, and the embellishments typical of the time, offering a rich understanding of how these garments were constructed and worn. We will examine the role these clothing items played in the everyday life of their wearers, from leisure and social gatherings to their association with emerging forms of personal identity.
With a focus on authenticity, craftsmanship, and historical context, this course bridges the gap between costume history and practical garment construction. Students will be equipped with the knowledge to recreate these garments, using primary sources and historical research, while fostering a deeper appreciation for the art of costume design and the rich history it encapsulates.
target_audience: History Lovers: People fascinated by the fashion and culture of the 18th and 19th centuries who wish to deepen their understanding by making their own garments.
Sewing Beginners: Learners with little to no sewing experience who are eager to start creating historical clothing with clear step-by-step instructions.
Costume Design Enthusiasts: Individuals interested in historical costume design and construction, eager to learn how to create authentic 18th- and 19th-century garments.
Intermediate Sewists: Those with some sewing experience who want to expand their skills by learning how to create period-specific garments with historical accuracy.
Historical Reenactors: Individuals involved in historical reenactment groups who want to craft realistic, period-appropriate clothing for their performances.
Craft and Textile Lovers: Individuals who enjoy working with fabrics and textiles and wish to explore their historical significance through hands-on garment creation.
Collectors and Historians: People who collect historical artifacts and want to create or replicate historically significant clothing items for display or personal interest.
Creative Hobbyists: People passionate about crafting and learning new skills who are excited to delve into the world of historical clothing construction as a fun and fulfilling project.

courses.title: Saber vestir según tu silueta. Sácate más partido.
courses.bio: Cómo sacarle el máximo partido a tu forma de cuerpo usando la ropa y complementos adecuados. Asesoría de imagen.
objectives: Identificar cuál es el tipo de silueta, de entre los cinco posibles, con el que estás dotada por naturaleza.
Aprender cuáles son las prendas y accesorios que te favorecen y las que debes evitar, para equilibrar tu figura, descatar tus puntos fuertes y disimular los débiles
También descubrirás los trucos para disimular partes concretas de tu cuerpo que no te gustan demasiado.

Lo primero, conócete: Descubre cuál es tu tipo de silueta
Partes del cuerpo que merecen especial a: Cuello corto, hombros anchos, pecho grande, pecho pequeño, brazos gruesos
Piernas demasiado gruesas, delgadas, cortas o arqueadas. Últimas recomendaciones
Unos ejercicios de repaso, para terminar: Ejercicio: Lo más apropiado para piernas gruesas.
Ejercicio: A cada silueta, su vestido.

requirements: Ganas de aprender y gusto por cultivar la imagen personal, y por la belleza en general.
courses.description:
¿Te has desesperado alguna vez porque las prendas que están de moda no te sientan bien? ¿ no disfrutas de comprar y vestirte porque no acabas de verte bien, de acertar con tus estilismos? ¿Te gustaría disimular ciertas partes de tu cuerpo que no te gustan y no sabes cómo? ¿Crees que por no tener un cuerpo de modelo no te puedes sacar mucho partido?
No existe un solo tipo de belleza femenino.
Estadísticamente se han identificado al menos cinco figuras-tipo, todas ellas tan admirables como el cuerpo de reloj de arena, que es el patrón ideal en este momento de la Historia. Todas las mujeres somos bellas, pero no cabe duda que siempre podemos mejorar nuestra imagen, trabajando múltiples aspectos. En este curso nos centraremos en aprender a modelar las proporciones de nuestro cuerpo.
Por fin un VIDEOCURSO donde se desgranan los secretos del buen estilismo para cada tipo de cuerpo.
Aquí encontrarás explicados con detalle los tipos de prenda, combinaciones, y texturas que te convienen y las que no, y lo que es más importante: aprenderás por qué. Conocerás las reglas básicas para reconocer por ti misma qué disimula tus partes menos agraciadas y qué potencia tus puntos fuertes. Explicado de forma muy sencilla, al alcance de cualquiera.
Comos sabemos que la teoría no basta, cada sección se concluye con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios para que compruebes que has entendido correctamente lo que debes conocer.
Te recomendamos ponerlo en práctica lo antes posible, revisando las prendas de tu armario a la luz de lo que has aprendido, para que valores lo que te favorece y deseches la ropa que te está boicoteando.
target_audience: Mujeres con ganas de mejorar su imagen y sentirse bien con ella.
Estudiantes o profesionales del estilismo y la moda que quieran repasar o profundizar conocimientos.

Bienvenido/a a un nuevo curso! En esta ocasión aprenderás como funcionan Clo 3d, Marvelous Designer y otros softwares, como crear desde 0 ropas y tejidos virtuales, como crear los patrones , coserlos, añadirles detalles y adornos como botones y cremalleras, crear tus maniquís virtuales, posarlos y/o animarlos; crear tus estampados en Photoshop  y muchas cosas más.
Este curso está enfocado especialmente en la parte técnica de los programas, no es un curso de patronaje, pero aun así capaz de darle vida a tus ideas, incluso con conocimientos básicos de informática y diseño.
Como siempre recuerda que puedes contactarme para cualquier duda que tengas, incluso puedes formar parte de una comunidad exclusiva donde incluso puedes compartir tus trabajos y tus avances con el curso, me encantaría verlos.
Espero que disfrutes mucho del curso, mínimo tanto como yo creándolo, que aprendas mucho, te aseguro que  va a valer mucho la pena.
PD : El curso se irá actualizando de forma gratuita de vez en cuando con nuevos avances en las herramientas o enseñando más proyectos, si hay algo que te gustaría aprender no dudes en hacérmelo saber, así todos salimos ganando, tú, yo y los futuros alumnos que vayan viniendo, aqui sobre todo estamos para aprender, no lo olvides.

Introduction: Whom This Course is Intended for?
Designing Clothes with The New Black AI: Designing Clothes with The New Black AI
Redesigning My Clothes with The New Blac: Redesigning My Clothes with The New Black AI
Converting Sketch to Design with The New: Converting Sketch to Design with The New Black AI
Designing Fabric Pattern & Analyzing Fas: Designing Fabric Pattern & Analyzing Fashion Style with The New Black AI
Designing Polo Shirt with AIO Wear: Designing Polo Shirt with AIO Wear

requirements: No previous experience in clothing business is required
Basic knowledge in fashion design
courses.description:
Welcome to Fashion Design with Generative AI & Building Clothing Brand course. This is a comprehensive tutorial for fashion designers and entrepreneurs who are interested in leveraging generative AI to create innovative clothing designs and also start your own clothing brand business. This course will give you a whole new perspective about the future of fashion design and you will be amazed by how far artificial intelligence has advanced in the past couple of years to the point where you can generate high quality designs from a single text prompt. In the introduction session, you will learn about AI applications in fashion design, understand how it can help you to automate the designing process and give you new design inspirations. Then, in the next session, we will start designing clothes using several AI tools like Refabric, The New Black, Cala, and AIO Wear. The process will be relatively straightforward, all you need to do is to write the prompt describing your desired clothes design, you can specify things like color, styles, texture, and in less than a minute AI will generate the design. In addition to that, we will use AI to convert your handwritten sketch into design and redesign your existing clothes, Afterward, in the next session, we will learn how to build a successful clothing brand business, we will talk about market overview, market research strategies, business models, and which marketplace or platform to sell your products. Then, we will also learn how to find high quality suppliers for your clothing brand business. After that, we will also get to know more about clothing materials, specifically we will be comparing the pros and cons of using cotton and polyester based materials. Once you’ve learnt the basic fundamentals of clothing brand business, then, we will start building an online store on Shopify, we will import the product to the store, we will add price tag, product images, and product descriptions. In order to make the product images more interesting, we will use Vmake AI to create virtual fashion models to wear our clothing products. Last but not least, at the end of the course, you will learn to market your clothing brand. In this section, we will talk about effective marketing strategies like social media marketing, running ads, and partnering with influencers.
Firstly, before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves: why should we incorporate generative AI into fashion design? Well there are many reasons why and let me answer it from the perspective of fashion designers and clothing brand owners, generating fresh design concepts can be quite challenging and time consuming, requiring intense concentration and imagination exploration. Moreover, translating these designs from imagination to reality presents challenges, demanding attention to detail while sketching. Therefore, generative AI serves as an all in one solution, enabling the automatic transformation of designs into high-quality images, reducing the burdens of manual design processes. Lastly, the fashion industry remains in high demand as individuals seek to express themselves through their clothing and create comfortable and also stylish wardrobes.
Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:
Learn about AI applications in fashion design
Learn how to design clothes using The New Black AI
Learn how to convert sketch to design using The New Black AI
Learn how to design fabric pattern using The New Black AI
Learn how to analyze fashion style using The New Black AI
Learn how to design Jacket with Refabric
Learn how to design hoodie with CALA
Learn how to design polo shirt with AIO Wear
Learn how to build a successful clothing brand. This section covers market overview, market research strategies, and business models breakdown
Learn how to find high quality suppliers
Learn about pros and cons of using cotton and polyester
Learn how to add design to your product on Printful
Learn how to find custom clothing manufacturers
Learn how to build an online store using Shopify
Learn how to import product, add product image, and add product description to Shopify store
Learn how to create virtual fashion model with Vmake AI
Learn about effective marketing strategies for promoting your brand. This section covers social media marketing, partnering with influencers, and running Tiktok ads
target_audience: People who are interested in designing clothes using generative AI
People who are interested in building a successful clothing brand

requirements: No experience needed, this course is suitable even for complete beginners
courses.description:
You will learn how to make earrings in this course. All video tutorials are very detailed, showing each technique step-by-step, which makes this course suitable even for complete beginners. Materials used in each video are listed in downloadable files.
When you start the course, you will first learn about earring-making tools. The tools you need are simple and affordable, you only need two types of pliers and one pair of wire cutter. No expensive tools (such as a heat torch or a jewelry making bench) are required.
Once you understand how to use pliers, you will then learn how to make a simple earring, made with one bead only. You will build your skills as the course progresses. Your next steps will be to learn how to make earrings with links, decorative connectors, bead caps or sparkly bead dividers. You could try all the techniques demonstrated in my videos. Or, you could just select your favorite techniques and use these. The techniques can be also combined to create statement earrings, as will be explained at the end of the course, when I share my design tips with you.
While the techniques in this course are simple, you can create truly exquisite earrings with that 'red carpet look', using highly reflective crystals or genuine pearls, giving your earrings a touch of timeless elegance. If you are looking for just a bit of fun, you can use very simple colorful beads instead. Or, you could upcycle old bracelets and necklaces and turn them into earrings, as I will mention in the design tips section.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to make beautiful earrings

Este é muito mais do que um curso online: É a possibilidade de aprender a modelagem e a costura de uma peça muito importante no vestuário feminino que é a saia.
A saia virou uma peça de uso (quase) exclusivo das mulheres no século XII,  e hoje sem dúvida é uma das peças queridinha das mulheres , seja curta, longa, justa, godê ela conquista cada vez mais novas adeptas.
E nesse curso  você poderá a, modelagem do absoluto zero ou poderá aperfeiçoar seus conhecimentos.  O foco principal e a modelagem da base e  também a interpretação dos mais variados modelos, mais também vou te mostrar a montagem de todas as peças que forem modeladas durante o curso.
Você irá aprender  a modelar  do absoluto zero!!!
Irá fazer a construção da base de saia reta e irá aprender várias técnicas de modelagem para a interpretação dos modelos mais desejados, de saia.
A modelagem e a costura ao contrário do que muitos pensam não é dom, é dedicação e paciência aliadas é claro a uma boa metodologia de ensino é e justamente o que vou te oferecer neste curso.
Então, vem comigo pois eu vou acompanhar você nesta jornada. Partindo do absoluto zero até a confecção total de peças lindas para você usar e arrasar, com mais de 15 anos de experiência no ramo da modelagem e costura, sendo 5 como instrutora de cursos presenciais e online, tenho vasto conhecimento de técnicas e conheço bem a dificuldade de quem sonha em aprender modelar e costurar.   É neste curso, você vai aprender desde o manuseios das ferramentas para modelagem, materiais para construção dos moldes e ainda irá aprender a modelagem de saias de uma  forma prática e eficaz, e ainda irá conhecer o passo a passo do corte e da montagem das peças.
E sem contar com todos os outros benefícios que a costura irá lhe proporcionar por ser uma atividade terapêutica, a Costurar é uma arte e traz inúmeros benefícios para a saúde.  seja por hobbie ou como profissão, o mundo da costura é apaixonante.  Vou listar aqui mais 3 motivos para começar modelar e  costurar. Você pode ganhar dinheiro costurando Pode também Economizar bastante criando seus próprios modelos de saia, Assista as aulas disponíveis para visualização gratuita.

requirements: No Experience required in Pattern Making and Sewing.
courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Dartless Bodice PATTERN Block Course is the 11th course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable simple steps.
Our courses are created for students who like to learn in a systematic and orderly manner.
Our courses are straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts and clear instructions.
We focus on Stress Free learning.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Dartless Sleeve Block
2. Accurately place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Dartless Sleeve PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include, is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the course you will learn how to Draft, Cut and Sew Dartless Sleeve Pattern prototype accurately and professionally.


Let's start here, first of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?


Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns from a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics into a garment.

A basic pattern block is a pre-made template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.


Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of this course you will learn how to professionally Draft, Cut and Sew Dartless Sleeve Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This DARTLESS Skirt PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic DARTLESS Sleeve PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype (mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

courses.description: Hello everyone! In this course we are going to draft a basic pattern of bralette according to your individual measurements, and using this pattern we are going to sew a simple, but very delicate and beautiful lace bralette/triangle bra. I explain how to take the necessary measurements (totally 5), what is a stretch factor, why we need it and how to calculate it, how to draft the pattern step by step, how to trace it to the tracing paper, how to add seam allowances, how to mark a grainline (in case if in the future you will want to make the bralette out of mesh or cotton fabric), what materials we need to use for sewing the bralette (lace, elastics and etc.), what threads and needles we need for sewing this bralette, what materials we need for making the pattern and so on. I show a simple way of processing the seams, so that anyone can sew this bralette. Also I explain each step in detail. I have also added a Word File to each video (except for the introduction and conclusion), where you will find the text of the video, and in the file with the drafting the pattern I have added an example of the calculation formulas that we will need (using my personal measurements as an example). And in the end of this course you will learn how to sew the lace bralette!

requirements: None, this course will provide all the necessary information
courses.description:
Jewelry was created to enhance a person's beauty. Nowadays wearing accessories has become a trend with an increasing number of people preferring to wear handmade jewelry. If you like handmade jewelry, you probably thought about creating your own handmade items, which match your tastes, the colors of your clothing and will be a reflection of your own personality. Handmade products are considered to be more expensive due to the extra time, work, and materials used in manufacturing them. In the jewelry-making business, tools and techniques are important to create really unique pieces that will attract the attention of buyers.
Created by a series of knots that form a woven pattern, friendship bracelets are actually a kind of macrame. Understanding how to make knots is very important for any beginner who wishes to learn how to create beautiful and colorful bracelets. Understanding the two main types of knots, the forward and the backward knot allows you to create a great variety of bracelets. You should begin with two beginner patterns, the Candy Stripe and the Chevron. By switching the cords and the knots, you will learn to create new patterns and you will be free to choose the preferred shapes and colors for your bracelets, and to express your own personality.

objectives: Il corso di STYLING fornisce agli studenti le conoscenze su come valorizzare i prodotti moda, dove viene insegnato il metodo e la comprensione di tutti i meccanismi che ruotano intorno a questa professione. Racconteremo lo stile e la sua evoluzione nella società’ e’ studiamo insieme i compiti e le competenze. Nel corso approfondiremo tutti gli aspetti con analisi, dibattiti e processi di lavoro. Verranno esposti studi iconografici d’immagini, e analisi di case history specifici. Il corso insegna e spiega come e in che ambiti opera lo Stylist, affrontando in ogni lezione un tema specifico. Alla fine di ogni lezione ci sara’ l’assegnazione di un compito e un dibattito. Alla fine del corso lo studente avrà una visione chiara e completa sulla professione dello stylist.

courses.description:
Questo corso di FASHION STYLING fornisce allo studente le conoscenze su come valorizzare i prodotti moda, dove viene insegnato il metodo e la comprensione di tutti i meccanismi che ruotano intorno a questa professione.
Racconteremo lo stile e la sua evoluzione nella società’ e’ studiamo insieme i compiti e le competenze.
Nel corso approfondiremo tutti gli aspetti con analisi e processi di lavoro.
Verranno esposti studi iconografici d’immagini, e analisi di case history specifici.
Il corso insegna e spiega da un professionista e addetto ai lavori come e in che ambiti opera lo Stylist, affrontando in ogni lezione un tema specifico.
I temi che andremo a toccare sono diversi come lo shooting fotografico per un redazionale o per una campagna pubblicitaria; vedremo quello che c'e dietro la grande macchina delle sfilata di moda; scopriremo anche con dei dati statistici quali sono le modelle/i piu' usati in queste recenti sfilate, analizzeremo anche quali sono i modelli/e piu' visti sulle passerelle.
Ci sara' tutto una sezione dove ci concentreremo sul bellissimo mondo degli accessori fino ad arrivare al mondo delle celebrity internazionali.
Alla fine di alcune lezione daro' anche degli esercizi da svolgere, dove andrete a prepare concretamente dei veri e propri moodboard dove darete spazio alla vostra creatività' su contenuti attuali.
Alla fine del corso lo studente avrà una visione chiara e completa sulla professione dello stylist.

courses.title: Dyeing and Fabric Printing( Surface Ornamentation)
courses.bio: Learn about Surface Ornamentation methods and techniques - fabric dyeing, fabric printing, fabric painting, fabric smock
objectives: About Surface Ornamentation - Process and Techniques

Fabric Printing - Types and Process

requirements: Noting
courses.description:
The purpose of surface ornamentation is to beautify the appearance of a fabric or a material. The variety of beautiful clothes and other accessories we have today go through different processes. The colours we see and the textures we feel are the result of such processes.
Surface ornamentation deals with all the processes that produce the end result i.e., to make the surface of a fabric decorative, attractive and enhancing its feel as per its purpose.
This course is beneficial for anyone who wants to understand different surface ornamentation procedures right from the very basics. The course is bifurcated into different topics for ease of understanding.
In this course, you will learn how to prepare dye baths, what is tying and dyeing method, deep understanding of natural dyes, types of dyeing, know the art of smocking, fabric printing and different types of printing, about fabric quilting, fabric painting, how to create variations while printing fabric, and know how to practice the art of needlepoint.
The course is strategically designed so as to equip aspiring and professional fashion designs and other artists understand various processes related to Surface Ornamentation with ease. Each topic is categorised according to make the content easy to consume. Additionally, various tips and examples have been given which makes the course more interesting.


Who is this course for?
1. Anyone who wants to learn Fashion designing
2. Anyone who wants to learn about Surface Ornamentation in Fashion Designing
3. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Design
4. For all entry level to advanced Fashion Designers
5. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers

courses.title: Luxury Industry Professional Certification (LIPC)
courses.bio: Luxury Industry Professional Certification (LIPC) by MTF Institute School of Art and Design
courses.description:
Welcome to Luxury Industry Professional Certification (LIPC) by MTF Institute School of Art and Design
This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.
Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:
Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test
Write us with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma.
In case of any questions, or for certificate getting you may write us to email welcome gtf . pt or find the contacts at our web site gtf . pt or at our welcome message.


School of Art and Design is a part of MTF Institute, department created to guide students to modern areas of Art, Design, Fashion, Style and related types of Expertise, Business and Management.
Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Assessment Description:
In the dynamic landscape of the luxury industry, where exclusivity, craftsmanship, and innovation converge, the role of a certified luxury industry professional holds paramount importance. A Luxury Industry Professional Certification stands as a testament to an individual's deep understanding, specialized knowledge, and commitment to excellence in the realm of opulence. This certification not only enriches the career prospects of experts but also augments the growth and prestige of companies within this intricate and high-demand sector.


Importance for Experts:
The luxury industry is not just about lavishness; it is a world characterized by unique nuances, intricate details, and relentless pursuit of perfection. A Luxury Industry Professional Certification acts as a cornerstone for experts seeking to navigate this complex terrain. It is a recognition of their proficiency in comprehending the luxury market's subtleties, from the intricate craftsmanship of high-end jewelry to the precision engineering of luxury watches. For professionals, this certification symbolizes their commitment to maintaining the highest standards, from the sourcing of rare materials to the creation of unique experiences for discerning clients.


Furthermore, the certification validates an expert's ability to cater to the discerning needs of elite clientele, showcasing their skills in personalization, bespoke service, and the art of creating indelible memories. This certification is not just a piece of paper; it is a badge of honor that establishes an expert's credibility, setting them apart in a competitive field and positioning them as trusted advisors in the luxury arena.


Importance for Companies:
For companies operating within the luxury sector, employing certified professionals is not just an option; it's a strategic imperative. A team of certified luxury industry professionals brings an unparalleled level of expertise, allowing companies to provide a superior level of service that aligns with the exclusivity and elegance associated with luxury brands. From luxury fashion houses to high-end hotels, the presence of certified experts enhances the brand's image, fostering a sense of trust and reliability among their elite clientele.


Companies also benefit from the continuous learning that certification promotes. In an industry characterized by ever-evolving trends and client preferences, certified professionals stay updated on the latest innovations and shifts, enabling companies to adapt swiftly and proactively. Moreover, the certification provides a cohesive framework for training and development, ensuring that every member of the team adheres to the same elevated standards.


Building a Career in the Luxury Industry:
A career in the luxury industry is not only financially rewarding but also intellectually stimulating and creatively fulfilling. The Luxury Industry Professional Certification serves as a stepping stone for individuals aspiring to enter this fascinating world. It equips them with comprehensive knowledge about the diverse segments of the industry, whether it's haute couture, fine jewelry, luxury automobiles, or high-end hospitality. The certification offers a holistic understanding of what constitutes luxury beyond the surface, diving deep into the philosophies, artistry, and cultural influences that shape this industry.


Moreover, a certified professional is better poised to climb the career ladder rapidly. Whether seeking employment with renowned luxury brands or pursuing entrepreneurial ventures, the certification showcases a commitment to excellence and a deep understanding of the intricacies that set the luxury sector apart.


In conclusion, a Luxury Industry Professional Certification is not merely a credential; it's a doorway to an exclusive realm where precision meets passion, where service transcends satisfaction, and where innovation intertwines with tradition. It not only empowers individuals to shine as experts in their field but also empowers companies to flourish by providing unparalleled service and experiences. For those aspiring to build a remarkable career, the luxury industry offers a world of opportunities, and a certification in this field is the key to unlocking its treasures.
target_audience: For anybody who want to get certification for Luxury Industry work or prepare to exams at other certification and learning providers

courses.title: Curso de História da Moda com Senai Cetiqt
courses.bio: História da Moda - Belle Époque até anos 2000
objectives: História da Moda Contemporânea de 1900 - 2000
requirements: Ser apaixonado por arte, história e moda.
courses.description:
Neste curso, você vai aprender que a moda vai muito além de roupas e formas. Ela acompanha a história da nossa sociedade e se transforma de acordo com nossas necessidades e desejos. Um século de muitas mudanças, embalado por duas grandes guerras e transformações sociais, culturais e artísticas que transformaram a forma de vestir de pessoas do mundo o todo. Da Belle Époque, cheia de rendas, plumas e volumes, passando pelo estilo minimalista e clássico de Gabrielle Chanel, aos grupos libertadores dos anos 70, com os movimentos hippie, punk e disco. Entender como o vestuário se moldou ao longo do século vai lhe ajudar a compreender por que a moda hoje se inspira no passado para criar tendências e conexões, ditando novas histórias da nossa sociedade. O curso é a realizado pela FashionTeen e com apoio do Senai Cetiqt e Sebrae Nacional.
Nesta aula você vai: • Conhecer os fatos que marcaram a história do mundo fashion nos últimos 100 anos • Compreender por que um profundo conhecimento da história da moda é fundamental para encontrar sucesso em seu futuro • Encontrar inspiração criativa entendendo a moda do século XX • Melhorar sua compreensão contextual e crítica da história da moda • Compreender os principais pontos de referência que cada estudante de moda precisa saber • Aumentar seu conhecimento cultural para melhorar suas habilidades de pesquisa
*Capítulos: * Aula 1 – Introdução Aula 2 – Belle Époque e I Guerra Mundial Aula 3 – Anos 20 e 30 Aula 4 – Anos 40 e 50 – da Alta Costura ao Pret a Porter Aula 5 – Anos 60 e 70 Aula 6 – Anos 80 e 90 Aula 7 – Anos 2000 e encerramento
*O que você vai precisar: * Lápis e papel
Projeto da aula: Para o projeto desta aula, monte um quadro criativo inspirado na sua década favorita.
target_audience: Alunos interessados em arte, história, moda, design e arquitetura

courses.title: Fashion Marketing Strategy: How To Promote & Sell Your Brand
courses.bio: Essential Strategies for Brand Management for Success in Fashion Design. Social Commerce is the New Storefront.
objectives: You will learn about branding and promoting and selling your fashion designs.
You will learn about: Social Media, E-commerce, Print Campaigns, Email Marketing, Branding vs Marketing, Brand Identity, different channels of promoting designs
You will learn the use of advertising campaigns and media usage to promote your brand
You will learn about Fashion Shows and Public Relations (PR)
You will learn about Brand Equity ~ the power of Brand!

Fashion Marketing: Introduction to Course - Overall view of Course Content
Brand Cohesiveness & Consistency. Different channels of promoting your Brand
Marketing vs Branding: What is the difference. Identifying your customer.
Marketing Strategies: Defining your Ad Campaign. Social Media: PART 1
Social Media-Part 2 - The making of "Revolve" - mastery in Social media.
Print Advertising: Catalogs, Cookbooks, Editorials, etc.
Websites, On-Line marketing, Global visibility, Website builders, etc.
Fashion Shows. Creating a Buzz. Public Relations (PR).
Email Marketing: Funnels and Lead Generators.
Brand Equity: Creating the Ultimate Powerhouse. My Ralph Lauren story.
Tips for Success. Words of Wisdom. Conclusion.
My New Book: "Design Your Future-Be A Future Designer"

requirements: No requirements or prerequisites.
courses.description:
This Course is about developing and implementing strategies for a strong and successful Fashion Brand. It is designed to inspire you, educate you and support you to create a powerful individual Brand. If you are passionate about Fashion Design, and believe in yourself and your company, then you must promote, market and sell your fashion designs to the marketplace, in a successful, empowering, and financially rewarding way -- start your journey!
Taking your designs from the runway and to the customer is a journey filled with many questions that need to be answered accurately in order for a Brand to succeed.  This Course will guide you and direct you to make the right decisions and choices: deciding which channels to use in Media Use and Social media is important when implementing the right vehicles to communicate your message to your customer.
Having a consistency in your Brand Identity is very important: from your Logo, to Stationary, to Websites, Blogs, online presence, etc... it all must be consistent -- one voice, one vision. And speaking of vision, this Course will encourage you to explore your vision and your purpose for your Brand.  This will be your driving force throughout the process of establishing yourself as a major player on the fashion stage.
This Course is a journey of self-awareness and self-expression -- discovering who you are as a Brand is the foundation of a successful Brand. We will also differentiate between Marketing vs Branding and other necessary strategies for achieving a global Brand.
Discovering who you are as a designer will empower you to connect with your unique creative self and fuel your creativity and artistic side.  Your fashion design vision is an extension of who you are and knowing how to present it and share it with the world, is necessary not only on an inner personal level but also as successful financial business venture.
The Course covers topics such as:
Marketing vs Branding
Brand Cohesiveness and Consistency
What makes you a unique fashion designer
Channels to promote your fashion brand
Strategies for maximum visibility
Advertising Campaigns
Email marketing and Lead Funnels
Social Media Engagement through Empathy + Connection
Proprietary Technology and its advantage power
Website building - a powerful marketing tool
Finding the DNA of a Brand
Marketing Strategies for Brand Equity
Vision and purpose
Print Campaigns
Media Usage
Catalogs
Lookbooks
Fashion Shows
Public Relations (P.R.)
You will learn how Brands such as "Revolve" were able to create a multi-billion dollar empire using Social Media and other strategic methods such as Proprietary Technology and influencers and bloggers such as Aimee Song and Olivia Culpo. How they engaged on Social Media -- instrumental in their success.  Finding one's "voice" is essential in defining oneself as a fashion designer.  Discovering the potential of Online marketing is important in creating global visibility.
You will also see how Fashion Shows are used to elevate visibility and keep the conversation going after the show is over. Fashion Shows in conjunction with a good Public Relation campaign, makes for a strong and solid Brand.  Fashion shows can be expensive but I will show you how you can create your own "buzz" without braking the bank.
You will learn how to use your Website as a powerful tool for marketing your designs and your Brand to the world.
Catalogs and Lookbooks are necessary tools of the trade: finding out more about them will support getting your message out there. These are part of your Print Campaign and all the different Media Usage available to you.
This Course can be either for fashion designers or for individuals who have an existing company who want to increase expansion and growth.
You will learn how to use e-mail marketing, still a powerful tool to communicate with you customers. Using Funnels and Lead Generators for email campaigns.
You will discover how a company like Ralph Lauren, how they used branding to elevate and increase their value in the marketplace: brand equity.  The material covered in this Course will inspire and motivate  anyone in wanting to expand and grow their brand into worldwide visibility.
The use of Marketing Strategies such as the use of Empathy plus Connection for Social media Engagement.  Using Proprietary Technologies and its power to elevate a Brand to Global Visibility. You will explore Media Usage and all the many channels of communication.
Public Relations: The use of Public Relation (PR) in conjunction with Fashion Shows adds another powerful element to further empower and expand visibility of a Brand.  Creating a "buzz" before, during and after the Show, continues the conversation and thus effects sales.
Building a solid Brand on the 3 important elements of Reputation, Relationship, and Results -- the power of Brand Equity.
Brand Equity.  In this Course you will discover that Brand Equity is a very powerful goal to strive for and achieve; with Brand Equity anything is possible, the opportunities are endless, you will be able to extend your vision in areas other associated with fashion, such as: perfume, shoes, glasses, hats, bags, and other accessories.  Once your Brand has a certain strength, everybody will be knocking on your door and wanting to be associated with you, with your Brand, with your product.
And it all starts with having a commitment to a vision, a vision bigger than yourself, a vision that makes a difference in the world; and in doing so you are aligned with your purpose.  Having your designs (your product) congruent with your vision and purpose, strengthens and energizes the Brand to grow to global status.  And in this Course we address these issues and how powerful they are.
You will learn the 4 things that all successful companies have in common, things that are always present in big companies and corporation. Research shows that when certain elements are in place, a company will thrive and prosper.
target_audience: This Course is for students who want to learn how to build a solid brand and sell their designs to the marketplace.
Students can include fashion design students or individuals/companies who want to learn how to Brand your company and expand, and promote Brand visibility

courses.title: Learn to draw fashion with Adobe Illustrator CC - Beginners
courses.bio: Illustrator training specifically tailored for fashion designers
objectives: You will have a good foundation in drawing fashion flats
You will be well on your way to becoming a fashion designer with expert skills in Adobe Illustrator.
You will be ready to progress to the intermediate and advanced training with the details and links to these additional online courses provided in the course summary.
You will stand out from the thousands of fashion design graduates and make yourself more attractive to potential employers.
requirements: You should have Adobe Illustrator installed. The training is designed around the latest Adobe Creative Cloud version of Illustrator, however you can still follow the training with older versions of Illustrator as many of the techniques will be the same. You should be aware though that there may be some functions featured that will not be available in older versions.
courses.description:
Learn how to use Adobe Illustrator to draw fashion flats. Develop your skills to enable you to produce creative, accurate product designs quickly and to standards required for retail and manufacturing.
In this beginners level course, you will learn all the core tools and features that make up the basic fashion drawing toolbox.
For beginners that have not used Adobe Illustrator before
Overview of Illustrator terminology
Overview of design and product development processes used in industry and how Illustrator fits into the design workflow
Familiarise yourself with the Illustrator interface
Learn the core tools and features needed to produce basic fashion drawings
Garment drawing workshops
Learn essential skills required by the fashion industry
Having spent over a decade implementing and training software technologies into fashion brands and retailers across the globe, I spent a lot of time working with the designers. Over the years there seemed to be a common theme in the design room - lots of designers were using Illustrator well but many either couldn't use it at all or couldn't use it very well. They also didn't adhere to any drawing standards or best practises so had problems such as not being able to easily edit each other's drawings, create colourways quickly or create reusable components properly, making them inefficient.
Illustrator 4 Fashion training has been specifically tailored for fashion, with the needs of the industry in mind. The training can be taken by company design employees, freelance designers, fashion design students and anyone else looking to learn or improve their fashion drawing with Adobe Illustrator.
Course Overview
Most Adobe Illustrator manuals and online training courses are industry generic with many modules not relevant to fashion drawing. It can be hard to know which features to learn and how to develop techniques to draw professional fashion designs. Illustrator 4 Fashion only teaches you the features and techniques relevant to drawing fashion flats, illustrations and garment components.
The Illustrator 4 Fashion course is split into 3 levels; beginner, intermediate and advanced. In this level 1 beginners course, aimed at users with no previous Illustrator knowledge, we start off by introducing you to the Illustrator terminology and interface. You'll also gain an understanding of the fashion product development process used in industry and how Adobe Illustrator is used as part of this. Following this we will then go through in simple individual tutorials all the functional tools you need to know how to use to get you started with fashion drawing. The final part of the course features a series of garment drawing workshops where we will put together all the skills you have acquired into practise.
Every lecture includes supporting Illustrator work files so that students can follow the lecture exactly.
target_audience: Suitable for fashion design students
Suitable for freelance fashion designers
Suitable for company fashion design employees
Suitable for anyone looking to learn how to draw fashion using Adobe Illustrator

In this project based course, you will build on the foundational knowledge of creating digital fashion. Starting with a basic t-shirt to swimsuit and a hoodie, I will show you how to create a realistic finish to your garments taking into consideration the fine details of construction like hems, top stitching, seam construction, along with tips and tricks to add trim and hardware. From drawcords to embroidered patches, I will show you easy step by step techniques in CLO to add the details you need and give you the resources to do so.


CLO for Production will give you the knowledge you need to take your designs from a simple pattern to a production ready 3 dimensional garment. But even more than that, this course will teach you how to apply the fine details of creating digital fashion in a way that will give your creations a true to life finish.
