courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Dartless Bodice PATTERN Block Course is the 1st course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our courses are created for students who like to learn in a systematic and orderly manner.
Our courses are straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts and clear instructions.
We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.
We focus on Stress Free learning.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Dartless Bodice Block
2. Accurately place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Dartless Bodice prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include, is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the course you will learn how to Draft, Cut and Sew Dartless Dartless Bodice Pattern accurately and professionally.


Let's start here, first of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?


Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns from a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics into a garment.

A basic pattern block is a pre-made template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.


Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of this course you will learn how to professionally Draft, Cut and Sew Dartless Bodice Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately using the muslin test fabric.

Fashion design is design, aesthetics, clothing making and the art of applying natural beauty to clothing and accessories. It is influenced by culture and different trends, and varies with time and place.
KOMEK was established in 2004 and provided vocational training to 1500 people per year with courses opened in 3 different centres.
Our KOMEK courses, which have become a brand in vocational education in Turkey, improve their professional and artistic knowledge while responding to the general education needs of the people of our city.
As a public university, our courses, which contribute to employment, train artisans, ensure the personal development of the trainees, and contribute to the social life of the city while doing these, have provided training in 474 branches since its establishment.
Turkish
Moda tasarımı, tasarım, estetik, giysi yapımı ve doğal güzelliği giysi ve aksesuarlarına uygulama sanatıdır. Kültürden ve farklı eğilimlerden etkilenir ve zamana ve yere göre değişiklik gösterir.
KOMEK 2004 yılında kurularak, 3 ayrı merkezde açılan kurslarla yılda 1500 kişiye mesleki eğitim vermiştir.
Bir halk üniversitesi olarak istihdama katkıda bulunan, sanatkâr yetiştiren, kursiyerin kişisel gelişimini sağlayan, bunları yaparken de şehrin sosyal hayatına katkı yapan kurslarımız, kurulduğu günden bu yana 474 Branşta eğitim verdi, 1 milyona yakın insanımızın yararlandığı, binlerce kursiyerimiz yeni bir meslek sahibi oldu.

courses.description:
You want to learn how to hand stitch a Buttonhole like the professional tailors do? You want to finish your self-made pants or bags or any other projects with a nicer looking Buttonhole than the machine sewn ones?


In this class I will teach you step by step how to prepare your fabric to get the best results, how the Buttonhole stitch works, how to place the knots on the different parts of the Buttonhole and how to finish your Buttonhole to look neat and clean.
To wrap up the topic there will be one lesson about how to sew on a Button to last and look pretty at the same time.


Tools and Materials needed:
A piece of fabric for practice

Thick thread
A sewing machine and matching thread (the sewing machine isn´t essential)
Sharp small scissors
Punch pliers for the eye if you have, but you can also make a Buttonhole without an eye
Tailor´s chalk if you have, but a pencil will do the work as well

A button of your choice


To follow the class, you don´t need a lot of experience in sewing. Everyone can do this with a bit of practice.

requirements: No
courses.description:
This course looks at the contemporary fashion image, the current fashion image and the day-to-day working life of a fashion stylist.
Students will learn about the role of fashion stylist.
Students will also learn about the different types of contemporary fashion image, key industry creative. Students will learn about the importance of Personal styling i.e. presenting yourself and the key skills required to be a personal stylist.
Students will learn about the style by the decade. Students learn about the celebrities’ style transformation over the period of time.
Course Modules
This course covers 4 modules of study and research, including how to get the right style for the right person, building different looks and much more. We also cover what to expect in terms of being on the job.
Module 1: Fashion Styling - Introduction to Fashion Styling, Fashion Stylist Specialties, Skills required for Fashion Styling, History of Styling, Fashion Styling Basics, Becoming a Fashion Stylist, Skills and Talents, Styling for Print, Preparing and Performing Test, Styling for Entertainment, Image management, Understanding Body Shapes, Understanding Personal Style, On the job, Portfolio Building, Branding
Module 2: Personal Styling - What is Personal Style?, Personal Style and New Image, Identifying your Look, Shopping and Maintaining your wardrobe, Wardrobe Essentials, Chic - the gate away & evening looks, Dress and style.
Module 3: Styling your Business - Business Basics for Stylists & Marketing your Business, Forms & Contracts, Getting Work /Freelance Stylist, Personal & Celebrity Clients.
Module 4: Colour Therapy by Laura Lightbody
target_audience: Student who want to learn all about Fashion styling, Personal Styling and Styling your Business

Fashion Design Revolution: Learn Modern Pattern Making the Smart Way
Unlock the world of digital pattern making with this comprehensive course designed for absolute beginners. Using Adobe Illustrator, you'll learn how to create printable sewing patterns from scratch with ease and precision. Say goodbye to backache and neck pain from drawing paper patterns, and embrace the flexibility and convenience of digital design
With this course, you'll be able to create professional-looking patterns in minutes, ready to print at any photocopying shop or on your home printer. Whether you're a fashion enthusiast, a professional designer, or simply curious to learn a new skill, this course is for you
With clear and concise instruction, you'll master the basics of pattern making, including:

MARKA : basic commands for creating grap: Calling up a matrix from the archive

requirements: Basic knowledge of a computer
courses.description: The video course aims to explain, step by step, the process by which a paper pattern of any garment goes from digital to paper format, to be edited, printed by plotter and finally cut. Essentially a simple guide made up of short videos covering the basic commands of Lectra V9R1 CAD, but it can be applied to any other garment CAD as the process remains the same and only the names of the commands change. The video course is therefore aimed at anyone who would like to work in the fashion industry but particularly those who would like to pursue a career as a CAD operator. It is recorded so that anyone following it does not lose focus and is full of useful tips that you would normally acquire after years of practice and experience in the industry. This course summarises everything you need to know to use a garment CAD system and make your way gradually into the fashion industry. In the first lesson you will learn the basic commands for modifying the pieces, in the second lesson you will learn how to use these pieces to create patterns and matrices, and in the third and final lesson you will learn how to use these matrices to create graphs that are indispensable for later cutting the garment.
target_audience: Designers with little or no experience on clothing CAD
Fashion designers who want to learn how to modify pre-made garments themselves
Anyone who wants to pursue a career in the fashion industry, or simply wants to learn how to use clothing software

Welcome to Hand Embroidery Master Class for Beginners by Gossamer!

Are you ready to dive into the world of hand embroidery? Whether you’re an absolute beginner or looking to refine your skills, this course is designed to take you from foundational techniques to advanced artistry with ease.

Espero que te sea de ayuda

requirements: A ser posible, no tener daltonismo o un defecto visual que te impida elegir de forma realista los colores.
courses.description:
¿Acabas vistiendo siempre de los mismos colores porque "no se te da bien" combinarlos? ¿Tienes prendas que te gustan pero no utilizas porque no sabes cómo casarlas con el resto de tu ropa? ¿Te gustaría enriquecer tu paleta sintiéndote segura de que tus estilimos queden armoniosos cromáticamente? ¿Quieres poner más color a tu vida?
Con este videocurso pretendemos poner fin a tus dudas. A través de vídeos teóricos, herramientas online y ejercicios de práctica aprenderás los principios del uso del color: Qué es la rueda de color y qué colores la componen, qué tipo de combinaciones se pueden hacer, cómo manejar el color en las distintas piezas de ropa, cómo manejar los estampados y complementos, y sobre todo cómo aplicar todo esto a tu propio vestuario, componiendo estilismos a partir de una prenda concreta o de una idea.
También te enseñaremos cómo descubrir la paleta de color que mejor va a tu color de piel y pelo. Porque no todas somos iguales.
Es hora de que quites el miedo al color y lo pongas en tu vida, sin complejos y con la seguridad del que reconoce la armonía y sabe crearla.
target_audience: Cualquier mujer u hombre que quiera conseguir estilismos armoniosos a la vista combinando prendas de distintos colores.

requirements: Have an experimenter-mindset, as surprises are guaranteed

courses.description:
If you want to learn how to level up your wardrobe and revive your love for old clothes you haven't worn in ages by colouring them using natural pigments extracted from kitchen "waste"... then this course will teach you exactly how to do it.
We live in the time of "fast fashion" where we buy new clothes by a mouse-click. Synthetic colours are applied to the fabric by using harmful chemicals and they still don't look unique or special.
In this course I want to teach you a new way.
A way which is enabling you to fully express yourself, while valuing the gifts of mother nature.
In this course I want to show you how to use natural colour derived from common foods to create beautiful and unique garments and fabrics.
It is a step-by-step guide where you can follow how I upcycle old fabrics to create a special present… :)
You will learn:
Why natural colour is not only beautiful but also good for you!
How to extract vibrant colours from leftover kitchen materials (you will be surprised what we will make out of old avocado pits)
How to prepare your fabric in a way that the natural colour pigments will strongly bond to the fibers
A simple hack used by women in all (ancient) cultures around the globe to imprint stunning patterns into the fabric
Why every dyed piece is like opening a present from mother nature
Why natural dyeing is the perfect hobby for relaxing and getting inside your body: Taking your time and exploring the colour potential of your surrounding with your own hands
Little known secrets of how to give your fabrics "the special something" that makes you feel good about yourself when wearing it
Click on "Buy Now" to get started on the journey of creating wearable art in harmony with nature.


Intro-music by Vinnie Mayz, thank you guys! (you can find them on Spotify)
target_audience: This course is suitable for beginners of colouring with plants

courses.description:
Starting a fashion company can be challenging. Especially when you lack experience in retail management or fashion. You do not want to make a simple legal or business mistake, which can cost you financially.
Be a Step Above the Competition When You Master These Legal and Business Concepts:
·Trademark your brand
·Figure out your brand identity
·How to get Copyright protection
·Familiarize yourself with patents
·Find your ideal price strategy
·Learn retail terminology
·How to find and approach retailers


This course is designed by a retail professional with fashion designers in mind.


Contents and Overview
The topics are based on the common problems and questions new brands have. I’m familiar with these issues since I’m an online retail buyer for a top 300 retailer. These are the topics I’m commonly asked when new brands are seeking advice from a buyer.
As a retail buyer with over 6 years of experience I have seen a lot of mistakes. For example, there are many tee-shirt brands on the market that will never land on a website, due to various legal problems with the retailer carrying the line. Communication can be an issue as well, especially when the owner of a brand lacks a retail or fashion management background and does not understanding common retail terms.
This course contains 7 topics and over 50 lectures. The majority of videos time length ranges from 30 seconds to 3 minutes, so you don’t feel overwhelmed by the material. In the class I give out helpful worksheets, resources for more information, and offer a quiz to learn terms.
I designed this course to be easily understood by beginners with no legal or business background. This class is perfect for teenagers to adults looking to start something new. I have a background in teaching, training and understand the importance of making lessons clear and simple.
At the end of the course you will feel more confident with the legal and business topics covered. You will gain valuable skills to help you run your fashion business as a seasoned professional.
DISCLAIMER: The legal information contained in this course is not legal advice, and should not be treated as such. Nothing contained in this course and course materials shall be deemed to create an attorney-client relationship with you. You must not rely on the information on this website as an alternative to legal advice from your attorney or other professional legal services provider. If you have any specific questions about any legal matter you should consult your attorney or other professional legal services provider. You should never delay seeking legal advice, disregard legal advice, or commence or discontinue any legal action because of information on this website. courses.title: Beginner Garment Practice: Tunic and Pants Combo
courses.bio: Design a Stylish Tunic and Pants in Style3D Atelier
requirements: This course is beginner-friendly and there should be some familiarity with the user interface.
courses.description:
This short course is designed for digital fashion enthusiasts who want to create a clean and stylish tunic and pants outfit using Style3D Atelier. Perfect for beginners with basic knowledge of the software, this project-based course will guide you step-by-step through the design and construction of a complete outfit, focusing on simple shapes, balanced proportions, and practical use of essential tools like internal lines, elastic, and fabric settings.
You’ll learn how to start from a basic block, adjust the shapes to create a modern tunic and pants, and refine the garment using Style3D's intuitive tools. The course also explores fabric selection, color, and simple detailing to help your outfit look polished and wearable. You’ll practice clean design techniques that can be used for future projects, with an emphasis on experimenting confidently while staying in control of your design choices.
By the end of the course, you’ll have created a finished outfit ready for rendering or animation, and you’ll feel more comfortable navigating Style3D Atelier for garment creation. Whether you’re building a portfolio or just practicing your skills, this course offers a quick, clear path to designing your own digital fashion looks with style and confidence. Try your hand at this now!
target_audience: This course is perfect for beginner to intermediate digital fashion designers who are familiar with the Style3D interface and want to practice building full outfits. It’s ideal for those looking to improve their garment construction skills while creating a simple, stylish tunic and pants set.

courses.title: Digital Fashion Illustration: Illustrator ed.
courses.bio: A Beginner's Guide to Adobe Illustrator for Fashion Designers
objectives: How Adobe's new generative AI tool can be applied to fashion illustrations
How to create a geometric prints/pattern
How to create tossed prints/patterns
How to add prints to your swatch library
How to create a logo
How to create a branding style sheet
How to use the pen tool
How to place and resize images
How to vectorize an image
requirements: No prior knowledge or experience with Adobe Illustrator
Latest Adobe Illustrator (Creative Cloud version)
courses.description:
Step into the future of fashion design with our Adobe Illustrator course, tailored for creative professionals who want to bring their fashion ideas to life digitally. Whether you're a budding designer, illustrator, or industry expert, this course will empower you to create precise, scalable, and stunning digital fashion illustrations that stand out.
Adobe Illustrator is a game-changer for fashion design, offering unparalleled tools for creating detailed sketches, technical flats, and vibrant illustrations. In this course, you’ll master essential skills like vector drawing, creating custom brushes, and applying advanced techniques to design everything from garments to prints.
What you’ll learn:


How to use Illustrator’s tools for sketching and rendering fashion designs.
Techniques for designing colorful patterns using generative AI.
Adding dynamic colors, textures, and gradients to your illustrations.
Exporting your designs for presentations and production.
Through engaging tutorials and real-world projects, you’ll develop a professional skill set that helps you communicate your creative vision effectively. By the end of the course, you’ll have polished portfolio ready projects with industry-standard digital fashion illustrations that reflect your unique style.
With lifetime access, downloadable resources, and an opportunity to learn at your own pace, this course is perfect for designers ready to elevate their careers.
Ready to transform your fashion ideas into digital masterpieces? Enroll today and start creating your signature designs with Adobe Illustrator!
target_audience: Apparel design professionals seeking to improve their illustrator skills
Fashion Design students looking to supplement their knowledge of illustrator
Fashion enthusiasts who want to learn how to apply digital tools to develop their ideas
Digital fashion lovers seeking entry level training in digital design

courses.bio: Hayal ettiğin ayakkabı tasarımlarını, teknik çizimini yap, 2D ve 3D görselleştir, hayallerini ürün tasarımına dönüştür
objectives: Ayakkabı tasarımını baştan sona öğrenin
2D ve 3D Ayakkabı tasarımlarını uygulamalarla adım adım çizin ve tasarlayın

AYAKKABI TASARIMINDA ÇİZİME GİRİŞ: Renkli Ton Çubuğu ile Tomlama Ödev

ÜRÜN OLARAK AYAKKABI TASARIMI UYGULAMA 2: ÜRÜN OLARAK BANTLI AYAKKABI TASARIMI UYGULAMA 2

ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR İLE VEKTÖR TABANLI AYA: ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR İLE VEKTÖR TABANLI AYAKKABI ÇİZİMİ
Adobe Illustrator ile Vektör Tabanlı Ayakkabı Çizimi Ödev

requirements: Bu kursa ayakkabı tasarımını deneyimlemek isteyen herkes katılabilir
11 yaş üstü ayakkabı tasarımını merak eden herkes katılabilir
courses.description:
Hayalini kurduğun ayakkabıyı gerçekten tasarlayabilir misin?

Ayakkabı Tasarımı, ürün geliştirme Kursu’na hoş geldin.
Bu kurs, sadece bir ayakkabı çizmeyi değil, bir moda aksesuarı ve endüstriyel bir ürün olarak ayakkabıyı tasarlamayı, modellemeyi ve profesyonelce sunmayı öğretmek için hazırlandı.
bu kursla Moda aksesuar tasarımcısı ve tasarımcı profesyonel eğitmenlerle, ayak anatomisini öğrenerek başlayacağın, ve fikirlerini önce 2D (elle çizim ve dijital eskiz) sonra 3D tekniklerle geliştirerek ayakkabı konusunda ürün odaklı tasarım yolculuğuna adım atacaksın.
KURS İÇERİĞİNDE;
Ayakkabının tarihçesinden günümüzdeki trendlere,
Ayak ve Anatomi bilgisine
Stil çizimlerinden, teknik çizim ve detaylandırmaya,
Malzeme bilgisi, doku ve renk kombinasyonlarından,
2D ve 3D Dijital modelleme ve sunum tekniklerine kadar adım adım ilerle.
uygulanabilir fikirler üretmeyi ve çizimin, bir konseptten doğan gerçek bir ürüne dönüşmesini öğreneceksin.
Kendi moda koleksiyonunu oluşturacak, ister sektöre hazırlanacak ister hayalini kurduğun ayakkabı markasına ilk adımı at.


Ayakkabı sadece bir giyim ürünü müdür?
Yoksa bir kimlik, bir duruş, bir stilin en güçlü ifadesi mi?
Ayakkabılar; modanın, işlevselliğin ve sanatsal ifadenin kesiştiği nadir parçalardan biridir. Bir tasarımcının vizyonu, zanaatkârın ustalığı ve kullanıcının ruhu tam da bu noktada buluşur.
İşte bu yüzden ayakkabı tasarımı öğrenmek, moda dünyasında sadece yetenek değil, ustalık ve öngörü kazandıran bir ayrıcalıktır.
Bu kurs; bir fikri, önce çizime, sonra gerçek bir ürüne dönüştürme sürecini sana detaylıca öğretmek için hazırlandı.
Anatomiden form bilgisine, malzeme seçiminden dijital modellemeye, 2D ve 3D tekniklerle ayakkabıyı hem estetik hem teknik yönüyle tasarlamayı öğreneceksin.
Bu eğitim, sadece “çizim yapmak” değil, ürün düşünebilmek, “tasarımcı gibi bakabilmek” isteyenler için hazırlandı.
Çünkü iyi bir ayakkabı sadece güzel görünmez; iyi düşünülmüş bir fikirle yürür.


Unutma, ayakkabı sadece bir aksesuar değil, hayallerin yansımasıdır.
Şimdi sıra sende. Kalemi eline al ve ayakkabı tasarlama yplculuğunda birlikte atalım.

Çizim yeteneklini geliştirmek isteyenler
Hayallerini çizerek aktarıp bilgisayarda dijital ortamda bu hayalleri çizerek sunmak isteyeler
Ürün olarak Ayakkabı tasarımı yapmak isteyenlere yönelik

courses.title: Merch By Amazon Text-Based T-Shirt Design for Non-Designers
courses.bio: Learn how to identify fonts, source FREE and low-cost fonts and design text-based t shirt designs for Merch by Amazon
objectives: LEARN some of the basics of typography
UNDERSTAND the importance of font selection
DISCOVER how to identify the font on a t-shirt design you like the look of
FIND OUT how to source quality fonts that are FREE for commercial use
LEARN how to create a simple text-based t shirt design for Merch by Amazon using Over
LEARN how to create a more complex text-based tshirt design in Affinity Designer

Introduction: Typography and the Importance of Selecting the Correct Typeface
Identifying and Sourcing Fonts for Your: Taking a Sample of the Font You Want to Identify
Identifying the Font from Your Sample
A Guide to the Sourcing of Fonts
Creating a Text-Based T-Shirt Design in: An Overview of the Over App
How To Create Simple Text Designs in Over
How To Create a Text Design in Affinity Designer
BONUS SECTION: BONUS LECTURE: How To Source Fonts For Your Designs
BONUS LECTURE: Expanding Your POD Business Further

requirements: It will help if you are creative or at least have an eye for a good design
You should really be willing to treat Merch by Amazon (or TeeSpring or Redbubble etc.) as a business
courses.description:
Merch By Amazon Text-Based T-Shirt Design for Non-Designers is a MUST-watch course for anyone serious about making money through Merch by Amazon - after all text-based t-shirt designs probably sell better than any other type of design on the platform.
What you will learn
The first part of this t shirt design course covers the following topics:
I explain exactly why you should be creating Text Based Designs for Merch by Amazon (or Teespring, Redbubble, TeePublic, etc.)
I take a look at basic typography and why font selection is so important when designing tshirts
I show you where you can source fonts that are FREE for commercial use as well as discounted type faces for use on your t-shirt designs
I show you how you can easily identify fonts on other t-shirts that you like the look of for use in other niches
The second part of the course then shows you step-by-step how to create a text-based tshirt design from scratch:
I walk you through the creation of a simple t-shirt design for Merch by Amazon from within an iOS app, called Over
I show you how to create a more complex t shirt design from within a professional vector type application, called Affinity Designer
So why not join me in this course today and discover how easy it is for us non-designers to create a text-based t-shirt design for sale on Merch by Amazon.
target_audience: People who would like to earn a substantial passive income through Merch by Amazon and other Print On Demand platforms
Non-designers who would like to learn how to create a text-based t-shirt design

courses.title: Cloth Modeling Master Course Tutorial
courses.bio: Create Realistic 3D Clothing from Scratch with Marvelous Designer — Beginner to Advanced
objectives: Master Basic to Advanced Techniques: Students will learn how to create clothing from simple garments to complex, detailed costumes using all essential tools
Realistic Cloth Simulation: Students will understand how to simulate realistic fabric behavior, draping, and fit for different garment types such as jackets
Pattern Drafting & Detailing: Students will gain skills in drafting accurate 2D garment patterns and adding advanced details like pockets, straps, accessories,
Exporting & Integration: Students will be able to export their cloth models properly for use in other 3D pipelines, games, animations, or rendering workflows.

Jacket Leather: Master CLoth Modeling- Jacket Leather Part1
Master CLoth Modeling- Jacket Leather Part2
Master CLoth Modeling- Jacket Leather Part3
Master CLoth Modeling- Jacket Leather Part4

requirements: No Prior Experience Needed: This course is designed for complete beginners as well as intermediate users — no previous experience with Marvelous Designer or 3D modeling is required. Basic Computer Skills: Learners should be comfortable using a computer, installing software, and managing files. Software: Students need to have Marvelous Designer installed (a trial or licensed version is fine). Hardware: A computer that meets the minimum system requirements for Marvelous Designer is recommended (a decent GPU and enough RAM for smooth cloth simulation).
courses.description:
Welcome to the Cloth Modeling Master Course Tutorial — the ultimate step-by-step guide to mastering cloth creation in Marvelous Designer, from complete beginner to advanced garment modeling. Whether you’re an aspiring 3D artist, a game developer, an animator, or a fashion designer looking to bring your creative vision into the digital world, this course is designed to equip you with all the tools and techniques you need to create stunning, realistic clothing for your characters and projects.
Cloth simulation and garment creation are some of the most challenging and rewarding aspects of 3D design. High-quality clothing can dramatically increase the realism and believability of your characters, whether you’re making a hero for a game, a costume for an animated film, or even a prototype for real-world fashion. But learning how to model, simulate, and detail fabric properly can be overwhelming — especially if you don’t have prior experience. That’s exactly why this course exists.
What You’ll Learn
Over 14 hours of clear, structured video lessons, you’ll progress from the basics of Marvelous Designer’s interface and tools to advanced techniques used by professional 3D artists. You will learn how to create a wide variety of garments, including shirts, jackets, hoodies, tactical vests, belts, straps, and complex layered outfits. You’ll master the fundamentals of pattern drafting, sewing, simulation, and detailing. By the end of the course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to design your own custom clothing for any character or project.
This is not just a software tutorial — it’s a complete learning path that takes you step by step through real-world workflows. You’ll work through practical examples like the ones shown in the course images: a stylish fantasy corset outfit, a military tactical jacket, and a modern two-tone hoodie. Each project will teach you new skills and challenge you to apply what you’ve learned.
Key Topics Covered:
Understanding the Marvelous Designer interface and workspace
Navigating the 2D pattern window and 3D simulation window
Creating basic garments: T-shirts, pants, skirts, and simple tops
Drafting and sewing complex patterns for advanced garments
Working with layers, trims, accessories, and embellishments
Using fabric properties to simulate realistic drape and fit Adding details: zippers, buttons, straps, pockets, and more
Managing garment thickness, seams, and internal lines
Posing and fitting clothing to characters
Exporting garments for use in other software like Blender, Maya, Unreal Engine, or Unity
Tips and tricks for optimizing simulation performance
Common troubleshooting and how to fix simulation issues
Each module builds on the last to ensure you truly understand how cloth behaves, how patterns are constructed, and how to bring your ideas to life with precision.
Why Learn Marvelous Designer?
Marvelous Designer is the industry standard for 3D cloth simulation. It’s used by top studios for AAA games, blockbuster movies, virtual fashion, and digital doubles. Unlike traditional polygon modeling in software like Blender or Maya, Marvelous Designer allows you to design clothing just like a real-world tailor or fashion designer would — using 2D patterns that are stitched together and simulated to drape naturally over your character.
Learning Marvelous Designer gives you a massive advantage in the 3D industry. It dramatically speeds up your workflow, produces more realistic results, and gives you the freedom to experiment with endless variations. Many employers actively look for artists with cloth simulation experience because it saves studios countless hours in production.
Who is This Course For?
This course is perfect for anyone who wants to learn how to create realistic, high-quality clothing in 3D. It’s designed for:
Complete beginners with no experience in Marvelous Designer or cloth modeling.
Intermediate 3D artists who want to expand their skill set and add professional cloth workflows to their toolkit.
Game developers and animators who need dynamic, believable costumes for characters.
Fashion designers who want to bring their ideas into 3D for virtual prototyping, marketing, or showcasing designs before production.
Hobbyists and indie creators who want to make their characters stand out with unique outfits and accessories.
No matter your goal, if you want to level up your 3D work with realistic, beautifully simulated clothing, this course will guide you every step of the way.
What You Need to Get Started
There are no strict requirements to start this course. You don’t need any prior experience with Marvelous Designer or 3D modeling in general. All you need is:
A computer that meets the minimum system requirements for Marvelous Designer (a modern CPU, a decent GPU, and enough RAM for smooth simulation).
A copy of Marvelous Designer (you can use the trial version if you don’t have a license yet).
Basic computer literacy and a willingness to practice and experiment with the tools.
Hands-On Learning & Practical Projects
This is a hands-on course. You won’t just watch — you’ll follow along and create garments step by step. By working on real examples like the fantasy-inspired corset outfit, a functional tactical jacket with pockets and straps, and a casual two-tone hoodie, you’ll build practical skills you can apply to any future project.
Along the way, you’ll learn industry tips for achieving clean patterns, avoiding simulation glitches, and keeping your scenes optimized for smooth performance. You’ll also see how to prepare your final garments for export and integrate them into your larger 3D pipeline, whether you’re rendering high-quality images, animating characters, or creating assets for games.
Course Benefits:
Clear, beginner-friendly explanations: Each lesson is designed to be easy to follow, with no unnecessary jargon.
Full project files included: Get access to project files you can use to follow along and practice.
Practical, real-world examples: Learn techniques you’ll actually use in production.
Flexible learning: Study at your own pace, revisit lessons anytime, and practice as much as you like.
Expert guidance: Learn from an instructor with industry experience and a passion for teaching.
By the End of This Course, You’ll Be Able To:
Confidently navigate Marvelous Designer and use all major tools.
Create your own clothing from scratch, from simple shirts to complex layered outfits.
Simulate realistic fabric behavior and understand how to adjust material properties.
Draft accurate 2D patterns, sew them together, and troubleshoot common issues. Add advanced details like pockets, straps, belts, and accessories.
Export your garments properly for use in your favorite 3D software or game engine.
Build a professional-quality portfolio of clothing designs to showcase your skills.
Enroll Today
If you’re ready to take your 3D characters to the next level with realistic, dynamic clothing, this is the perfect course for you. No matter where you are in your 3D journey, you’ll come away with a complete understanding of how to create stunning garments that look and move like real fabric.
Don’t miss this opportunity to learn one of the most in-demand skills in the industry. Join thousands of other artists mastering cloth simulation and make your characters stand out with beautiful, believable costumes.
Let’s get started — enroll now and bring your clothing designs to life!
target_audience: Beginner and intermediate 3D artists who want to learn realistic cloth creation from scratch. Game developers and animators who need high-quality clothing assets for characters. Fashion designers interested in bringing their garment ideas into a 3D environment. Anyone curious about Marvelous Designer and how to create detailed, dynamic clothing for digital projects.

courses.description:
As the old saying goes " "If you give me six hours to chop down a tree, I'll spend four hours sharpening the axe." - Abraham Lincoln. With this course, I want to give you a structure for learning 3D fashion and save you 100+ hours. If you are doing 3D for the first time or at a beginner level then this is a must-course that you need to go through. Learning 3D is going to be difficult but it would be an extremely satisfying and important skill for your future.
Technology is becoming an integral part of every industry and the fashion industry is no exception. One such advancement is happening in the 3D-Fashion space. Every major brand, export house, and the manufacturer is adopting 3D technology for better design communication, lead time, and sustainability.

Digital fashion is revolutionizing the fashion industry by transforming the way that consumers interact with fashion and how fashion brands create and market their products. It is making the industry more sustainable by reducing waste in the production process and allowing for experimentation with different materials and designs before committing to physical production. Digital fashion is also making fashion more accessible to people through virtual try-on technology, allowing consumers to try on clothes digitally without leaving their homes. It is also enabling greater customization and interactivity with augmented reality experiences. Finally, digital fashion is giving rise to new business models, such as virtual fashion shows and digital clothing collections that can be purchased as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

courses.title: Printing on Fabric: 5 Techniques to Get You Started

Techniques: Using Powdered Dye and a Squirt Bottle

requirements: Student will need to purchase some basic supplies like fabric, dyes and textile ink.
Some of the techniques demonstrated use toxic chemicals and should be handled accordingly
courses.description:
Printing on Fabric: Five Techniques to Get You Started is your answer to boring old fabric from your local craft store.  Learn how to take your fabrics from basic to extraordinary with a few simple techniques.
Learn Textile Techniques to Get Your Creative Juices Flowing
·      Learn 5 techniques that will transform your sewing projects
·      Learn to determine the difference between natural and synthetic fibers
·      Choose the appropriate dye or ink for your project
·      Feel comfortable experimenting with textile design on fabric
·      Set up appropriate workspaces for each technique
Experiment with Five Non-traditional Textile and Surface Design Techniques
This class will give you the courage and know how to create one-of-a-kind fabric for your sewing projects with the help of five very different techniques.
Whether you're a beginner looking to get your feet wet in the textile industry or if you are an experienced sewer or quilter looking to take your project up a notch this course is for you. You can even use it to build your fashion, textile or fiber arts portfolio, a great way to get ready for art school.
This course is presented in real time so you can follow along and includes detailed instructions about workspace set up and making the most of your home studio.
Contents and Overview
Over 11 lectures and over 1.5 hours of video content you’ll learn how to effectively manipulate dye and chemicals on fabric.
First I’ll show you how to monoprint, a non-repeatable abstract manipulation of dye on a slick surface that's then transferred onto a piece of fabric.  Then I’ll show you how to apply vibrant splashes of dye with little more than dye powder and a spray bottle.
Once you feel comfortable with dyes and inks I’ll show you a non-traditional way to create beautiful surface texture with only a heat gun.
Then, I’ll introduce you to two chemicals, one used to remove color called, discharge paste and another to remove fibers from fabric, called Fiber Etch.
Upon completion of this course you’ll be able to think beyond your local fabric store and create unique textiles on any fabric using fabric dye, inks, heat and chemicals.
target_audience: This course is meant for beginners with an interest in learning some textile design techniques.
This course isn't for someone who wants to achieve regular, expected results
This course is great for someone willing to experiment and embrace the unexpected

courses.description:
Olá! Sou Robson Costa, instrutor do curso.
Tenho o prazer de apresentar para vocês esse projeto da experiência de minha vida, trazendo além de conhecimento, empatia por todos vocês que vão adentrar no mundo da modelagem CAD. Essa expertise que trago vem de mais de 20 anos de experiência no setor têxtil fabril de vestuário. Comecei a trabalhar em fabricas da linha têxtil desde 2001, fazendo atividades desde o acabamento, e a um passado recente, fui operador de CAD no corte, cuidei de facções e pilotistas… Recentemente atuei como modelista e coloquei em prática tudo aquilo que vi no decorrer da minha vida no trabalho da industria têxtil. Já tive a minha própria industria de roupas, e hoje sou proprietário da Modelagem e Diversos®, empresa de desenvolvimento e venda de modelagens em MarketPlaces e redes sociais.
O curso pode ser feito em qualquer versão do Audaces. Comece agora!
Para começar a falar do programa, queria desmistificar um achismo da maioria. Não é viável o desenvolvimento de moldes no Corel Draw. Os moldes são desenvolvidos no Audaces ou programas específicos de moldes, por ser uma produção técnica e que exige ferramentas apropriadas, e só assim é exportado para o Corel Draw e PDF.O Audaces consiste em ser, na prática, como se fosse uma mesa de um modelista com todas as suas ferramentas físicas em cima dela, mas que no programa, ficam mais detalhadas e de maneira mais simples para tais edições.


Também ensinaremos a mecânica de uso do Corel Draw para esse fim de moldes das tarefas do setor de confecção, impressão e artes gráficas.


O Corel Draw por sua vez, é um programa mais usado hoje em dia, por muitos profissionais como de artes gráficas, de fotografias, designers, arquitetos, pessoal da sublimação, de bordados e até engenheiros e muito mais. Ele traz ferramentas mais universais e que ajuda em vários processos, e aqui é um parceiro que hoje auxilia na produção e confecção de roupas, aliando-se na hora de impressão dos moldes, edições simplificadas dos moldes, nas artes sublimação, também riscos para cortes têxteis e finalização do produto para venda, que no nosso caso é o de modelagem.
Para a comercialização, o que tem mais saída é o arquivo do molde em Corel Draw e PDF. No entanto é necessário o Audaces para desenvolver os moldes, por isso ele é importante na comercialização de moldes digitais.


Deu pra ver que, se você pretende comercializar moldes, o Corel Draw e PDF são muito mais eficazes em termos de venda do que outros sistemas.


Peço a gentileza de ao término do curso, o aluno nós dê um feed back. Agradeço desde já!
target_audience: Costureiras
Cortadores
Designers Gráficos
Sublimadores
Empreendedores
Fabricantes
Operadores de Audaces

Welcome to the DIY Pearl Collar - Rounded Pearl Necklace course, where creativity meets elegance! This course is your gateway to mastering the art of crafting a stunning pearl collar necklace that exudes sophistication and charm.


Pearls have long been cherished for their timeless beauty and versatility in jewelry design. In this course, we will explore how to harness the allure of pearls to create a statement piece that enhances any outfit, from casual to formal.


Whether you're an aspiring jewelry designer or simply passionate about handmade accessories, this course is designed to cater to all skill levels. We will start with the basics of selecting materials and tools, guiding you through each step of the crafting process with clear, easy-to-follow instructions.


Throughout the course, you will learn essential techniques such as bead stringing, knotting, and creating intricate patterns that highlight the natural luster of pearls. We'll also cover tips for adding personal touches and customizing your necklace to reflect your unique style.


By the end of this course, not only will you have a beautiful pearl collar necklace to wear and cherish, but you'll also have gained the confidence and skills to explore further creativity in jewelry making. Whether you gift your creation or proudly wear it yourself, your handmade necklace will be a testament to your newfound expertise.


Join us on this exciting journey into the world of DIY jewelry and discover the joy of creating something exquisite with your own hands. Let's unleash your creativity and make a statement with a handmade pearl collar necklace that's as unique as you are!


Let's dive in and create something exquisite together!


If you need any more help, Don't hesitate to send me a message xo

courses.title: Jewelry Design - How to draw rings
courses.bio: Learn the art of drawing rings
objectives: Learn to draw circles, ellipses and cuboids
Draw rings on table and using cuboids
Draw rings in different thicknesses and positions
Think outside the box and make creative designs
requirements: No prior knowledge required, you will learn everything you need
courses.description:
In this course I am going to share with you how I draw rings. We will start first by understanding how to draw circles freehanded, ellipses and cuboids using one point perspective. After that, we will see how to draw different rings on a surface, and then using cuboids to see them in a 3 dimensional view. We will see together how to draw rings with different thicknesses and positions. And Last but not least, we will go through the process of thinking outside of the box create ideas and develop them together, we will work on volumes, positions, proportions and textures.


After this class you will be able to draw rings easily and generate several ideas and designs by your own. I would like you to practice with me all along the class. By this, I mean that you need to do exercises after each lecture.

Draw :
Circles - Ellipses - Cuboids in one point perspective
Rings on a table ( Simple - Concave - Convex - Wavy )
Rings on a table with different thicknesses
Rings in cuboids ( Simple - Concave - Convex - Wavy )
Rings in cuboids with different thicknesses
Rings in cuboids in different positions
And as a final project I would like you to follow the same steps we did in the course and share your results with me in the project section.
Draw multiple possibilities using different rings (base) and stones (upper part)
Choose three combinations (or more) and make a ring out of them while changing :
The volumes
The position
The texture
So if you are interested in this course, you are most welcome and I will be very glad if you join me !
target_audience: All people interested in jewelry design

courses.title: Historia de la Moda
courses.bio: Un recorrido dinámico por los estilos y diseñadores de moda del siglo XVIII a la actualidad
objectives: Reconocer estilos de moda desde el siglo XVIII hasta la actualidad
Aprender el contexto social y cultural de cada época
Conocer el origen y evolución de las principales prendas de vestir
Identificar diseñadores destacados
Reconocer íconos de moda representativos de cada época

Moda de 1900 a 1950: Estilos del Dress Reform al New Look
Moda de 1960 a 1980: Estilos del a Revolución Juvenil al Lifestyle
Moda de 1980 a la actualidad: Estilos del Power Dress a Versace

requirements: No se requieren conocimientos previos.
courses.description:
Este curso de te permitirá conocer los diferentes estilos de la moda desde el siglo XVIII hasta la actualidad.
Podrás conocer la aparición y evolución de las prendas actuales y vincularlas con el contexto social y político de cada época, ya que la moda se nutre de fenómenos económicos, sociales y estéticos. Así podrás conocer el vínculo en la Revolución Industrial y el traje ejecutivo masculino o la minifalda con las Liberación Femenina de los años 60.
Para poder entender cada estilo de una manera clara y directa, nuestro recorrido histórico será muy dinámico y visual. Podrás conocer los estilos indumentarios del Barroco, el Romanticismo, la Belle Époque, el Dress Reform, el New Look, el Swining London, el Punk y el Power Dress entre otros.
Mediante 4 clases en video conoceremos cada época y sus diseñadores destacados a través de ilustraciones, fotografías, personajes populares y escenas de películas. Conocerás el trabajo de diseñadores como Poiret, Chanel, Dior, Balenciaga, Givenchy, Yves Saint Laurent, Cardin, Quant, Courréges, Halston, Westwood, Armani, Calvin Klein, Gaultier y Versace, entre otros.
También recorreremos las principales perspectivas sociológicas de la moda pensada como objeto de identidad personal pero también como símbolo de estatus y poder.
Se podrán descargar apuntes ilustrados de todas las clases que incluye lista de bibliografía y filmografía para quienes deseen profundizar contenidos.
target_audience: Público en general interesado en la moda, la historia y el diseño. Estudiantes y profesionales de la moda, el diseño y la historia.

courses.title: Moda Markalari Vizyonu
courses.bio: Vizyon olusturmak icin moda markalari
objectives: Moda markalarinin tarihteki onemi
Moda markalarinin en onemli tasarimlari ve aksesuarlari
Moda vizyonunun onemi
Vizyon bakis acisi perspektif genisletmek
requirements: Herhangi bir deneyim gerekmemektedir
courses.description:
Moda Markalari Vizyonu ve Vizyon olusturmak icin moda markalari
Moda Markaları Eğitimi: Stil ve Yaratıcılığın Keşfi
Vizyon olusturmak icin moda markalari
Moda, sadece giysilerden ibaret değildir; bir yaşam tarzı,  ayni zamanda yasamanin ta kendisi ve bir ifade biçimidir. Moda markaları eğitimi, bu dinamik dünyayı anlamak tema ile sarilip sarmalanmak ve kariyerinize yön vermek için mükemmel bir fırsattır. Eğitim programımız, katılımcılara moda endüstrisinin temel bileşenlerini, marka stratejilerini ve pazarlama tekniklerini marka ve vizyon olusturma yontem ve tekniklerini dogru kullanmayi öğretmeyi amaçlamaktadır.
Bu eğitimde, ünlü moda markalarının tarihçesi, tarihteki onemi tasarim kombinasyon ve butun olarak tasarim dengesi struktur tasarim ilkeleri ve birbirini tamamlamada tasarım süreçleri ve pazar analizi gibi konular ele alınacaktır. Ayrıca, farklı hedef kitlelere hitap eden markaların nasıl yaratıldığını ve sürdürülebilirlik gibi güncel trendlerin moda üzerindeki etkilerini keşfedeceksiniz.
Bir cok basari hikayesi ile katılımcılar, kendi moda markalarını oluşturma fırsatı bulacak, tasarım becerilerini geliştirecek ve profesyonel bir portföy icin hedef yon belirlemekte basarili  bir kazanim oluşturacaklardır. Moda dünyasında kendinize yer edinmek için gereken bilgi ve yetenekleri yetkinlikleri kazanın. Unutmayın, moda sadece giyinmek değil, kendinizi ifade etmektir!
Eğitimimize katılın, stilinizi  orjinalliginizi kalitenizi ve yaratıcılığınızı ortaya çıkarın Dusuncelerinizi Vizyonunuzu gelistirmenin ve Genisletmenin  tam zamani Orjinal benzersiz tasarimlar icin Moda Markalari Vizyonu  Egitimine hemen katilin Sizleri memnuniyetle bekliyoruz
poe yapay zeka ile gorsel olusturuldu
target_audience: Moda ve Markalara merakli Vizyon genisletmek isteyen ilgili ve istekli herkes katilabilir

courses.title: Easy Sewing Kit: Learn To Sew A Lined Corset
courses.bio: Grow your sewing skills and make a beautiful lined corset
objectives: students will learn how to cut out a corset pattern
students will learn how to sew a corset pattern in fabric
students will learn how to sew bust cups to corset side panels
students will learn how to add lining to a garment
students will learn how to add a zipper to a garment

Chapter 3: Sewing Base Fabric Panels and: Sewing Center and Side Front Panels
Sewing Lining Center and Side Front Panel
Sewing Lining Center and Side Bust
Sewing Panels and Bust Cups Lining
Chapter 4: Sewing Lining And Fabric: Sewing Corset Front and Back Together
Sewing Corset Front and Back Lining Together
Joining Fabric and Lining For Sewing
Chapter 5 Adding A Zipper: Adding A Zip To The Corset

requirements: Students will need a sewing machine and basic knowledge for sewing.
courses.description:
"A corset is a beautiful addition to any sewing portfolio." The corset creates a perfect shape that works with any outfit, however sewing a corset requires key sewing skills that can't be overlooked.
In this Easy Sewing Kit on Learning To Cut and Sew A Lined Corset, you will learn both the important skills of sewing, cutting and design as well as understanding the corset garment and how it's fit accomplishes a beautiful shape.
In this course, you will learn every aspect of sewing a proper corset from a simple corset pattern to final piece. We start with accurately placing your corset bodice pattern to your fabric for cut out, adding all necessary allowances, and labeling the different sides cups. We then duplicate the material to produce a comfortable lining. We notch and prepare the fabric for aligning when sewing. We finally assemble the cups and the piece, sew in the lining for a finished corset.
After this class, you will have learn important fundamentals of sewing hands with the corset that you can apply to your next design piece.


What you learn:
How to transfer your corset drafting paper pattern to your fabric and your lining, adding your gum stays
How notch all necessary points
how to cut out fabric neatly and with proper allowance
how to stitch all corset panels and busts
how to develop and attach the lining
how to flip the fabric after sewing on the internal side
how to add zip to the finished piece


Sewing a corset is one the joys of a new designer, where they can both learn about fashion and be ready to create a beautiful shaped work. This Easy Sewing Kit is the tool to help every designer achieve that goal.
If you're ready to perfect your sewing skills and make a beautifully shaping corset, then see you in my course!
target_audience: fashion designers
diy fashion enthusiasts

courses.title: Nozioni base CAD abbigliamento
courses.bio: Guida per principianti: tutti i comandi indispensabili per iniziare a processare un capo d'abbigliamento
objectives: Comandi base CAD abbigliamento
Skills di modellistica
Processo di creazione di modelli di abbigliamento
Industrializzazione di un modello
requirements: Conoscenza base di un computer
courses.description: Il videocorso mira a spiegare, passo dopo passo, il processo con il quale un cartamodello di un qualsiasi capo di abbigliamento passa dal formato digitale a quello cartaceo, per essere modificato, stampato tramite plotter e infine tagliato. In sostanza una guida semplice, fatta di video brevi riguardanti i comandi base del CAD Lectra V9R1, ma può essere applicata a qualsiasi altro CAD per abbigliamento in quanto il processo resta invariato e a cambiare sono solo i nomi dei comandi. Il videocorso quindi è rivolto a chiunque voglia lavorare nel settore della moda ma in particolare a chi vorrebbe intraprendere una carriera come operatore CAD, è registrato per fare in modo che chiunque lo segua non distolga l'attenzione ed è pieno di consigli utili che normalmente acquisiresti dopo anni di pratica ed esperienza nel settore. In questo corso sono sintetizzate tutte lel nozioni che devi sapere per utilizzare un CAD di abbigliamento e farti strada un pò alla volta nel settore della moda, i vdeo sono brevi e concisi, senza giri di parole, cosi da arrivare dritti al punto. Nella prima lezione imparerai i comandi base per modificare i pezzi, nella seconda imparerai ad usare questi pezzi per creare dei modelli e delle matrici, e nella terza ed ultima lezione impararerai ad usare queste matrici per creare dei grafici che sono indispensabili per andare successivamente a tagliare il capo.
target_audience: Modellisti con poca o nessuna esperienza su un CAD di abbigliamento
Fashion designer che vogliono impare a modificare da soli capi d'abbigliamento realizzati in precendenza
Chiunque voglia intraprendere una carriera nel settore della moda, o semplicemente voglia impare ad usare un software per abbigliamento

courses.title: FASHION DESIGNER - CORSO COMPLETO
courses.bio: Scopri i punti chiave per diventare un perfetto Fashion Designer
objectives: Studio delle tendenze e analisi del mercato della moda
Tecniche di disegno e illustrazione di moda, sia tradizionali che digitali
Selezione e lavorazione dei materiali
Modellistica e confezione dei capi
Branding e Marketing nella moda, per imparare a costruire e promuovere il proprio stile unico

Lezione 3: Terminologia nel mondo della: Lezione 3: Terminologia nel mondo della moda
Lezione 7: Elementi e principi del desig: Lezione 7: Elementi e principi del design della moda

requirements: Imparerai tutto ciò che devi sapere
courses.description: Scopri il mondo della moda con il mio corso di Fashion Designer, pensato per chi desidera trasformare la propria passione in una carriera creativa e dinamica. Grazie alla modalità FAD potrai seguire le lezioni comodamente da casa organizzando il tuo percorso formativo in base ai tuoi impegni. Il corso copre tutti gli aspetti fondamentali del fashion design, dall'ideazione alla progettazione di capi ed accessori alla creazione di collezioni complete. Saranno approfonditi temi come: studio delle tendenze e analisi del mercato della moda, tecniche di disegno e illustrazioni di moda sia tradizionali che digitali, selezione e lavorazione dei materiali, modellistica e confezione dei capi, branding e marketing nella moda, per imparare a costruire e promuovere il proprio stile unico. Al termine del corso avrai acquisito le competenze pratiche per ideare e realizzare collezioni di moda, sviluppando uno stile personale e distintivo. Sarai in grado di affrontare le sfide del settore con una visione professionale, dalla progettazione fino alla produzione e al marketing del prodotto. Questo corso è perfetto per chiunque voglia sviluppare una carriera nel fashion design, sia per principianti sia per chi vuole perfezionare le proprie abilità. Iscriviti ad acquisisci subito le competenze tecniche e artistiche per entrare nel mondo della moda!
target_audience: Le basi fondamentali per diventare un Fashion Designer

courses.description:
In this course we will focus on taking body measurement to calculating gusset, drafting panty patterns from high brief to bikini, we will also learn about types of elastic, fabric and sewing needles required in our project. We are also going to sew the panty. After this course you will have a firm foundation in making your own panties with different design and styles.


Lingerie Construction: includes assembling panty, sewing channeling, You will also learn different size of elastic how to sew a decorative elastic.


Just as an artist look at the beautiful sun and is inspired to make the most amazing painting.
This course is also perfect if you are a beginner and want to start making your own lingerie that fit your body.
In this course you too will be able to draw of the basic skills taught to make lingerie and design your own unique
styles, me as your instructor will be able to guide you every step of the way. Use the message function if you feel stuck or you need help with a new design you want to invent.

courses.title: Disegno Figurativo di Moda
courses.bio: Diventare Figurinista di moda
objectives: Cosa è un Figurino di moda, Storia, Origine
Come disegnare il bozzetto Scegliere la posa del figurino Metodi di creazione
Come disegnare il corpo del figurino Come disegnare i vestiti e gli accessori Come disegnare le pieghe degli abiti Ombreggiature, inchiostro e colori, Il flat
Strumenti di lavoro Tecniche di lavoro
requirements: Non è necessaria nessuna esperienza pregressa
courses.description:
Nel mondo della moda, i nuovi modelli vengono presentati sotto forma di bozzetti creati a mano prima di essere effettivamente tagliati e cuciti.
Innanzitutto, bisogna disegnare un figurino, un'immagine che riproduca la forma dell'indossatore e serva come base dello schizzo.
Partire dall’idea stilistica e dal figurino per arrivare al capo confezionato. Nonostante la crisi del tessile che resta una nota dolente per il nostro territorio, il mondo dell’abbigliamento in Bergamasca cerca nuove leve e giovani specializzati che siano in grado di creare un abito e realizzarlo. Il corso triennale di Moda e abbigliamento nato in Abf con Confindustria nasce proprio così e se nel 2014 sono usciti i primi 20 operatori, ora da via Gleno con i prossimi open-day si lancia anche un appello alle famiglie e ai ragazzi: servono studenti, servono specialisti del settore, perché il territorio ha fame di giovani leve.
La formazione è stata pensata per dare tutte le informazioni affinchè i ragazzi siano capaci di lavorare sui tessuti, tagliare, fare un modello, arrivare alla confezione di un capo. In particolare i ragazzi imparano a lavorare con il Cad con programmi specifici del mondo dell’abbigliamento
nel comparto abbigliamento e tessile ed è emerso il bisogno di effettuare un ricambio generazionale del settore pari al 70%, con in particolare l’esigenza di figure professionali specializzate sul Cad e sulla produzione del capo».
target_audience: Disegno Figurativo di Moda

courses.title: Sketching for Fashion Design ~ Beginner Course for Designers
courses.bio: Learn Step-by-Step Professional Fashion Drawing Techniques. Using Croquis, Plumb Lines, Body Movement, Shading, Folds et
objectives: You will learn how to sketch a "9-heads Croqui". (what is a Croqui?)
You will learn movement of the body, how the body moves, establish balance, and be aware of a plumb line.
You will learn pencil techniques in order to create shirring/gathers, and shading, and the use of color pencils.
They will learn about a fashion diary/journal, as a source of inspiration in order to be a great designer.

Lesson 6: Creating a Fashion Journal as a source of inspiration.
Lesson 7: Bonus Lecture: FAQs, and other "goodies", etc.
My New Book: "Design Your Future-Be A Future Designer"

requirements: No course requirements or prerequisites.
courses.description:
This Fashion Sketching Course (7-videos-modules) is for beginners: young and old, with an interest and passion for designing fashion.  In this Course you will learn how the body moves, body movement, and  balancing the body using the Plumb Line.  You will learn the industry standard "9-Heads Croquis".
We start with a simple exercise using a pencil and learn how to achieve different "shading" effects depending on how you are holding the pencil.  Using the pencil correctly is the foundation of good sketching, whether it's fashion design or not.
You will also look at inspiration as a way to influence sketching: fashion inspiration, using a "fashion diary/journal" - creating a "pool" from which to draw ideas from will definitely affect your ability to draw new fashion designs.
You will learn garment closure: difference between womenswear and menswear button closure.
In this Course students will learn:
How to draw a "9-Head Croquis"
How to use a Croquis as a template to start sketching fashion ideas.
Body movement and creating an "S-shaped" silhouette.
Balancing the body and use of the Plumb Line.
Pencil techniques to create "shirring/gathers", and shading, and coloring.
Creating a "fashion diary-journal" to use as source of inspiration to influence ideas for designing.
Differentiate garment closure between men's wear and women's wear
Create your own style.
And some inspiring words of wisdom...
Sketching ideas swirling in your imagination onto paper is the first step in developing a fashion portfolio and a fashion collection/line.  Being able to share ideas that can eventually be translated into an actual garment is so important.
You will learn that the body moves in a certain way and stays balanced at all times. That's when learning how to use the Plumb Line correctly will enable you to create your sketches so they look professional and exciting. Learning how the torso and the hips work together in-sync with each other will enable you to sketch dramatic and impressive figures and illustrations.
As a fashion designer the pencil will become your best friend: learning techniques on how to hold the pencil and apply pressure unto paper in order to achieve different "thickness", applying different weight of the pencil unto paper.
Whether you are a beginner designer or a professional, sketching plays an important role when delegation responsibilities to your assistant or team.  They have to understand what you are trying to achieve in your design and sketching it correctly is necessary.
Your seamstress and/or pattern-maker have to be able to look at your sketches and understand what you're communicating. The sketch will eventually become the garment thus needs to be accurate and clear.
You will learn how the industry uses a Template known as the Croquis as a way to sketch ideas.  A Croquis is "taller/longer" than the normal body thus elongating the body/figure and appearing taller than the average human body.
You will learn how to create a "fashion journal" which will help you develop your own unique style as a fashion designer. Knowing what you like (and don't like) empowers your designing abilities and will support you in developing your unique "voice".
Developing your own unique fashion design style is very important: what makes you different than the next designer. Establishing your own style is key in creating a successful brand. Fashion brands come and go therefore you must build a strong foundation with a strong particular and different style that you can call your own.  Practicing your fashion sketching consistently will enable you to achieve that goal.
Learning how to sketch fashion designs, and the practice of it, will give you confidence and certainty; it will boost your morale, and the ability to communicate your ideas. Having the power to tell your story through your ability to sketch, will solidify your brand identity.
Sketching enables you and empowers you to express on paper your ideas and possibilities that come across your imagination.
Enjoy the course!
target_audience: Students can be as young as Junior High School to more mature person who is interested in learning how to sketch for fashion designing

courses.description:
Indian Design League helps amateurs, professionals, experts & entrepreneurs to turn their specialized knowledge, talents, and abilities into a career & business that works so well that they can live a lifestyle that they want and achieve peace of mind, financial Freedom and a Career for Life.


If you an aspiring fashion stylist, fashion designer or you simply want to upgrade your fashion styling. If you got a passion for fashion? Or have you always been the best dressed person and want to help other people feel great about themselves? Do you want to ideate or direct thematic product shoot? Do you want to decode complex style artwork? If you need right guidance then this fashion styling course may be right for you!
The essence of styling is a simple way of saying something complex. An essence of fashion styling will dramatically transform your personality and it will help you to start your fashion journey personally and professionally both. This course is designed in a way to understand the essence of fashion design & styling.
This Fashion styling courses is certainly for fashion stylist, designer, blogger, artist and creator. It trains the students to become a professional stylist. Being more stylish and having better essence of fashion improve a person’s self-esteem and undoubtedly this course will enhance your fashion and dressing sense and make you feel more stylish and confident.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn the Styling Essence.
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students.
3. Fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers to brush up their skills.
4. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Styling.
5. For all entry level to advanced Fashion Stylists.

Também vamos aprender a desenhar os manequins em diferentes poses. Além disso veremos passo a passo os detalhes do manequim, como rosto, cabelos e também mãos. courses.title: Bespoke Headbands, Create a Stylish Headband from Scratch
courses.bio: Learn how to design and make a bespoke and stylish headbands that reflect your personality
objectives: Design and Create your own stylish headband with experienced milliner Elena Shvab London
You will learn all basic skills of creating a headband - blocking a hat base, padding, adding a fabric of your choice
Detailed material guide is provided. You will learn in detail what material will be required and where to get them
After completing this course you will learn invaluable skills and would be able to carry on creating beautiful headbands and experimenting further
Learn from experienced milliner and tutor Elena Shvab Millinery, London

Introduction: Part6. Covering the headband with fabric

requirements: No experience is required. The course will guide you step by step
courses.description:
Welcome to this exclusive video course on crafting bespoke headbands! Whether you're an aspiring milliner, a fashion enthusiast, or a beginner simply looking to add a personal touch to your accessory collection - this course is designed for you!
During this course, you'll explore the fascinating world of headband design, providing you with the expertise and insights required to create bespoke headbands that are both unique and fashionable. You will learn blocking a headband base, wiring and trimming the shape, adding padding, selecting the perfect materials and creating stunning decorations. Every session is meticulously designed to assist you in achieving a deep expertise in the craft.
By taking in this course, you'll not only learn how to make beautiful headbands but also find joy in expressing your creativity through crafting wearable art and will empower you to bring your visions to life.
Material Guide and valuable links are included as part of the course.


What to Expect


- 8 Chapters, 65min of valuable content
- PDF detailed material guide and list of selected millinery suppliers
- Contact your tutor at any time if you have questions

Embark on a journey to become a pro at stitching blouses with our beginner-friendly course. We’ll teach you how to create four blouse designs, explaining each step in detail to make sure you understand everything. We start with the basics, giving you a strong foundation.
This course is made for everyone, no matter your skill level. It’s filled with top-notch content from our live workshops and is suitable for both female and males. The recorded classes are easy to access and make learning fun which are on Youtube.
Feel confident while join it, knowing you’ll learn a lot and improve your stitching skills. We’re excited to have you in the class and see your progress. Thanks for considering our course!


ब्लाउज सिलाई में प्रो बनने की यात्रा पर निकलें हमारे शुरुआती दोस्तानिक कोर्स के साथ। हम आपको चार ब्लाउज डिज़ाइन कैसे बनाएं, यह सब कुछ समझाने के लिए हर कदम की विस्तृत रूप से सीखाएंगे। हम साधारिता से शुरुआत करते हैं, जिससे आपको मजबूत आधार मिलता है।
यह कोर्स सभी के लिए है, आपके कौशल स्तर से फर्क नहीं पड़ता। इसमें हमारे लाइव वर्कशॉप से प्राप्त श्रेष्ठ सामग्री से भरा हुआ है और यह महिलाओं और पुरुषों के लिए उपयुक्त है। संग्रहीत कक्षाएं आसानी से पहुंचने में मदद करती हैं और सीखने को मजेदार बनाती हैं।
साइन अप करते समय आत्म-विश्वास का अनुभव करें, जानते हैं कि आप बहुत कुछ सीखेंगे और अपने सिलाई कौशल में सुधार करेंगे। हम आपको कक्षा में स्वागत करने और आपकी प्रगति को देखने के लिए उत्सुक हैं। हमारे कोर्स को धन्यवाद देने के लिए शुक्रिया!

courses.title: Patternmaking For Beginners: Draft An Offshoulder Dress
courses.bio: Perfect your drafting skills to a beautiful Offshoulder dress and sleeve pattern
objectives: How to draft an offshoulder dress
How to apply body measurements into pattern
How to calculate various measurements for the dress
How to draft the offshoulder sleeve

How to Draft A Flownce Peplon: Attaching The Peplon To A Sleeve

requirements: No drafting experience needed, though helpful
courses.description:
The Easy Sewing Kit - Learn To Draft An Offshoulder Dress Course teaches you how to construct a beautiful dress in the offshoulder style.
In this course, you learn to draft a pattern for an offshoulder dress and sleeve, using fitting measurements, and quality techniques. We begin with organizing your pattern paper with accurate measurements laid out properly. You will then learn to calculate the armhole, the waist darts, and allowances. Finally you will draft accurate lines to match quality measurements for a fitting design.
What you learn:
How to layout measurements for an offshoulder dress, including the vertical measurements of the shoulder to bust, shoulder to waist and shoulder to hip, and the horizontal measurements of the waist circumference, the hip circumference and the armhole width
How to arrange and draft a offshoulder pattern from measurements onto drafting paper. This includes using the proper curves and drafting technique for the design
How to calculate the neckline and the armhole curve using measurements to fit within the offshoulder dress
How to draft appropriate allowances for sewing seams and later joining of the fabric
How to layout a fitting offshoulder sleeve, that will tie in appropriately
How to cut out both offshoulder dress and offshoulder sleeve ready to be applied to fabric for cutting out and sewing.
The ability to draft different styles helps you grow your craft and skill. This offshoulder drafting course is made to help you grow in both, and be ready for your own creative take to the offshoulder dress.
If you're ready to draft your offshoulder dress, then see you in my course!
target_audience: Fashion designers and pattern makers looking for new ideas
Beginner sewers interested in learning new patterns

courses.title: ZBrush for Jewelry Designers
courses.bio: The Fundamentals
objectives: Understand the fundamentals of digital jewelry sculpting using ZBrush.
Understand ZBrush interface navigation and use the settings to create a custom interface.
Create custom sculpting brushes using the brush settings
Apply the ZBrush ZPlug-ins to import and export 3D files for 3D Printing
Use Reference Imagery on the Grid to create a guide for your jewelry designs
Use the preferences to create and save customized interfaces
Apply symmetry settings to create elegant and engaging designs to your sculpts
Understand the power of subtools to create complex pieces and apply boolean operations
requirements: No ZBrush or jewelry experience needed. You'll need a ZBrush 2023 license.
courses.description: This course is an introduction to the fundamental skills and tools jewelry designers need to know in order to get started using Maxon's ZBrush.  ZBrush has long been the industry standard in digital sculpting software, and it is quickly being embraced by jewelry artists because of its powerful capabilities. ZBrush's interface and approach can be a little daunting at first so I created a course that specifically addresses your needs as a jewelry designer so you understand what is useful to you and what you can safely ignore. The uniqueness of ZBrush is often the first hurdle artist face when they dive into digital sculpitng, however you'll quickly learn to embrace ZBrush's toolset and use it to your own creative advantage. The course consists of 15 video chapters averaging 12 to 18 minutes each. They address specific topics such as navigating the interface, importing and exporting 3D files, sculpting geometry, importing reference imagery, customizing brushes, customizing the interface, and more. I use my 20 years of experience as a professional ZBrush artist and teacher to guide you and help you build a solid foundation so that you can sculpt with confidence and allow your artist vision to be fully realized with this incredible software.
target_audience: Absolute Beginners
Jewelry Designers who want to add ZBrush to their workflow
ZBrush users who are interested in Jewelry Design
Designers who have used CAD software such as Matrix but want to learn how ZBrush can improve their workflow

objectives: Learn to master the basic flat Peyote stitch techniques
Learn how to make simple strips of beadwork using flat Peyote stitch and turn the beaded strips into jewelry pieces
Learn how to add a new thread to your project and how to secure your work

Introduction: Get Ready& Brief Introduction to Materials and Tools
Start with the Basic Flat Peyote Techniq: How to Add a New Thread to Your Project
How to Zip Up Peyote Strips
