Students need to prepare some basic tools and materials to practice: seed beads, round beads or glass pearls, beading needles, beading thread, crystal rivolis, gemstone cabochons etc.
courses.description:
In this jewelry making course, you will learn to make beautiful & wearable beaded jewelry and explore more design ideas using one of the most popular and versatile beading stitches-- Peyote Stitch. With the essential Peyote techniques, you’ll be able to create endless jewelry designs.
This course will take your jewelry making skills to the next level.
You'll learn:
· How to make simple strips of beadwork using the basic flat Peyote techniques
· how to add a new thread and secure your work
· How to attach jewelry findings to turn the simple beaded strips into jewelry pieces
· How to make wreath earrings using the 1st variation of Circular Peyote
· How to make flower and pearl earrings using the 2nd variation of Circular Peyote
· How to use 3D Tubular Peyote techniques to make spiral rope bracelet
· How to make beaded bezels for crystal rivolis and gemstone cabochons
· How to turn the basic bezels into necklace pendants and earrings
This course is designed for the students who have either completed my first jewelry making course, or who already have a basic knowledge of beading techniques
All the detailed materials and tools information is in the PDF file of this course
This course comes with lifetime access, future updates and 30-day Money-Back Guarantee
target_audience: Students with a basic knowledge of beading techniques want to learn Peyote stitch techniques to create and design more styles of jewelry that are beautiful and wearable

courses.title: Easy Sewing Kit: Learn To Measure for Dressmaking & Trousers
courses.bio: Learn to take accurate measurements for fashion design.
objectives: how to measure for dressmaking
how to measure for trousers and pants
professional techniques to get accurate measurements
how to use tape rule to measure arm, hip, waist, knee, ankle and other circumferences
requirements: Students only need a tape rule
courses.description:
Accurate Measurements are the key to good fashion design. Whether designing dresses, trousers, skirts, shirts and so on for yourself or for a client, you will need to start with quality measurements. And This Easy Sewing Kit Course for Learning Measuring has you covered.
In this course, I teach you the basics to prepare the key measurements vertically and horizontally for your design, so that it will inform an accurate design and a comfortable and stylish fit.
This course begins with teaching you typical dressmaking measurements for horizontal/circumference from the shoulders, busts, hips, thighs and armhole, and continues to the vertical measurements shoulder to bust, shoulder to waist and shoulder to hip.
In the second part of this course, I teach measurements for trousers including the measurements for the thigh, knee, ankle and crotch.
What you learn:
Best technique for measuring for dresses and trousers
Alternate methods in getting accuracy
Important cues for where to measure
How to measure hard spots
How to arrange tape rule for best measure
How to prepare measurements for dresses and shirts
How to prepare measurements for trousers and pants
How to position clients for measurement
Alternate methods for accurate measuring
If you’re ready to begin perfecting your measurements, then see you in lesson 1.
target_audience: Fashion Designers
Diy clothes designers

courses.bio: From Fabric to Fashion: A Complete Course on Sewing Skirts and Pants for Absolute Beginners
objectives: The student will gain the skills and confidence to work with a sewing machine, unlocking a world of creative possibilities.
The student will be skilled in pattern construction, enabling them to bring their unique designs to life with precision and creativity.
The student will be able to accurately take measurements for creating templates.
The student will gain a comprehensive understanding of all essential technological skills, providing a solid foundation for their sewing journey.
Upon completing the course, the student will confidently create beautiful skirts and pants.

03 Taking Measurements: The Key to Perfe: 03 Taking Measurements: The Key to Perfect Fit

courses.description:
Welcome to “Natasi Sewing Courses”! This program covers everything you need to know about the basics of sewing. It’s designed for beginners eager to learn the fundamentals, as well as those with some experience looking to challenge themselves. By the end of the course, you'll be able to sew skirts and pants that you can proudly wear.
My program includes both practical and theoretical materials. The theoretical component focuses on pattern making and template creation, while the practical side involves cutting and sewing your finished products.
The syllabus consists of 9 lessons:
Equipment: An overview of the tools you'll need for this course.
Taking Measurements: Learning how to measure accurately.
Sewing Machines: Understanding the structure and functions of sewing machines.
Different Variations of Seams: Exploring various seam types.
Handmade Stitches: Learning three types of hand-stitched techniques.
Creating a Skirt Pattern: Studying how to design a skirt pattern.
Cutting and Finishing a Skirt: Techniques for cutting and finishing your skirt.
Pants Pattern: How to create a pants pattern.
Cutting and Finishing Pants: Techniques for completing your pants sewing.
Why is our course the best choice for you? You’re about to find out! Click the enroll button, and I’ll see you in Lesson 1!
target_audience: This course is for anyone who want to study sewing from basics
Anyone who whats to creat unique and original products
For designers who want to enhance their creativity by learning how to bring your ideas to life through fabric and design.
This Course is for anyone who want to wear their on created clothes

courses.title: Advanced clothing CAD course: size development + templates
courses.bio: Method of developing sizes and their respective templates
objectives: Learning how to develop a garment in sizes
Evenly divide the fabric to be added for each size
Learn the calculations to be done to make the garment grow proportionally
Understanding the risks involved in not developing a garment proportionally
Learn how to position the buttons and create the template to mark them with chalk
Learn how to position pockets and create templates to mark them with chalk
requirements: Basic knowledge of any clothing CAD is required
courses.description: The video course aims to explain, step by step, the method by which a paper pattern of any garment is developed in sizes and how to create for each size the respective template to chalk out the buttons, in essence a simple guide, made up of short videos where you will learn the method to make a garment grow proportionally and to button it, thanks to the help of Lectra V9R1 CAD, but it can be applied to any other garment CAD as the process remains the same and only the names of the commands change. The video course is therefore aimed at anyone who wants to work in the fashion industry but in particular anyone who wants to pursue a career as a CAD operator, it is recorded so that anyone following it does not lose focus and it is full of useful tips that you would normally acquire after years of practice and experience in the industry. The first 5 videos of this video course summarise all the knowledge you need to know about growing a garment proportionally, in the next 5 videos the method for getting it to button correctly, and in the remaining videos you will delve deeper into these two topics and receive useful tips. You will also learn the difference in developing a garment in international sizes from one in European sizes and the mistakes you absolutely must not make so that the garment does not lose its identity. The videos are short and concise, without mincing words, so as to get straight to the point.
target_audience: Garment modellers, CAD operators, designers,

courses.title: How to sew a sports bra
courses.bio: Learn to how to design and make a sports bra in under an hour !
objectives: Drafting the Pattern.

How to cut pattern on fabric.

Introduction: Joining shoulder seam and armhole elastic.

requirements: Be able to use a sewing machine.
courses.description: In this course you will learn how to make a sports bra from taking your own body measurements to get a perfect fit, drafting and shaping the back armhole of the sports bra, then we will be drafting front pattern and cutting on fabric. You will also master how to sew the sports bra and type of fabric that will be used, which will be a one way stretch, and the type of  needles required for a stretchy fabric. You will also learn different size of elastic how to sew a decorative elastic from the armhole round the neck line, then you will also learn how to attach a waist band on the sports bra. Just as an artist look at the beautiful sun and is inspired to make the most amazing painting . In this course you too will be able to draw of the basic skills taught to make sports bras and design your own unique styles, me as your instructor will be able to guide you every step of the way. Use the message function if you feel stuck or you need help with a new design you want to invent. So happy sewing and breaking off that sweat with your self made sports bra.
target_audience: All levels

courses.title: CAD/CAM Jewellery Design Masterclass for Beginners
courses.bio: Design Your First CAD Jewellery Piece
objectives: Master jewellery CAD fundamentals using industry-standard Rhino software
Design and create a complete pendant from digital concept to finished piece
Develop 3D printing skills specific to jewellery manufacturing
Gain exclusive industry insights from an award-winning designer with commercial experience

Day One: Learn How Jewellery is Made Usi: 1-1 What is CAD-CAM and How to Use CAD to Design and Make Jewellery
1-2 What Does a Jewellery CAD Designer Do and What is Their Career Path
1-3 Section 3- What are the Most Common CAD Software Packages for Jewellery
Consulting with a Client on Their First Custom Jewellery Project
Day Two: Learn Rhino Basics - From Downl: 2-5 Creating Your First Objects in Rhino
2-6 How to Save and Open a File in Rhino
Troubleshooting Rhino Software Issues with a Junior Designer
Day three: Creating your first Jewellery: Design Review Meeting: Pendant Concept Approval

requirements: No prior CAD experience or jewellery design knowledge is required. This course starts from absolute basics and guides you step-by-step through the entire process.
A computer capable of running Rhino software
Internet access for downloading software (90-day free Rhino license provided)
Basic computer skills
Enthusiasm to learn a new digital craft
courses.description:
Transform your creative vision into stunning jewellery pieces with our comprehensive CAD/CAM Jewellery Design Masterclass for Beginners. This intensive 6-day course empowers complete beginners to design, prototype, and produce their first professional CAD jewellery piece from initial concept to polished finished product.
Master the complete digital jewellery creation workflow with expert guidance through every step. You'll discover lucrative career opportunities as a jewellery CAD designer, understanding exactly what skills and knowledge are needed to succeed in this exciting field.
Starting with CAD/CAM fundamentals, you'll learn how jewellery is made using digital technology and explore the most common CAD software packages used in the industry. Focus your learning on Rhino 3D, the industry-standard software, as you master navigation, viewport controls, and essential modeling techniques. From downloading and installation to understanding hardware requirements, we cover everything needed to get started.
By day three, you'll design your own custom pendant, learning to draw lines, create 3D objects, add bails, and finalize professional designs. Understand pendant components and construction while building confidence in Rhino's powerful tools and layer management system.
Our comprehensive 3D printing module covers everything from foundation principles to hands-on operation. Explore different 3D printing technologies for jewellery, learn about specialized resins, and understand prototype versus production applications. Master the complete 3D printing workflow: checking file printability, adding supports, defining settings, exporting files correctly, and operating desktop 3D printers. Gain practical experience with preparation, printing, and essential post-processing techniques.


Perfect for aspiring jewellery designers, creative entrepreneurs, hobbyists seeking professional skills, or traditional jewellers embracing digital transformation. This masterclass provides practical, industry-relevant knowledge through hands-on projects and step-by-step guidance.

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Darted Trouser PATTERN Block Course is the 10th course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Dartless Trouser Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Dartless Trouser PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Dartless Trouser Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Dartless Trouser Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately and professionally using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This DARTED Trouser PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic DARTED Trouser PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype (mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

requirements: no experience is necessary
the course will provide all the necessary information
courses.description:
In this course, I will show you a few techniques for creating air-dry clay jewelry. The best part about clay is that you can literally create any shape and style of jewelry you want. With clay, there are very few limitations. Working with clay is fun and relaxing. You will also need to decorate your jewelry items with some colors. If you do not know what colors to go with then just stick with the primaries, along with black and white. You can always mix your own colors. If you are unsure about the use of colors, then think about the basic color theory. You only need some brushes or a sponge. You will also need some tools and findings, in order to connect the different parts of your jewelry. You can actually find a lot of these tools in your kitchen, so it's not necessary to spend a lot of money before you even start working. It is advisable to have your own working space, where you can keep all the things you need to create your jewelry items. It does not have to be anything special or expensive, but it is good to have a table where you can place all your tools and materials so that you don’t need to put them all away each time you're finished with work.
In this course, you will learn how to shape, mold, and decorate air-dry clay to create beautiful, one-of-a-kind jewelry pieces. Air-dry clay is easy to work with and doesn’t require baking, making it perfect for beginners. I will show you step-by-step how to work with this versatile material, turning it into earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and more. You’ll explore various techniques to create unique shapes. I’ll also demonstrate how to add textures and patterns to your clay to give your jewelry a special touch.
Whether you prefer vibrant hues or neutral tones, I’ll guide you on how to blend colors and apply them for different effects. This course is not only about creating beautiful pieces for yourself, but also about gaining the skills to design jewelry that you can sell. Once you’re comfortable with the techniques, you’ll be able to explore your creativity and develop your own unique style. By the end of the course, you'll be confident in making beautiful, lightweight, and durable air-dry clay jewelry!
target_audience: People who want to learn how to create DIY jewelry items using air dry clay
People who want to make their own clay jewelry items that they can use themselves or sell in their jewelry store

Introduction to Subcultures: Do you know people often have groups & followers based on their lifestyles and way of living such as nightlife, working hours, beliefs, fashion, literature as well as other elements. These preferences developed into progressive movements, which are today referred to as "subculture." Therefore, people who distinguish themselves from mainstream culture are members of a specific subculture. This topic will enhance perspectives of stylists in regards to origin and evolution of subcultures as well as significance of subculture in fashion styling.
Various Subcultures & their Core Elements: Would you like to replicate a certain subculture's fashion style? Do you enjoy learning about various interesting subcultures and their core elements? In this section, you will learn about various subcultures & their origins around the world such as, Punk, Sea-Punk & Gothic, Emo & Hippie. Beatnik, Lolita & Geisha, Hip-Hop, Greaser, Gen-Z and many more. With profound knowledge of various subcultures, their origins, lifestyles, evolution, accessories and fashion preferences, you will develop thorough understanding of the fashion styling domain.

"Essa roupa até é bonita… mas não parece comigo"?
Se sim, este curso é para você.
Aqui, você vai aprender a identificar seu estilo dominante, entender os 7 Estilos Universais e montar looks que representem quem você é de verdade, mesmo com um guarda-roupa simples ou orçamento limitado.

Autoconhecimento como ponto de partida

courses.title: How to Sew a Bra.
courses.bio: Bra making for beginners.
objectives: In this course you will learn how to make a simple wireless bra, as a beginner and taking body measurement correctly.
You will learn the material needed for this project e.g. fabric and elastics.
You will also learn to draft the pattern from scratch and learn all the basics of bra construction.
At the end of this course you will own a pair of bra with your sense of style.

Introduction: Cutting pattern on fabric and sewing Bra Cup.

requirements: Sewing Machine, Pencil, Pattern paper ,Eraser, Ruler and measuring tape.
courses.description:
In this course you will learn how to make a wireless bra using your own body measurement, type of fabric required which will be a mix of stretch and non-stretch material to stabilize the bra cups and give support to the bust.
Pattern drafting: includes drafting the upper and lower cup, frame or cradle and bra band.
Bra construction: includes assembling bra cups, , sewing bra channeling, assembling bra straps and You will also learn different size of elastic how to sew a decorative elastic from the armhole round and Bra neck line.
Just as an artist look at the beautiful sun and is inspired to make the most amazing painting. This course is also perfect if you are a beginner and want to start making your own lingerie that fit your body. In this course you too will be able to draw of the basic skills taught to make wireless Bras and design your own unique styles, me as your instructor will be able to guide you every step of the way. Use the message function if you feel stuck or you need help with a new design you want to invent. So happy sewing and breaking off that sweat with your self made   wireless Bra
target_audience: Beginner Friendly

courses.description:
Beginner Sewing: Making a Tote Bag is an introductory course to sewing meant to show you everything you need to know to safely operate a sewing machine.  I will show you everything from machine to set up to the construction of a lined tote bag complete with two pockets.
Some lectures in this course are the same as in Beginner Sewing for Tweens and Teens, but the project is brand new and directed toward an adult.
Learn Basic Sewing Practices And Challenge Yourself to Create Your First Sewn Item
·      Learn how to safely operate a sewing machine
·      Practice basic stitching skills like creating corners and curving lines
·      Recognize problems and learn how to fix them
·      Learn how to read a sewing pattern
·      Properly cut fabric in preparation of sewing
·      Use industry standard construction and finishing sewing techniques
A Lifelong Skill With Unlimited Possibilities
Learning basics sewing skills is not only a rewarding skill but it is also something that you can develop over your lifetime.  Start with something small and eventually work up to creating your own clothing.
If you have ever considered going into the fashion field this is a great place to start.  Unlike most home sewing courses I focus on industry standards and teach you how the professionals sew.
Course Overview
I designed this course for the absolute beginner. If your machine has never been out of the box, no worries, I will show you how to set it up, teach you about the parts of the machine and how to safely operate it to effectively sew together your very first project.
You’ll learn all of these things in 22 lectures with over 3 hours of video content.  Each lecture is broken down into easy to understand topics as to no overwhelm a beginner and created in real time so you can follow along or pause the lecture and pick it back up at any time.
By the time you finish this course you will be a confident seamstress well on your way to enjoying a skill that you can grow and develop over your lifetime.  The machine will no longer be a scary machine but a place you visit for a creative outlet and a tool to help you construct some really cool stuff.
target_audience: This course is meant for adults who have a desire to learn new sewing skills.
No prior sewing experience is necessary
This course is meant for the absolute beginner but people with prior sewing knowledge can take this course to learn how to construct a tote bag.
Some of the material covered in this class is the same as Beginner Sewing for Tweens and Teens but the project is more advanced.

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Dartless Dress PATTERN Block Course is the 4th course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Dartless DRESS Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Dartless Dress PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Dartless Dress Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
target_audience: This DARTLESS PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic DARTLESS PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype(mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

courses.description:
Welcome to the course on "How to Become a Handbag Designer & How to Sew a Handbag"
Designing handbags can be a great way to profit from your creative spirit and skills. You can design bags as a hobby or career. While it may take a while to reach your goal, you can become a successful handbag designer if you spend some time learning about fashion trends and making attractive prototypes and sample bags. If you’re down for some hard work and patience, get ready to take the fashion world by storm!
If you're interested in sewing and design or even just creativity, then this is the right rainy day activity for you!
Have you tried shopping for a handbag without any luck? Maybe you know what you're looking for in a handbag, but can't find it anywhere. Figure out what you're looking for and find inspiration everywhere. Then, plan the details of your handbag. You could assemble it yourself, if you're skilled with a sewing machine or you could find a designer to create it for you. Either way, have fun dreaming up and sketching your very own handbag.
Here's a novel purse that is perfect for the bibliophile in your life!
Make this purse out of an old (preferably cheap and unloved) book. It's sure to be a conversation starter wherever you take it and you'll get to recycle a discarded book in the process.
Purses can be a quick and easy accessory that take an outfit from office to night on the town, but they can get expensive. If you know how to make a clutch purse, especially from inexpensive supplies, you can expand your accessories wardrobe without spending too much money. You can even recycle kitchen linens or old fabrics around your house, making your new clutch a green project, as well.
target_audience: Any one can take this course.
Household women can take this course

courses.title: Traditional Indonesian Batik: Wax Resist and Dye Bath
courses.bio: Learn authentic batik techniques with wax and dye baths, as practiced in Indonesia for generations.
objectives: Understand the history and cultural roots of batik art
Learn how to prepare fabric, tools, and dyes for batik.
Master basic waxing and dyeing techniques step-by-step.
Create your own unique batik designs on fabric with confidence
Sketch, transfer, and plan multi-layer designs to avoid color bleed and muddy mixes.
requirements: No prior experience needed. You’ll only need basic tools like fabric, wax, dyes, and a brush or tjanting tool.
Equipment: hotplate or double boiler, thermometer, jars, gloves, apron, iron, newspapers/paper towels.
Basic supplies: cotton or silk fabric, tjanting or small brush, optional stamps, paraffin/beeswax blend, fiber-reactive dyes, soda ash.
Work in a ventilated area and follow hot-wax and dye safety guidelines.
courses.description:
This course teaches the authentic process of traditional Indonesian batik, a centuries-old textile art form recognized by UNESCO as part of the world’s cultural heritage. Batik is not simply painting on fabric — it is a craft of patience and precision, where wax and dye are used together to build layered designs that cannot be achieved any other way. In this class, you will learn the genuine step-by-step method of creating batik, exactly as it has been practiced in Indonesia for generations.
We begin with the fundamentals: how to prepare your fabric so it is ready to absorb color, and how to transfer your chosen design. You will then explore the process of applying hot wax with traditional tools such as the tjanting and with brushes for broader areas. The wax acts as a resist, protecting certain parts of the fabric and allowing you to build your design in stages.
Next, you will move into the dyeing process. Using the three primary colors, you will see how batik designs are developed through multiple dye baths, each one adding richness, depth, and contrast. This layering process is what gives batik its unique character, as new shades and effects emerge naturally from the interplay of wax and dye.
Throughout the course, you will gain not only technical knowledge but also an appreciation for the rhythm and flow of batik-making. Each stage requires care and focus, yet the results are always one of a kind. By the end of this course, you will have created your own piece of traditional batik art, a textile that carries both your creativity and the legacy of a craft practiced for centuries.
This course is suitable for learners who already have some experience with the basics of batik. If you are brand new to the process, I recommend starting with my Batik for Beginners class before moving on to this one.
target_audience: This course is perfect for creative beginners, art enthusiasts, hobby crafters, textile lovers, and anyone curious about batik design and technique.

courses.description:
Are you a lover of fashion? Would you like to start dressing people for every day, editorial, celebrity, personal shopping, or e-commerce shoots? Would you love styling to be your career and to make money from it? Do you want to travel around the world and work with high-profile companies and fashion brands? If so, this course is perfect for you.
This course will take you deep within the unique world of fashion and style. You will learn how to become a celebrity stylist right from scratch, without having any prior contacts. You will also learn what it takes to become a fashion editor at a magazine and how to pitch your ideas and concepts to these magazines in order to get your work published. You will gain key skills and techniques that will allow you to grow and develop as a professional stylist, and by the end of the course, you will know how to break into the industry. In these specially designed classes industry expert, stylist, and motivational speaker Denise Brown will not only teach you how to become a stylist, but she will also show you behind the scenes of how she networks, receives clothing, attends London Fashion Week, and gets invited to press days. After completion of this course, you will feel confident in your ability to be able to start your career as a stylist.
Course Structure
Gain motivation, inspiration, and a wide range of necessary skills to kick start your career in Fashion Styling. In addition to providing evidence of your individual talent, this course will help you gain access to essential skills for styling success.
Thorough and intensive, this course will tackle all aspects of the industry, allowing you to develop the fundamental skills required to pursue a career as a professional fashion stylist. Starting with the basics, then over the duration of the course, you will progressively delve deeper into the more complex skills of styling and networking. This course will provide you with a brilliant opportunity to demonstrate your creative and business skills as you let your individual talent shine through.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to become a Fashion Stylist or celebrity stylist
This course requires no prior knowledge of styling or fashion or a specific skill set. We accept anyone with a love for fashion and a keen interest to learn.

courses.description:
Questo corso è in grado di insegnarti in modo rapido e incisivo come si svolge la ricerca tematica e delle tendenze che precede la fase di progettazione delle collezioni di moda. Apprenderai non solo a raccogliere dati e informazioni ma saprai anche desumere un tema di ispirazione imparando a tradurlo in un concept di progettazione.
Tema e concept, infatti, non sono esattamente la stessa cosa: imparerai, anche attraverso l'ausilio del moodboard, a estrapolare dei segni da un immaginario e a progettare attraverso essi un prodotto innovativo, coerente e di forte impatto.
Il corso è indicato a chi si sta preparando a diventare un designer di moda ma anche a chi è orientato al design in generale o a chi desidera tentare la carriera di cacciatore di tendenze o di fashion marketer.
target_audience: Chiunque si trovi a progettare un prodotto di abbigliamento, un accessorio o un prodotto di design
Chiunque voglia strutturare un brand o una campagna di comunicazione

courses.title: Corso di Moda Online Completo
courses.bio: Dal figurino alla Collezione
objectives: Progetterai le tue Collezioni di moda senza stress
Svilupperai uno stile creativo unico e personale
Saprai disegnare in pochi minuti figurini di moda
Otterrai la capacità di sintesi nel rappresentare le tue idee
Presenterai in modo professionale ed efficace le tue Collezioni
Come realizzare una figura umana partendo da zero
Come realizzare figurini di moda proporzionati
Quali sono le tecniche di colorazione
Come si realizza una Collezione di moda completa, dal Moodboard alle cartelle tecniche
requirements: Dotarsi di una matita HB, fogli A4, Pantoni, Squadre
courses.description:
CORSO DI MODA ONLINE
Ciao aspirante designer! Questa è la mia proposta se sei una persona creativa e hai sempre sognato di esprimerti tramite i tuoi disegni...


Meriti un posto nella moda! Non importa se non hai studiato moda o se non hai esperienza. Tu puoi farcela e sono qui per aiutarti a raggiungere il tuo potenziale e iniziare una carriera di successo nella moda senza stress e in modo semplice e positivo!


Il mio corso unico in Italia ti darà le basi per realizzare le tue collezioni di moda in autonomia e a rendere leggibili i tuoi lavori anche per i professionisti di settore.


Questo percorso didattico ti porterà diritto al risultato finale, sia che tu parta da zero, sia che ti servano delle basi SICURE e CERTE oltre alle informazioni che hai già.


La mia esperienza sviluppata in anni di formazione accademica e specialistica e di lavoro sul campo, ti guiderà con professionalità, ma soprattutto con PASSIONE, fino alla realizzazione delle tue opere future in modo semplice e veloce.


Parliamo di un percorso che ti accompagna da zero alla realizzazione di una collezione di moda, suddiviso in 4 moduli.


MODULO 1: qui imparerai a disegnare una figura umana proporzionata. Apprenderai tutti i segreti per sviluppare un corpo femminile in maniera rapida e pulita. In questo modulo apprenderai tutte le basi del disegno, illustrate in maniera semplice e dettagliata. Adatto a te se vuoi migliorare la tua tecnica di disegno, anche partendo da zero.


MODULO 2: in questo modulo apprenderai le tecniche per sviluppare un figurino di moda. Sarai in grado di disegnare un figurino in pochi minuti, in diverse pose. Imparerai a sviluppare il tuo stile creativo personale attraverso le tecniche di stilizzazione che renderanno il tuo figurino unico. Una volta sviluppato il tuo stile vedremo come applicare le pieghe, i chiaroscuri, quindi dare tridimensionalità, per vestire il tuo figurino e trasformare le tue idee in moda.


Fino a questo modulo servono solo matita, gomma, fogli da stampante e squadre.


MODULO 3: ti mostrerò tutte le principali tecniche per colorare i tuoi figurini. Imparerai come utilizzare pantoni, acquerelli, matite colorate, trattopen. Vedremo insieme come disegnare varie tipologie di tessuto. Ti accompagnerò nella colorazione dei principali materiali quali Velluto, Paillettes, Ecopelle, Chanel...e tanti altri.


MODULO 4: in questo importantissimo modulo ti accompagnerò nella realizzazione della tua Collezione di moda. Ti mostrerò la mia tecnica personale e avrai accesso ad una mia collezione, che svilupperò passo per passo insieme a te. Imparerai tutte le fasi necessarie per sviluppare una collezione. Moodboard, schede tecniche, ricerche di immagine, plat, cartelle colori e tessuti... non avranno più segreti per te. Non avrai bisogno di costosi e complicati softwares, ma ti mostrerò come creo le mie collezioni in maniera semplice, rapida e gratuita.


Gli step della collezione sono:
Individuare il target, capire a chi è rivolta la collezione e decidere il TEMA/CONCEPT della collezione; fare ricerca di immagini, cioè prendere ispirazione e creare il MOODBOARD ossia un collage che spiega il tema della collezione.
Decidere i colori della collezione realizzando una CARTELLA COLORI.
Decidere le stoffe creando una CARTELLA TESSUTI.
Fare SKETCH (bozzetti) buttando giù le prime idee per la collezione.
Disegnare i FIGURINI che rappresentano i vestiti definitivi della collezione.
Progettare i PLAT, ossia i disegni tecnici per capire i dettagli di ogni abito.
Realizzare la SCHEDA TECNICA che racchiude le caratteristiche generali di ogni outfit (come una carta d’identità).


Per questo modulo ho realizzato io stessa una collezione passo passo, così che potrai prendere spunto dal mio lavoro
Alla fine di ogni modulo troverai delle esercitazioni con cui testare i tuoi progressi


PER CHI È ADATTO:
La moda è la tua passione più grande
Sei una persona creativa e piena di idee
Non hai potuto frequentare un'Accademia ma non vuoi rinunciare al tuo sogno
Se parti completamente da zero
Hai già esperienza o hai già frequentato un’accademia, ma vuoi comunque imparare il metodo definitivo per realizzare una collezione di moda
REQUISITI
Per frequentare con successo il corso è necessario dotarsi di:
Matita HB
Fogli A4
Squadre
Gomma e temperino
Pantoni (almeno nero, rosa pelle, grigio, rosso)
Trattopen nero e penna bianca gel
Matite colorate (almeno bianca e nera)
Acquerelli (opzionale)
target_audience: Chiunque appassionato di moda che ha voglia di scoprire questo mondo
Sei una persona creativa e piena di idee
Non hai paura di metterti in gioco e dimostrare il tuo valore
Non hai potuto frequentare un'Accademia di moda
Frequenti un'Accademia ma vuoi migliorare nel disegno e nella realizzazione di una Collezione

courses.title: All About Fashion Illustration
courses.bio: From basic to advanced - learn how to draw and design using various techniques and tools to create a realistic fashion i
objectives: Sketch garments considering a range of factors - hairstyle, expressions, gestures, and movements
Draw 11.5 head mechanical croquis
Sketch garments according to different poses - hands and legs variations
Sketch fitted and loose garments
Rendering apparels for different purposes - seasonal collection, ethnic wear, wedding wear, lehenga, saree, casuals, etc.

Introduction: History of Fashion Illustration and 11.5 Head Mechanical Croquis
Sketch Poses - Hands and Legs Variation
Draw a Face in Different Angles and Poses

requirements: NO
courses.description:
Every artist wants to draw realistic sketches, especially Fashion Designers. From rough drafts to final drafts to taking measurements to final execution – everything needs to be illustrated for a concrete reference to the bigger picture.
This course is beneficial for anyone who wants to learn how to sketch and illustrate professionally. The course is bifurcated into different modules like Mechanical Croquis that covers drawing 11.5 head croquis, sketching, impact of light and shadow in illustration, etc.
Every apparel is different and so, illustrating each type of garment can pose a challenge in itself. Along with a variety of apparels available today, showcasing various materials like knitwear, leather, fur, silk, wool, etc. through illustrations, (colours, highlights, folds, crease, texture, shades, etc.) can be a difficult task. Similar is the case for hairstyles and the varying human profiles and poses. Learners will understand all the minute details required to illustrate with such details through the video tutorials.
In this course, you will learn how to draw the garments according to the human body in various proportions (11.5 head croquis), how to draw various body shapes using given tools, how to sketch garments according to different poses, how to draw facial expressions, how to illustrate distinct hairstyles, how to render a variety of apparels that include ethnic wear, wedding wear, casual wear, beach wear, layered clothes, etc. and how to draw loose and fitted clothes.
Who is this course for?
1. Anyone Who Wants to Learn Fashion designing
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers
3. Aspiring Fashion Illustrators
4. Anyone who wants to learn how to sketch types of apparels realistically
5. For anyone who wants to learn to sketching professionally
target_audience: 1. Anyone Who Wants to Learn Fashion designing 2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers 3. Aspiring Fashion Illustrators 4. Anyone who wants to learn how to sketch types of apparels realistically 5. For anyone who wants to learn to sketching professionally

objectives: Create beautiful jewelry that is unique and expresses the personality of the artist

Learn how to make handmade earrings, bracelets or anklets using beads, ear wires, crimps or clasps that they can wear themselves, offer as gifts, or sell

courses.description: Do you dream of creating your own beautiful jewelry, that you can wear yourself and focus everybody's attention and admiration upon? If you are a beginner and want to understand how to make nice earrings, bracelets or anklets, using beads and different findings, then this is the right course for you.  This course provides information on how to use crimps, make wire loops, open and securely close jump rings, choose the best finishing methods, and much more. You will understand what the main tools are and how to use them in order to create unique items, that you can wear yourself, give as a gift to friends and family or sell in your online shop. If you're new to making jewelry this course will give you the tips and confidence you need. You will learn how to turn your hobby into a business and create unique jewelry using your imagination and skill. This is why even jewelry that is made of less costly materials like plastics can be a real work of art. The question that arises in the mind of any buyer is if handmade items are indeed more beautiful than factory-made pieces? Anyone who has received handmade jewelry as gifts will confirm that those pieces are unique and are easy to identify as handmade items. People who select to make jewelry on their own always make sure that their design is unique and defines their personality. The freedom of making personalized designs is made possible by a wide range of materials available for buying. You can buy online or in specialized shops a great variety of beautiful beads that you can combine as you wish, to match them to the clothing you prefer to wear or express your own style and personality. The combinations of materials and designs are unlimited and it is up to your own imagination to create wonderful items that you will wear with pride.

Anyone who wants a simple, beginner-friendly introduction to the world of jewelry making.

courses.title: Punjabi Suit Making/Sewing Course
courses.bio: Learn to sew perfectly fitting Punjabi suit with this course.
objectives: Admiring and gasping looking at beautifully sew Punjabi suits and patiala salwar and wondering how the hell are they sewn ? Well wonder no more !
This course will teach you exactly how to sew your dry own Punjabi suit even though you are complete beginner.
Starting right from taking precise measurements to making well drafted pattern to sewing perfectly fitting suit, we have every thing covered.
Learn to sew this gorgeous piece of garment in price less than an actual Punjabi suit itself, plus you get to all it designed coz YOU ARE THE DESIGNER !

Drafting the patterns: Drafting the pattern for pants (patiala salwar)

requirements: No prior knowledge of pattern making or sewing required. Basic machine handling would be helpful but that can be learnt on my YouTube channel, just look for D Sew Club and unlock treasure of dress making video absolutely free!
courses.description:
Punjabi suits and Punjabi salwar are traditional wear for all age group feminine beauty and now the craze for this attire is spreading worldwide. In ethnic events or casual get together, Punjabi Salwar Suits are preferred choice by majority of females in India. This clothing is loved by all women and is very much comfortable. During wedding season girls always prefer to wear salwar kameez because of its diverse advantage of giving perfect style, sheer luxury and great comfort fit. In these traditional outfits, there is lot of trending innovations being introduced. These dresses are suitable for all functions whether it is a wedding, party, traditional function or any other function or you can say it is common clothing wore by maximum women.


Punjabi salwar and suits are made up of fabric like georgette, crepe, Silk cotton and much more . Salwar and suit looks more elegant after embroidery work and various designs done in it, the printed duppatta too are gaining an heart throbbing attention in recent times.

In the ancient Punjab region, people wore cotton clothing. The tops lied till knees for both the genders. A scarf was worn over the tops which would be draped over the left shoulder and under the right. A large sheet would be further draped over one shoulder which would hang loose towards the knees. Both sexes wore a dhoti around the waist. Modern Punjabi dress has retained this outfit but over its long history has added other forms of dress.
target_audience: Women across the world admiring Indian/Punjabi wear and Bollywood fashion and would like to sew there own (or others) styled and designed clothes.

courses.title: How To BE a Fashion Designer ~ 4-Hour Master Course
courses.bio: What Makes A Great Designer: Discover Your Creative Voice ~ Sketching, Draping, Fabrics, Pattern Making, Branding, etc.
objectives: Learn how to be a skillful fashion designer
Courses to take to be a fashion designer

requirements: No requirements or prerequisites or experience necessary. You will learn everything you need by taking this course.
courses.description:
Welcome to "How To Be A Fashion Designer" – your doorway to unlocking the Fashion Designer within you! If you've ever wondered what sets great designers apart and how to become one yourself, this course is your journey of creativity and discovery.
~ In this course you won't just learn the technical skills of a designer. More importantly, you'll uncover what makes YOU a unique designer: your inspirations, your motivations, and your creative drive. This course dives deep into the heart of fashion design, exploring how to tap into your unique creativity and transform it into innovative designs.
What Sets This Course Apart?
~ What sets this course apart from other fashion design courses? It's all about you – your individuality, your vision, and your creative voice. While other courses might focus solely on the technical aspects, this course starts from within, encouraging you to commit to being a designer from the outset. This approach is transformative because it builds a strong foundation of self-awareness and confidence, which are essential for a successful career in fashion design.
Course Content Overview
~ Of course, you'll master essential skills like sketching, draping, pattern making, branding, marketing, and textiles. But we'll go beyond that. This course is a transformative journey, taking you through exercises that will awaken your creative self. Imagine being able to create your own designs and develop your own brand, knowing the power lies in your hands. This transformation is priceless.
Module 1: Introduction to Fashion Design
~ We'll introduce you to the world of fashion design. This foundational knowledge will provide context for your creative journey and help you understand where your unique vision fits within the broader landscape of fashion.
Module 2: Fashion Sketching
~ Fashion sketching is a fundamental skill for any designer: you'll learn how to translate your ideas onto paper. We'll cover basic sketching techniques, and how the body "moves"..
Module 3: Fashion Draping
~ Draping is an essential technique for bringing your designs to life. We will review how to drape fabric on a dress form to create garments. Draping allows you to experiment with your designs in a tangible way, giving you a deeper understanding of how your ideas will look and feel in real life.
Module 4: Pattern Making
~ Pattern making is the bridge between your sketches and the final garment. In this module, you'll learn how to create patterns that will be used to cut and assemble your designs. We'll cover some basic pattern-making techniques. Learning pattern making is crucial for ensuring that your garments are both beautiful and functional.
Module 5: Fabrics and Textiles
~ Understanding fabrics and textiles is key to making informed design decisions. This module will introduce you to different types of fabrics, their properties, and how to choose the right fabric for your designs.
Module 6: Branding and Marketing
~ Creating beautiful designs is only part of being a successful fashion designer. Knowing how to market your creations and build a brand is important. In Branding & Marketing we review the principles of branding, how to create a brand identity, and effective marketing strategies for reaching your target audience.
Module 7: The Business of Fashion
~ The fashion industry is a business, and understanding the business side is crucial for your success. You'll need a business plan, and navigate the complexities of manufacturing, and you'll be equipped with the knowledge you need to turn your passion for fashion into a thriving business.
Unleashing Your Creativity
~ A significant part of this course is dedicated to helping you unleash your creativity. We'll explore various sources of inspiration, from nature and art to cultural influences and personal experiences. You'll learn techniques for brainstorming and developing new ideas, as well as how to keep a design journal to document your creative process.
~ Creativity is not just about having great ideas; it's also about being able to refine and execute those ideas effectively. We'll guide you through the process of developing a design, including how to create mood boards, and experiment with different design elements.
Transformative Learning Experience
This course is designed to be a transformative learning experience. Through a series of engaging exercises, you'll develop a rich understanding of what it truly means to be a fashion designer. You'll move from doubt to certainty, gaining confidence in your abilities and clarity in your vision.
~ One of the unique aspects of this course is the emphasis on personal growth and self-discovery. You'll be encouraged to explore your own motivations and aspirations, and to think deeply about what you want to achieve as a designer. This introspective approach will help you build a strong sense of identity and purpose, which is essential for navigating the challenges of the fashion industry.
Students Success Stories
I've received countless emails from students who say this course has revived a long-dormant dream. They are now inspired to pursue their passion for fashion design with renewed vigor. Here are a few success stories from former students:
Emily S.: "This course changed my life. I always wanted to be a fashion designer but didn't know where to start. The exercises helped me discover my unique style and gave me the confidence to launch my own clothing line."
James T.: "I was stuck in a creative rut, but this course reignited my passion for design. The modules on sketching and draping were particularly helpful, and I loved the focus on personal growth."
Maria L.: "The business module was a game-changer for me. I learned how to create a business plan and manage my finances, which gave me the tools I needed to turn my hobby into a full-time career."
The Puzzle of Fashion Design
~ The fashion industry is a complex puzzle, and by the end of this course, you'll understand how all the pieces fit together. You'll gain a profound understanding of what it means for YOU to be a designer, achieving a sense of accomplishment and clarity.
Embrace Your Unique Genius
~ Redefine your perception of fashion design. Embrace your unique genius and join this exciting adventure. The rewards of taking this course are invaluable, and it will be fun!
Are You Ready to Start Your Journey?
Don't let fear or uncertainty hold you back. This course is designed to empower you, giving you the skills, knowledge, and confidence you need to succeed in the fashion industry.
Whether you're just starting out or looking to take your career to the next level, "How To Be A Fashion Designer" will provide you with the tools and support you need to achieve your goals.
By enrolling in this course, you're making an investment in yourself and your future. The knowledge and skills you gain will serve you well throughout your career, helping you stand out in a competitive industry and make your mark as a designer.
Are you ready to unlock your potential and become the designer you were meant to be?
Enroll in "How To Be A Fashion Designer" today and start your journey towards a fulfilling and successful career in fashion design.
~ The future is in your hands, and it starts now!
See you in class! Ciao!
target_audience: This course is for beginners and intermediate students interested in learning about fashion design, producing a fashion collection, and starting your own brand.

courses.description:
Are you someone who dreams of designing and stitching saree blouses from scratch? Whether you're a homemaker, fashion enthusiast, or aspiring boutique owner, this beginner-friendly course will help you confidently create your own perfectly fitting saree blouse.
In this structured course by Deepa, a self-taught designer and popular YouTube educator, you’ll learn to:
Take accurate body measurements
Draft a blouse pattern (including princess cut and waistband)
Cut fabric with precision
Stitch and finish a professional-looking saree blouse
This course is created with simplicity in mind. All videos are clear, practical, and recorded in real-time so that you can follow along without needing prior experience.
By the end of the course, you'll be able to create beautiful, custom-fit saree blouses for yourself or your clients!


What you’ll learn:
How to take body measurements for a blouse
Drafting a basic saree blouse (front and back)
Adding waistband and princess seam to the draft
Fabric cutting with practical tips
Stitching step-by-step with detailed explanations
Finishing and final fitting tips
Who this course is for:
Beginners in tailoring and blouse making
Homemakers and women seeking financial independence
Small business owners or boutique starters
Anyone interested in Indian ethnic wear design
Viewers of Deepa’s YouTube channel who want an ad-free, structured learning path
Course Requirements:
Basic tailoring tools (measuring tape, ruler, chalk, scissors, machine, etc.)
Interest and patience to learn
No prior tailoring or fashion design experience required
target_audience: Beginners in tailoring and blouse making
Homemakers and women seeking financial independence
Small business owners or boutique starters
Anyone interested in Indian ethnic wear design
Anyone looking for perfection in Blouse fitting

courses.title: Handmade Jewelry Course
courses.bio: The basics of jewelry making
objectives: The basics of jewelry making with tips, techniques, and how-to become familiar with the different findings used in jewelry creation.
Understand how to use handmade jewelry tools
Learn how to make handmade jewelry that they want to sell
Understand jewelry design principles and color combinations
Introduce a range of jewellery making techniques
Learn to choose the right materials for your handmade jewelry designs based on style, durability, and affordability.
Master the technique of stringing beads and cord to create different styles of necklaces and bracelets.

How to Make Bracelets: Soccer Ball Leather Bracelet with Lobster Claw Clasp
Beaded Bracelet with Lobster Claw Clasp
How to Make a Biceps Bracelet: Armband to Decorate the Upper Arm
How to Make Necklaces: Cowrie Shell Necklace with Red Leather Cord
Making a Chain Necklace for Women

requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description:
Humans have been adorning themselves with jewelry for thousands of years. Creating your own jewelry designs is fascinating. Each jewelry item you create is unique and has its own story to tell. When you create handmade jewelry you use specific jewelry making techniques and you add to this knowledge your own imagination, when you combine the colors or the materials. You need some tools, accessories beads and cord and you are ready to begin. When making your own jewelry, you have to choose the materials. If you are a beginner, it is advisable that you use materials such as common beads, thread, cord, or other affordable materials. You don’t want to work with expensive gems or metals when you are a beginner because something may go wrong and you could damage the precious material. You can find different kinds of beads, made of different materials, with different colors and shapes that you can combine the way you like, in order to create the best color combination or an esthetic structure. You can make this jewelry for yourself, or you can give it as a present to your friends or relatives or you can even sell it, in order to make a profit.
In this course, we will explore various techniques for creating handmade jewelry. You’ll learn how to design and craft pieces using simple tools and materials, such as beads, cords, and threads. We will discuss different styles, from elegant and sophisticated to boho and casual, and teach you how to personalize your jewelry according to your taste. You'll also discover how to choose the right materials and tools to match your desired designs and learn how to create sturdy and durable jewelry that will last. Additionally, you’ll get an introduction to adding embellishments like charms, pendants, and clasps to enhance your creations. Whether you want to create pieces for yourself, make thoughtful gifts, or even start a small jewelry business, this course will provide you with the skills to turn your creative ideas into reality.
target_audience: People who like making beautiful handmade jewelry that they want to sell.
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

courses.title: Straight Stitch Sewing for Beginners - tension, seams, hems
courses.bio: Make a Pencilcase and Cardholder using skills learnt on a straight stitch sewing machine
objectives: How to thread your machine for correct tension
How to check that your tension is correct for straight stitching
Stitch length for various applications
How to adjust your sewing machine foot pressure
2 methods to finish straight stitching; french seam and hem
How lining can finish garments using only straight stitch
Edgestitching
Complete a pencil case
Complete a cardholder

Getting your straight stitch right - ten: Tension: How to thread your machine
Can I get my adjustment right?
Simple finished seams and hems using str: Gather scraps for learning seams and hem.
Pencilcase: Using a french seam to finish the pencilcase
Cardholder: Putting card holder together with elastic

requirements: A working sewing machine
Scissors
Ruler/Measuring Tape
Pins
Pencil
Iron
Woven non stretch fabric (2 colours/patterns preferable)
Matching thread
Zip
Elastic
courses.description:
The course covers 5 sections:


an introduction
how to set up your sewing machine to get your thread tension, foot pressure and stitch length correct (including a quiz).
how to do french seams, hems, linings and edgestitching using straight stitch.
how to make a lined pencilcase with the skills learnt.
how to make a cardholder using the skills learnt.


The course uses video footage of an older domestic sewing machine with simple adjustable parts. Mention is made of how other models may be set up, but reference is to parts and systems that all simple domestic machines have.


The course is meant for beginners that are using a simple domestic machine as a way to make simple items for themselves, friends as gifts and/or items to be made for sale. The 2 items that are made are finished well, so that they are suitable for sale. They are also quick to make in repetition, using only a small amount of fabric and notions. The pencil case and cardholder can be changed in size and fabric type so that other items can be made, like toiletries bags, makeup bags, tissue holders, nappy wallets, and wet bags (instruction not included for these items).


Requirements of equipment to be able to complete the course:
A sewing machine (only needs to be able to sew straight stitch).
Sewing machine needles to suit the fabric type and weight.
Light/mid-weight woven fabric (preferably quilting); 100 x 110cm or 4 fat quarters.
Small scraps of fabric for testing your machine.
Matching thread
1  matching zip (20 - 30 cm)
16cm elastic (3 - 10mm width, as preferred)
Scissors
Pins
Ruler or measuring tape
Iron
Pencil (preferable tailors chalk pencil) for marking fabric.
target_audience: Beginner to intermediate sewers who want to complete well-finished garments with a straight stitch only.
Beginner sewers who want to make simple gifts or items for sale.

courses.description:
This is the second module of the Men's bespoke trouser making course.
Learners will understand how to create trousers for men. With tutorials in sewing techniques, you will develop the skills to hand or machine sew garments to fit for the client, developing the skills and knowledge to fit analysis, and adjusting the fit of clothing to specific body shapes and size. Gaining valuable knowledge in the art of made to measure clothing, and how to obtain a perfect fit of a garment. The skills obtained from the technical creation side of the course will give learners the understanding of garment details and components and fabrics used in different casual and tailored looks.
All the main details such as pockets, straight seams and fly are sewn by machine.The process of trouser making is an excellent garment for the student to hone their machine handling skills.With such a comprehensive trouser making video series you too could be making your own trousers in no time at all.
This course will prepare you for a career within the fashion industry. You will understand how to sew garments, fit to a person and design skills in creating trousers to specific body shapes. The knowledge and skills obtained in this course will provide a foundation of core abilities, which are used within the bespoke tailoring.
target_audience: For tailors who just in the beginning of their sewing journey

Build your first capsule wardrobe
De-clutter your wardrobe and learn how to keep things organized
Choose colors that work for your mood and your beauty
Wear prints with confidence
Master the art of shape and dressing

Style yourself uniquely
Shop confidently with easy guidelines

Shape Your Life: Confusing Fruits: Are you an Apple or Pear?
Additional content: What You Should Have In Your Bag!

courses.description:
Fashion: Style Yourself Flawlessly
Dress yourself with ease and confidence, without a personal stylist.


Be the best dressed woman in the room: Be filled with confidence, personal empowerment, while feeling sexy and feminine and most importantly becoming the best version of you!


After taking this course you will:
Choose colors that flatter your natural beauty
Feel confident dressing according to your shape
Organize your space to get most out of your wardrobe
Be amazing at accessorizing
Think outside the box with styles beyond the trends
Dress appropriately for any occasion
Become a smarter, more confident shopper
Enjoy experimenting with fashion!
There is a lot more to fashion than just picking out an outfit in the morning based on the weather patterns. The latest scientific studies shows that the outfit you choose to wear actually alters the way you interact with the world.
This course will help you choose garments that allow you to bring your A-game to both your professional and personal life. Learning how to carefully select items that enhance your best features will give a powerful edge. It might even open the door to new business ventures or better relationships. The image you project to the world through your clothes determines the quality of your connections, as well the relationship you have with yourself.
Your closet isn't just a box filled with fabric. Instead it is a doorway to creativity that allows you to express who you are, heighten your performance and quality of life. Ultimately it opens the gateway  for you to become the best version of YOU!


Take this course today, and become the best dressed woman in the room!




This course comes with a 30 day money back guarantee.
target_audience: Any woman who wants to gain confidence in fashion and styling
Any woman who wants to change or enhance the image they are projecting to the world through their clothes

courses.title: Beginner Sewing for Tweens and Teens
courses.bio: Through the creation of a small tote bag your teen/tween will learn how to use a sewing machine safely.
objectives: Safely operate a sewing machine and iron.
Learn to effectively control a sewing machine
Create a small tote bag.
Become familiar with industry standard sewing practices

Sewing machine basics: Lecture 7: The parts of the sewing machine
Stitching basics: Lecture 10: Controlling the machine and stitching practice
Construction of tote: Lecture 15: Constructing the outside of the tote
Conclusion: Lecture 20: Course conclusion and staying in touch

requirements: Student will need a sewing machine, iron, fabric and a willingness to learn a new skill.
Student will need to collect some basic supplies before beginning the class.
A trip to the fabric or craft store may be in order to purchase some supplies specific to sewing.
courses.description:
Beginner Sewing for Tweens and Teens is an introductory course to sewing meant to show you everything you need to know to safely operate a sewing machine. I will show you everything from machine set up to the construction of a simple tote bag.
Learn Basic Sewing Practices And Challenge Yourself to Create Your First Sewn Item
Learn how to safely operate a sewing machine
Practice basic stitching skills like creating corners and curving lines
Recognize problems and learn how to fix them
Learn how to read a sewing pattern
Properly cut fabric in preparation of sewing
Use industry standard construction and finishing sewing techniques
A Lifelong Skill With Unlimited Possibilities
Learning basics sewing skills is not only a rewarding skill but it is also something that you can develop over your lifetime. Start with something small and eventually work up to creating your own clothing.
If you have ever considered going into the fashion field this is a great place to start. Unlike most home sewing courses I focus on industry standards and teach you how the professionals sew.
Course Overview
I designed this course for the absolute beginner. If your machine has never been out of the box, no worries, I will show you how to set it up, teach you about the parts of the machine and how to safely operate it to effectively sew together your very first project.
You’ll learn all of these things in 20 lectures with over 2.5 hours of video content plus a bonus lecture that shows you how to customize the pattern to create any size tote you wish.  Each lecture is broken down into easy to understand topics as to no overwhelm a beginner and created in real time so you can follow along or pause the lecture and pick it back up at any time.
By the time you finish this course you will be a confident seamstress well on your way to enjoying a skill that you can grow and develop over your lifetime. The machine will no longer be a scary machine but a place you visit for a creative outlet and a tool to help you construct some really cool stuff.
target_audience: This course is meant for tweens and teen who want to learn how to sew.
No prior sewing experience is necessary.
Younger students should have adult supervision especially while ironing and cutting fabric.
This course is probably not meant for someone looking to learn more advanced sewing techniques.

requirements: 具備基本手縫技巧
會使用家庭用裁縫機、熨斗
courses.description:
您是否曾被旗袍所呈現出的優美線條與高雅氣質所吸引?
您是否覺得要親手做出一件旗袍是不可能的事?
旗袍是華人文化的代表服飾之一，合身的線條和經典的剪方式裁可以展現東方女性的婉約之美。經過多年來東西方文化的交互影響，今天的旗袍不僅保留了傳統的曲線美感，也更能與時尚結合，呈現出多樣的韻味。
如果您是旗袍愛好者，現在是最好的機會在線上學習更深入的旗袍製作知識!
在超過七小時的教學影片中，淑玲老師將循序漸進的帶領您從量身開始、經過打版、裁布、縫製等過程到最後製作出一件量身訂做的旗袍。


完成課程後，您將可以學會:
認識旗袍打版與製作所需的工具
學會依照人體上的各個計測點取得製作旗袍所需的量身尺寸，進行基本款旗袍打版
學會圓襟、方襟、一字襟、長襟、與琵琶襟等襟型的旗袍打版
學會旗袍布色對花、上漿與燙縮拔等製作技巧
學會製作出一件基本款圓襟旗袍


淑玲老師教授旗袍與服裝製作已經有二十年的經驗，大多數學生在完成此課程後都能做出自己的第一件旗袍。其中許多同學在學習旗袍製作的技巧與概念後，將其應用到其他服裝款式的設計上，更呈現出令人驚豔的成果!
如果您也希望親手完成一件專屬自己的旗袍，歡迎馬上加入課程，我們一起完成您的夢想!
target_audience: 對於服裝製作有興趣的學員
對於旗袍製作有興趣的學員
就讀於服裝設計相關科系的學生
對於中國傳統服飾有興趣的學員
對於手工藝與縫紉有興趣的學員

courses.title: Merchandising Adaptive Fashion - The Shopping Experience
courses.bio: Ensuring adaptive fashion reaches the adaptive consumer through proper in-store and online merchandising.
objectives: Students will be introduced to adaptive fashion merchandising.
Students will gain an understanding of how to improve the in-person shopping experience for consumers with disabilities.
Students will gain an understanding of how to improve the online shopping experience for consumers with disabilities.
Students will analyze real-life examples of in-person and online shopping challenges and successes.
requirements: Please take Introduction to Adaptive Fashion, History of Adaptive Fashion, Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion, Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive, and Adaptive Fashion Market Overview prior to taking this course.

Adaptive design and universal design understanding may benefit learners in this course. To gain this understanding, please consider taking Developing Adaptive Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design, Developing Adaptive Fashion 2 - Universal Design, and Developing Adaptive Fashion 3 - Fit and Functionality.
courses.description:
This course, Merchandising Adaptive Fashion, takes a deep dive into the shopping experience of people with disabilities. By understanding the shopping experience, we can properly merchandise adaptive fashion to enable Disabled consumers to shop the thoughtfully developed adaptive fashion. While this course is geared towards merchandisers, buyers, and e-commerce specialists, learning what goes into merchandising adaptive fashion will also benefit designers, technical designers, production managers, marketing teams, company executives, and more. The prerequisites for this course are:
Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion
Course 2: History of Adaptive Fashion
Course 3: Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion
Course 4: Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive
Course 5: Adaptive Fashion Market Overview
In addition, students are encouraged to take Course 6: Developing Adaptive Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design, Course 7: Developing Adaptive Fashion 2 - Universal Design, and Course 8: Developing Adaptive Fashion 3 - Fit & Functionality in order to understand what goes into the adaptive fashion that is being merchandised.
Lecture 1 provides a brief instructor and course introduciton. Lecture 2 provides a merchandising overview, covering the goals of merchandising adaptive fashion and the importance of merchandising by looking at statistics around the shopping experience of people with disabilities. In lectures 3 and 4, you will learn the challenges of in-person and online shopping and how brands can improve the shopping experience to be more inclusive for all. In lecture 5, we will apply what we have learned to evaluate an in-person shopping experience and an online shopping experience. Wrapping up this course, Jessica Hayon, a fabric specialist, shares her experience as a Disabled shopper in lecture 6.
target_audience: Fashion merchandisers who want to learn about merchandising adaptive fashion.
Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers, buyers, production managers, product developers, e-Commerce specialists, and marketers who want to expand their knowledge of all facets of the adaptive fashion industry.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: Introduction: Make and Sell Custom Shirts w/ Merch by Amazon
courses.bio: Merch by Amazon allows anyone with a computer to offer their designs for sale on Amazon as print on demand shirts.
objectives: Create a Merch by Amazon account
Understand the digital file requirements for shirt designs
Use the Merch by Amazon platform to create their own shirt designs available for sale on Amazon
Become familiar with all of the Merch by Amazon account settings
requirements: Students should have an Amazon account to take this course
Students should be comfortable entering banking and tax information into their Amazon account
Basic photo editing skills (Photoshop or Illustrator) are beneficial but not mandatory
courses.description:
Merch by Amazon is Amazon's newest platform for content creators. It allows anyone to create and sell shirts right on Amazon's website with no upfront costs or minimum print runs. Anyone can now easily create custom branded shirts that their fans will love to wear. This course will help you get started and learn how to use the platform both optimally and creatively.

In this course, students will learn about the Merch by Amazon platform, the image requirements (dimensions and resolution), the royalty calculation system, and the content policies. Students will also learn about the different options and settings in their Merch by Amazon accounts and how to use them to optimize their shirt designs.

If you want to fast-track your understanding of the Merch by Amazon platform and get your shirt designs live and offered for sale on Amazon in as little as a few hours, then this course is for you. Students who complete this course will find that they have a better understanding of the technical aspects of the Merch by Amazon platform as well as the tools needed to create successful shirt designs.

Merch by Amazon is an absolutely incredible platform. This course will also show you the bigger opportunities that Amazon is offering by letting content creators upload print on demand shirt designs. Once a student completes this course, they will be able to use the Merch by Amazon platform for themself as well as be able to teach it to others.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to learn more about the Merch by Amazon platform
This course does not go into the details of in-app or in-game promotion of Merch by Amazon products

objectives: how to draw and illustrate in a variety of mediums from pencil and pen to coloured tools including pastels, watercolours and collage
You will leave the course having produced a mass of drawings & illustrations for your portfolio
This short course is a great introduction to experimental and expressive fashion drawing
exploring visual communication skills with fashion illustration & Developing your visual vocabulary
How to develop your personal drawing style

courses.description:
Do you want to develop your illustrative skills in the field of fashion?
This course offers you the chance to challenge the boundaries of fashion illustration.
You will be introduced to fashion illustration in its purest form. This course uses a variety of approaches to consider when illustrating fashion. Different ways of drawing and seeing the figure will be explored. For people who think they can't draw!
This course should improve your confidence and ability in fashion illustration. Some classes will focus on collage and I will be teaching you to experiment with a variety of media. You’ll investigate different concepts through drawing.  This course focuses on drawing & collage. Drawing and image making are central to the study of fashion illustration and are explored through the use of sketchbooks, drawing and the relationships between ideas.  This Fashion Illustration course reflects recent trends in the creative industries.
This fashion illustration course supports you to develop your own independent voice.  Developing your creative thinking as well as learning through experimentation.
target_audience: Crucial for anyone who wants to become a fashion designer
If you think you can't draw
The complete beginner.
