courses.title: Fashion Forecasting
courses.bio: Covers role of Fashion Forecaster, about the global Fashion industry, Fashion theories and eras, Forecasting of textile
objectives: Role of a Fashion Forecaster
About the global fashion industry - trends, theories, and eras
Textile and Colour Forecasting
7 Basic Fashion Statements
Fashion Forecast Research - Past, Present, and Future
requirements: Open To All Learners
courses.description:
Fashion forecasting is a domain of the Fashion Industry that primarily focuses on a variety of upcoming trends in terms of colours, fabrics, materials, apparels, textures, accessories, styles, and other elements that the industry constitutes.
Fashion forecasting is not only related to designing and manufacturing apparels at scale, but it majorly constitutes the key elements that define the fashion industry starting from the very basics of textiles.
The Fashion Forecasting course provides the necessary insights on different roles of a fashion forecaster. It is intricately designed to help students get a thorough understanding of which factors to consider when it comes to forecast fashion trends. The valuable insights in this course will guide you through the same.
The comprehensive program also covers the research-oriented approach required to predict fashion trends based on age groups, moods, and lifestyle of people in a particular demography. Such factors are important when planning to design demography and age-group specific apparels and accessories i.e. product management and strategizing marketing activities.
This course will shed light on the evolution of fashion in the world, fashion eras, seven basic fashion statements, segments which impact fashion trends like social, cultural, regional, etc., how to incorporate various themes while designing, and get consumer research hacks for product development and marketing.
target_audience: 1. Anyone Who Wants to Learn about Fashion Forecasting
2. Anyone who wants knowledge about Global Fashion Industry
3. Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion designers, fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers
4. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Design
5. For all entry level to advanced Fashion Designers

courses.title: Crea il Tuo Brand di Scarpe Made in Italy
courses.bio: Corso Completo Calzaturiero: Impara a Progettare, Produrre e Lanciare la Tua Collezione di Scarpe di Qualità
objectives: Conoscere a fondo le basi della calzatura
Analizzare e distinguere le principali figure calzaturiere
Sviluppare le prime idee creative attraverso la ricerca e l’ispirazione
Apprendere le basi del disegno tecnico e creativo
Conoscere la filiera produttiva calzaturiera
Preparare e gestire una prototipazione efficace
Interfacciarsi con fornitori e aziende
Analizzare costi, margini e prezzi di vendita
Costruire un’identità di brand solida e coerente
Sviluppare una collezione coerente e strategica
Pianificare il lancio e la promozione del proprio brand
requirements: Non è necessaria alcuna competenza nel settore calzaturiero: il corso parte dal livello base
courses.description:
Hai sempre sognato di creare il tuo brand di scarpe, ma non sai da dove cominciare? Questo corso è stato progettato proprio per te: per chi ha una passione autentica per la calzatura classica e vuole trasformarla in un business concreto, professionale e pronto a entrare nel mercato. È un percorso completo, ricco di contenuti tecnici e pratici, pensato anche per chi parte da zero, senza competenze pregresse nel mondo della moda.
Imparerai a sviluppare una collezione di calzature classiche, sia da uomo che da donna, come Oxford, Derbies, mocassini, décolleté e sandali, seguendo ogni fase essenziale del processo: dall'idea al prodotto finito. Partiremo dalla ricerca dei trend e dalle fonti d'ispirazione, per passare poi al disegno tecnico, alla creazione di moodboard professionali, alla selezione di pelli pregiate e materiali di qualità. Affronteremo la progettazione del prototipo e l’analisi della filiera produttiva, con un focus specifico su tutte le figure coinvolte: modellisti, orlatori, tecnici, fornitori di suole, tacchi, accessori e molto altro.
Approfondiremo inoltre i materiali più utilizzati, le tecniche di lavorazione artigianali e industriali, le differenze tra i vari modelli e come riconoscere la qualità costruttiva. Ti guiderò nella definizione dell’identità del tuo brand – naming, logo, storytelling – fino alla strategia di lancio, analisi di mercato e gestione della logistica.
Al termine del percorso, avrai tutte le competenze per creare, sviluppare e far crescere il tuo marchio di calzature partendo da zero.
Pronto a trasformare la tua passione in un brand di successo? Inizia ora il tuo viaggio nel mondo della calzatura di qualità!
target_audience: Il Creativo Emergente: Ha una grande passione per il mondo delle calzature e della moda, ma non ha mai avuto modo di formarsi in modo tecnico.

Il Designer Autodidatta: Ha già sperimentato il disegno o la progettazione, ma sente la necessità di acquisire conoscenze più strutturate sul mondo della calzatura, le tecniche di prototipazione, i materiali e le tipologie costruttive.
L’Aspirante Imprenditore della Moda: Vuole creare un proprio brand di calzature, ma non sa da dove iniziare.

Il Progettista Strategico: È interessato alla parte strategica, vuole capire come si sviluppa una collezione, come si costruisce l’identità di un brand, il naming, il packaging e tutte le scelte legate al posizionamento nel mercato.

Il Professionista del Settore Moda: Lavora già in ambito moda (abbigliamento, accessori o retail), ma desidera specializzarsi nella calzatura per ampliare le sue competenze e offrire nuovi servizi o progetti.

Il Freelance o Consulente Creativo: Lavora come grafico, art director o consulente nel mondo creativo e desidera approcciarsi al prodotto fisico, capendo le logiche di produzione, comunicazione e branding nel settore calzaturiero.

Il Rientrante o Ricollocato nel Settore: Ha già avuto esperienze nella filiera calzaturiera o nel design, ma vuole aggiornare le sue competenze e conoscere i nuovi approcci legati alla piccola produzione, al 3D, al marketing e alle collaborazioni artigianali.

Lo Studente di Moda o Design: Sta frequentando un percorso accademico o professionale nel mondo della moda e vuole integrare un corso pratico, mirato al footwear, per completare la sua preparazione con uno sguardo realistico sul mercato.

courses.title: Merch by Amazon Word Cloud T-Shirt Design
courses.bio: How To Create A Word Cloud TShirt Design For Merch By Amazon or Teespring or any of the other Print On Demand Platforms
objectives: DISCOVER where to source silhouettes for FREE for use as a mask
LEARN how to manipulate your chosen silhouette so that you can use it within your design
FIND OUT how to quickly and easily create a list words associated with your word cloud

DISCOVER how to add a mask to your word cloud
PREPARE your word cloud in the correct format to upload to Merch by Amazon
requirements: You should really be willing to treat Merch by Amazon as a business
It will help if you are creative or at least have an eye for a good design
courses.description:
The Merch by Amazon Word Cloud T-Shirt Design is a MUST-watch course for anyone serious about making money through Merch by Amazon - as this is the type of t shirt design that sells well on the platform.
What you will learn in this course
In this class, I am going to walk you through step-by-step how to create a Word Cloud tshirt design from scratch, which you can then sell on Merch by Amazon (or Teespring or Redbubble, etc.).
The class begins with an overview of the website where we will be creating the Word Cloud design and then takes a look at how to source the silhouette, which we shall use as the Image Mask for our Word Cloud.
The class then goes on to show how you will need to prepare your image mask for use in your Word Cloud Design and also how you can both generate and then add the word list for your Word Cloud.
Finally, the class shows you exactly how to create your Word Cloud Design from your mask image and word list as well as how to correctly incorporate the Word Cloud into a suitable t-shirt design that it is ready to upload for sale on Merch By Amazon.
So why not join me in this class today and discover how easy it is for us non-designers to create one of the types of t-shirt designs that sell well and make a great new side income through March by Amazon.
target_audience: People who would like to earn a substantial passive income through Merch by Amazon and other Print On Demand platforms

こんにちは、講師のMARIです。
今回は洋裁の立体裁断で袖を作る時に使用します、人工腕(bura)ブラの作り方の講座になります。
人台に腕を取り付け、袖のデザインを自由に、アレンジできます。

ボディだけでなく、人工腕があることで立体裁断の自由度がかなり上がります。
既製品もありますが、自分で作ることで愛着も生まれますし、
理屈がわかることで自分の使い勝手の良いようにアレンジすることもできる様になります。


立体裁断（ドレーピング）をする際の基礎力も上がるよう、講座の構成を考えました。
この腕作りを通じて、洋裁の楽しさも感じてもらえれば幸いです。

Necklaces for Men: Necklace with Fold Over Cord Ends
Leather Cord with Sliding Knot for Necklace
Anklets for Men: Rainbow Bead Anklet with Sliding Knot

requirements: Interest in creating handmade jewelry for men and to understand what tools and findings are necessary for jewelry making and how to use them
To want to learn the basic techniques of jewelry making that can afterwards be used to create other jewelry items that are totally unique
courses.description: When it comes to jewelry for men, there are many alternatives one can choose from. There are necklaces, cufflinks, watches, rings, and lapel pins that one can style according to the outfit. Small and easy to combine with other pieces of jewelry, bracelets make a great addition to any outfit. Coupled with a watch and a ring, bracelets have the potential to level up your entire outfit without drawing too much attention on themselves. Necklaces can be used to accentuate an outfit and there are hundreds of different styles and materials available. Pairing silver and black keep things monochrome and clean, while leather and gold will create a classic look. To achieve a stylish look, you should ensure that your materials match one another. Keeping things simple, matching materials, and avoiding being too flashy are some key rules to wearing jewelry for men. Since some pieces of jewelry might only be appropriate in particular circumstances, knowing when to wear and what to wear is crucial to improving your look without altering your outfit. Certain jewelry types may be restricted to particular settings. For the office, gold chains as well as flashy earrings aren’t the most appropriate choice and may infringe on the company’s dress code. Always keep dress expectations in mind. Some accessories may be inappropriate in some situations. Are you curious about the creation of jewelry and do you like making jewelry items for men? Do you want to understand more about the style of jewelry for men as well as the jewelry-making techniques? In this case, this course is made for you. This course will teach you what tools and findings you will need, will show you how to use them to create nice jewelry items, how to combine the colors, and what the jewelry making techniques are so that you will later be able to apply them in order to create your own unique jewelry pieces. In this course, you will understand how to create handmade jewelry for men, that you can wear, or sell, and thus turn your hobby into a job.
target_audience: People who want to learn how to create jewelry items for men.
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.
People who want to understand the use of tools and findings and the techniques necessary for the creation of nice jewelry items for men

courses.description:
Lerne umfangreiches Insider-Wissen zu Grundlagen, Berufseinstieg und Honorar!
Dieser Onlinekurs vermittelt alle nötigen Grundlagen, um als Modestylist arbeiten und vor allem Geld verdienen zu können.
Die Dozentin Janina Cüpper ist selber seit über 12 Jahren erfolgreiche freiberufliche Fashion Stylistin. Ihre Arbeit ist fokussiert auf Foto- und Bewegtbildproduktionen (Commercials & Editorials), sie hält Trendvorträge und moderiert Stylingvideos als Mode-Expertin für bekannte Bekleidungshersteller sowie verschiedene TV-Formate.
Da der Beruf des Modestylisten kein gängiger Ausbildungsberuf ist, ist es üblicherweise schwer an fundiertes Expertenwissen zu kommen, den Berufseinstieg zu finden und die meisten Bildungsmöglichkeiten sind teuer und zeitintensiv.
Dieser Kurs bietet endlich Abhilfe.
Du lernst step-by-step in 6 Kapiteln anschaulich und verständlich
· die nötigen Fachbegriffe, Styling-Tricks und Techniken zu beherrschen
· dein Styling Equipment zu besorgen inkl. Spartipps
· die üblichen Arbeitsabläufe kennen
· dein Portfolio aufzubauen
· Kunden zu akquirieren
· Budgets zu kalkulieren
· welche Honorare du fordern kannst
· uvm.
Das umfangreiche Arbeitsmaterial, Vorlagen, Linklisten, Honorartabellen und Budgetkalkulationen unterstützen deinen schnellen Lernerfolg und ermöglichen dir den sofortigen Berufseinstieg als Modestylist nach Kursabschluss.
Wenn du
· überlegst, ob der Beruf des Modestylisten das Richtige für dich ist
· bereits angehender Modestylist bist, aber dir der Berufseinstieg schwer fällt
· Quereinsteiger bist und dich weiterbilden möchtest
· Mode-Blogger bist, aber du nicht weißt, wie die Kleidung und Kooperationen für deine Beiträge beschaffen kannst
· von Mode begeistert bist und wissen möchtest, wie Fotoshootings ablaufen und wie die Arbeit eines Modestylisten aussieht
dann solltest du dich jetzt einschreiben!

courses.bio: Start your perfect design training now, from illustration to technical drawing, from intonation to collection design!
objectives: Sketching

Stylist

courses.description:
Everything you want to know about fashion design is at Start Now Fashion. Start your perfect design training now.
We will start our fashion design course with a straight line and you will learn basic charcoal pen applications such as shade bar, shading on geometric shapes and ribbon drawing in the first section. Then, you will learn to draw a fashion figures with face and body anatomy. 12 different hair style drawings are waiting for you. We will paint 3 different skin colors with colored pencils and marker pens. Then we have fashion illustrations based on bird and leopard themes.
In technical drawing section, you can develop your skills to apply technical drawing details to create basics such as the skirts, blouses, jackets, pants and dresses. In the new sections to be added, we will draw designs for skirts, trousers, dresses and jackets.
In the different fabric drawings section, you will find denim, knitwear and fur fabric drawings and applications on design. In the new sections to be added, there will be leather, satin, lace, chanel, chiffon, velvet and fringe fabrics.
In fashion collection design section, you will learn to design a collection that reflects the fashion taste of urban woman with a passion for nature and adventure. You will design an entire collection from dress to tunic, pants, and shirts by transferring the safari theme to fashion illustration, technical drawing and colouring with coloured pencils and markers.
In computer-aided designer section, you will learn artistic fashion illustrations with Adobe Photoshop and Procreate programs.
A complete online course is waiting for your with comprehensive course content, application files, homework, and special QA section.
Start Now Fashion fashion course is the right course for you with the course content that matches the fashion design process.
At the end of the course, you will get your certificate of participation and an amazing fashion portfolio.
The entire training set is prepared by Start Now Fashion team consisting of academicians and designers.
*We will continue to improve our course by adding new sections!

Those who want to be a Fashion Designer
Those aiming for a career in fashion design
Those who want to go to fashion school (Italy etc.)
Those who want to prepare a fashion portfolio

Make 2 different types of Aromatherapy bracelets
Make 2 Aromatherapy Necklaces
Intermediate Jewellery making skills
Learn to make a boutique quality cohesive story of aromatherapy jewellery that sits beautifully together.
requirements: Patience to learn and fine tune your skills

courses.description:
Welcome to this fantastic guide to this online aromatherapy jewellery class. Come join me in this class to master these skills so that you are able to unleash your creativity within. Once you start with the basics there is no end to where this could take you, there are truly so many benefits.
Learn to repair jewellery quickly
Create beautiful gifts for loved ones
Make yourself bespoke pieces in minutes
Create a jewellery business and work from home
Enjoy learning about Lava stone and it's incredible properties
It is so satisfying when you buy a new outfit and wish you could have a pair of earrings, bracelet or necklace to match or give your outfit that pop it needs. I cannot count the amount of times i have quickly whipped up accessories to wear for a special occasion or night out with friends, it is so satisfying that i have made them. Especially seeing the look on an admirers face when you tell them that it was YOU that made them. That always makes me smile and feel proud of myself.
Another skill this class will teach you is how to repair jewellery. We all have a few pairs of earrings that are missing a hook or a favourite necklace that just needs a clasp replaced. Well after this class you will be able to do exactly that and you'll be amazed how simple it is once you know how. The only thing is you'll have a queue of friends asking you to fix things!!
You will also be able to make inexpensive gifts for friends and family with your new skill. I have saved a fortune over the years by making my own gifts for my loved ones. Not only is this more special as it is handmade by you with your time and love, you can also personalise the jewellery too, to match an outfit or make a necklace length perfect for them using their favourite gemstone. It's a great gift to have and to use it to give. It also means that you don't need to fight the masses so much at the shops!! It's a win win.
I must say though that my favourite part of being able to create your own jewellery is that you can live your love and work from home, whether it be a side hustle or launch it into a full time career. It allows you to chose your own hours of work, be creative, have flexibility with family commitments and to do something you love! Who doesn't want that?
Jewellery making is a wonderful skill to have, practice and grow with so come with me and have some fun while i take you on a journey towards creative freedom.
You will learn:
How to master the tools
What components are
What a cohesive jewellery story is
About stringing materials
About the properties of Lava Stone
How Aromatherapy works
You will learn how to make this wonderful Aromatherapy jewellery story which comprises of:
Simple Lava drop earrings
Triple stud drop earrings
Elastic bracelet x 2
Pendant chain necklace
Long Lava beaded necklace with pendant
target_audience: Students wanting to create their own jewellery business from home
Creatives looking for a new skill
Aromatherapists looking for a new way to introduce their practice
People who want to make and wear their own unique jewellery

requirements: Nil
courses.description:
The Textile and Fashion Industry Training Centre Pte Ltd was established in 1983 and has been a long-term partner of SkillsFuture Singapore (SSG) as the appointed Continuous Education Training Centre (CET) of the textile and fashion industry. The school is also EduTrust certified by the Committee for Private Education (CPE).


Wish to know how to build quality into your products?
Join this course to learn about the principles of quality management. In this course you will be receiving a short crash course on understanding the importance of quality within the fashion industry and how to identify and maintain quality.
The multifaceted delivery will aid you in identifying problem areas and developing solutions to assure quality in the end product. Topics of this course will include statistical sampling, defects classification, product testing, safety standards, sample evaluation and report writing.


Objectives Include:
Principles of quality management
Comprehend inspection procedure and statistical sampling plan (AQL)
Interpret raw materials and apparel test reports
Evaluate apparel factories and fabric mills as per industry requirements
Perform fit evaluation as per industry standards
Monitor to sustain quality of products from suppliers and in-house process
Make decisions on non-conformities
Suggest action plan to improve work processes
Requirements for the class:
- No prior quality assurance experience is required. Students of all levels are welcome.
- Having clothes on hand would be great in learning how to identify defects.
- Simple mathematical calculation. Having a calculator can be helpful.
target_audience: Individuals who are interested in learning about quality in the apparel industry

courses.title: Become Fashion Designer, Draw Fashion Sketches & Note Book
courses.bio: Step By Step Complete Guideline to Become Fashion Designer, Draw Fashion Sketches & Note Book
objectives: How to Become a Fashion Designer
How to Draw Fashion Sketches
How to Make a Fashion Design Notebook
Creating Your Designs

How to Become a Fashion Designer: Working Out Which Fashion is Your Passion
Deciding if the Fashion Industry is Ready for You

requirements: There is no prerequisites
A wish to learn
courses.description:
Welcome to the course on "Become Fashion Designer, Draw Fashion Sketches & Note Book "
There is no formal education or certification required to become a successful fashion designer, but that doesn't make the feat any easier. To become a fashion designer, you will need to have a combination of drawing, sewing, and design skills, a knowledge of the fashion industry, and unparalleled perseverance. You'll also need to create a strong fashion portfolio and strengthen your knowledge of business and finance in general.
In the fashion world, new designs are presented in the form of hand-drawn sketches before they’re actually cut and sewn. First you draw a croquis, the model-shaped figure that serves as the base of the sketch. The point is not to draw a realistic-looking figure, but a blank canvas of sorts on which to display illustrations of dresses, skirts, blouses, accessories and the rest of your creations. Adding color and details like ruffles, seams and buttons helps to bring your ideas to life.
If you've ever wanted to design fabulous fashion pieces but didn't know where to start, there are simple ways you can get your creative energies flowing! Start with putting together a fashion design notebook so you can have a tangible collection of your designs all in one place. It's a great way to impress your friends and colleagues, and it's easy to get started.
So Let's Get Started!
target_audience: Anyone can take this course
Students can take this course
College level students can take this course

courses.title: Learn to Sew in 7 Days
courses.bio: Learn to Sew in 7 Days Online Sewing Course
objectives: You will get to know the sewing machine.
You will learn about the equipment and accessories used in sewing.
You will be able to solve common sewing problems.
You will be able to create your first sewing project and start gaining experience in this field.
You will learn to sew in 7 days.

DAY 1: Which Machine Should I Start Sewing With?
DAY 2: What Type of Fabrics Should I Start With?
DAY 4: Getting to Know the Sewing Machine

requirements: No experience is required. You will learn everything you need to know in this course.
courses.description:
Who is Tuğba İşler?


Hello! I'm Tuğba İşler. I graduated from Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in 2011.


After graduating, I started gaining experience in the field of fashion design.


I am married and a mother of one child.


I share all the knowledge and experience I have gained so far through my YouTube channel and Udemy platform with video courses and e-books in PDF format.


In my courses, I teach even those who have never sewn before how to design, pattern, and sew in the simplest way possible.


With my slogan "Design with me, pattern, cut, and sew." I will be offering beginner to advanced level courses, starting from the basics. Stay tuned.


Why should you receive support from me?


I am Learning
I no longer say that I know everything. I continue to receive education. I am constantly researching and learning new things.


I am Teaching
I teach what I've learned using my own teaching methods. I simplify the topics that you find difficult.


I provide ideas
I provide ideas that can make many things easier or yield better results.


I Provide Support
I answer your questions during or after my online lessons. We start the learning process together and continue together.


Content Creator - Fashion Designer - Instructor
target_audience: This online course is suitable for anyone interested in sewing, those who are new to sewing, or those with some knowledge who want to improve their skills.

courses.title: Men's Fashion: Tips on How To Dress Well
courses.bio: Feel confident with the clothes you wear and experiment with fashion through the principles shared in this course!
objectives: Effectively search for inspiration on high-quality fashion blogs
Recognize different styles of fashion that they appreciate
Apply the 3 principles of “fit, simple, and unique” when making fashion choices
Make smart purchase decisions -- whether they’re looking online or in stores
requirements: Just to have a desire to learn about mens fashion and experiment with new frameworks on how to think about it
courses.description:
Ever looked at your wardrobe and thought "I have so many different things that I could wear, and looks I could try, but I don't know where to start?"
Well we've all been there, and this is the course that will help you think through your own personal style and how to feel great about your wardrobe and what you choose to wear!
In this action packed course, Gregory and Linos will walk you through the gamut of things you need to know - from providing a high level overview of our viewpoint on mens fashion, to introducing three key principles that we follow which makes it easier for us to make decisions on what to wear, to looking at different pieces of clothing piece-by-piece so you can see how the framework applies to individual items, to how you can gain confidence and inspiration for new ideas and looks about fashion!
target_audience: Our course is for males between 21 - 50 who want to have fun with fashion and want to dress to impress at work or when going out.

courses.title: Adaptive Fashion Introduction Course Bundle
courses.bio: From introduction to history to customer and market, get the first 5 of our courses with this bundle!
objectives: Students will gain a wholistic overview of the challenges faced by people with disabilities in relation to clothing, fashion, and shopping.
Students will be introduced to language, terms, and equipment used in the adaptive fashion space.
Students will learn the innovations in fashion that laid the foundation for adaptive fashion to develop.
Students will gain an understanding of why disability representation in fashion matters.
Students will explore the size, scope, price points, and key players of the adaptive fashion market.
Students will understand the strategies to make fashion that works for Disabled people, including the three approaches to clothing by people with disabilities.
requirements: No prior adaptive fashion knowledge or experience needed, just an interest in learning about adaptive fashion and becoming a more inclusive member of society!
courses.description:
This bundle course is perfect for those looking to get a complete introduction to adaptive fashion. From introduction through history to customer and market, this 5-course-pack covers everything one needs to know to start exploring adaptive fashion! This course is intended for individuals in the fashion industry looking to expand their professional knowledge or who are looking to make the fashion industry more inclusive of people with Disabilities. This course is also well suited for high school, undergraduate, and graduate students interested in learning more about adaptive fashion. This course will benefit students, designers, technical designers, production managers, merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. No prerequisites are needed to take this course.
This course covers the first 5 of Vollbrecht Adaptive Consulting's individually sold courses. The courses within this bundle are:
Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion
Course 2: History of Adaptive Fashion
Course 3: Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion
Course 4: Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive
Course 5: Adaptive Fashion Market Overview
In this 5-course bundle, students will also hear from Disabled activists, as their share their immense knowledge and experiences. Guest speakers include model and actress Jillian Mercado and fashion blogger Molly Farrell.
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Fashion merchandisers who want to learn about merchandising adaptive fashion.
Production managers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion buyers who want to learn about adaptive fashion.
E-Commerce specialists who want to learn about adaptive fashion e-commerce.
Marketing professionals who want to learn about marketing adaptive fashion.
Product Developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: Desenho Técnico de Moda Digital Avançado
courses.bio: Domine a Representação de Costuras
objectives: Criar desenhos técnicos que transmitam suas ideias com clareza
Entender os maquinários e costuras ideais para cada tipo de tecido
Desevolver habilidades de representação digital das costuras e acabamentos
Dominar a criação de desenhos técnicos precisos, garantindo uma comunicação clara e eficiente com toda a equipe de produção.
requirements: Computador com sistema operacional Windows
instalar o corel draw
courses.description:
Se você já domina os fundamentos do desenho técnico de moda digital e busca aprimorar suas habilidades, este curso é o seu próximo passo! Aqui, você mergulhará no fascinante mundo da representação detalhada de costuras e acabamentos, dominando as técnicas para dar vida às suas criações em diferentes tipos de tecido, como planos, jeans e malha.
O que você vai aprender:
Documentação técnica: Domine a criação de fichas técnicas precisas e desenhos técnicos impecáveis, garantindo uma comunicação clara e eficiente com toda a equipe de produção.
Tecidos e maquinários: Explore as características de diferentes tecidos e os maquinários ideais para cada tipo de costura, dominando a escolha dos materiais e técnicas mais adequados para cada projeto.
Representação precisa de costuras: Aprenda a representar cada detalhe das costuras e acabamentos em seus desenhos técnicos, eliminando dúvidas e garantindo a execução perfeita das suas criações.
Ao final deste curso, você estará apto a:
Criar desenhos técnicos impecáveis que refletem seu conhecimento profundo sobre costuras, acabamentos e tecidos.
Comunicar suas ideias com clareza e confiança para toda a equipe de produção.
Garantir que suas criações sejam executadas com perfeição, do conceito à confecção.
Impressionar seus colegas e clientes com seu domínio técnico e atenção aos detalhes.
Abrir portas para novas oportunidades no mercado da moda.
Prepare-se para elevar suas habilidades em desenho técnico de moda digital a um novo patamar e transformar suas criações em realidade!
target_audience: amantes de moda
profissionais de moda
estudantes de moda

courses.title: محترف معتمد في صناعة الأزياء
courses.bio: Certified Fashion Industry Professional (CFIP) : امتحانات عملية
courses.description:
تنبيه، هذه ليست دورة دراسية بل إعداد لاختبار تقييم
مرحبًا بك في دورة المحترف المعتمد في صناعة الأزياء (CFIP) . هذا البرنامج الشامل للشهادات مصمم لتزويد الأفراد بفهم عميق لصناعة الأزياء. من خلال مزيج من المعرفة النظرية والتطبيق العملي، سوف يكتسب المشاركون الخبرة في مختلف جوانب الصناعة، بما في ذلك مبادئ التصميم والنسيج واستراتيجيات التجزئة والممارسات المستدامة. بالنسبة للمحترفين المتطلعين، يقدم CFIP فرصة فريدة للحصول على تفوق تنافسي في سوق العمل. من خلال الحصول على هذه الشهادة، يمكن للأفراد أن يبرزوا كفاءتهم والتزامهم بالمجال،
مما يجعلهم يبرزون للأرباب العمل المحتملين. تعتبر شهادة CFIP خطوة قوية نحو دخول صناعة الأزياء، حيث تتيح للمشاركين الانتقال بثقة من الأكاديمية إلى العالم المهني. علاوة على ذلك، CFIP ليس مفيدًا فقط لأولئك الذين يبدأون مسيراتهم المهنية ولكن أيضًا للمحترفين ذوي الخبرة الذين يسعون إلى تعزيز مهاراتهم والبقاء على اطلاع على أحدث اتجاهات الصناعة. الأزياء هي مجال متطور دائمًا يعتمد على الابتكار والقدرة على التكيف. من خلال التسجيل في CFIP، يمكن للأفراد ذوي الخبرة توسيع معرفتهم باستمرار والبقاء ذات الصلة في صناعة تطلب النمو والتطور المستمر. الشركات ضمن صناعة الأزياء أيضًا تستفيد من مزايا كبيرة عن طريق توظيف المحترفين المعتمدين من CFIP
. توظيف الأفراد الحاصلين على هذه الشهادة الرفيعة يضمن مستوى معين من الكفاءة ويقلل من الحاجة إلى التدريب الشامل والتوجيه. وهذا يتيح للشركات تبسيط عمليات التوظيف وتخصيص الموارد بشكل أكثر كفاءة، مما يعزز في النهاية الإنتاجية والأداء العام. علاوة على ذلك، فإن القوى العاملة المعتمدة تسهم في سمعة الشركة وصورتها العلامة التجارية. العملاء وأصحاب المصلحة يقدرون الخبرة والمصداقية المرتبطة بـ CFIP، مما يعزز الثقة والأصالة. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، يمكن للمحترفين المعتمدين أن يلعبوا دورًا حاسمًا في مساعدة الشركات على دمج الممارسات المستدامة والأخلاقية في عملياتها.
مع فهم عميق للممارسات الأزياء المستدامة، يمكن للأفراد المعتمدين من CFIP مساعدة الشركات في تلبية الطلب المتزايد على المنتجات والعمليات صديقة للبيئة. يعمل دورة CFIP كبوصلة للأفراد الذين يتجولون في مساراتهم المهنية ضمن صناعة الأزياء. وهو يساعد المشاركين في تحديد قوتهم واهتماماتهم، مما يتيح لهم اتخاذ قرارات مستنيرة حول أي مناطق الأزياء يجب أن يركزوا عليها. من خلال سد الفجوة بين التعلم النظري والتطبيق العملي، يزود CFIP المشاركين بالأدوات والمهارات اللازمة للتغلب على التحديات بفعالية وبناء مهن ناجحة ومستدامة. في الختام، دورة المحترف المعتمد في صناعة الأزياء (CFIP) هي أصل لا يقدر بثمن للأفراد والشركات العاملة ضمن صناعة الأزياء. يمكنه تمكين الأفراد بالخبرة والثقة والمصداقية، بينما يوفر للشركات قوى عاملة معتمدة تعزز الكفاءة والسمعة والابتكار. انضم إلينا في هذه الرحلة التحويلية نحو التميز في عالم الأزياء المتغير.



ضمان استرداد الأموال بنسبة 100%:

نحن نقدم ضمان استرداد الأموال بنسبة 100% لدورتنا. إذا لم تكن راضيًا عن اشتراكك لأي سبب، يمكنك طلب استرداد الأموال في غضون 30 يومًا دون الحاجة إلى تقديم تبرير.

إخلاء مسؤولية:

هذا الاختبار التجريبي غير الرسمي مخصص لتكميل الإعداد للامتحان ولا يضمن الحصول على الشهادة.

نحن لا نوفر أسئلة الامتحان الحقيقية أو المخرجات. هدفنا هو تقديم المواد الدراسية واختبارات الممارسة لدعم المتعلمين في الإعداد لامتحاناتهم.

بينما يمكن أن يساعدك في الاستعداد للامتحان الشهادي، من الضروري الجمع بينه وبين موارد الدراسة الشاملة والخبرة العملية للحصول على أفضل إعداد للامتحان.

الأسئلة المتضمنة هي أمثلة لمساعدتك في تقييم إتقانك للمحتوى.

جميع علامات الشهادة المذكورة في هذه الدورة تنتمي إلى أصحابها المعنيين. نحن لا نمتلك أو ندعي أي حقوق على أي من العلامات المذكورة.
target_audience: لأفراد الذين يهتمون بمتابعة مهنة في صناعة الأزياء.
يهدف برنامج CFIP إلى تزويد الطلاب بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة للنجاح في صناعة الأزياء المنافسة.

courses.bio: DESİNATÖRLÜK BECERİSİ,ACCURATE 4 VE 5 PUNCH PROGRAMI KULLANIM BİLGİSİ.
objectives: ACCURATE PROGRAMININ KULLANIM ÖZELLİKLERİ
ACCURATE PROGRAMIYLA ÇİZİM NASIL YAPILIR
ACCURATE PROGRAMIYLA PUNCH NASIL YAPILIR
KLAVYE KISA YOL TUŞLARI VE PRATİK KULLANIMI
requirements: Temel düzeyde bilgisayar bilmek,Bu işe meraklı olmak.
courses.description:
Sanayi ve ev tipi nakış makineleri için, bilgisayar destekli desen hazırlama programı olan, Accurate 4 ve 5 programını, sektöre, piyasa ve makine şartlarına uygun halde kullanmayı öğrenerek, hayalini kurduğunuz tekstil tasarımı kariyer hedefinize, bir adım daha yaklaşabilirsiniz. Piyasa içinde sizden beklenenleri önceden bilecek ve buna uygun tasarımları istenen düzeyin üstünde niteliklerle tamamlayabileceksiniz. Eğitim videoları sayesinde geri dönük sorunları karşınıza çıktığı anda nasıl bertaraf edeceğinizi bileceğiniz sürekli bir arşive sahip olacaksınız.
Alacağınız eğitim sayesinde, ister konuya dahil sektör firmalarında işe girebilir, ister bu gibi firmalar için online çalışma düzeninde, istediğiniz yerden ve istediğiniz kadar çalışarak, desenler tasarlayabilir, isterseniz kendi ajans ve ofisinizi kurarak, sektör içinde yeni bir online iş sahibi olabilirsiniz.
Nakış, brode, gipür nedir? Tasarımları nasıl olmalıdır? Punch nedir ve nasıl yapılır? Dikkat edilmesi gereken detaylar nelerdir?Doğru ve spesifik fikirler nasıl oluşturulur? Multidisipliner düşünce tarzında nasıl desen oluşturulur?
Tüm bu soruların cevaplarını Accurate 4 ya da 5 eğitim videolarını izleyerek bilgi deponuza saklayacak ve yeri geldiğinde kullanabileceksiniz.
İlk andan son ana kadar tasarım ve punch süreci nasıl işleme alınır ve makinede nakış işlemesi çalışılıp elde edilene kadar olan süreç nasıl ilerler tüm detaylarıyla anlatımlarına sahip olabileceksiniz.
Tüm süreçlerle ilgili derinlemesine bilgi alacağınız gibi, gelecekte vizyoner ve deneyimli bir punchor olarak çalışmalarınıza profesyonel firmalarla devam edebilirsiniz.
target_audience: Sanayi ve ev tipi nakış makinesinde bilgisayar destekli nakış tasarımı yapanlar yapmak isteyenler,bilgisayar operatörleri,grafik çizim yapanlar,nakış firmalarında çalışanlar ve çalışmak isteyenler,moda,tekstil,konfeksiyon,tasarım gibi bölümlerde okuyan öğrenciler,kendisini yaptığı işte geliştirmek isteyenler için ideal bir eğitimdir.

Understand your body and learn how to enchance your best features.
Get to know your own style personality and why this is so important for your style.
Find out what needs to stay and what needs to go in your wardrobe.

Discover the essentials of your personal style and how you can apply them to your desired style.

Find out how to mix and match your outfits like a pro so you will always have something to wear.
Learn about the right colors that work for you and how they can make a huge difference to your overall appearance.
Choose garments that flatter your body type and how to bring your figure in perspective with the right colors, lines, cuts and fabrics.
Are you ready to get more style and save lots of money from not buying the wrong clothes?
Then you will love this Course that will change your style and how you feel about yourself forever.
target_audience: Any woman who wants to save money by buying the right clothes
Any woman who wants to create her own style and to be more attractive and confident in her style

courses.title: Desenho de Moda - Calçado Feminino
courses.bio: Conheça o universo do sapato feminino desde sua história, o desenho, as técnicas de pintura e a matéria-prima utilizada.
objectives: O curso Design de Calçados é perfeito para aqueles que desejam desenvolver suas habilidades criativas e aprender a desenhar e criar sapatos incríveis!
Com um processo fácil e acessível, este curso capacita os alunos a desenhar sapatos de alta qualidade, que se destacam no mercado.
Neste curso, você irá desenvolver habilidades criativas, vai conhecer o universo do sapato, sua estrutura, além do processo de criação e sua constituição.
Você vai aprender o processo de como desenhar croquis de sapatos, além de técnicas de pintura para colorir suas criações, aplicadas ao design de moda.
Você enriquecerá seu conhecimento com um rico material complementar em PowerPoint, com uma curadoria de imagens, história, curiosidades e tipos de estampas.
Você vai receber cadernos de atividades com exercícios de detalhamentos do sapato, para a prática do traço e seu condicionamento.
Sua dedicação nos estudos, poderá te habilitar ingressar em faculdades de moda, em equipes de criação em confecção de calçados e até mesmo criar a sua marca.
O curso vai te inspirar a dar o primeiro passo em direção a sua carreira de sucesso como Ilustradora de moda ou uma Designer de Calçados de sucesso!

Apresentação do curso design de calçados: Apresentação do curso design de calçados sapato feminino
Desenhando os detalhes de um calçado: Vídeo apresentação dos desenhos de detalhamentos do calçados
Projeto sapato pink: Crepando a fôrma para criação do modelo
Criando e traçando um modelo de calçado.
Técnicas de pintura com lápis de cor, gr: Aplicação da técnica do colorido circular
Aplicação da técnica do colorido raiado
Técnica raiada em um croqui de sandália.
Scarpin de couro em composição com o metalassê
Interpretação da estampa de animal print

requirements: O único requisito pra fazer esse curso é a vontade de aprender sem medo de errar, juntamente com a disciplina da prática diária do desenho se possível for.
Não é necessário experiência alguma em desenho.
courses.description:
O objetivo do curso é fornecer conhecimento e treinamento ao aluno para desenvolver habilidades criativas para o design de calçados. Com um processo fácil e acessível, levará o aluno a compreender os processos de design de calçados desde o esboço inicial do croqui até a finalização com a aplicação de diferentes técnicas artísticas e interpretações de estampas texteis.
O programa inclui conhecimentos básicos sobre o universo do calçado, seus eventos e principais personalidades que fazem história com este importante acessório de guarda do vestuário feminino. O aluno ampliará seus estudos abordando temas importantes, como as explicações sobre as diferentes matérias-primas utilizadas na fabricação de calçados, sua estrutura e sua constituição.
A metodologia aplicada neste curso foi construída através das minhas dificuldades e experiências enquanto aluna, da qual me serviu de inspiração para que a construção do processo de aprendizado do programa seja fácil, prático e objetivo.
E para complementar os seus estudos, você receberá um conteúdo programático rico em informações básicas e necessárias através de um material complementar com uma curadoria especial de imagens, com centenas de ilustrações de desenhos e fotografias de sapatos capaz de inspirar seus futuros croquis.
Um material didático exclusivo, com suporte de Cadernos de Exercícios para iniciar seus primeiros traços e tarefas que serão solicitadas conforme as aulas forem sendo assistidas e laboriosos arquivos de PowerPoint com breves histórias do sapato e do salto.
Você vai até o fim, sabendo interpretar suas ideias e criações no papel de forma única e autoral!!
A frase que fica é: O exercício na prática do desenho com disciplina, leva a perfeição!!
target_audience: Este curso está destinado à estudantes de moda, profissionais da confecção, artistas plásticos e curiosos do design.

courses.description:
Course Description
Unlock the world of fashion accessory design through digital illustration, no experience needed.
Whether you're a fashion student, digital artist, or beginner with a passion for design, this course will teach you how to bring stunning accessories to life using Photoshop, Procreate, or your favorite drawing software.
Led by professional artist Yaşar Vurdem, who has worked with global brands like Adobe, Wacom, and Prime Video, this masterclass will take you from blank canvas to portfolio-ready accessory art  all with an industry-level finish.


What You'll Learn:
How to sketch and render accessories like handbags, shoes, jewelry, belts, and hats
Techniques for creating realistic textures: leather, suede, gold, metal, fur, and more
2D rendering methods to illustrate form, light, and material
How to develop a cohesive accessory collection that tells a story

Beginners in digital illustration or fashion design

You’ll finish this course with a set of eye-catching accessory designs and the confidence to create fashion-forward illustrations that can turn heads  and open doors.
target_audience: Aspiring fashion illustrators who want to specialize in accessory design for bags, shoes, jewelry, and more.
Fashion design students looking to build professional digital portfolios and impress potential employers or clients.

courses.title: Basic Bodice Pattern Making for Beginners
courses.bio: Learn to draft a bodice pattern for any body measurements
objectives: How to draft a basic bodice pattern
How to layout pattern paper
How to add accurate body measurements
How to cut out a pattern

Drafting Basics: Quick Guide For Taking Body Measurements
Calculating Bust, Waist and Hip Circumference.
Drafting The Arm Hole On The Back Panel
Joining Bust Waist and Hip Circumference.
Cutting Basics: Best Practices When Cutting Your Sewing Pattern

requirements: No fashion experience needed, just follow course measurements and simple drafting tools.
courses.description:
This course on Basic Bodice Pattern Drafting teaches you the fundamentals for drawing out body measurements into a pattern form.
Drafting a basic bodice is the first step in getting the structure for a fashion design. With proper measurements on a bodice, you can shape your fabric and curves into an excellent design.
In this course, we go through how to accurate add measurements for the neck line, the arm hole, the bust line, and waist line, with all accessory measurements along the way. I teach you how to calculate measurements so that you can draft a pattern that can be placed on drafting paper or clothing fabric for a successful design.
What you learn:
How to layout measurements for a bodice pattern
How to draft fitting lines and curves that will fit the body
How to calculate circumferences for the waist, bust and hip
How to construction waist and bust darts to help clothing fit
How to cut out a bodice pattern properly
How to setup drafting paper for efficient bodice pattern drafting and cutting
Fashion requires your ability to put your measurements into a good order for a fashion design to work creatively and this course will help you master that process. If you're ready to perfect your bodice pattern drafting, then see you in my course!
target_audience: Beginners in fashion design and sewing

courses.bio: Learn the basics of traditional Asian tailoring
objectives: You will learn how to cut fabric correctly
You will learn how to draft a pattern from an existing garment

You will learn how to draft and sew traditional kameez stitching
You will learn industry tricks and techniques in ways you have not seen before
requirements: Basic use of sewing machine needed.
Basic sewing tools needed plus 2.5m shalwar fabric, 2.5m kameez fabric, pattern paper, tailor's set square
courses.description:
In this course you will learn to sew traditional Asian tailoring, right from the basics.
You will first learn the correct tools and equipment that you will need for basic tailoring.
You will also learn important terminology used in the sewing industry.
This course consists of multiple classes; the first class will teach you how to draft a paper pattern using an existing garment.
The second section of this class will teach you how to correctly fold the fabric in preparation for cutting
The next part of the class will teach you how to cut correctly; although this sounds like a basic technique you will be surprised at what you will learn
The final, most challenging section of the course will consist of sewing up each part of your garment. This includes stitching your shalwar.
Then onto stitching your kameez, complete with sleeves
Each section will provide you with industry level tips and tricks that you can use in your own future projects.
This class is perfect for anyone who is a beginner and wanting to learn traditional tailoring in the English language from a tutor with a decade of experience in the industry
This class is sectioned into bitesize, easy to digest, easy to follow lessons.
As your tutor, I am excited for you to start your sewing journey into traditional Asian tailoring
So, what are you waiting for?
Let’s get started
target_audience: The perfect beginner friendly course for those looking to start their journey in traditional Asian tailoring

courses.title: Introdução ao Sistema Kibbe Body Types para homens
courses.bio: As Identidades Corporais de David Kibbe aplicadas à Consultoria de Imagem Masculina
objectives: Conhecer a base do Sistema de Identidades Corporais definido por David Kibbe
Identificar as IDs Kibbe em corpos masculinos
Saber quais as recomendações de cada ID corporal Kibbe no vestuário masculino
Aplicar o conhecimento de Kibbe Body Types na consultoria de imagem para homens
Vestir-se de acordo com a sua harmonia corporal realçando sua beleza
requirements: É importante já ter uma noção do Sistema Kibbe: o que é, para que serve e já ter visto exemplos de sua aplicação. Mas é possível compreender os conceitos apresentados por ser um curso introdutório.
courses.description:
O Sistema de tipos corporais Kibbe foi sistematizado pelo consultor de imagem David Kibbe. É uma ferramenta de classificação corporal que nos ajuda a entender a nossa estrutura física e a nos vestirmos de maneira que valorize nossas características naturais. Esse sistema foi desenvolvido nos anos 80, embora tenha se popularizado no Brasil mais recentemente. É aplicado por Consultores de Imagem Especialistas no método, com o objetivo de compreender e indicar as peças, tecidos, modelagens, acessórios e outros elementos do visual como cortes de cabelos, penteados e até mesmo calçados, com base na estrutura óssea, massa corporal e características faciais de cada pessoa. Existem 13 tipos ou identidades corporais originalmente definidos por Kibbe, com suas particularidades. São elas: Dramatic, Soft Dramatic, Natural, Flamboyant Natural, Soft Natural, Classic, Dramatic Classic, Soft Classic, Gamine, Flamboyant Gamine, Soft Gamine, Romantic e Theatrical Romantic.
Embora esse sistema tenha sido originalmente desenvolvido para mulheres, também pode ser aplicado a homens com grande sucesso. Na Consultoria de Imagem Masculina, pode ser utilizado para orientar os homens quanto aos tipos de roupas, tecidos e combinações, bem como cabelos e barbas que melhor harmonizam com o tipo corporal. Diferente do sistema de Biotipos da Consultoria Tradicional (retângulo, triângulo, triângulo invertido, oval e trapézio), o Sistema Kibbe preenche muito mais lacunas e oferece recomendações muito mais específicas de acordo com as particularidades de cada pessoa. Portanto, é uma ferramenta valiosa que está revolucionando o universo da Consultoria de Imagem e Estilo.
Este não é um curso profissionalizante, mas um curso introdutório, que busca conceituar as IDs, sintetizar e exemplificar com imagens como podemos identificar as IDs em homens e como as recomendações podem ser aplicadas aos homens.
target_audience: Consultores de Imagem que desejem aplicar o Sistema Kibbe nas consultorias masculinas
Homens que desejem vestir-se de forma que valorize mais seus atributos físicos
Estudiosos e entusiastas de moda e design corporal

courses.title: History of Adaptive Fashion
courses.bio: The first wave of adaptive fashion in the 1950s and 60s to the pioneers of the early 2000s adaptive fashion resurgence.
objectives: Students will be introduced to the innovations in fashion that laid the foundation for adaptive fashion to develop.
Students will learn about the rise and decline of the first wave of adaptive fashion in the 1960s and 70s.
Students will learn about the adaptive fashion resurgence and the second wave pioneers in the 21st century.
Students will be introduced to the three approaches to clothing by people with disabilities.

Key Takeaways from Second Wave Pioneers: Key Takeaways from Second Wave Pionners
Approaches to Clothing by People with Di: Approaches to Clothing by People with Disabilities

requirements: No prior adaptive fashion knowledge or experience needed, just an interest in learning about adaptive fashion and becoming a more inclusive member of society! It is recommended that you have taken Introduction to Adaptive Fashion prior to taking this course.
courses.description:
This course, History of Adaptive Fashion, dives into the origins of the adaptive fashion movement. We will begin with the fashion inventions that enabled easier dressing; discuss the achievements of the mother of adaptive fashion, Helen Cookman; and cover the rise, fall, and resurgence of adaptive fashion. This course is intended for individuals in the fashion industry interested in learning more about adaptive fashion. This course will benefit designers, technical designers, production managers, merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. Although no prerequisites are needed for this course, it is recommended to take Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion before taking this course.
The first lecture of this course provides a brief instructor and course introduction. The second lecture covers the first part of the adaptive fashion timeline, focusing on the foundations of adaptive fashion. Lecutre 3 covers the second part of the adaptive fashion timeline, focusing on the rise and fall of the first wave of adaptive fashion and the beginning of the adaptive fashion resurgence. In lecture 4, we will dive into the 21st century pioneers of the second wave of adaptive fashion. After setting the stage with the history of adaptive fashion, we begin to look at the clothing approaches for people with disabilities in lecture 5.
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Fashion merchandisers who want to learn about merchandising adaptive fashion.
Production managers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Product developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion buyers who want to learn about adaptive fashion.
E-Commerce specialists who want to learn about adaptive fashion e-commerce.
Marketing professionals who want to learn about marketing adaptive fashion.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

After the course, you will be able to use this knowledge to design other forms and sizes of soft pouches, but also for shoppers.


Welcome to everyone.
I would like to introduce myself and give you some insight into my handbags and my workshops.
This presentation will take around a half an hour.
My name is Sophie Springer, I was born in Austria, in Vienna, a city of a long tradition of highquality fashion. 30 years ago, I came to Florence to study fashion design and specialized in bag design, learning both the craftmanship and designing. For more than 15 years I have been teaching at different international fashion schools (drapery, pattern, sewing and accessories). This has given me a lot of experience in teaching students from all over the world.
With the current situation, where it is safer for us to stay in our own homes, I wanted to offer different workshops: Handbag design, up-cycling and draping.


Let me tell you something about my bags:
I have had my own brand for 15 years. All my bags are designed and hand- crafted by me and trained craftspeople in Florence.
“Sophie Springer 100% Pura Italia” – I want the bags to represent my personality and knowledge, and at the same time produce locally.
Tuscany is famous for its centuries-old tradition of leather production and processing as well as its elegant and versatile fabric creations.I love to go out and source fabrics and leather for my new collections here around Florence.
My bag collection is fashionable while outlasting short-lived trends – you will find elegance, extravagance, fashion, trendy colors and refined details.

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Side-Dart Bodice PATTERN Block Course is the 2nd course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Side-Dart Bodice Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Side-Dart Bodice PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Bodice Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Bodice Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately and professionally using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This SIDIE-DART PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic SIDE-DART PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype(mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

courses.description:
Welcome to the course on " How to Use a Sewing Machine & Make your own pattern for sew"
In the 1st section of this course I will teach you How to Use a Sewing Machine:
Sewing machines can look frighteningly complex to those of us who don't know how to use them. However, don't let the fear of an unknown machine and skill set keep you from creating glorious textile wonders! Use this step-by-step guide through the anatomy, set-up, and use of a sewing machine so that you can begin crafting your own hand-made items.
In the 2nd section I will teach you How to Make Your Own Pattern for Sewing a New Piece of Clothing:
Do you have a new fashion idea? Make your own pattern!
In the 3rd section will teach you How to Line a Skirt:
A skirt lining ensures that the fabric doesn’t ride up on your legs, which makes the skirt more comfortable. You can create a skirt lining using any type of smooth, lightweight fabric. Create your lining with the same dimensions as your skirt and sew it in before you sew up the back seam and hem the skirt.
In the 4th section I will teach you How to Print PDF Sewing Patterns:
Online patterns are becoming increasingly popular. Instead of having to print and ship patterns out, many designs opt for selling PDF patterns instead that their customer downloads instead.
In the 5th section I will teach you How to Sew a Straight Line:
Sewing a straight line isn't a difficult task with the right tools and tips. You can either sew a straight line by hand or with a sewing machine.
In the 6th section I will teach you How to Blind Stitch:
This stitch connects one fabric or one fold of fabric to another with nearly invisible stitches. Here is a hand sewing technique that can help you with hemming, applique and mending.

courses.description:
Welcome to our SIMPLE STEPS Educational Learning System.


This Side-Dart Dress PATTERN Block Course is the 5th course in our Pattern Making and Sewing Course Series.


Our Courses are:
Very Straight forward to follow.
There is no waffling on.
We provide very simple layouts.
Stress Free


We breakdown complex learning for you into very easy, understandable steps.


In this beginners course you will learn how to:


1. Accurately DRAFT a Side-Dart Dress Block
2. Accurately CUT place and Cut the pattern on the Fabric
4. How to Use a Sewing Machine
3. How to SEW the Side-Dart Dress PATTERN prototype


This pattern making course is created for students who like to learn in a systematic orderly and professional way with simple formulas they can apply to any body shape or size.
Also include is the basic sewing skills that will help you SEW your pattern prototype to check the fitting for accuracy.
At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Dress Pattern accurately and professionally.


First of all WHAT IS PATTERN MAKING?
Pattern making also called pattern cutting or pattern drafting is the process of designing garment patterns for a fashion drawing.


A pattern is a term in sewing and fashion design that is referred to the paper or cardboard template from which the parts of a garment are traced onto fabric before cutting out and assembling the fabrics int a garment.

A custom-fitted basic pattern is a premade template from which patterns for many different styles can be created. It is called a sloper for home sewer or a block for industrial production.


The flat-pattern method begins with the creation of a sloper or block, a basic pattern made from body measurements.


The pattern block or sloper is usually made of lightweight cardboard or tagboard, without seam allowances or style details. Pattern or sloper shape can be further refined form its original look by making a series of mock-up garments with a less expensive fabric called toile or muslins.


The final block or sloper can be used to create patterns for many styles of garments with varying necklines, sleeves, dart designs and garment shapes.
Now, that we know basically what pattern making is, WHAT IS THE ROLE OF A PATTERN MAKER?

A pattern maker creates a prototype, similar to an actual garment design to be made. They test the prototype pattern to be made by using a less expensive fabric called the muslin or toile.


Muslin fabrics are inexpensive fabrics that are easy to work with when making garment prototypes.


The prototype garment made from the pattern can be adjusted by pinning the fabric around the body or a dress form.


The sewer cuts the patterns on the muslin using the same method that they will use for the actual garment, according to a pattern. The muslin pieces are then fit together and other adjustments are made.


This provides the sewer with pre-made shapes to use as a guideline for marking out the pattern pieces and cutting the fabric for the finished garment.


At the end of the Course you will learn how to Create, Cut and Sew Side-Dart Dress Pattern prototype (mockup) accurately and professionally using the muslin test fabric.
target_audience: This SIDIE-DART Dress PATTERN BLOCK construction and SEWING course is for a complete BEGINNER who want to learn professional steps in creating the Basic SIDE-DART PATTERN BLOCK construction and prototype(mockup) SEWING in simple steps.

courses.title: Art Appreciation, Art Movements, Art Aesthetics & Creative
courses.bio: Comprehensive course on how aesthetics and movements influenced Art and Design and vice versa, introduction to Creative
objectives: Introduction to Art Appreciation
Various Art Movements & their significance
Creative Sketches & their formulation
How to recreate looks from Art Movements.
requirements: Open to all Learners
courses.description:
Understanding the Art Aesthetics & Creative Sketching will enhance your profession as a “Stylist”. Any individual who wants to start their career as a fashion stylist, fashion manager, or fashion blogger should be well-versed about understanding Art Appreciation, various Art movements such as baroque & rococo art, neoclassicism art, romanticism & realism Art, Expressionism & Abstract Expressionism Art, cubism, dadaism and many more.
Introduction to Art Appreciation - Looking back across Western history, it is fascinating to discover how many different creative art movements have had an influence on civilization. Tracing the history of various art trends will help you understand how each art movements represents its time period. This section will empower the Stylists to use a multitude of components to produce a masterpiece or makes excellent color, structure, line, and shape choices by studying variety of art movements.
Various Art Movements & their Significance – Realism, Cubism, Romanticism, Abstract Art, Pop Art, and Graffiti are not only forms of art movements, but they have also played a vital role in revolutionizing art movements across the world. This section will help you in acknowledging the elements which helped in defining these art movements. Therefore, by focusing on the main features of each art movement, you will be able to generate innovations and original crafts in this field of styling.
Creative Sketches & their Formulation – By learning various Art movements in detail, you can now formulate your own original sketch, this section will enhance your learning with reliable resources.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about Fashion Styling.
Aspiring and professional artists, students, and fashion stylists, fashion managers, and fashion bloggers.
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Fashion Styling.
Anyone who wants knowledge about Art Appreciation, Various Art Movements & their significance as well as Creative Sketches & their formulation.
For all entry level to advanced Fashion Stylists.

objectives: Understand basic pattern Tools in CLO3D.

requirements: A strong interest in fashion design and patternmaking is recommended. Previous experience in fashion design or garment construction is helpful but not required.
courses.description:
Unlock your potential as a fashion designer with our comprehensive course, "Patternmaking for Fashion Design in CLO3D." This course is designed to take you from beginner to proficient in digital pattern making using the powerful CLO3D software.
What You'll Learn:
Understanding Basic Pattern Tools: Gain proficiency in using CLO3D's essential tools, including the line, curve, and edit pattern tools. You'll learn how to navigate the software and utilize these tools to create precise and professional patterns.
Drafting a Basic Pattern Set: Master the art of drafting basic patterns, including the bodice, skirt, and sleeve. We'll guide you step-by-step through the process, ensuring you understand the fundamentals of pattern making.
Applying Corrections to Patterns: Learn to evaluate and correct your patterns to ensure a perfect fit. This section will teach you how to make necessary adjustments, helping you create accurate and wearable garments.
Creating Production-Ready Slopers: Finalize your patterns into production-ready slopers. Understand industry standards and best practices to prepare your designs for manufacturing.
Who This Course is For:
Aspiring Fashion Designers: Those looking to start a career in fashion design and need foundational skills in pattern making.
Fashion Design Students: Students wanting to enhance their studies with practical, hands-on experience in digital pattern making.
Industry Professionals: Experienced designers and patternmakers seeking to upgrade their skills and stay current with digital techniques.
Sewing Enthusiasts: Hobbyists who want to learn how to create professional-quality patterns and garments.
Entrepreneurs: Individuals aiming to start their own fashion line and need the technical skills to bring their ideas to life.
Prerequisites:
Basic computer skills
Access to CLO3D software
A strong interest in fashion design
(Optional) Basic sewing knowledge
Course Highlights:
Interactive lessons with real-world examples
Step-by-step guidance through the pattern making process
Hands-on projects to apply what you learn
Support and feedback from the instructor
Join us in "Patternmaking for Fashion Design in CLO3D" and take the first step towards mastering the art of digital pattern making. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this course offers everything you need to succeed in virtual fashion design career. Enroll today and start creating your own fashion masterpieces!
target_audience: Aspiring Fashion Designers looking to learn patternmaking fundamentals in CLO3D.
Fashion Design Students wanting to enhance their skills with CLO3D.
Industry Professionals upgrading to digital patternmaking techniques.
Sewing Enthusiasts interested in professional-quality pattern creation.
Entrepreneurs starting their own fashion lines.

objectives: Fazer as medidas das suas clientes de forma presencial.
Conheceram técnicas novas para aperfeiçoar como a TEORIA DO APERTO
Aprenderam a usar a teoria do aperto para obter maior perfeição nas peças
Técnicas de costura para facilitar o trabalho

Definindo o modêlo: Posicionando o Molde do Sereia sobre o tecido para cortar.
Como cortar a saia godê e semi-godê

requirements: Esse curso é para pessoas que costuram e querem aprender modelagem
Precisa ter Tesoura , régua de modelagem, trena e lápis.
Papel craft
courses.description:
Meu nome é Neyrivânia Magalhães, designer de moda e proprietária do ateliê Neyrivania Festas e Noivas. Trabálho com vestidos de festas e noivas a mais de 20 anos. Quero ajudar você que deseja aprender uma nova profissão ou trabalha com costura a fazer modelagem com a MODELAGEM FUNCIONAL.
Eu comecei a me interessar por costura aos 11 anos, estudei e realizei meu sonho. Quem costura sabe o quanto é ruim fazer acertos em uma peça depois da primeira prova, eu perdia mais tempo concertando que fazendo o vestido. Eu sofria muito com isso, era uma sensação de tempo perdido. Depois que aprendi essa técnica maravilhosa da MODELAGEM FUNCIONAL nunca mais passei por isso, a peça sempre fica perfeita, sem folga, sem boquinha, eu não perco mais tempo concertando. Abri meu próprio ateliê , eu passei a confeccionar vestidos de festas e de noivas. Além do ateliê tenho loja de aluguel roupas de festas noivas de confecção própria.
Minha pergunta para você é: Você está fazendo o quê para crescer? Você quer sair da mesmice? ter sucesso? Deixar de ser uma simples costureira para montar seu ateliê e atender com profissionalismo? Ou caso não costure quer aprender uma nova profissão?
Se você não está fazendo nada comece agora! Saia da sua zona de conforto, corra atrás que ainda dá tempo. aprendendo a tomar medidas, fazer modelagem para cortar com perfeição, profissionalize-se e logo você será uma fashionista de sucesso.
Esse curso irá passar para você a modelagem em uma linguagem fácil e descomplicada, nele será mostrado como você deve tomar as medidas da sua cliente , fazer cálculos para definir tamanhos e entender como cortar no fio de urdume.
Aprenderá a fazer Modelagens de festa e também adaptar para outros estilos que possa atender sua clientela.

Modelistas
Curiosos

courses.description:
Are you a creative soul dreaming of crafting beautiful embroidery designs at home?
Do you own a USHA Janome Memory Craft 450E but feel overwhelmed with where to start?
Or maybe you're thinking of starting a home boutique or small embroidery business, but need guidance to master your machine?
Welcome to “Mastering the USHA Janome Memory Craft 450E: From Basics to Digitizing” – a practical, beginner-friendly course designed especially for homemakers, hobbyists, and aspiring entrepreneurs.
I'm Deepa John, an ex-IT professional turned self-employed boutique owner and motivational YouTuber. I’ve taught thousands of women through my free videos and now I’m bringing everything together into this structured Udemy course to help you confidently operate your Janome 450E embroidery machine, even if you’ve never touched one before!
Whether you're looking to add custom touches to sarees, kidswear, bedsheets, or gifts—or build a steady side income—this course will help you feel empowered, independent, and creative.
You don’t need to be “tech-savvy” or experienced in embroidery. All you need is the passion to learn and a willingness to try.


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:
Confidently operate your Janome 450E from threading to stitching
Choose the right hoop and stabilizer for your projects
Navigate Digitizer Jr to auto-digitize designs for machine embroidery
Maintain and oil your machine for long-lasting performance
Feel ready to turn your creativity into custom embroidery pieces—or even a home-based business!
For Whom:
Absolute beginners with a Janome embroidery machine
Homemakers and moms looking for a creative income option
Boutique owners, tailors, or fashion lovers

Join today and turn your embroidery machine into a canvas of endless possibilities!

Welcome to the Fantasy Armor Digital Apprenticeship Course on Udemy.

This collection is an expansive pattern and tutorial pack that will teach you to craft a functional and creative full head-to-toe suit of fantasy armor in a fantasy style (Includes a bonus variant style for alternate aesthetic).  This is designed as an in depth crash course for both leather crafting and armor making. You will learn a wide array of skills and techniques, all while building towards a suit of armor you can enjoy, wear, and display prominently. Each video will demonstrate new tips, tricks, and style options. And while the video tutorials provide complete instructions for crafting a full suit of armor in leather, it can also be adapted for foam, metal, or other mediums.


Great for beginners too! New to the craft? No problem! Many first-time leather crafting students have taken on this challenge with great success! We also have many great free resources over on our academy to help get you started too!

If you're into LARP, or cosplay or even want to have a suit of armor on display, you would expect to spend thousands of dollars on a suit of armor.  Our own full suit custom armor projects start at $15,000! courses.title: Tie Dye & Ice Dye classes
courses.bio: Tie Dye & Ice Dye classes for beginners and advanced dyers.
objectives: Tie-dye & Ice Dye techniques taught by Master Dyers start to finish from basic ring burst to elevated fashion forward patterns.
Taught by Master Dyers, our Tie-Dye Class instructors have been on the Bravo hit show Project Runway as teachers to the contestants!
Kids Tie-Dye class taught by Kids for Kids
Professionally produced and directed by Project Runway film crew.

Preparing Fabrics and Garments for Next: Preparing Fabrics and Garments for Next Level Tie Dyeing
Kids Tie Dye: Create Amazing Tie Dyes with your Kids

requirements: Students will need basic home supplies such as a kitchen pot or vessle, rubber bands or zip ties, RIT Dye, a stove top or hot plate, salt, & vinegar.

Whether you are an urban city resident without private outdoor space or have a big back yard or garage, you will have different options. You can even use your kitchen sink. But if you aren’t comfortable with using your sink, or would prefer to dye outdoors, a large plastic bin will work great. No matter the vessel you use, the most important thing is to have a contained space to tie-dye so clean-up is easy. Amazon has several options, as does Home Depot
courses.description:
Our Master Dyers have been collaborating with the most creative minds in fashion for over two decades. Whether it is creating last minute looks for Mercedes Benz Fashion Week shows, movie shoots, Disney, Broadway, our Master Dyers are sought after to bring whatever you can dream of to life. Our Master Dyers combine creative skill with technical knowledge, in these online tie-dye classes they will teach you step-by-step how to create some of the most innovative Tie-Dye & Ice-Dye looks imaginable. Our pragmatic approach to teaching these dyeing classes is with artistic sensibility and deep knowledge of the textile chemistry. Our Master Dyers begin each tie dye instruction with an in-depth overview of the project details, explaining the preparation, supplies, and techniques. The results are always unique and expressive of each student. Our step-by-step online tie-dye courses are the same instructions provided to the contestants on Project Runway Season 18 Episode 10 where we taught each contestant elevated tie-dye techniques in just one hour. Our Master Dyers are sought by the leading names in fashion, such as Oscar de la Renta, Calvin Klein, Proenza Schouler, DVF, Ralph Lauren, Tory Burch etc..
By combining traditional dyeing, painting and hand twisting with the latest trends we will teach you how to create basic looks like the ring burst, and elevated tie-dye & Ice Dye designs found in high fashion. All you will need is a desire to learn and some basic supplies that can be found in most local department stores. Our Master Dyers will teach you in your own home how to easily transform your ideas to reality in a fun, safe, and clean process. Everything is 100% environmentally friendly.
target_audience: Anyone with a desire to learn tie-dye.
Our classes are for beginners and advanced dyers.
