Beginners not for advanced sewing

courses.title: Hut macht Figur
courses.bio: Kreative Kappe
objectives: Hutmachen
Eigene Masse nehmen
Einen Schnitt erstellen
Hut naehen
Grosgrain band einnaehen
Hut schnecken

Zuschneiden der Kappe und des Futters: Zuschneiden der Kappe und des Futters

requirements: Naehkenntisse waeren hilfreich
kein Basis Schnittwissen ist erforderlich
courses.description:
Hier in diesem Kurs"Hut macht Figur" zeige ich Euch, wie ihr die richtigen Maße für euren Hut nehmt: Euren Kopfumfang abmessen müßt,diesen dann auf Papier bringt und ein Schnittmuster anfertigt.Diesen  Schnitt koennt ihr dann für die verschiedesten Kopfbedeckungen benützen und anfangen mit euere Phantasie zu spielen.Ihr designt euren Hut nach euren Maßen und entwickelt euer eigenes Design.Hier in diesem Kurs zeige ich euch die Kappe und die verschiedesten Varianten dazu-wie ein Twist-Knoten,quadratischer Schnitt,eifoermiger Schnitt,mit Band oder ohne.
Ich zeige euch einige Varianten und wie diese entwickelt werden.Ausserdem zeige ich euch wie man einen Twist-Knoten  in die Kappe einarbeiten kann.Ihr koennt dann entscheiden,welche Form und Design eure Kappe haben soll.Wichtig ist,daß ihr die grundlegenden Schritte lernt und auf dieses Wissen aufbauen koennt.
Schlussendlich nähe ich eine Kappe ganz fertig und zeige euch Schritt für Schritt, was zu tun ist.VomKopf abmessen,die Maße richtig  abnehmen,über das Schnittmuster erstellen,das Zuschneiden der Kappe und des Futters,dem Nähen der Kappe und des Futters bis zum Fertignähen mit der Hand.
Ihr werdet dann verstehen, wie man Kappen näht und sie abändern kann, um die verschiedensten Formen zu entwickeln.Dann werdet ihr dieses Wissen auf die verschiedensten Hüte an wenden koennen.Und ihr beginnt mit eurer Modisten karriere! In zukunft werde ich auch andere Hutkurse aufladen und euch andere Modelle zeigen.
target_audience: Mode interessierte Menschen
Wer einen Hut kreieren will
kreative personen
Wer acessoirs kreieren will

courses.title: Курсы кройки и шитья
courses.bio: Базовый курс, базовое построение лекало с нуля (поясные, плечевые и брючные изделия) процесс моделирования моделей
objectives: Типы фигуры, и какие фасоны предложить ТИПОМ ФИГУР?
Как правильно снимать мерки?!
Как строить лекало на индивидуальную фигуру с НУЛЯ!
Моделирование сложных изделий, плечевые, поясные, брючные..
Как достраивать лацкан и воротник?!
С выше 20-видов наргрудных выточек

Базовый курс “КРОЙКИ И ШИТЬЯ” из 10-УРОК: Типы фигуры, и какие фасоны предложить ТИПОМ ФИГУР? Как правильно снимать мерки?
Базовое построение прямой юбки и юбки футляр

requirements: Обучаться может любой желающий абсолютно с нуля. Самое главное желание и действие, только тогда вы дойдете до результата.
courses.description:
Научу Вас шить с нуля: от базового шитья до создания красивых, сексуальных корсетов, белья и не только.
Привет! Меня зовут Шолпан Карим, я основатель и директор Школы Высокой Моды «VEN KARA», дизайнер одежды эпатажных и стильных образов. Я — преподаватель с опытом более 10 лет, обучаю пошиву сложных изделий: нижнего белья, корсетов, свадебных нарядов и эксклюзивных моделей.
В моем курсе я помогаю новичкам обрести уверенность за швейной машинкой, а мастерам — выйти на новый уровень. Я собрала все свои знания и практику в одну понятную и простую программу. Информация разложена «по полочкам», чтобы вам было легко и приятно учиться. Всё объясняется доступным языком, с пошаговыми инструкциями, подробными видео и практическими заданиями.
Всё, что от вас потребуется — доступ в интернет, швейная машинка и огромное желание творить. Даже если вы никогда не держали иглу в руках — у вас обязательно получится! Уже с первых уроков вы почувствуете уверенность и вдохновение.


На курсе вы:
• Научитесь шить сексуальное боди, нижнее белье, корсеты, свадебные наряды любых размеров.
• Начнёте зарабатывать на своём хобби.
• Создадите выкройки под себя и своих клиентов.
• Сошьёте свой первый комплект: бельё, корсет, боди, наряд для особого случая.
• Получите обратную связь и поддержку на каждом этапе.


Кому подойдёт этот курс:
• Полным новичкам, кто никогда не шил, но мечтает научиться.
• Тем, кто уже пробовал, но хочет системных знаний и качественного результата.
• Швеям-самоучкам, желающим освоить профессиональные техники.
• Дизайнерам, которые хотят научиться создавать бельё, корсеты и свадебные изделия.
• Мамам в декрете, студентам и всем, кто хочет освоить новое ремесло и начать зарабатывать.


И это только начало! Добро пожаловать в мир высокой моды вместе со мной.
target_audience: Полным новичкам, кто никогда не шил, но мечтает научиться.
Тем, кто уже пробовал, но хочет системных знаний и качественного результата.
Швеям-самоучкам, желающим освоить профессиональные техники.
Мамам в декрете, студентам и всем, кто хочет освоить новое ремесло и начать зарабатывать.
Дизайнерам, которые хотят научиться создавать бельё, корсеты и свадебные изделия.

courses.title: دورة رسم الازياء
courses.bio: دورة كاملة لتعلم رسم الازياء من الصفر الى المستوى الاحترافي
objectives: رسم المودل
تحريك جسم المودل
تلوين البشرة
رسم وتلوين الشعر
رسم الازياء
تطبيق الخامات
رسم الفساتين
رسم فستان الزفاف
requirements: ورق ابيض A4
قلم رصاص
مسطرة
الوان ماركر
الوان خشب
طباعة الملف
اقلام فحم ابيض واسود
مدعكه
اقلام تحبير ملونه
اقلام ذهبي وفضي وابيض حبر
معجونه
courses.description:
تقديم خدمة رسم الأزياء هو عمل ممتع وإبداعي يهدف إلى تحويل أفكار وتصاميم الموضة إلى رسومات فنية
يعتبر هذا النوع من الخدمات أحد العناصر الأساسية في صناعة الموضة والأزياء، حيث يساهم بشكل كبير في عملية التصميم والتخطيط للملابس والإكسسوارات الجديدة. يقوم رسام الأزياء بتحويل فكرة مصمم الملابس أو العلامة التجارية إلى صورة مرئية ملموسة تعكس تصورهما للتصميم.
يعتمد هذا النوع من الخدمات على مهارات فنية عالية، إذ يجب على رسام الأزياء أن يكون متمكنًا من تصميم الأشكال والقطع والخامات بشكل دقيق ومبدع.
تتميز خدمة رسم الأزياء بالعديد من الفوائد، منها:
توضيح الفكرة: يساعد رسم الأزياء على توضيح الفكرة والتصميم المطلوب بشكل أفضل من التعبير الشفهي، مما يجعل عملية التفاهم بين مصمم الملابس والعميل أو فريق التصميم أكثر سهولة ودقة.
تحقيق التفرد: يمكن لرسم الأزياء أن يساهم في تحقيق التفرد والابتكار في تصاميم الموضة، حيث يمكن للمصمم أو المصممة تجربة أفكار جديدة وغير تقليدية قبل الشروع في عملية الخياطة والتنفيذ.
العرض والتسويق: تعتبر رسومات الملابس الجذابة والمعبرة وسيلة فعالة لعرض التصميمات الجديدة للعملاء والجمهور، سواء في العروض الأزياء أو الحملات التسويقية.
توفير الوقت والموارد: من خلال رسم الأزياء، يمكن توفير الوقت والجهد والموارد قبل البدء في عملية الإنتاج الكاملة، حيث يمكن التعديل والتغيير في التصميم بسهولة دون الحاجة لإعادة تكلفة الخامات والوقت. تحتاج خدمة رسم الأزياء إلى استخدام أدوات مثل أقلام الرصاص الخاصة بالموضة، الألوان،
مما يجعل هذا النوع من العمل مجالًا مثيرًا للاهتمام والابتكار لكل من المصممين والفنانين الموهوبين


سيتضمن هذا الكورس تعلّم رسم المودل من جميع الزوايا
الأمامية، الجانبية، والخلفية،
بالإضافة إلى كيفية تحريك جسم المودل ورسم اليدين وإنشاء رسم للمانيكان
ستتعلم أيضًا كيفية رسم الأزياء، بما في ذلك رسم الأنماط مثل نمط الزيبرا، التايجر، والكاروهات، بالإضافة إلى رسم مجموعة متنوعة من الخامات مثل الجلد، والفرو، والصوف، والجينز
سيتضمن الكورس أيضًا رسم خامات الفساتين مثل الستان، والمخمل، والجليتر، والتل، بما في ذلك فساتين الزفاف. وبالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستتعلم كيفية رسم تصاميم متنوعة للشعر مثل الكيرلي، والويفي، والشعر المفرود، والمرفوع، وربطات الشعر. وسيتم توفير نماذج جاهزة للطباعة والرسم عليها بسهولة
target_audience: مصممين الازياء
المهتمين بالموضة
رسم الازياء

courses.title: Learn Fabric Smocking Design!
courses.bio: Learn the whole process of fabric smocking,including drawing grids and patterns. Create stunning, 3-dimensional fabrics
objectives: Learn the whole process of fabric smocking, including drawing grids and patterns.
Create stunning, 3-dimensional fabrics using the Arrow, Basket, Flower, Diamond, Honeycomb and Lozenge pattern.
You will learn how to hand-stitch a whole range of smocking patterns. We will start with the Arrow pattern, then Basket, Flower, Diamond, Honeycomb & Lozenge.
Create your own smocking sample book, you will see beautiful inspirations and learn how to apply these techniques to fashion and accessories design projects.
requirements: No previous skills are necessary to master this course. You don’t need any fabric design, machine sewing and patternmaking skills. During this course, we will only hand-stitch. The only thing you really need is the eagerness to learn something new and exciting!
courses.description:
n this course, you will learn how to create step by step 3-dimensional, structured and simply beautiful smocked fabrics. As your teacher, I will show you all the tools and materials, that you need in order to master this class. You will learn how to hand-stitch a whole range of smocking patterns. Together we will start with the Arrow pattern, then the Basket, Flower, Diamond, Honeycomb and Lozenge.
The goal of this masterclass is to teach you the whole process of fabric smocking, including drawing grids and patterns. During this course you will create your own smocking sample book, you will see beautiful inspirations and learn how to apply these techniques to fashion and accessories design projects.


WHAT YOU WILL GET


• Instant and unlimited access to this Fabric Smocking Masterclass
• Downloadable templates
• PDF coursebooks for every chapter
• 13 exclusive step by step informational videos (over 3h)
• Exclusive access to our designer community
• An insider view on troubleshooting mistakes when they come up
• Additional support from Dominika inside the online community
• Videos in English audio (with optional polish subtitles)
• The ability to learn online anytime and at your own pace


WHAT YOU NEED


No previous skills are necessary to master this course. You don’t need any fabric design, machine sewing and patternmaking skills. During this course, we will only hand-stitch. The only thing you really need is the eagerness to learn something new and exciting!
In terms of materials and tools, you will need fabric (around 2m of fabric without any prints), needles for hand-sewing, thread, scissors, tailor's chalk, a ruler and a meter.
target_audience: This course is for everyone! The only thing you really need is the eagerness to learn something new and exciting!

courses.title: Diseño de estampado textil
courses.bio: Crea tus estampados
objectives: A diseñar estampados textiles
A manejar el color correctamente a la hora de diseñar estampado
Las diferentes técnicas de estampados textiles
Realizar fichas técnicas para la producción de estampados
requirements: Conocimientos básicos de Adobe Illustrator
courses.description:
En todas las temporadas la moda de la calle se define por el predominio de un estilo de estampado, que junto a las prendas, forman las tendencias. Los motivos que los diseñadores textiles crean son el fruto de un proceso creativo completo.

La estampación es un aparte fundamental del trabajo del diseñador textil. A través del mismo la prendas adquieren una identidad propia capaz de llegar al público al cual se dirige . Del dominio de está técnica nace el éxito de una colección de moda.

A lo largo de todo el curso aprenderás a realizar una colección de estampado textil.
Empezarás conociendo que es una tendencia y los diferentes canales de los cuales se puede recaudar información para estar al tanto de las mismas.

Seguiremos por conocer a nuestro cliente y al público al que dirigimos la colección.
Despues verás los diferentes tipos de estampación que podemos realizar y las diferentes técnicas que se utilizan para aplicar los motivos al tejido.

Además adquirirás los conocimientos necesarios para el uso del color en tus estampados. Te hablare de la teoría del color y explicaré los diferentes modos y perfiles de color para finalmente enseñarte como utilizar los colores Pantone.

Cómo ultima parada veremos como realizamos los estampados con Adobe Illustraitor también crearemos un Moodboard donde podrás juntar los conocimientos adquiridos en el curso para aplicarlos en el estampado. Finalmente verás como se realizan las fichas técnicas para mandarlo a producción.
target_audience: Diseñadores de moda, diseñadores gráficos y todos aquellos que quieras aprender ha hacer sus propios estampados textiles.

courses.title: Curso de Costura à Máquina
courses.bio: Costura à máquina para Iniciantes
objectives: Costura à máquina
requirements: Querer aprender à utilizar uma máquina de costura.
courses.description: Neste curso você vai aprender desde como funciona a máquina de costura, como passar a linha, encher a bobina e realizar os primeiros treinamentos para começar a costurar, até a confecção de peças de roupas, acessórios, almofadas, bolsas e muito mais! Cada aula é uma peça diferente que você aprende todo o passo a passo bem detalhadamente. Algumas aulas contam com a disponibilização de moldes para auxiliar nas produções.
target_audience: Pessoas que queiram aprender à costurar utilizando a máquina de costura.

courses.title: Developing Adaptive Fashion 3 - Fit & Functionality
courses.bio: Why fit, functionality, and wear testing are crucial to the adaptive fashion development process.
objectives: Students will understand the importance of fit and functionality of adaptive fashion.
Students will learn the fit and functionality considerations for adaptively and universally designed fashion.
Students will understand how it is essential for Disabled people to be involved in all adaptive fashion development.
Students will be introduced to the wear test and feedback process.
requirements: Please have an adaptive fashion foundation by taking Introduction to Adaptive Fashion, History of Adaptive Fashion, Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion, Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive, and Adaptive Fashion Market Overview prior to taking this course.
Please also take Developing Adaptive Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design and Developing Adaptive Fashion 2 - Universal Design before taking this course.
courses.description:
In this course, Developing Adpative Fashion 3 - Fit & Functionality, we will continue through the process of actually developing adaptive fashion. This course focuses specifically on the fit, functional, and testing of adaptive fashion. While this course is geared towards designers, technical designers, product developers, and production managers, learning what goes into developing adaptive fashion will also benefit merchandisers, buyers, e-commerce specialists, marketing teams, company executives, and more. The prerequisites for this course are:
Course 1: Introduction to Adaptive Fashion
Course 2: History of Adaptive Fashion
Course 3: Importance of Disability Inclusion in Fashion
Course 4: Adaptive Fashion Customer Deep Dive
Course 5: Adaptive Fashion Market Overview
Course 6: Developing Adaptive Fashion 1 - Adaptive Design
Course 7: Developing Adaptive Fashion 2 - Universal Design
After a brief introduction in lecture 1, we will explore the importance of fit and functionality in adaptive fashion in lecture 2. Lectures 3 and 4 focus on fit & functionality considerations, including what to consider during the fit process to ensure products fit and function as well as possible. In lecture 5, we will cover how people with disabiltiies should be involved in the adaptive fashion development process. We will finish this course by hearing from Izzy Camilleri, the founder of IZ Adaptive and a pioneer in the adaptive fashion resurgence in lecture 6.
target_audience: Fashion students interested in adaptive fashion.
Fashion designers who want to learn about adaptive and universal design.
Product developers who want to learn about developing adaptive fashion.
Fashion merchandisers, buyers, production managers, e-Commerce specialists, and marketers who want to expand their knowledge of all facets of the adaptive fashion industry.
Fashion executives who want to expand the reach of their brands.

courses.title: Moda Sustentable: Crea y Recicla prendas fácilmente
courses.bio: Comienza a reciclar prendas y crear objetos textiles desde una mirada sustentable. Aprende costura a mano y con máquina.
objectives: Vas a iniciarte en la moda y la costura desde una mirada responsable y sustentable
Descubrirás los principios del reciclaje de prendas y su importancia para el medioambiente
Vas a dar tus primeros pasos tanto en la costura a mano como en el manejo de la máquina de coser
Conocerás el origen de las fibras textiles y sus características
Aprenderás a organizar el tiempo y el espacio de trabajo
Te formarás para dar tus primeros pasos en un emprendimiento personal de moda sustentable
Verás los principios básicos de la moldería y cómo tomar medidas
Pondrás en práctica lo aprendido con ejemplos de reciclaje de prendas y descartes
requirements: Para hacer este curso no se necesita experiencia previa ni conocimientos específicos.
Para hacer las prácticas te bastará con un kit súper básico de costura.
Si quisieras hacer prácticas avanzadas se recomienda una máquina de coser, aunque no es fundamental.
courses.description:
Si te interesa la moda y la costura, desde una mirada responsable hacia nuestro planeta y el medioambiente, este curso te encantará! Veremos tanto la teoría como la práctica para que te inicies en esta apasionante actividad y puedas realizar tus propias prendas y objetos textiles.
En caso de que quieras formar un emprendimiento, este curso también te guiará para escalar tu conocimiento y poder transformar tu pasión  en un oficio rentable.
Florencia Dacal, la instructora, es diseñadora y se dedica a la educación ambiental a través del reciclaje textil. Dirige su emprendimiento (Somos Dacal) en el que crean líneas de indumentaria a partir de prendas recuperadas de sastrerías.
En los últimos años hemos cambiado profundamente nuestros hábitos de vestir. La industria textil -una de las más contaminantes del mundo- genera una gran cantidad de desperdicio y un enorme impacto negativo ambiental, social, cultural y económico.
Por eso este curso está creado con un doble objetivo: brindar las herramientas para que crees tus prendas y objetos textiles de manera sencilla, pero al mismo tiempo respetando nuestro entorno y cuidando el medio ambiente.
Te invitamos a realizar este curso a distancia desde donde quieras, sin horarios fijos y a tu ritmo. Lo puedes ver desde cualquier dispositivo, es muy simple.
target_audience: Personas que tengan interés en la costura y la moda.
Entusiastas del diseño textil que quieran dar sus primeros pasos en esta actividad.
Emprendedores y emprendedoras que quieran iniciar un proyecto basado en costura responsable.
Personas interesadas en el desarrollo de emprendimientos sustentables.

courses.title: Procreate ile Dijital Moda Tasarım İllüstrasyonu

objectives: Procreate programı nasıl kullanılır?

Procreate'te fırça nasıl oluşturulur?
Procreate'te kürk, deri, dantel kumaşları nasıl çizilir?
Procreate'te palet nasıl oluşturulur?
Procreate'te saç çizimi nasıl yapılır?
Procreate'te yeni belge nasıl oluşturulur?
requirements: Procreate Programı
IOS Tablet ve Tablet ile Uyumlu Çizim Kalemi
courses.description:
Start Now Fashion, Procreate ile Dijital Moda İllüstrasyonu Kursunda, moda illüstrasyonunun püf noktalarını öğrenmeye şimdi başla. Kursa Procreate uygulamasını öğrenerek başlayacaksın. Bu bölümde yeni belge oluşturmayı, araçları, menüleri, kısayolları ve uygulamayla ilgili diğer tüm püf noktalarını öğrenebilirsin. Bu sayede uygulamayı hiç kullanmamış olsan bile çok rahatlıkla çizime başlayabilirsin. Uygulamayı daha önce kullandıysan yeni püf noktalarını keşfedebilirsin.
Kursun diğer bölümlerinde moda tasarımına yönelik çizimler yapacağız.  İlk olarak hazır şablon üzerinden bir moda figürü çizimi uygulaması yapacağız. Bu bölümde renklendirme aşamalarını ve detayları işlemeyi öğrenebilirsin.
İkinci bölümde de figür çizimi yapacağız. Bu çizim daha artistik bir çizim olacak ve eskiz aşamasından başlayacağız. Çizim için kullanılacak paleti ve fırça setini indirme bağlantısından indirebilirsin.
Kursun  diğer bölümünde dantel büstiyer, deri şort, kürk mont, puantiyeli külotlu çorap ve Mary Jane stil ayakkabılar ile aksesuarlardan oluşan bir kombin çizeceğiz. Çizime başlamadan önce dantel fırçası oluşturacağız.
Dördüncü bölümde de gömlek ve kot pantolondan oluşan bir kombin çizeceğiz.
Kurs için Procreate programına gereksinimin var. Procreate uygulaması, iOS işletim sistemine sahip tabletlere indirilebilir. Bununla birlikte çizimleri yapabilmek için tabletine uyumlu bir kalemin olması gerekir.
Moda tasarımı hakkında eğitimin yoksa ve temel bilgileri edinmek istersen Temelden İleri Seviyeye Moda Tasarım kursumuza göz atabilirsin.
Kursa yakında yeni bölümler ekleniyor olacak. Start Now Fashion tasarım kursları ile tasarlamaya şimdi başlayabilirsin.
Start Now Fashion

courses.title: Ten skills that you need in sewing as a beginner.
courses.bio: A problem solving guide for the first year of sewing.
objectives: To create confidence in sewing for beginners by learning to do these 10 samples without help.
Naturally remember each step through repetition. Understand why they are used. Then apply that knowledge to each sample.
Analyse what you did right and try and learn form the wrong ones. Evaluate your understanding of the concept.
Quality of product is what makes each sample beautiful to look at, but more importantly accurate to the pattern.
You will receive a Certificate of Completion when you finish this course.

DAY 1: INTRODUCTION: SEWING AND INDUSTRIAL SEWING MACHINE INTRODUCTIONS
BASICS REFRESHER: BOBBIN AND BOBIN CASES
DAY 2: HAND SEWING: HAND SEWING: HOW TO CATCH STITCH
DAY 4: DARTS: CURVED BODY DART: HOW TO IRON
DAY 8: COLLARS: PREPARING A MANDARIN/ BAND COLLAR FOR SEWING
DAY 9: ZIPS: CENTER BACK DRESS ZIP WITH FACING
Bonus Material: Bonus material: How to shape with or without darts

requirements: This course is ideally suited to a first-year fashion student who has gained some knowledge and experience in sewing. This course will not suit the absolute beginner who has never sewn before. It also can suit anyone else that wishes to refresh their skills. There and tips and tricks I use which I have gained over time; that I demonstrate in the course. After completing this course, you will have a better understanding of how to create better quality clothing.
courses.description:
This course will teach you my personal insight into what First year sewing “should” include. Hi my name is Tunku Adhikari. I am a Fashion Educator and Designer based in Melbourne, Australia. I have taught in the field of Fashion and Design for over 20 years.
I say “should” because we are slowly becoming less and less hands on, especially since the pandemic. It is a course that Includes tips and tricks that I use personally, learnt over the years.
Ten Skill you need in Sewing as a Beginner, is a course I designed based on what I believe a 1st Year Fashion student should know before transitioning into 2nd Year. These topics are based on questions from students that I have answered for over 20 years. You could say it is a problem-solving guide for sewing.
After completing this course, you will have a better understanding of how to create better quality fashion.
To create confidence in sewing for beginners by learning to do these 10 samples without help.
Naturally remember each step through repetition. Understand why they are used. Then apply that knowledge to each sample. Analyse what you did right and try and learn form the wrong ones. Evaluate your understanding of the concept. Eventually create your own samples without instructions.
Quality of product is what makes each sample beautiful to look at, but more importantly accurate to the pattern.
target_audience: This course is ideally suited to a first-year fashion student who has gained some knowledge and experience in sewing. This course will not suit the absolute beginner who has never sewn before. It also can suit anyone else that wishes to refresh their skills.

courses.title: Fashion Industry Professional Certification (FIPC)
courses.bio: Fashion Industry Professional Certification (FIPC) by MTF Institute School of Art and Design
courses.description:
Welcome to Fashion Industry Professional Certification (FIPC) by MTF Institute School of Art and Design
This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.
Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:
Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test
Write us with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma.
In case of any questions, or for certificate getting you may write us to email welcome gtf . pt or find the contacts at our web site gtf . pt or at our welcome message.


School of Art and Design is a part of MTF Institute, department created to guide students at modern areas of Art, Design, Fashion, Style and related types of Expertise, Business and Management.
Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Assessment Description:
In the ever-evolving world of fashion, where creativity meets innovation and trends shape consumer preferences, the significance of a Fashion Industry Professional Certification cannot be overstated. This certification serves as a cornerstone for both aspiring professionals and established experts, offering a structured pathway to enhance skills, gain industry insights, and unlock career opportunities. For individuals, this certification validates their proficiency and commitment to the field, while for companies, it translates into a pool of adept and well-prepared talent.


Empowering Individuals for Success
A Fashion Industry Professional Certification equips individuals with a comprehensive understanding of the intricate facets of fashion. From design principles and textile knowledge to retail strategies and sustainable practices, this certification ensures that candidates are well-versed in the entire fashion ecosystem. It offers a unique blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application, preparing individuals to navigate the challenges of the industry with finesse.


For aspiring professionals, this certification serves as a powerful stepping stone into the industry. It provides them with a competitive edge by demonstrating their expertise to potential employers, making them stand out in a crowded job market. Moreover, it instills a sense of confidence and credibility, enabling them to transition seamlessly from academia to the professional world.


For seasoned professionals, the certification offers an avenue for continuous learning and skill enhancement. In an industry that thrives on innovation and adaptability, staying updated with the latest trends and technologies is paramount. The certification's curriculum reflects the ever-evolving nature of fashion, ensuring that experienced individuals remain relevant and equipped to lead the industry forward.


Fueling Company Success
Companies within the fashion industry also reap substantial benefits from a certified workforce. Firstly, hiring professionals with a Fashion Industry Professional Certification guarantees a certain level of competence. This reduces the need for extensive training and onboarding, allowing companies to streamline their recruitment processes and allocate resources more efficiently.


Secondly, a certified workforce contributes to a company's reputation and brand image. When customers and stakeholders know that a company employs certified professionals, it translates into trust and authenticity. Moreover, companies can leverage the expertise of their certified employees to enhance product quality, innovation, and overall performance.


Furthermore, companies often grapple with the challenge of integrating sustainability and ethical practices into their operations. A certified workforce is well-versed in sustainable fashion practices, ensuring that companies can align their strategies with the growing demand for eco-conscious products and processes.


The Role of Fashion Industry Certification in Career Building
The fashion industry offers a multitude of career paths, from design and merchandising to marketing and retail management. A Fashion Industry Professional Certification equips individuals with the foundational knowledge required for success in any of these roles. Moreover, it serves as a compass, helping candidates identify their strengths and interests within the diverse field of fashion.


Furthermore, the certification bridges the gap between theoretical learning and practical application. It exposes candidates to real-world scenarios, enabling them to make informed decisions and solve challenges effectively. This practical exposure is invaluable when it comes to building a successful and sustainable career.


In conclusion, a Fashion Industry Professional Certification is an invaluable asset for both individuals and companies. It empowers individuals with expertise, confidence, and credibility, while companies benefit from a certified workforce that enhances their efficiency, reputation, and innovation. As the fashion industry continues to evolve, the certification paves the way for a prosperous and fulfilling career journey, fostering growth and excellence within this dynamic realm of creativity and style.
target_audience: For anybody who want to get certification for Fashion Industry work or prepare to exams at other certification and learning providers

Eu me chamo Diego Nascimento, sou programador de bordados desde 2015 e já fiz mais de 5.000 matrizes de bordados. Meu método de ensino é diferenciado por explicar como usa as ferramentas e aplicar o conhecimento na prática.
Elaborei este curso para pessoas interessadas em aprender programar matrizes de bordado, durante as aulas você irá aprender de uma maneira fácil como utilizar as ferramentas corretas para fazer uma matriz de bordado de qualidade. Se você não tem a mínima noção de como começar no programa Wilcom, este curso é para você. Ensino como importar a imagem para o programa, e depois como você vai usar as principais ferramentas para fazer suas matrizes, aprenda a sobreposição de cores e como dar os ângulos dos pontos para que o bordado fique com um ótimo resultado.
Vamos aprender a utilizar o programa com projetos reais, a cada aula vamos finalizar uma matriz de bordado que vai ajudar você fixar o conhecimento, assim criamos uma base de conhecimento sólida e intuitiva que facilita seu aprendizado.

courses.title: How to Make Handmade Anklets

Learn about handmade jewelry techniques

Introduce a range of jewellery making techniques
requirements: No jewelry making experience is needed. The course will give all the necessary information on jewelry making.
The course will provide information regarding the tools and findings that the future jewelry creator will need to buy if he intends to make handmade jewelry.
courses.description: Anyone who has received handmade anklets as gifts will confirm that those pieces are unique and are easy to identify as handmade items. People who select to make anklets on their own always make sure that their design is unique and defines their personality. The freedom of making personalized designs is made possible by a wide range of materials available for buying such as crystals, plastic, metals or gemstones. Jewelry was initially created to enhance a person's beauty. In the past people also created jewelry to exhibit their power and rank. Now wearing accessories has become a trend with an increasing number of people preferring to wear handmade jewelry. Did you think often about buying jewelry that is handmade? Handmade products are considered to be more expensive due to the extra time, work and materials used in manufacturing them. In the jewelry making business, tools and techniques are important to create really unique pieces that will attract the attention of buyers. This is why even anklets that are made of less costly materials like plastics, wood, clay, and crystals can be a real work of art. The question that arises in the mind of any buyer is if handmade anklets are indeed more beautiful than factory made items?
target_audience: People who want to learn how to create handmade jewelry and start their own jewelry business
People who want to start a jewelry business and want to turn their hobby into a job.

Unlock the joy of crochet with our “Crochet Kanata Kerchief Tank” course, designed specifically for beginners and those looking to refresh their skills. In this easy-to-follow class, you'll learn how to create a stylish and versatile tank top using simple square motifs. Whether you're new to crochet or an experienced crafter, this course will guide you through each step with clear instructions and helpful tips.

By the end of this course, you'll have a chic Kanata Kerchief Tank ready to wear and the confidence to tackle future crochet projects with ease. Join us and start creating your handmade wardrobe today!

courses.description:
Welcome to "3D Virtual Fashion Simulation: Using Clo3D and Blender” a comprehensive Udemy course designed to help you transform your design ideas into mesmerizing 3D fashion simulations and catwalk animations using Clo3D, and then successfully import the 3D design and its animation into Blender.


No prior experience in fashion and pattern making is needed for this course.


In this course, we will explore some fundamental techniques of Clo3D, focusing on creating a show-stopping red carpet dress. You'll learn the essential tools and features of Clo3D to bring your designs to life, from draping and pattern making to garment simulation and texturing.


But that's not all! We will also dive into the world of animation using Clo3D's built-in animation tools, as well as importing motion data from Mixamo to add realistic movement to your designs. This will enable you to create captivating animations that showcase your designs in motion, capturing the essence of your creations and taking your portfolio to the next level.


Once you have mastered the art of animating your designs in Clo3D, we will move on to Blender, where you will learn how to seamlessly import your animations into Blender.


By the end of this course, you will have the skills and confidence to create stunning 3D virtual fashion simulations and animations that are sure to impress.
So, are you ready to embark on an exciting journey into the world of 3D virtual fashion design?
Enroll now and let's get started!
target_audience: 3D artists and designers interested in learning about digital fashion and applying their skills to create stunning garments and animations
Fashion brands and businesses looking to incorporate 3D virtual fashion simulations into their design process, product presentations, or marketing efforts
Individuals with a basic understanding of 3D software or design principles who are eager to learn more about the applications of 3D technology in the fashion industry.

• Learn how to add buttons.
• Learn how to finish off the piece properly with an overhand knot so that it never comes undone.
• PLUS tips on how to effectively market your jewelry if you choose to start a business, how to present your jewelry as gifts, and how to make your jewelry as appealing as possible.
When you learn how to make lovely hemp earrings, you will have a unique craft that you can use to make gifts for your loved ones, create a jewelry business with, and create jewelry for yourself that will earn you tons of compliments!
Stand out from the crowd with this unique and virtually unheard of craft. Everyone will love your earrings, including you!
About the Expert
Robyn McComb has been making hemp jewelry since she was eleven years old. After her first macramé bracelet, she was hooked. Since learning the unique craft of knotting hemp jewelry, Robyn has undertaken a lifelong journey of learning new knots and experimenting with new styles of jewelry.
When she was twenty, she invented hemp earrings after realizing that she never saw them for sale anywhere. She has sold jewelry in stores and has created her own online Etsy business, Robyn’s Nest Creations. She has also taught basic hemp jewelry making techniques at her local community college. This is her first course on the topic.
target_audience: Art Students

courses.title: NAKIŞ DESİNATÖRLÜĞÜ ACCURATE 4 VE 5 TEMEL EĞİTİMİ 1.KUR
courses.bio: Brode,Nakış,Gipür,Abiye,Ev Tekstili,Gelinlik,Konfeksiyon desenleri çizim ve punch işlemleri nasıl yapılmalıdır.

Sanayi ve ev tipi nakış makineleri için, bilgisayar destekli desen hazırlama programı olan, Accurate 4 ve 5 programını, sektöre, piyasa ve makine şartlarına uygun halde kullanmayı öğrenerek, hayalini kurduğunuz tekstil tasarımı kariyer hedefinize, bir adım daha yaklaşabilirsiniz. Piyasa içinde sizden beklenenleri önceden bilecek ve buna uygun tasarımları istenen düzeyin üstünde niteliklerle tamamlayabileceksiniz. Eğitim videoları sayesinde geri dönük sorunları karşınıza çıktığı anda nasıl bertaraf edeceğinizi bileceğiniz sürekli bir arşive sahip olacaksınız.
Alacağınız eğitim sayesinde, ister konuya dahil sektör firmalarında işe girebilir, ister bu gibi firmalar için online çalışma düzeninde, istediğiniz yerden ve istediğiniz kadar çalışarak, desenler tasarlayabilir, isterseniz kendi ajans ve ofisinizi kurarak, sektör içinde yeni bir online iş sahibi olabilirsiniz.
Nakış, brode, gipür nedir? Tasarımları nasıl olmalıdır? Punch nedir ve nasıl yapılır? Dikkat edilmesi gereken detaylar nelerdir?Doğru ve spesifik fikirler nasıl oluşturulur? Multidisipliner düşünce tarzında nasıl desen oluşturulur?
Tüm bu soruların cevaplarını Accurate 4 ya da 5 eğitim videolarını izleyerek bilgi deponuza saklayacak ve yeri geldiğinde kullanabileceksiniz.
İlk andan son ana kadar tasarım ve punch süreci nasıl işleme alınır ve makinede nakış işlemesi çalışılıp elde edilene kadar olan süreç nasıl ilerler tüm detaylarıyla anlatımlarına sahip olabileceksiniz.
Tüm süreçlerle ilgili derinlemesine bilgi alacağınız gibi, gelecekte vizyone ve deneyimli bir punchor olarak çalışmalarınıza profesyonel firmalarla devam edebilirsiniz.

courses.title: Sewing Patterns: Finding the Right Size for You
courses.bio: You can become an expert at selecting the right size for you in any sewing pattern!
objectives: How to use the size charts on sewing patterns to select the right size that works for your body.
Learn to measure sewing patterns to an accurate picture of how a pattern will fit on your body before you even cut it out.
Learn the history sewing patterns and modern sizing and why sizing is not standardized.
Learn to use a light box to copy your patterns so you will never lose the original.
Learn why you should make sample fitting garments.
Discover what and how ease is used in sewing patterns and how ease affects fit and size selection.

History of Patterns and Ready to Wear Si: History of Pattern Sizing and Ready to Wear Sizing
Using Stretch Fabrics: Stretch vs Woven Fabrics and Stretch Fabric Recovery
Learning to Select a Size on Your Patter: Deciding What Sizes to Print in a PDF Pattern
Working a Pattern - Start to Finish: Selecting the Size on the Back of the Envelope
Using the Finished Hip Size Markings

requirements: You will need a basic/beginner knowledge of how to read and use a sewing pattern and an open mind!
courses.description:
Selecting a size in a sewing pattern can be confusing and frustrating. In this class you will learn how to select the right size in a sewing pattern for your body so you can get closer to that perfect fit before you even cut your pattern. I will teach you all about the different aspects where to measure your body, how to shop for sewing patterns, and how to select the perfect size for you.


You will learn about:
The history of sewing patterns and ready to wear sizing
Tips for accurate body measurements
A step by step guide on where and how to get key measurements on your body
What ease is and how it affects sewing patterns
Learn how woven and knit fabrics differ in sewing patterns
Learn how to check for stretch recovery and stretch percentage in your pattern and how it applies to sewing patterns
Learn how to use size charts on sewing patterns and tips on how to select your size if you measurements are not on the chart
Learn my tips for selecting sizes in PDF sewing patterns
Learn how to measure every part of sewing pattern pieces
Learn when you should select the "wrong" size
Learn to go start to finish from the size chart to measuring the pattern to a final size selection
Learn to copy sewing patterns using a light box
Learn why about sample garments and sizing


Why should you take this class?
Anyone learning to sew garments will interact with sewing patterns. Selecting the right size in a sewing pattern can be confusing and size charts are not enough alone to make a selection on size. By the end of this course you will be confident that you can select the right size in any sewing pattern so you can sew garments that fit better on you.


Why learn from me?
I have been sewing and creating in textile arts for over 25 years and teaching sewing for over 5 years. I learned as a small child from my grandmother. Sewing has been passed down as a skill in my family for several generations.
I continued my learning by taking classes from instructors around the world, including classes with Hand and Lock in London. I have worked in custom bridal, special occasion, and historical costuming. I have won several awards for my costumes.
target_audience: Beginner to intermediate people learning how to sew and design garments

courses.title: Basics Of Shuttle Tatting - Introduction To Tatting
courses.bio: Shuttle Tatting Basics, Terminologies and Different Types Of Stitches Used in Shuttle Tatting
objectives: Basics Of Shuttle Tatting
Terminologies Used in Shuttle Tatting
Basic Materials Required For Shuttle Tatting
Different Types of Stitches In Shuttle Tatting

Introduction: How to make Single Knot -1 in Tatting
How to make Single Knot -2 in Tatting
How to make Double Knot in Tatting
How to make Picot Stitch in Tatting

requirements: Absolutely none, except the interest to learn
You will definitely need the materials
courses.description:
Hello Crafters !! Have you ever wondered what exactly is Tatting? Let us get to know about Tatting. Tatting is a technique for handcrafting a particularly durable lace from a series of knots and loops. Tatting can be used to make lace edging as well as doilies, collars, accessories such as earrings and necklaces, and other decorative pieces. The lace is formed by a pattern of rings and chains formed from a series of double stitches, over a core thread. Gaps can be left between the stitches to form picots, which are used for practical construction as well as decorative effect. So in this course you will learn what are the basic materials required for shuttle tatting, how to work different types of stitches using a shuttle and also terminologies used. This Course starts with how to hold the shuttle and prepare the same for tatting and we will also learn how to work Single Knots, Double Knots and Picot Stitches which are a very important part of Shuttle Tatting.
Since this is a Basic Course we will only learn how to work the stitches, very soon I will posting another course on how to do basic designs like small flowers, rings, lace etc. Before we get to that you will have to be very thorough with the stitches so my suggestion for you guys is to practice really well.
target_audience: People who want to learn Shuttle Tatting
People interested in making Lace
People in search of a creative hobby
Beginners in Tatting

courses.description:
Questo corso è pensato per chiunque abbia sempre sognato di realizzare un proprio brand nel mondo della moda!
Grazie a esempi concreti e strumenti pratici, metterò a vostra disposizione tutta l'esperienza che ho accumulato in questi dodici anni lavorando a stretto contatto con stilisti emergenti. Imparerete come, prima ancora di realizzare dei capi, e ancor prima di avere una collezione completa, sia fondamentale avere un brand che incarni e raccolga tutti i nostri valori fondamentali.


Sarete guidati passo dopo passo attraverso i vari concetti chiave, e avrete la possibilità di confrontarvi direttamente con me su come procedere in ogni fase del processo. Questo non è solo un corso teorico: è un percorso interattivo che mira a trasformare la vostra visione in realtà tangibile. Approfondiremo tematiche come:
il posizionamento di mercato
la definizione del target di riferimento
lo sviluppo di una identità di marca coerente
l'importanza del packaging e del branding visivo.
L'importanza della definizione strategica del vostro brand PRIMA DI REALIZZARE DEI PRODOTTI


Attraverso esercizi pratici, studi di caso e sessioni di brainstorming, sarete stimolati a pensare in modo critico e creativo. Imparerete a definire la missione e la visione del vostro brand, a costruire una storia convincente che parli al cuore del vostro pubblico e a sviluppare una strategia di marketing efficace che promuova la vostra unicità nel mercato.
target_audience: Studenti di moda che voglio affiancare al loro percorso accademico un corso pratico fatto da chi lavora davvero tutti i giorni nella moda
Professionisti del settore che hanno sempre desiderato creare qualcosa di loro ma non hanno mai "osato"
Blogger e influencers che vogliono usare la loro influenza per vendere cose create da loro ai loro follower
Proprietari di negozi che vogliono avere una loro collezione per vendere qualcosa di unico e smettere di essere una commodity
Appassionati di moda che si sono sempre chiesti: "ma se volessi cominciare a fare moda da dove mai potrei partire?"
Sarti, modellisti che sono tecnicamente bravissimi ma non sanno nulla di marketing

Chiunque voglia vendere "qualcosa" che si differenzi dai propri competitors (sia che si tratti di bigiotteria, gioielli, oggettistica) molti dei principi che tratto sono trasversali e possono essere applicati facilmente ad altri campi
Chiunque ha un'idea "innovativa e geniale" per un prodotto fisico/manufatto/oggetto e non si è ancora confrontato con il mercato
